Around 15 April 2023 (month of), between Machala and Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), a man was killed and their dismembered and charred body found. Some body parts of the victim were found in Machala while others were found in the Autoridad Portuaria neighborhood, Puerto Bolivar. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 April 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed men shot and killed a man along Rocafuerte Street near the Verdi Cevallos Balda hospital. The perpetrators arrived on a motorcycle, but stepped off when they approached the victim to shoot him various times. A girl nearby was injured by a stray bullet. Police forces gave chase to the perpetrators soon after the attack, resulting in an unspecified man being injured in an unspecified manner during the chase. There is no further information available. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 April 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), at least two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man along 9 de Octubre and 4 de Agosto streets. The perpetrators shot the man various times. Soon after the attack, police forces intercepted and arrested two of the suspected perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 15 April 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen riding motorcycles killed a man riding a bicycle in a drive-by shooting in the Gonzalez Rubio neighborhood of the La Sapera sector. The perpetrators shot the victim at least 10 times. 1 fatality.

On 15 April 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators described as suspected extortionists threw an explosive device at the building of a public bus cooperative along Costa Rica and Machala streets in the 24 de Mayo neighborhood, causing an explosion that injured one woman. People were in the area at the time and ran away due to the explosion. The source indicates that the explosion was thrown as a threat from suspected extortionists. There were no fatalities.

On 15 April 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen traveling on two vehicles shot and killed two people in their car in a drive-by shooting along Ruta del Rio. The victims were a man and a woman, who were a couple driving along the road. The perpetrators used guns of three different calibers to shoot at victims. The bullets were from a 5.56-mm rifle, a 9-mm pistol, and a 45-mm pistol. The man was shot four times in the head and thorax, dying in the car, while the woman was shot twice in the head and once in the leg and died later at a hospital. At least 25 bullet shells were found at the scene. 2 fatalities.

On 15 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), six unidentified armed men described as hitmen shot and killed four people in the Nueva Prosperina housing cooperative. The perpetrators first entered a house on foot and shot and killed a man inside. Sources indicate that the perpetrators mistook their target, so they then entered the house across the street and shot and killed three people inside, including two minors. The suspects left the scene on three motorcycles. Police authorities suspected that the attackers were looking for drugs, but also stated the none of that victims had a criminal record. Shortly after, police forces exchanged fire with the suspected perpetrators (coded separately). 4 fatalities.

On 15 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Letamendi (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling by vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting along Yolanda Baquerizo and Federico Godin streets. Police authorities indicate that the victim was not the target of the attack, as the perpetrators were aiming at a nearby unspecified individual. One other man who was driving nearby was injured by a stray bullet. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

On 16 April 2023, in Catarama (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling by vehicle attacked a group of people in a drive-by shooting along Justin Landivar and Burgos streets, killing one man and injuring another. The killed man was shot in the head an unspecified number of times, while the injured man was shot once in the chest, once in the torso, twice in the right arm, twice in the jaw, and once in the thorax. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; La Republica (Ecuador); Policia DMG Zona 8
notes: On 16 April 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), at least four unidentified armed perpetrators kidnapped a woman as she waited for a taxi along Francisco de Orellana Avenue for ransom. The perpetrators demanded USD 30,000 for the woman's release. Police authorities liberated the victim on 19 April in a raid on a house in Chongon. They arrested four perpetrators and confiscated two guns. Three of the perpetrators were Ecuadorian nationals, and the other was a Dominican national.

On 16 April 2023, in Puyo (Pastaza), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle shot and injured three people in a restaurant in a drive-by shooting near the Terminal Terrestre bus station. There is no further information available. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: FARC Dissident - Urias Rondon Mobile Column: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Urias Rondon)
source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 17 April 2023, in San Lorenzo de Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police authorities arrested the leader of Los Tiguerones in the El Cementerio neighborhood. The gang leader is a Colombian national with a connection to Urias Rondon FARC Dissidents. Police authorities suspected him of being the executioner of a Los Tiguerones attack on fishermen in Esmeraldas on 11 April (coded separately). The man was captured during police raids in the 26 de Junio and La Guacharaca neighborhoods, known Los Tiguerones-controlled areas, where two other gang members were also arrested. Los Tiguerones have links with Los Lobos gang and the Jalisco New Generation Cartel, but sources indicate that the man arrested had connections with Urias Rondon FARC Dissidents.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 17 April 2023, in Milagro (Guayas), four armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed an ex-footballer and reality show personality at his gym in the Ciudadela Nuevo Milagro neighborhood. The armed perpetrators arrived in a vehicle and parked outside of a gym owned by the victim. They entered the building to shoot him various times with at least one 9-mm caliber pistol and a rifle. Security video footage showed two of the armed perpetrators shooting the victim repeatedly while he was on the ground. The perpetrators also shot the victim's bodyguard, who was injured. The bodyguard had a criminal record for two counts of robbery. The victim had previously been attacked on 10 November 2022 (coded separately). There is no further information on the identity or motivation of the attackers. 1 fatality.

On 17 April 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling by vehicle attacked two persons traveling by motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in the 15 de Abril neighborhood. A male taxi driver was shot and injured by a stray bullet. There is no information on whether the targets of the attack were injured. There were no fatalities.

On 17 April 2023, in Arenillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man and a woman as they rode on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in the Ciudadela Franklin Jimenez neighborhood. Authorship and motivation unknown. 2 fatalities.

Defusal: On 17 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police authorities safely detonated a device placed by unidentified individuals in the Los Ceibos sector. No further information is available.

On 17 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a street vendor while he was working at the Metrovia bus stop at kilometer 5.5 of the road to Daule. The attackers were arrested by police shortly after. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 April 2023, in Picoaza (Portoviejo, Manabi), various unidentified armed individuals shot at a house various times. The armed individuals then left the scene in a vehicle. There is no further information available. There were no casualties.

On 17 April 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), four unidentified armed men traveling by vehicle attacked and injured a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Pantano sector in San Cristobal parish. The man was taken to the Sagrado Corazon de Jesus hospital, where police and soldiers stood guard for at least 24 hours due to a suspected threat that the man would be attacked again. A local witness indicated hearing at least 18 shots during the attack. Authorship and motivation unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 18 April 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Colorados (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), residents of Jaramillo Delgado neighborhood captured, beat up and burned a man that they claimed was a robber. The man was a recycler that used to frequent the neighborhood to rummage trash and get materials to sell. The man died later in a hospital. 1 fatality.

On 18 April 2023, in Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators placed and detonated a homemade explosive device at the front door of a judicial police station in the Ciudadela Nueva Patria neighborhood in the Loma Pelada sector. The explosion from the device damaged the building's front door and broke the windshield of a nearby vehicle. There were likely people and police officials present at the location due to the time of the attack. There is no further information available. There were no casualties.

On 18 April 2023, in El Guabo (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling by vehicle injured three men in a drive-by shooting at a sports court in the Los Kioskos sector. The perpetrators drove past the court and shot indiscriminately at the people present. The three injured men were taken to a local hospital. There were no fatalities.

On 18 April 2023, in Machala (El Oro), various unidentified perpetrators threw an explosive device at a house along Corredor Noven Sur Street between 18 and 17 avenues, which exploded and damaged the house. Local residents were present at the time of the attack. There were no casualties.
On 18 April 2023, in Quiroga (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed six people. There is no further information available. 6 fatalities.

On 18 April 2023, in Yantzaza (Zamora Chinchipe), two armed individuals described as hitmen riding a motorcycle attacked a businessman as he arrived at his business in a drive-by shooting in the San Pedro sector. The businessman had a reinforced vehicle, which he used to try to ram the perpetrators' motorcycle to interrupt the attack. The victim nor the perpetrators were injured. Police authorities later arrested three men suspected of being connected with the attack. There were no casualties.

source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Policia DMZ Zona 9; Primicias
notes: Defusal: On 18 April 2023, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), police forces safely detonated an explosive artifact placed by unknown individuals at the El Recreo commercial center.

On 18 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), three unidentified armed men shot at a group of people attending a party in the 24 de Mayo housing cooperative in the Las Malvinas neighborhood, injuring two women. The perpetrators arrived at the scene on a motorcycle, at which point one of them got off the motorcycle and approached the party-goers on foot, opening fire. The attacker attempted to shoot at a male target who was being celebrated at the party, but missed the target and shot and injured two women instead. The attacker then joined the two other perpetrators on the motorcycle as they left the scene, but fell off the motorcycle nearby and hit his head on the curb. The man was hospitalized under police custody. The two women victims were hospitalized, with one of them in critical condition. The motivation of the attackers is unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: El Comercio (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 18 April 2023, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), two unidentified armed men (described as delinquents) shot and killed a private residential security guard in the La Esperanza neighborhood. Both perpetrators entered the neighborhood with rifles and were stopped by the security guard. They shot the security guard and left the area. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

On 19 April 2023, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified perpetrators riding a motorcycle threw an explosive device that detonated and damaged a home along 9 de Mayo Street while its residents were inside. Authorities suspected that the attack was due to extortion, as the residents had received extortion threats days before. There were no casualties.

On 19 April 2023, in Naranjal (Guayas), an unidentified armed individual shot and injured a male tattoo artist at his shop along Bolivar and Tarqui streets. The perpetrator entered the shop and shot the victim various times before fleeing the scene with an accomplice waiting for him on a motorcycle. Authorship and motivation unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; La Republica (Ecuador); Policia Ecuador
notes: On 19 April 2023, in San Lorenzo de Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police authorities arrested a prominent Los Tiguerones gang leader in the Zona Franca sector. The gang member was previously charged with killing a person in Imbabura on an unspecified date in 2016 and with another murder in Esmeraldas in 2018. This is part of the same police operation that also arrested another Los Tiguerones gang leader on 17 April (coded separately).

On 19 April 2023, in Loja (Loja), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a woman in a drive-by shooting in the Los Rosales neighborhood. The perpetrators intercepted the victim on their motorcycle and shot her, but one of them stepped off and chased the woman as she ran into a store to seek protection, shooting her once in the shoulder before running away. The woman had already suffered injuries from the initial wounds and died despite medical help. Authorities suspect that the woman had received death threats since the killing of her husband on 15 April (coded separately), and that the order to kill the woman had come from a criminal group inside Loja prison. 1 fatality.

On 19 April 2023, in Petrillo (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals traveling by motorcycle killed a man riding his motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in the Barrio Lindo sector. The perpetrators intercepted and shot the man along kilometer 40 of the road to Daule, leaving his body on the side of the road. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Mercurio (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 20 April 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), residents of Luis Cordero and Mariscal Lamar streets in the center of the city captured and beat up a man that had recently robbed a woman. They turned him to the police after. Also on 20 April, in Cuenca, a group of residents used sticks to beat up two men suspected of robbing a grocery store in the Ucubamba sector. Police intervened and arrested the individuals. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Comercio (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Policia Ecuador
notes: On 20 April 2023, in Machala (El Oro), around 50 people threw objects at two police officers who chased a criminal into the 4 de Abril neighborhood and set their motorcycle on fire. The criminals had escaped into the neighborhood and the police officers had gotten off their motorcycle to chase the criminals on foot. As this happened, a mob of around 50 people intercepted the officers to interrupt the arrest, threw objects at them, and burned the unattended police motorcycle. The police officers were reported injured. There is no further information available. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Regional Los Andes; Ecuador Comunicacion
notes: On 20 April 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police forces arrested a prominent Los Tiguerones gang leader. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Policia Ecuador
notes: Property destruction: Around 20 April 2023 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police authorities discovered and confiscated around 1 ton of cocaine. There is no further information available. Police authorities arrested three Ecuadorian nationals.

On 20 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed men described as criminals shot and killed three people at a private property in the Casas Viejas sector along the Guayaquil Coastal Road. The victims were drinking inside the building when armed men arrived on two motorcycles and opened fire on them. The perpetrators likely got off their motorcycles to shoot at the victims as they were found inside the building. The perpetrators also shot and injured a woman at the location. Authorship and motivation unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 20 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting at a restaurant in the Prosperina sector. The man was eating inside the restaurant when the perpetrators arrived and fired at him from outside. The victim then ran out of the restaurant, where he was shot once more. The perpetrators fired a total of three shots and hit the victim in the thorax. Reports indicate that the victim's family had not received previous threats. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 April 2023, in Nueva Loja (Sucumbios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling by vehicle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in a tattoo parlor where he was working along Amazonas Avenue and 8 Street. The perpetrators fired over 40 times with 9-mm bullets and 7.22 and 5.56 mm rifle rounds. Police authorities indicated that the victim had been arrested twice before for possessing illegal substances. 1 fatality.

Around 20 April 2023 (between 19 - 20 April), in Tosagua (Manabi), two armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man at the Malibu nightclub (an alternative source calls it a brothel). Authorship and motivation unknown. Two different reports contrast on whether the attack took place on 19 April or 20 April. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Mercurio (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Policia DMG Zona 8; Policia Ecuador
notes: Property destruction: On 21 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces confiscated around 2.4 tons of cocaine inside a house in the Urdesa sector. Police raided the house after local residents had reported suspicious activity at the house. There were no arrested made.

On 21 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals killed two men, one of whom was a national Ecuador Transit Commission (CTE) transit officer, at a barbershop in block 4 of the Flor de Bastion neighborhood. The armed perpetrators arrived at the restaurant on a motorcycle, after which one of them stepped off and entered the location to shoot at the two victims. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 21 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen and members of a criminal gang shot and killed a teenage boy in the Antonio Neumane housing cooperative in the Isla Trinitaria sector. The victim was walking with a family member, also a minor, whom the perpetrators tried to shoot but failed as the boy ran back into his house. The victim's family shared that they had received various threats from a local criminal gang due to one of their family members witnessing and reporting an unspecified crime. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 21 April 2023 (as reported), in Huaquillas (El Oro), police authorities confiscated over 1 ton of marijuana discovered in a house. Police arrested five people present and confiscated 123 rounds of 223-caliber bullets.

On 21 April 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified individuals described as extortionists threw an explosive device at a house in the Machalilla 1 neighborhood (likely with people inside because the attack happened in the early morning). The blast caused significant damage to the house. Along with the explosive, an extortion note was found demanding USD 5,000 in exchange for the homeowner's safety, accompanied by a photograph of the homeowner. There were no casualties.

On 21 April 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a man as he sat in a small park outside his home in the Ciudadela San Alejo neighborhood. The attacker fired four shots with a 9-mm pistol before fleeing the scene on a motorcycle with an accomplice waiting nearby. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 21 April 2023, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), a group of people beat up two suspected thieves while in a public bus along the Estacion Ofelia - La Marin route. Various people caught the two men stealing from them and hit them repeatedly while filming. Police intervened and arrested the two men. There were no fatalities.

On 21 April 2023, in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling by motorcycle killed a man as he drove in his car in a drive-by shooting along Gabriel Rivers Street in the La Caraguay sector. The perpetrators opened fire immediately after blocking the victim's path. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 21 April 2023 (as reported), in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), at least five unidentified perpetrators kidnapped a person. Police authorities liberated the victim on 21 April 2023 and arrested five suspects during a police operation in the city.

On 21 April 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), a group of vendors at the El Arenal market captured a suspected thief, doused him with cold water and nettles, and then handed him over to the police. Also on 21 April, local residents in two separate sectors of the city beat up suspected thieves (unspecified).
On 21 April 2023, in Banos (Azuay), a group of residents set fire to a motorcycle of a suspected extortionist they captured. It is unspecified whether they also beat up the extortionist.

Property destruction: On 21 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals blew up two parked trucks and a car with 100g of emulsion in the garage of a condominium in the Samanes 2. The attack caused material damage only and there were no civilians in the area. There were no casualties.

Around 22 April 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), the dismembered body of an unidentified man was discovered in a sack along a canal in the La Carolina sector of the Sergio Toral housing cooperative in Nueva Prosperina. The number and identity of the perpetrators is unknown. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

On 22 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen riding a motorcycle killed three people in a drive-by shooting in block 4 of the Bastion Popular neighborhood. There is no further information available. 3 fatalities.

Around 22 April 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and his body was found with hands tied in the Balerio Estacio housing cooperative. The number of perpetrators is unknown. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

Around 22 April 2023 (as reported), in Jaramijo (Manabi), a man was shot and killed by an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators described as hitmen and his body was found tied up and with signs of torture near a municipal landfill in the La Sequita sector. The victim had bullet wounds in the hand and chest and had a threatening note attached to his head. 1 fatality.

On 22 April 2023, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a man as he walked along the street in a drive-by shooting in the Rayito de Luz neighborhood. The perpetrators opened fire five to eight times, with two shots hitting the victim in the head. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Ecuador (2021-2023) Prison Guards; Students (Ecuador)
notes: On 22 April 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen opened fire on two men as they stood outside a wedding party along C 30 and Primero de Noviembre streets, killing one and injuring the other. The man who was killed was a police academy student, while the injured man next to him was an off-duty prison guard at the Guayaquil regional prison. Both victims were initially injured, but the police academy student died later at a hospital. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 April 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals killed a man in a drive-by shooting on the corner of Segunda and D streets in the 7 de Octubre parish. The victim sustained approximately ten bullet wounds to the head and torso. He was rushed to a nearby hospital, where he was pronounced dead. Police authorities stated that the victim had no prior criminal record. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 April 2023, in Rosa Zarate (Esmeraldas), unidentified perpetrators were suspected of abducting a taxi driver. The driver disappeared shortly after fueling his car at a gas station on the outskirts of the city.

On 23 April 2023, in Bahia de Caraquez (Manabi), two armed men riding a motorcycle killed a man outside his home in a drive-by shooting in the Cristo del Consuelo neighborhood, in the Leonidas Plaza parish. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 23 April 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a man was drugged, stabbed, and killed and his dead body was found with a cloth tied around his mouth next to a gutter in the Julio Coll housing cooperative. The victim had been drugged with Scopolamine (also known as Devil's Breath). Police authorities discovered a man, naked and unconscious, 1.5 kilometers away in the Abel Gilbert 2 housing cooperative, who had also been drugged with Scopolamine. The man recovered and told authorities that he took a taxi after work in the center of Guayaquil with a friend. It is unspecified whether the friend mentioned is the killed victim or whether the two men were kidnapped. No further information is available. 1 fatality.

On 23 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and left his dead body, with hands and feet tied with packing tape, in an empty lot in the 12 de Octubre housing cooperative in the Mapasingue Oeste sector. The perpetrators taped the man to the head and shot him several times with 9-mm bullets. Local residents heard several gunshots and walked up to investigate, calling the police when they saw the body. 1 fatality.

On 23 April 2023, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), three armed individuals described as hitmen shot and injured a man in a nightclub near Montanita beach. The hitmen shot the victim in the head and abdomen. Police authorities tracked the hitmen down shortly after the attack and arrested them. The perpetrators were two Ecuadorian nationals and one Venezuelan national. There is no further information on the motivation of the perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 24 April 2023, in El Pan (Azuay), approximately 150 residents of El Pan, Sevilla de Oro and Huachapala captured, tied to a post and beat up the driver of a truck that transported stolen cattle. They burned down his truck, and later police officer rescued the truck driver.

On 24 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Letamendi (Guayas), residents of Alfredo Valenzuela and Francisco Segura streets attempted to forcibly rescue two men that had been arrested with guns moments before by police officers. The group attacked the police officers. Two from the group were arrested for carrying firearms, and another was arrested for interfering with police work.

On 24 April 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), a group of local residents captured and beat up a suspected thief in the Indurama neighborhood. The residents stopped a vehicle in which three men who had robbed in the neighborhood were driving. They pulled one of the men out and beat him repeatedly before police intervened to arrest the suspect. Police arrived quickly, and the other two men were already in the police vehicle when the mob attacked the third suspected thief. There were no fatalities.

On 24 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals riding motorcycles (described as hitmen and members of a criminal gang) opened fire on a family in their home in a drive-by shooting in the Antonio Neumane housing cooperative in the Isla Trinitaria sector. The family was inside the home and hid for cover as the perpetrators fired over 20 shots with 9-mm bullets and rifle rounds. The victim's family shared that they had received various threats from a local criminal gang due to one of their family members witnessing and reporting an unspecified crime. One of their family members had been killed by the same group of criminals on 21 April (coded separately). There were no casualties.

On 24 April 2023, in La Concordia (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a municipal control agent near the La Concordia Judicial Unit building. The victim was riding a motorcycle en route to his workplace at the Judicial Unit when the perpetrators shot him multiple times. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 April 2023, in Pelileo (Tungurahua), three unidentified perpetrators kidnapped a girl as she walked to school. Police authorities liberated the victim on 27 April in the Banos canton during a police operation in which they also arrested the three perpetrators.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 24 April 2023, in Portoviejo, two armed men described as criminals and hitmen riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting along 20 de Julio Street in the San Pablo parish. The victim was shot various times. 1 fatality.

On 24 April 2023, on the road between Portoviejo and Manta (coded to Portoviejo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle injured two men in a drive-by shooting in the San Pedro sector along the Portoviejo-Manta highway. The perpetrators intercepted the victims as they stopped their vehicle at a traffic light. The victims managed to drive to the emergency room of the IESS hospital in Portoviejo for treatment of their gunshot wounds. There is no further information available. There were no fatalities.

Property destruction: On 24 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), four unidentified perpetrators traveling together in a vehicle set fire to a restaurant in the Urdesa sector due to extortion. One of the perpetrators stepped off the vehicle and threw gasoline onto the building.

On 24 April 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), residents at the Cristo del Consuelo neighborhood captured and beat up a man accused of robbing a citizen moments before. The police arrived and took control of the situation. There were no fatalities.

On 25 April 2023, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), parents of students of a school at the north of the city captured and beat up the school janitor that has been accused of sexually assaulting at least 12 students.

On 25 April 2023, in Picoaza (Portoviejo, Manabi), a woman who was a minor was killed and her body found in Picoaza parish. The victim had been tied up and shot repeatedly, and her body was found soon after the incident. 1 fatality.

On 25 April 2023, in Bahia de Caraquez (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen riding a motorcycle shot and killed a father and son in a drive-by shooting near the Los Caras bridge connecting Sucre and San Vicente. The victims were traveling on two motorcycles from San Vicente to Bahia de Caraquez when the assailants opened fire on them. The father died at the scene, while the son died later at a hospital. Neither victim had a criminal record. Authorship and motivation unknown. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former Unidentified Gang (Ecuador); Police Forces of Ecuador (2021-2023); Students (Ecuador)
notes: On 25 April 2023, in Bajo Alto (El Oro), an unknown number of masked individuals shot and killed a man who was studying to become a police officer in his home in the Las Palmas neighborhood. The assailants arrived on a motorcycle and entered the house of the victim, who was asleep when the assailants shot him. Another person in the home was injured in the attack. Police collected 10 bullet shells from the scene. The victim had a criminal record for weapon and drug offenses. The victim was likely no longer involved in drug trafficking as he was attempting to become a police officer. 1 fatality.

On 25 April 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen riding a motorcycle (likely two based on the wording of the source) killed a motorcycle delivery man as he worked in a drive-by shooting along Salinas Street near the Roberto Luis Cervantes Children's Park. The attackers shot the victim at least eight times, with some bullets hitting his head. Witnesses indicates that one of the perpetrators wore a school uniform, suggesting he was a minor. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals traveling on motorcycles placed and detonated an explosive device at the doorstep of a family-owned business in the Ladrillera sector of the Nueva Prosperina district. The family paid an extortion fee to an unspecified criminal gang and reported that the day before the attack, members of a different unspecified gang approached them and demanded that they also be paid an extortion fee. The family refused, and the perpetrators returned the next day to place the explosive while the family was inside, which detonated and damaged the building. There were no casualties.

On 25 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling by multiple vehicles fired multiple shots into a home in a drive-by shooting in the Los Geranios neighborhood, injuring three minors. The three minors were home alone at the time of the attack (likely they were not the targets). One of the armed men was captured and sentenced to jail by police authorities. Authorship and motivation unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 25 April 2023 (between 24 - 25 April), in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped and then killed a man and left his body, with hands and feet tied and wrapped in sheets, in the Entre Rios neighborhood. The victim had sustained three gunshot wounds to the head. The perpetrators had forced the man into their vehicle the night before along 18 de Agosto Avenue, behind the Alberto Spencer Stadium. The body was shot elsewhere and left at the place where it was discovered. Police authorities indicated that the victim had a criminal record related to micro-trafficking and was recently released from prison. The attack is believed to be an act of revenge linked to his past criminal activities. 1 fatality.

On 25 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified men shot and killed a man in front of a store he owned in the Juan Montalvo sector. The perpetrators fired at him with a 9mm firearm while he was closing his shop. The victim's son stated that the man had received threats related to extortion from unidentified gangs operating in the area. It is suspected that the victim had refused to pay an extortion fee. 1 fatality.

Around 26 April 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators shot and killed a man and left his dead body wrapped in a bag among trash behind a school in the Los Cerezos housing cooperative. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 26 April 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), police authorities confiscated over 2 tons of cocaine during a police operation in which they also arrested 21 individuals.

On 26 April 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed men described as hitmen traveling by a motorcycle and a car opened fire on two municipal construction workers as they worked on a street in a drive-by shooting in the Urseza neighborhood, killing them. The two male construction workers were the targets of the attack. Two other adults and one young girl were injured by stray bullets. One of the two adults, a woman who was shot while in her house, died later in the hospital. The perpetrators fired over 40 times. Authorship and motivation unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 26 April 2023 (as reported), in the rural area of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas canton (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture, over 10 bullet wounds, and a mutilated hand on the rural road leading to the Nuevo Israel community. Police authorities recovered 15 bullet shells and one 9-mm bullet. The number of perpetrators is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 April 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a woman, the director of the National Transit Agency (ANT), as she drove on the Las Mercedes road. Residents of Las Mercedes-El Toachi heard gunshots and a vehicle speeding away at the time of the woman's kidnapping. The victim's abandoned truck was later found with two flat tires, and a burnt vehicle, potentially used by the kidnappers, was also discovered by authorities. Police officers from the Anti-Kidnapping and Extortion Unit (UNASE) and officials from the Prosecutor's Office were involved in an operation that liberated the woman on 28 April 2023. Authorities did not provide further details on the operation. Authorship and motivation unknown.

On 27 April 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), residents of the Kennedy citadel burned a motorcycle that was owned by people accused of being robbers. The residents surrounded a house where they thought the suspected thieves were staying, and police arrived to prevent a lynching by the group, and allowed the suspects and their families to leave the area. After, the group burned the motorcycle left behind.

On 27 April 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and wounded two people in a drive-by shooting in the Nuevos Horizontes neighborhood. Both victims were hospitalized, and one later succumbed to his wounds. 1 fatality.

Around 27 April 2023 (as reported), in Machala (El Oro), a man was killed and his head was discovered in a backpack wrapped in trash bags along Circunvalacion Norte Avenue in the Los Sauces sector. Local witnesses indicated seeing two men riding a motorcycle throwing the backpack as they rode past. Shortly after discovering the head, police authorities discovered the man's severed leg hanging from a pedestrian bridge on the Machala - Puerto Bolivar road. The leg was visible from the street and was encased in a black bag. Police authorities suspect that the body parts were left as intimidating messages between rival criminal organizations competing for control over the area. Preliminary findings suggest the victim was mutilated with a saw. The victim had been reported missing on 25 April. 1 fatality.

On 27 April 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen traveling by motorcycle killed a man sitting on a sidewalk in a drive-by shooting along Vicente Mendoza Street in the Ciudadela San Alejo neighborhood. The man was shot with 9-mm bullets. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 April 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Los Esteros neighborhood. Residents reported hearing several gunshots and found the victim's body in the street. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 April 2023, in San Clemente (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen traveling by vehicle shot and killed a lawyer as he sat in his car outside his home in a drive-by shooting along Quito and Las Monjas streets. The victim was shot at least seven times. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 27 April 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of Mafia-18 gang members kidnapped a man for extortion in the Petrillo sector. Police authorities liberated the victim on 27 April during a police raid in which they also arrested six perpetrators and confiscated unspecified explosives, weapons, and drugs. The kidnapped man was an unspecified foreign national.

Defusal: On 27 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces carried out a controlled detonation of an explosive device placed on the window of a house in the Mucho Lote 1 sector. The house also serves as a meat-selling business. The placement of the explosive is likely due to extortion, as similar events were reported throughout the city due to extortion, but there is no further information available. Police authorities are investigating whether the explosive was placed due to extortion.
Property destruction: On 28 April 2023, in Atuntaqui (Imbabura), the house of the mayor of Antonio Ante was shot by unidentified assailants. The mayor was out of the country the moment of the attack.

On 28 April 2023, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), approximately 500 residents captured and beat up a Spanish woman accused of extorting local businesses in the Carcelen Bajo sector. The woman was then arrested and transferred into police custody. There were no fatalities.

On 28 April 2023, in Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man while he was with his son and partner outside a health center in a drive-by shooting in the Juan Bautista neighborhood. The victim was riding a motorcycle with his family when the perpetrators fired over 15 shots, hitting the man in the head and thorax, killing him instantly. His partner was injured with gunshot wounds to her thorax and leg and was hospitalized in critical condition. The child was unharmed. Police found over six 9-mm shell casings at the scene. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 28 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces conducted a controlled detonation of an explosive device found in the parking lot of the national Alban Borja Judicial Complex along Carlos Julio Arosemena Avenue. The explosive device was left by an unknown number of perpetrators with a threatening note signed by Los Tiguerones.

On 28 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen and members of a criminal gang placed and detonated a grenade at a family home in the Antonio Neumane housing cooperative in the Isla Trinitaria sector. The device detonated and caused structural damage to the target home and further caused damage to three surrounding houses. One person was inside at the time of the attack, but was not injured. The targeted family shared that they had received various threats from a local criminal gang due to one of their family members witnessing and reporting an unspecified crime. The family had experienced two separate attacks by gunfire on 21 and 24 April (both coded separately), in the first of which a teenage boy was killed. There were no casualties.

On 28 April 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of armed perpetrators traveling by taxi injured two men and a minor in a drive-by shooting on Velasco Ibarra and Guayas streets. The assailants opened fire on the victims as they were conversing outside a house. All three victims were hospitalized. Police reported that two of the victims are in serious condition. There were no fatalities.

On 28 April 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of masked individuals described as hitmen shot and injured two men who were dining in a restaurant in the Autoridad Portuaria neighborhood. The perpetrators were armed with rifles and fled the scene on a motorcycle. Authorship and motivation unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 28 April 2023, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), three unidentified armed perpetrators described as hitmen shot and killed a man at a volleyball court. The attackers approached the victim while he was watching a sports event and opened fire, shooting him various times. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 April 2023, in Checa (Azuay), a group of people beat a man after accusing him of being a thief, in the San Miguel sector. The crowd also set his car on fire. The man claimed he was innocent and said he was only visiting his family. There were no fatalities.

Around 28 April 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), at least two unidentified individuals kidnapped a male taxi driver for extortion as well as two other people. Police forces liberated the three victims during a raid in the Socio Vivienda sector in which they also arrested two perpetrators.

On 29 April 2023, in Guaranda (Bolivar), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man near the 24 de Mayo market in the Bellavista neighborhood. The shooting was suspected of being linked to drug trafficking. 1 fatality.
On 29 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Letamendi (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed three people at the intersection of Oriente and 36th streets. 3 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 29 April 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police discovered and confiscated approximately 1 ton of cocaine stored across 15 suitcases inside a shipping container of bananas scheduled for export to Switzerland.

On 29 April 2023, in Puyo (Pastaza), an unknown number of suspected gang members shot and killed a woman in the Rayo Arco sector of the Pituimi community. The victim was shot at least five times, and the motive of the attack is a suspected settling of scores between rival groups over drug trafficking. 1 fatality.

On 29 April 2023, in Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators opened fire on a house and detonated an explosive, damaging the targeted house and two neighboring homes. The residents of the affected houses were likely sleeping inside due to the time in which the attack took place. Authorship and motivation unknown. There were no casualties.

Around 29 April 2023 (as reported), in Jaramijo (Manabi), various unidentified perpetrators kidnapped a man. Police authorities liberated the man on 29 April. There is no further information available.

On 29 April 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Blanca Garcia neighborhood. The victim was targeted while walking in the area. The attackers fired at least seven shots before fleeing the scene. The victim was taken to a medical facility but died from his injuries. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 April 2023, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators described as delinquents kidnapped two men in an express kidnaping on Mariscal Sucre Avenue in the El Bosque sector. The victims were a surgeon and his friend, who were kidnapped and then abandoned on the same day in the Tambilo sector for a ransom of USD 2,000. The surgeon's car was left behind along Mariscal Sucre Avenue with its doors open and tires deflated, causing a traffic jam on the road.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Ecuador (2021-2023); UP: Popular Unity (Ecuador)
notes: On 29 April 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot at the house of the former Mayor of Esmeraldas (UP). There is no further information available. There were no fatalities.

Defusal: On 30 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police forces captured and destroyed 8 explosive devices belonging to an unidentified group (likely gang members due to connection with a previous attack) in Union de Bananeros neighborhood of Guasmo sector. Authorities suspect the devices may be linked to the same group that conducted an attack that killed ten people on 29 April at Gomez Rendon and 14th street (coded separately).

On 30 April 2023, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two people walking at the intersection of Parra and 34th streets. One of the victims was shot at least 20 times while the other was shot at least 10 times, but the motive for the attack is unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 30 April 2023 (weekend of), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a person in a drive-by shooting in Siete Lagos sector. 1 fatality.

Around 30 April 2023 (from 29 April - 1 May), in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a total of 13 people in separate events in the city which circumstances are unknown. 13 fatalities.

Around 30 April 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals killed at least one person and tore apart their body, leaving the victim's legs, arms, torso, and genitals to be found in Juan Montalvo community. It is not clear if the body parts all belonged to the same victim. At least 1 fatality.

source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: Around 30 April 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals killed two people and decapitated them, leaving the victims' wrapped heads to be found near Flor de Bastion community in Nueva Prosperina sector. The bodies formerly attached to these heads were later found in an advanced state of decomposition in a ditch in Nuevo Guayaquil sector on 4 May. Including this incident, eight bodies were found in the same ditch, known locally as the 'canal of death' between 4 and 10 May 2023 (coded separately). 2 fatalities.

On 30 April 2023, in Pedernales (Manabi), an unknown number of armed men described as hitmen opened fire inside a bar, killing three people at the intersection of Plaza Acosta and Malecon streets. 3 fatalities.

Around 30 April 2023 (as reported), near Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), a man was killed and his dismembered body was found wrapped in burlap sacks and plastic bags at kilometer four of the road to La Reforma. Police authorities suspect that the victim was killed elsewhere and that his body was placed there the previous night. The number of perpetrators is unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 1 May 2023 (as reported), on the road between Ancon and Atahualpa (coded to Atahualpa, Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals tied up, beat and shot a man in the head near an oil well where his body was found. Authorities noted that another person from the same neighborhood as the victim had been similarly tortured and killed in the same place on 21 March (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 1 May 2023, in Azogues (Canar), two unidentified armed individuals, described as hitmen, dismounted from a motorcycle and shot and killed a man on General Veintimilla street. The victim had an unspecified criminal record. 1 fatality.
On 1 May 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of armed men opened fire at a ceviche restaurant, killing three people and wounding one other in the 18 de Noviembre area. 3 fatalities.

On 2 May 2023, in El Esfuerzo (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), two armed and hooded individuals shot and killed a farm administrator in his vehicle before fleeing the scene on a motorcycle in the Redencion Social rural area. 1 fatality.

On 2 May 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a lawyer in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Manela Canizares and Cristobal Colon streets. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 2 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police captured and destroyed an explosive device planted at the entrance to a church on block 1B of the Bastion Popular neighborhood. The device was suspected to have been installed as an extortion tactic by an unidentified armed individual on a motorcycle.

On 2 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), multiple likely gang members on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in Nueva Prosperina sector. The victim had recently been released from prison. 1 fatality.

On 2 May 2023, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), friends and family members of a taxi driver captured and beat up two people who had previously beaten up the driver and stolen his car in La Magdalena sector. The suspects were then rescued and arrested by police. There were no fatalities.

On 2 May 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), armed and police forces arrested six members of Los Tiguerones gang. One of the suspects was a faction leader. Two firearms (including a rifle), a motorbike and two cell phones were seized.

Property destruction: Around 2 May 2023 (as reported), on the road between Duran and San Jacinto de Yaguachi (Guayas), police discovered and confiscated 1300 blocks of cocaine in a shed suspected of being used by an unidentified gang.

Around 3 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), a group of bus passengers captured, beat, and attempted to lynch one of two men who boarded the bus and attempted to rob everyone on it. Police intervened to rescue and arrest the beaten man, while the second suspect escaped the crowd and the police. There were no fatalities.

On 3 May 2023, in Ambato (Tungurahua), residents detained and beat up a suspected thief who had attempted to rob a store at the intersection of Los Shyris and Quingalumba roads. The suspect, who was later arrested and turned over to the police, was suspected to have been of foreign nationality. There were no fatalities.

Around 3 May 2023 (as reported), in El Guabo canton (coded to El Guabo, El Oro), an unknown number of armed assailants tied up, tortured, and killed a man by shooting him in the head, leaving his body to be found on the side of a road. 1 fatality.

source: El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Policia Ecuador; Primicias
notes: Property destruction: Around 3 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police discovered and seized almost 3 tons of cocaine. The drugs were hidden inside 125 sacks of flour destined to be transported from the port of Guayaquil to Germany.

Around 3 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of armed assailants tied up and put a bag over a man's head before shooting him repeatedly in the head and face until he died, leaving his body to be found in a ditch on block 21 of Valle de la Flor community in Flor de Bastion sector. The victim is believed to have been abducted elsewhere in the city and brought to the area to be killed. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 3 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), at least three unidentified armed individuals driving in a grey car shot and killed a chauffeur parked outside a bank on Hermano Miguel Avenue, in La Garzota sector. The perpetrators blocked the victim's car with their own and opened fire on the victim, eventually getting out and walking closer to the victim in order to shoot him at least three times total in the head. The victim had previously been arrested for robbery. 1 fatality.

On 3 May 2023, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Bellavista 3 neighborhood. The perpetrators called the victim and had him walk outside, whereupon they shot him seven times. The victim had a criminal record. 1 fatality.

On 3 May 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unidentified number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Nuevos Horizontes neighborhood. The victim had a criminal record. 1 fatality.

On 3 May 2023, in Quito district (Pichincha), residents detained and beat up two people described as delinquents in a northern neighborhood of the city. The victims were suspected of robbing multiple businesses in the area alongside at least three co-conspirators. Police intervened to arrest and rescue the suspects from the mob. There were no fatalities.

On 3 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two armed individuals described as Venezuelan hitmen shot and killed at least one person in Juan Montalvo community. The suspects were later detained by police. At least 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 3 May 2023 (as reported), in San Jacinto de Yaguachi canton (coded to San Jacinto de Yaguachi, Guayas), police discovered and confiscated 1.25 tons of cocaine hidden in a vehicle, under the floor, and inside of a banana container. Nearly 3 tons of cocaine hydrochloride were also confiscated, and six suspects were arrested in the operation.

On 4 May 2023, in Archidona (Napo), residents captured and beat up two men that were accused of being robbers. They also sprayed them with chili juice on the face as part of the punishment. There were no fatalities.

On 4 May 2023, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), residents captured and beat up with stones and sticks two men that had attempted to rob a restaurant. National police officers rescued the two men and took them to a police station.

On 4 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number (likely two due to mention of multiple perpetrators riding on a single motorcycle) of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorcycle shot and killed another man on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in La Fragata sector.1 fatality.

On 4 May 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the intersection of Carlos Regalado and Luis Leon Roman streets. The perpetrators shot the victim at least 11 times. 1 fatality.

On 4 May 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two likely gang members described as hitmen in a black vehicle opened fire on two people who were riding bicycles, killing one of them, in a drive-by shooting on Ejercito avenue at the entrance to Las Orquideas community. 1 fatality.

Around 4 May 2023 (as reported), in Sinincay (Azuay), residents captured, beat, and attempted to lynch an unidentified armed individual described as a suspected extortionist in Cochas community. Police later arrived to rescue and arrest the suspect. There were no fatalities.

On 4 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Rocafuerte (Guayas), two armed individuals (likely gang members due to driving a stolen car and taking orders from a gang leader to target a former gang member) described as delinquents shot and killed a woman between Garcia Aviles and Rumichacha streets. The area is known for drug trafficking and the victim was formerly part of a gang run by her former romantic partner, who ordered the attack against her while in prison for drug trafficking and robbery. The suspects were later arrested by police. 1 fatality.
tags: women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

notes: On 4 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Ayacucho (Guayas), a crowd of people attacked a taxi cab with stones and pipes at the intersection of Chile and Maldonado streets. The taxi was stuck in traffic at the intersection when bystanders noticed the cab's passengers were in distress, prompting a mob to form and attack the car in order to rescue three people who were victims of an express kidnapping. There were no fatalities.
On 4 May 2023, in Atacames canton (coded to Atacames, Esmeraldas), multiple armed individuals shot and killed a couple inside a house. 2 fatalities.

Around 5 May 2023 (as reported), in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), five armed individuals abducted two youths in an express kidnapping in the San Juan de Calderon sector. The victims were released after their families paid a USD 700 ransom.

Around 5 May 2023 (as reported), in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), five armed individuals abducted a person in an express kidnapping in the Bicentenario sector. The victim was rescued when police pursued and arrested the perpetrators that same day.

On 5 May 2023, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), two armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorcycle opened fire at two people in a drive-by shooting on Martha Bucaram de Roldos avenue, killing one of them. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 5 May 2023, in El Cambio parish (Machala), an unknown number of armed individuals used machetes to kill two field workers and leave their mutilated bodies on a banana plantation near the Pasaje-Machala highway. The victims disappeared after finishing work in the afternoon, and their bodies were found covered in banana leaves later the same evening. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 5 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), police discovered and confiscated 9.97 tons of sodium hydroxide, a cocaine precursor chemical, from a suspected drug lab in Pascuales sector. One person (likely gang member due to drug association) was also arrested in the operation.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 5 May 2023, in La Peana (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed field workers and left their bodies on the side of the road near a banana plantation. The perpetrators intercepted the victims' truck on motorcycles and forced the victims to get out and kneel down before shooting them. 5 fatalities.

Around 5 May 2023 (as reported), around Machala (El Oro), overnight, an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed three people, leaving their bodies to be found with unspecified signs of torture on the side of Via a Pajonal avenue. No ballistic evidence was present at the scene, leading authorities to suspect the victims had been killed elsewhere and brought to the area for disposal. 3 fatalities.

Around 5 May 2023 (as reported), in Imbabura province (coded to San Miguel de Ibarra, Imbabura), members of an indigenous community tied an individual described as a delinquent to a lamppost and took turns beating him up before turning him over to police. The victim was accused of attempting to rob a house. There were no fatalities.

On 5 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed the head of security for the Port of Guayaquil in a drive-by shooting near the victim's house in Las Malvinas sector. The victim, who had previously received threats from narcotrafficking gangs, was returning home from work when he was shot six times. 1 fatality.
Property destruction: On 5 May 2023, near Daule (Guayas), police captured around 10 tons of sodium hydroxide, a cocaine precursor ingredient, on a road leading to the city.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; Policia Ecuador; Primicias
notes: Defusal: On 6 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police responded to a suspected bomb threat at the Mall del Sur and detained a suspected member of Los Lobos gang carrying two explosive devices outside the mall. The devices were both destroyed by police in a controlled detonation.

Around 6 May 2023 (weekend of), in Tabuga (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals killed three people on a rural property. The motive for the attack is suspected to have been a territorial dispute between Los Lobos and Los Choneros gangs, though some sources suspect La Cartel La Escuela gang was also involved. 3 fatalities.
On 6 May 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals opened fire at a sports field, killing two people and wounding at least three others. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 6 May 2023, in Picoaza (Portoviejo, Manabi), a group of armed individuals in a truck fired at least five shots at a man who was selling fish. The victim was brought to a hospital, where he later died. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 6 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), four individuals described as criminals and hitmen, two of whom were armed, arrived in a car and fired more than 30 shots into a group of around 20 family members gathered outside near Medardo Angel Silva and 32nd streets. Two people were killed and six others were hospitalized following the incident. Five of the eight victims were children under 10 years old. Another member of the same family was previously killed in a similar incident in the same location on 16 October 2022 (coded separately). Three of the suspected perpetrators were arrested on 7 May 2023 after participating in another shooting that wounded two people on Trinitaria island that day (coded separately). Following their arrests, police recovered four weapons suspected to have been used in both shootings: two revolvers, a pistol, and a rifle that had been stolen from a military base in 2022. 2 fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Primicias
notes: On 6 May 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals described as delinquents got out of two cars and opened fire with rifles on a group of people at a park in the Centenario neighborhood. Six people were killed and four others were injured in the attack, which is suspected to have been motivated by a territorial dispute between Los Lobos and Los Choneros gangs, though some sources suspect El Cartel La Escuela gang was also involved. 6 fatalities.

On 6 May 2023, in Montecristi (Manabi), a man was shot to death and his body found in La Sequita sector. Authorities suspect the victim was killed approximately two hours before his body was found. The attack is suspected to have been motivated by a territorial dispute between narcotrafficking gangs 1 fatality.

On 6 May 2023, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen fired six shots, killing a nightclub manager and a Venezuelan security guard while they were working at adjacent nightclubs on Alonso de Angulo avenue in El Pintado area of La Magdalena sector. Both fatal victims had prior criminal records for drug possession, and a third person was also wounded in the attack. The suspected motive for the attack is a settling of scores between rival gangs. 2 fatalities.
On 6 May 2023, near Tonsupa (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of armed individuals described as delinquents shot and killed a taxi driver after robbing him. 1 fatality.

Around 7 May 2023 (as reported), in Abdon Calderon (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed two people as they were talking outside in the Cascabel area of the Miguelillo community. A third person was wounded in the attack, which is suspected to have been a territorial dispute between Los Lobos and Los Choneros gangs, though some sources suspect La Cartel La Escuela gang was also involved. 2 fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Property destruction: On 7 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police captured around four tons of cocaine and arrested three suspected members of a narcotrafficking organization in a house in the Guayacanes sector.

Around 7 May 2023 (as reported), in Jama Canton (coded to Jama, Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals killed four people. The motive for the attack is suspected to have been a territorial dispute between Los Lobos and Los Choneros gangs, though some sources suspect La Cartel La Escuela gang was also involved. 4 fatalities.

On 7 May 2023, in La Peana (El Oro), two armed individuals described as suspected delinquents on a motorcycle fired multiple shots at a couple, who were also on a motorcycle, in a drive-by shooting on the Machala - Pasaje road. The suspected motive for the attack was robbery, and police arrested the perpetrators, who had a prior criminal history for robbery and organized delinquency. There were no casualties.

Around 7 May 2023 (as reported), in Manta (Manabi), a man was killed and his dead body found floating in the ocean near Malecon avenue. The victim had a knife wound and scars on his neck, and his body had been decomposing for at least 24 hours. The motive for the attack is suspected to have been a territorial dispute between Los Lobos and Los Choneros gangs, though some sources suspect El Cartel La Escuela gang was also involved. 1 fatality.

On 7 May 2023, in Cojimies (Manabi), an armed individual described as a hitman fired at least six shots and killed a person at a billiards room. The attack is suspected to have been related to a territorial dispute between Los Lobos and Los Choneros gangs, though some sources suspect La Cartel La Escuela gang was also involved. 1 fatality.

On 7 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), three armed individuals shot and wounded two people on Trinitaria Island. The suspects were arrested by police, who also recovered four weapons from them: two revolvers, a pistol, and a rifle that had been stolen from a military base in 2022. The perpetrators were suspected to have also used the same weapons during an attack the previous day near Medardo Angel Silva and 32nd streets (coded separately). There were no fatalities.

Around 7 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), three people were killed and their dead bodies found in a ditch in Nuevo Guayaquil sector. Two of the bodies were found next to each other while the third was found a few hours later some kilometers further along in the ditch. Including this incident, eight bodies were found in the same ditch, known locally as the 'canal of death' between 4 and 10 May 2023 (coded separately). 3 fatalities.

Around 8 May 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a man was tied up, beaten to death, and his corpse found discarded in a field in the 5 de Junio community. The number of perpetrators is unknown. 1 fatality.

source: El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 8 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), three armed individuals described as hitmen got out of a car and fired more than 100 shots into a home where a birthday party was taking place, killing two people and wounding four others in the 3 de Noviembre community of Guasmo sector. Ballistics evidence indicates the perpetrators used a combination of rifles and pistols to commit the attack. The car used by the perpetrators was later recovered by police during a raid in which they arrested 16 members of the Mafia-18 gang and found the body of a man who was killed by the group after being kidnapped earlier that day. 3 fatalities.
On 8 May 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two armed individuals got off a motorcycle and shot a man to death at the intersection of Power and San Rafael streets in the Fatima neighborhood. 1 fatality.

actor1: Farc Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces Of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 8 May 2023 (as reported), in Tulcan (Carchi), four armed individuals who identified themselves as FARC dissidents and members of the Jalisco New Generation cartel abducted a merchant and his friend after luring them there from Quito (Ecuador) with false promises of a business transaction. The victims were forced to withdraw 5,000 dollars from their bank accounts over three days to give to their captors, after which they were released at a gas station. They also abducted a woman merchant at a gas station and demanded a ransom of 10,000 dollars for her release. Police later arrested four suspects for kidnapping and extortion.

Around 8 May 2023 (as reported), in Bahia de Caraquez (Manabi), a person was killed and their corpse left at the entrance to the municipal dump. The victim had been reported missing on the evening of 7 May, along with another person whose dead body was found in the same location on 11 May. Number of perpetrators unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 May 2023, in Santa Lucia canton (coded to Santa Lucia, Guayas), multiple armed perpetrators described as hitmen got out of a car and fired more than 20 shots at a group of victims on two motorcycles, killing three of them and wounding two others on 3 de Febrero avenue. 3 fatalities.
Around 9 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a man was tortured, killed, and his corpse discarded on a street in the Miami Beach community of Guasmo sector. 1 fatality.

On 9 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals (likely gang members due to previous threats) described as hitmen shot a man seven times, killing him, as he washed his car in Juan Montalvo community. The victim had previously received extortion threats. Two bystanders were also wounded in the attack. 1 fatality.

On 9 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of individuals described as delinquents driving in two vehicles intercepted and abducted a German man in Entrada de la 8 area near Nueva Prosperina sector. The perpetrators demanded a 100,000 dollar ransom from the victim's spouse, but police ultimately rescued the victim during an operation in San Ignacio community later the same day (express kidnapping).

On 9 May 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two armed individuals described as hitmen shot and wounded a person in the ear during a drive-by shooting on San Cristobal and 6 de Diciembre streets. The intended victim escaped when the perpetrators fell off their motorcycle. There were no fatalities.

On 9 May 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting as he walked home from a bar in Eugenio Espejo neighborhood. The perpetrators fired at least ten shots, three of which hit the victim in the head. 1 fatality.

On 9 May 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), two armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and wounded an infant in a drive-by shooting as she played with her father outside their house in 20 de Febrero community. The infant was wounded in the arm and hospitalized. There were no fatalities.

Around 9 May 2023 (as reported), in Santo Domingo canton (coded to Santo Domingo de Los Tsachilas, Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), unidentified armed individuals killed a man and left his tied-up corpse on the side of the road that leads to El Poste hamlet. 1 fatality.

Around 9 May 2023 (as reported), in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de Los Tsachilas), a man was killed and his decapitated head found partly submerged in the Pove river near the Plan de Vivienda Municipal community of 9 de Mayo neighborhood. The victim's headless corpse was later found in the same area. 1 fatality.

On 9 May 2023, in Loja (Loja), an armed individual got out of a car to shoot and kill a former municipal transit agent who was riding in a car in Chontacruz sector. The driver of the car was also wounded in the shooting. The victim was believed to have been involved in unspecified criminal activities in Machala and Loja. 1 fatality.

Around 10 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), two people were tied up, each of them was shot three times in the head and chest, and their dead bodies were found in a ditch in Nuevo Guayaquil sector. Including this incident, eight bodies were found in the same ditch, known locally as the 'canal of death' between 4 and 10 May 2023 (coded separately). 2 fatalities.
Around 10 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), residents captured and beat up a person described as a delinquent in Bastion Popular sector. There were no fatalities.

Weapons seizure: Around 10 May 2023 (as reported), in Lago Agrio canton (coded to Nueva Loja, Sucumbios), police and military forces captured and destroyed more than 100 IEDs and other explosives belonging to the CDF Colombian armed group.

Around 10 May 2023 (as reported), in Salinas canton (coded to Salinas, Santa Elena), a man was tortured, stabbed to death, and his corpse found on the beach near the Mar Bravo-Punta Carnero road. 1 fatality.

On 10 May 2023, in Duran (Guayas), four individuals beat up and abducted an informal taxi driver, tying him up in a house in Los Arbolitos 1 community. Two of the perpetrators, who were pretending to be customers, asked the driver to bring them to a house from which the other two perpetrators emerged and attacked the driver before tying him up. Police freed the victim and arrested two of the perpetrators during an operation later the same day. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 10 May 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two brothers were abducted from 24 de Mayo neighborhood, killed, dismembered, and their bodies found in sacks in a mountainous area of Bendicion de Dios neighborhood. Police found a machete covered in blood near the two bodies, which had been cut and mutilated in the legs, arms, and head. Police suspect the attack was related to an ongoing territorial dispute between rival gangs, and the victims had previously been injured during a shooting that wounded 8 people in 24 de Mayo neighborhood on 9 May (coded separately). 2 fatalities.

On 10 May 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorcycle shot and killed a lawyer in a drive-by shooting on 6th Avenue in Rocafuerte neighborhood. The victim had been riding in a car with her relative, who was wounded in the attack, when the perpetrators drove up and shot her in the head. 1 fatality.
On 10 May 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed another man on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in La Ensenadita neighborhood. 1 fatality.

On 10 May 2023, in Santa Rosa parish (Tungurahua), Indigenous residents captured and stripped two suspected thieves before subjecting them to an Indigenous purification ritual in the Cuatro Esquinas community.
