The punishment was part of the community's Indigenous traditions. There were no fatalities.
On 11 May 2023, in Quito - Tumbaco (Pichincha), a group of residents burned a motorcycle that was owned by people accused of being extortioners.

Around 11 May 2023 (as reported), in Bahia de Caraquez (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals tied up a man, shot him to death, and left his corpse at the entrance to the municipal dump. The person had been reported missing on the evening of 7 May, along with another person whose dead body was found in the same location on 8 May (coded separately). 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Military Forces of Ecuador (2021-2023); Police Forces of Ecuador (2021-2023) Prison Guards
source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 11 May 2023, in Guaranda (Bolivar), seven prisoners provoked a prison riot at the Bolivar Detention Center No.1. Prison guards coordinated with police and military forces to intervene in the riot and retake control of the facility. Several pamphlets were circulated on social media around the time of the riot indicating the violence was linked to authorities' refusal to transfer three prisoners out of the jail. Casualties unknown.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 11 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police arrested two top leaders of Los Aguilas gang during a raid in Las Palmas neighborhood of Nueva Prosperina sector. The suspects, who were believed to be high-ranking leaders of the gang, were detained days after the gang's overall leader was found dead in Colombia on 6 May (coded separately).

Around 11 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of armed perpetrators described as delinquents on a motorized tricycle shot and killed a Venezuelan informal taxi driver in his car during a drive-by shooting in Balerio Estacio community. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 11 May 2023, in Huaquillas (Huaquillas), an unknown number of perpetrators threw an explosive device at a house in the Nuevos Horizontes community. The device did not explode, and it was found with a note demanding extortion money from the owners of the home. Police later arrived to destroy the device.

On 11 May 2023, in Machala (El Oro), two armed individuals in a vehicle shot an off-duty military officer at least five times, killing him, during a drive-by shooting at his home on Adolfo Bucaram street. The perpetrators are suspected of having called the victim in order to lure him out of the house. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Policia Ecuador; Primicias
notes: On 11 May 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), two armed individuals described as delinquents fired two shots at an off-duty police officer wearing civilian clothes Venus del Rio Quevedo parish. At least one of the shots struck the officer in the head, killing him. Some reports indicate the perpetrators attempted to rob the officer, who resisted, leading to the shooting. 1 fatality.

On 11 May 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas ), two armed individuals described as hitmen arrived on a motorcycle, and one of them got off to fire seven shots at a man, killing him as he sat with his friends on a bench in Juventud park. 1 fatality.

On 11 May 2023, near Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals abducted a man at gunpoint and called his wife to demand a ransom of USD 10,000 for his release. Police rescued the victim during an operation on the La Refineria - El Aromo road near Manta on 13 May. The victim was likely kidnapped near Manta due to release location.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Policia DMG Zona 8; Policia Ecuador; Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 12 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police seized approximately 3.7 tons of cocaine during two operations at the city's ports. The first operation captured 1.4 tons of cocaine hidden in 39 suitcases destined for Spain, while the second operation seized 2 tons of cocaine hidden in sacks of sugar prepared to be shipped to Belgium.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2021-2023); Lawyers (Ecuador); UP: Popular Unity (Ecuador)
source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Policia Ecuador
notes: On 12 May 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), at least four to five armed individuals described as delinquents abducted a Quevedo city council member, who is also a lawyer and a member of the Popular Unity party, from his vehicle as he drove in 7 de Octubre parish. The victim was beaten and forced to transfer money from his bank account before being released from the express kidnapping early on 13 May.
On 12 May 2023, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), residents captured and beat two suspected criminals on Vega Davila street. The victims were later turned over to police custody. There were no fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Telegrafo; Primera Plana
notes: On 13 May 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), four members of Los Aguilas and Los Choneros gangs described as hitmen shot and killed a person in El Paraiso neighborhood. Police later arrested the perpetrators, one of whom had eight prior criminal convictions. 1 fatality.
Defusal: On 13 May 2023, in Machala (El Oro), police removed a dynamite-based IED that had been thrown by unknown perpetrators into a street in Santa Ines community.

On 13 May 2023, in Machala (El Oro), four armed individuals on two motorcycles opened fire at a vigil in Venezuela neighborhood, killing three people and wounding another. The suspected motive for the attack was a territorial dispute between rival gangs. 3 fatalities.

On 14 May 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), four armed individuals on motorcycles opened fire on a group of people outside a nightclub in a drive-by shooting, killing one man near the intersection of Ejercito avenue and America street. 1 fatality.

source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 14 May 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), three armed individuals described as hitmen related to organized crime got out of two cars and fired at least 50 shots at a Mother's Day celebration outside a home in Promejoras sector of San Camilo parish, killing seven people and wounding four others. The intended target of the attack, a man recently released from jail, is believed to have survived. 7 fatalities.
On 14 May 2023, in San Sebastian del Coca (Orellana), an unknown number of armed individuals opened fire on a taxi, killing the driver and wounding a passenger. 1 fatality.

On 14 May 2023, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of armed men shot a man five times, killing him as he was drinking with friends in front of a bar in El Salto parish. A youth bystander was also injured in the attack. The deceased victim had previously received threats from an unidentified group. 1 fatality.

On 15 May 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), residents detained and beat up a foreign man accused of stealing a cell phone in Kennedy neighborhood. The vigilantes doused the victim in gasoline and prepared to set him on fire when police intervened to rescue and arrest the suspected thief. There were no fatalities.

Around 15 May 2023 (as reported), in Catamayo (Loja), two armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and wounded a person in a drive-by shooting near the intersection of 24 de Mayo and Abdon Calderon streets. The perpetrators fired around seven shots at the victim, who was hospitalized following the incident. There were no fatalities.

Around 15 May 2023 (as reported), on the old road to Catamayo (coded to Catamayo, Loja), an unknown number of perpetrators killed a person with a machete, put the victim's corpse in a bag, and discarded it in a field in El Milagro sector. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 15 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), four armed individuals described as hitmen in a car fired at least 48 shots at a group of around 25 people at El Fortin park in Balerio Estacio community of Nueva Prosperina district, killing three people and injuring three others. The suspected motive for the attack is a conflict over drug trafficking. 3 fatalities.

On 15 May 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals on motorcycles shot and killed a man who was also riding a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in the 18 de Octubre neighborhood. The victim was shot in both the head and back. 1 fatality.

Around 15 May 2023 (month of), in Guayaquil - Olmedo (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators kidnapped a merchant in the Bahia sector for extortion. There is no further information available.

On 16 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a municipal traffic agent who was at the entrance of a parking lot in the Urdesa neighborhood. The victim, who was on leave at the time of the attack, received at least 11 gunshot wounds. Two days later in Manta, during the victim's funeral, unidentified perpetrators killed five people (coded separately). Motives and perpetrators unknown. 1 fatality.
Around 16 May 2023 (as reported), in Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed multiple people. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.

Around 16 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed four people on a basketball court near the Casuarina market in the Entrada de la 8 area. 4 fatalities.

On 16 May 2023, in Playas (Guayas), an unknown number of armed men in a car fired five shots at a businessman who was also a Daule canton firefighter captain, killing him in his car in front of the Public Notary's office. The perpetrators burned the vehicle used in the attack. Death threats against the victim had been circulated on social media hours before the killing, and the mayor of Playas began to receive similar threats shortly after the incident. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2021-2023); Lawyers (Ecuador); Police Forces of Ecuador (2021-2023) Prison Guards
source: Diario Regional Los Andes; Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 16 May 2023, in San Luis (Chimborazo), an unknown number of detainees threw stones at government attorneys and police, and they took a prison guard hostage, during a prison riot in the local prison. One guard was wounded during the violence. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2021-2023); Police Forces of Ecuador (2021-2023)
notes: On 16 May 2023, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), police arrested 33 suspected members of an organized crime group, including a police officer and 12 municipal transit officers, for involvement in an extortion scheme in the area.

Other: On 17 May 2023, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), president Guillermo Lasso signed the presidential decree 741 which dissolves the national assembly, informs the National Electoral Council (CNE) to call for elections to be carried out in six months, and allows the president to govern through presidential decrees.
Around 17 May 2023 (as reported), in Turi (Azuay), an unknown number of detainees engaged in a prison riot at El Turi penitentiary. Casualties unknown.

On 17 May 2023, in Machala (El Oro), three armed individuals described as delinquents beat, tied up, and abandoned a taxi driver on La Primavera road after forcing him to drive them around at gunpoint. The perpetrators stole the victim's car. There were no fatalities.

Property destruction: Around 17 May 2023 (as reported), in Pichincha province (coded to San Miguel de los Bancos), police confiscated approximately one ton of cocaine while searching a van during a vehicle stop on the road to Los Bancos.
On 18 May 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), two armed men on bicycles shot and killed a homeless man on Bolivar Madero Vargas avenue. The victim was known to be a drug user. 1 fatality.

Around 18 May 2023 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of armed individuals killed and decapitated a man and left his head in a bag in the Voluntad de Dios sector of the city. The victim had previously been reported missing by his relatives. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 18 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen on motorcycles opened fire with rifles against more than 60 attendees of a vigil during a drive-by shooting at a church in Union de Bananeros community of Guasmo Sur sector. A dog was killed and four people were wounded in the shooting, which is suspected to have targeted a man who had an unspecified criminal history. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 18 May 2023, in Manta (Manabi), at least five to six armed individuals described as hitmen with rifles and machine guns fired dozens of shots at a vigil for a former municipal transit agent, killing five people and wounding at least 17 others in the Jardines del Eden funeral parlor on Flavio Reyes avenue. Among the fatalities was a municipal transit agent, and the perpetrators also fired multiple shots at the corpse of the former municipal transit agent for whom the vigil was arranged after he was killed in an attack related to narcotrafficking in Guayaquil on 16 May (coded separately). Two suspects were later arrested in relation to the attack, for which the suspected motive was a settling of scores. 5 fatalities.

On 18 May 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), three armed individuals intercepted a Peruvian businessman and abducted him as he drove in Asogan sector. The perpetrators called the victim's relatives on 19 May to demand a ransom, and police freed the victim in an operation in Santa Martha community of the same city later on 19 May. All three perpetrators, as well as a woman suspected of involvement in extortion activities, were arrested during the operation.

Property destruction: On 18 May 2023, in Baeza (Quijos, Napo), police forces with the support of the special motorized group seized 240kg of cocaine hydrochloride, seized three vehicles and arrested five members of the Frontier Command.

On 18 May 2023, in Banos de Agua Santa (Tungurahua), residents of Pititig neighborhood captured and beat up a man that was accused of being a robber. Police officers rescued the man and took him to a police station.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2021-2023); MRC: Citizen Revolution Movement
notes: On 19 May 2023, in Alto Tambo (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed the president of Alto Tambo parish, who is also a member of the Citizens' Revolution political party, as he left a meeting. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 19 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two armed men on a motorized tricycle abducted a man at gunpoint and transported him to Las Malvinas sector, where they demanded a ransom payment from his family members. Police freed the victim during an operation on 20 May, during which they also arrested one of the perpetrators along with a pistol and drugs. The perpetrator who was arrested had a criminal history of drug trafficking.

On 19 May 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals on motorcycles opened fire on a group of people, killing one and wounding three during a drive-by shooting in Florida 4 neighborhood. 1 fatality.
On 19 May 2023, in Pasaje canton (coded to Pasaje de las Nieves, El Oro), two armed individuals shot and killed a man outside a house in 15 de Diciembre sector. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 19 May 2023 (as reported), in Pichincha province (coded to Quito), police discovered and confiscated 1.3 tons of cocaine that had been hidden in the ceiling of a ship on the Rio Blanco sector.

On 20 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals in a car and on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near 30th street and Vacas Galindo street. 1 fatality.

On 20 May 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), a group of armed individuals described as hitmen used rifles to shoot and kill a man as he slept with his wife and child in their home in 10 de Enero community. The victim was shot repeatedly in the head and chest. 1 fatality.

source: El Telegrafo; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 20 May 2023, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), a police cadet sexually assaulted eight students while they were asleep at the Escuela Superior de Policia in Pomasqui parish. There were no casualties.

On 21 May 2023, in Colon (Portoviejo, Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen in a vehicle opened fire with rifles and pistols on a group of people gathered on a patio, killing two and wounding two others during a drive-by shooting in the Las Canteras de Colon area. Ballistics evidence indicates more than 30 shots were fired during the attack. 2 fatalities.

On 21 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in Derecho de los Pobres community of Guasmo Sur sector. 1 fatality.

On 21 May 2023, in Catamayo (Loja), two armed individuals who arrived on a motorcycle fired seven shots at a man, wounding him in Cetmal sector of San Jose parish. The perpetrators are suspected to have opened fire on the victim, who was recently released from prison, after the latter refused to become involved in drug trafficking. There were no fatalities.

Around 21 May 2023 (as reported), near Ambato (Tungurahua), an unknown number of perpetrators driving a stolen car abducted a woman and extorted her for two motorcycles and a sum of money. The motive for the abduction was due to the victim's refusal to participate in drug trafficking. It is likely that the victim was kidnapped around Ambato given the location where she was rescued. The victim was rescued on 21 May 2023 during a police operation in Picaihua parish that also resulted in the arrest of four suspected perpetrators.

source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Policia DMG Zona 8
notes: Property destruction: Around 22 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), police discovered and confiscated 2.982 tons of cocaine hidden inside banana crates destined for shipment to Germany.

Around 22 May 2023 (as reported), in Manta (Manabi), a man was found dead in a field with stab wounds in La Pradera community. The victim was a known drug user who had recently relapsed after leaving a rehabilitation clinic. 1 fatality.
On 22 May 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen on motorcycles shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on 12 de Marzo street. 1 fatality.

Around 22 May 2023 (between 22 May - 24 May), in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals intercepted a delivery driver, abducted him, and set his car on fire in Salinas neighborhood. The driver was tortured and shot to death, and a group of fishermen found his body decomposing in the Pilo estuary on 24 May. 1 fatality.

Around 22 May 2023 (as reported), in Pangua canton (coded to Moraspungo, Cotopaxi), a person was tied up, killed, and their mutilated body found in a cacao field. The suspected motive for the attack was a possible contract killing. 1 fatality.

Around 22 May 2023 (as reported), in San Juan (Puebloviejo, Los Rios), eight armed individuals in a car fired indiscriminately into a crowd in the Colombia Chiquito sector, killing two people and wounding five others. 2 fatalities.
On 23 May 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants kidnapped a retired marine officer that was heading to his house.

Around 23 May 2023 (as reported), in El Rodeo (Manabi), unidentified perpetrators executed two inmates by hanging them to death and leaving their bodies to be found in El Rodeo prison. The victims were friends and had recently been transferred to the jail. 2 fatalities.

On 23 May 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of armed individuals who arrived on a motorcycle shot and killed a man inside a store on the E20 Esmeraldas - Quininde road. Two hours later, two armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man elsewhere in the city. One hour after that, an unknown number of armed individuals opened fire on the first victim's cousin, wounding her as she drove near Gustavo Becerra and Jose de Piedrahita streets. All three events are believed to be linked to a rivalry between criminal groups in the city. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 23 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), five to six armed individuals described as hitmen in a van fired more than 10 shots at the driver of a car, killing him as he waited at a stoplight in a drive-by shooting on Francisco de Orellana street. The victim was an informal taxi driver and coordinator for the Popular Civic Board of Guayaquil. 1 fatality.

On 23 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen on motorcycles shot and killed a man during a drive-by shooting in Juan Montalvo sector of Florida district. 1 fatality.

On 23 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), at least two armed individuals abducted a merchant as he left his house in 29 de Abril community of Prosperina sector. The perpetrators demanded USD 300,000 for ransom from the victim's family for his release, which they paid. Police rescued the man and arrested two perpetrators 18 hours after the initial abduction. One of the perpetrators had a criminal record for drug trafficking.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Heraldo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 23 May 2023 (between 23 May - 24 May), in Mocha canton (coded to Mocha, Tungurahua), at least 300 residents detained and killed a suspected robber accused of attempting to steal from children in the area, though some sources report he was also accused of kidnapping children in the area. The suspect was detained by the mob on the afternoon of 23 May, while his dead body was found partly naked and beaten up on the Ambato-Riobamba road in Capulispamba sector on the early morning of 24 May. 1 fatality.

On 23 May 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), two armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting as he arrived home from picking up his child from school. 1 fatality.

Around 23 May 2023 (as reported), in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), an unknown number of armed individuals intercepted and abducted a man driving a truck on the Quito-Quevedo bypass exchange. The perpetrators brought the victim to a property in Laura Flores community of La Cadena sector, where they took his bank information, bound him, gagged him, beat him up, and shot him. On 23 May, police rescued the man along with a second man who had been abducted by the same group in a separate incident; however, the victim died from the wounds suffered during his confinement shortly thereafter. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Policia DMG Zona 8; Primicias
notes: On 24 May 2023, in Chongon (Guayas), four armed individuals described as members of a kidnapping and extortion group abducted six people from two separate families and held them captive. The perpetrators had lured both families, one from Esmeraldas and the other from Machala, to a house in Chongon under the false pretense of offering a low interest loan advertised on social media, and then they abducted them when they arrived during the daytime on 24 May, stole their cars, and began to make extortion calls demanding ransom money for their freedom. Some of the captives managed to escape in the evening of 24 May and informed police, who then freed the remaining hostages in an operation later that same night. Police arrested two of the perpetrators during the operation, while two others escaped in one of the victims' cars.

On 24 May 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals on motorcycles threw dynamite that detonated on the roof of a house in Buenos Aires neighborhood, injuring at least two people inside. The victims are known to have family members who were targeted in a previous, unspecified attack elsewhere in the city. There were no fatalities.

Around 24 May 2023 (as reported), near Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), a fisherman discovered the decomposing body of a man who had been tortured, killed, and his body abandoned in the Pilo estuary, in the south of the city. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Comercio (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 24 May 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), four armed individuals described as hitmen on two motorcycles opened fire with pistols and rifles on a group of people at a soccer field, killing four people during a drive-by shooting in Puerto Azul neighborhood. Ballistics evidence indicates more than 30 shots were fired during the attack, the motive for which is suspected to be a territorial dispute between drug trafficking groups. 4 fatalities.

Around 24 May 2023 (as reported), in Santa Rosa canton (coded to Puerto Pongalillo, El Oro), a woman was shot to death and her body was found in the Pongalillo estuary of Jambeli island. The victim, who was a taxi driver, had previously been abducted and her car set on fire in Puerto Bolivar on 20 May and her family had paid a ransom demanded by her abductors on 22 May. 1 fatality.

Around 24 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), an unknown number of perpetrators abducted a person. The victim was likely kidnapped around Guayaquil due to the location where they were rescued. The victim was later rescued during a police operation in Pascuales sector on 24 May 2023, during which two perpetrators were also arrested.

On 24 May 2023, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), residents captured a man accused of robbing four women earlier in the day. The mob detained, stripped, and forced the suspect to run naked through the street while filming him as punishment for his crime. There were no fatalities.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 25 May 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of armed perpetrators abducted a relative of a well-known Ecuadorian soccer player in La Tolita 2 sector. The perpetrators demanded USD 1 million for ransom for the release of the captive, who was later released in Camarones sector on 31 May. Two suspects were arrested in Guayaquil in connection to the abduction.

assoc_actor_2: Former Police Forces of Ecuador (2021-2023); Labor Group (Ecuador)
notes: On 25 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed a former police officer as he was driving approximately one block from his home in Samanes 3 community. The victim had previously been a member of the police's disbanded Operational Support Group (GAO), a role in which he was later accused of illegally detaining and torturing people. Furthermore, the victim also owned a small business selling optical equipment and was driving in a company-branded vehicle when he was attacked. 1 fatality.

On 25 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals on motorcycles shot and killed a man during a drive-by shooting outside a bakery in Valle Verde community of Monte Sinai sector. The victim, who used a prosthetic leg due to a prior accident, had an unspecified criminal record. 1 fatality.

On 25 May 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two armed individuals shot and killed a man at a chicken restaurant near La Republica and Guayas streets. The attack is suspected to have been a targeted killing. 1 fatality.

On 25 May 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen in a vehicle shot and killed a man at the entrance to his home during a drive-by shooting the Cisne community. 1 fatality.

Around 25 May 2023 (as reported), in Jipijapa (Manabi), unidentified perpetrators executed three inmates (likely members of a rival gang due to context and familiar relations) by hanging them to death and leaving their bodies to be found in Jipijapa prison. The deaths are suspected to have been linked to the killing of a recently released prisoner, whom all three victims were friends with, in Portoviejo on 25 May (coded separately). Two of the victims, who were brothers, were also related to a third brother who was killed on 4 May while attempting to murder someone on the Portoviejo-Santa Ana road (also coded separately). 3 fatalities.

On 25 May 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals fired at least ten shots at a man, killing him near the transit terminal on 15 de Abril street in Andres de Vera parish. The victim, who had been released from the Jipijapa prison two hours earlier, was driving and stopped at a stoplight when the perpetrators shot and killed him. Three of the victim's friends were found dead in the Jipijapa prison later the same day (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 26 May 2023, in Cevallos (Tungurahua), residents captured and beat up a man suspected of breaking into a woman's home near 24 de Mayo and Oriente avenues. The suspect was beaten, but not killed, and he was turned over to police following the event. There were no fatalities.

Around 26 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals abducted a man and killed him, leaving his decapitated head and heart in a plastic bag in block 1A of Flor de Bastion sector. Next to the victim's body was a message that said 'three down, seven to go'. The victim was initially abducted on 25 May and his remains were found on 26 May. 1 fatality.

Around 26 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and his body cut into eight parts and left in two sacks in the Lomas sector of La Florida area in Nueva Prosperina district. The body was discovered hours after another mutilated corpse was found in Flor de Bastion sector (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 26 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals in a black vehicle opened fire on a group of people gathered at the corner of 35th and Vacas Galindo streets, killing one person and wounding four others, in a drive-by shooting. 1 fatality.

On 26 May 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals driving in a taxi shot at the vehicle in which a police officer and her wife were traveling, injuring the woman, in the Las Mercedes community. There were no fatalities.

On 26 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui , (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals driving in multiple vehicles intercepted and abducted a lawyer as he was driving home with his wife in Sauces, toward the bridge that connects that neighborhood with Samborondon Avenue. The perpetrators later sent messages to the victim's wife demanding a ransom of USD 500,000 for his release. The victim was likely kidnapped around Guayaquil due to the location of the victim's house. He was later rescued during a police operation in Guayaquil and Duran on 31 May in which four suspects were also arrested.

On 26 May 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), a soldier fired his rifle more than 20 times at a car, killing the driver near 8th and B streets in Siete de Octubre parish. The victim's family claims that a group of 40 soldiers was present at the time of the shooting, and that the victim had been followed prior to the attack due to a fight with his girlfriend. 1 fatality.
On 27 May 2023, in El Guabo (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals got out of a van and opened fire at a sports field in El Triunfo sector, wounding three people. There were no fatalities.

source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Policia Ecuador; Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 27 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police discovered and seized 1.444 tons of cocaine hidden inside a shipping container full of tuna destined for Spain.

On 27 May 2023, in Manta (Manabi), two armed individuals on a motorcycle shot a man at least nine times, killing him in a drive-by shooting near 319th and 218th streets in Eloy Alfaro parish. 1 fatality.

On 27 May 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man as he left a barber shop on Vicente Macias street in Andres de Vera parish. The perpetrators were waiting outside the establishment for the victim to leave to attack him. 1 fatality.

On 27 May 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals in a car shot and killed a person in a drive-by shooting outside at store near the intersection of Maria Auxiliadora and Guayaquil avenues. 1 fatality.

source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 27 May 2023, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), one or two armed individuals described as hitmen got out of a car and fired more than 20 shots at a barbershop, killing two people and wounding five others near Sixto Duran and Quito streets. The suspected motive for the attack was a setting of scores or a dispute between narcotrafficking groups. 2 fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil; Policia Ecuador; Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 27 May 2023, in Napo province (coded to Tena), military forces stopped a truck at a checkpoint and seized more than one ton of cocaine stored in sacks inside of the truck. The driver of the vehicle fled upon seeing the checkpoint, which was located at KM24 of the Napo road. Most reports indicate the truck was stopped in Tena canton, but some reports suggest the incident occurred near Narupa in Archidona canton instead.

Around 27 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), two people were killed and their bodies found approximately 200m apart in a canal in Janeth Toral community. One of the victims had been reported missing on 26 May and appeared to have been shot to death several times to the head and had a record for robbery, while the second victim had been decapitated and his heart was torn out. 2 fatalities.

source: El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Policia Ecuador
notes: On 27 May 2023, in Samborondon (Guayas), five armed individuals abducted a man as he arrived at his house in Boca de Cana area. The perpetrators called the victim's brother hours later to demand a USD 70,000 ransom. Police rescued the victim during an operation in Monte Sinai sector of Guayaquil on 29 May 2023, during which they also arrested one suspect and confiscated two knives.

On 28 May 2023, in La Peana (El Oro), an unknown number of armed men shot a man twice in the head as he walked home early in the morning. The victim was found alive but unconscious by a neighbor on the morning of 28 May and was taken to a hospital, where he died on 29 May. 1 fatality.
On 28 May 2023, in Arenillas (El Oro), two armed individuals shot and wounded a taxi driver and his two passengers as they got out a car to go shopping. There were no fatalities.

On 28 May 2023, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), residents detained, tied up, beat, and stripped three people to their underwear near Huaynapalcon and Huaquillas streets in Chilibulo neighborhood of La Magdalena sector. The victims were accused of robbing a house, and police intervened to arrest the suspects before they could be set on fire. There were no fatalities.

Around 28 May 2023 (as reported), near San Jose de Guayusa (Orellana), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed three people at an illegal mining camp in the Punino Rio Sardinas sector. Residents of the area reported finding a grave containing the bodies of the deceased; however, police who arrived at the scene afterward were only able to locate one of the victims' corpses. Ballistics evidence indicates at least 25 shots were fired in the area of the attack. 3 fatalities.

Weapons seizure: Around 28 May 2023, in Zaruma canton (coded to Zaruma, El Oro), military forces discovered and confiscated 30 packets of explosive gel, 62 packets of ammonium nitrate, 75 explosive caps, and 20 detonation cords belonging to an unidentified group.

Property destruction: On 28 May 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), various individuals arrived on a motorcycle and threw an explosive at a school before fleeing in Santa Martha cooperative of sector 2. The explosive, which is suspected to have been a Molotov cocktail, set fire to the school's roof but caused no other damage.

On 29 May 2023, in Carabuela (Imbabura), Indigenous residents captured a traffic agent and a man who were accused of participating in the kidnapping and robbery of two underage kids in La Compania community. The agent and the man were subject to Indigenous Justice, in which they were beat up, whipped with nettle and thrown cold water.
On 29 May 2023, in Naranjal canton (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals shot three people in the head and chest, killing them on a sugar plantation in San Jorge sector. 3 fatalities.

On 29 May 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals on motorcycle(s) opened fire on a group of five people who were driving in a car during a drive-by shooting on the road toward Machala. One victim was injured during the attack. There were no fatalities.

On 30 May 2023, in Atacames (Esmeraldas), two armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorcycle shot and killed a seafood merchant during a drive-by shooting in Juventud Progresista neighborhood of Cocobamba sector. The victim was working, having just finished delivering food to a restaurant, when he was shot at least four times and died while getting back into his van. 1 fatality.

On 30 May 2023, in Chongon (Guayas), various armed individuals dressed as police officers abducted a tourism worker after he refused to give them drugs and money they believed were stored at his workplace. Police pursued three vehicles the perpetrators had arrived in, allowing the victim to escape and resulting in the arrest of two perpetrators.

On 30 May 2023, in Cuatro Esquinas (Tungurahua), residents captured and beat up a suspected thief. The victim, along with two other suspected burglars, broke into a house and was attempting to rob it when neighbors surrounded and attacked them, capturing one suspect while the other two fled. Police intervened to rescue and arrest the victim before he could be killed. There were no fatalities.

Around 30 May 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals killed a person and dismembered them before disposing of the victim's torso in an estuary, where it was found floating near 45th and J streets on 30 May. The torso, which was found without a head or limbs and in an advanced state of decomposition, was suspected to have belonged to someone who had been abducted in the previous week. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 30 May 2023, in Machala (El Oro), four armed individuals described as extortionists and members of a delinquent organization opened fire against a house near 25th de Junio and El Cisne streets in the Buenos Aires neighborhood using a rifle. There were no casualties.

source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 30 May 2023, in Santa Ana (Manabi), an armed individual described as a hitman shot and wounded a lawyer who worked as a secretary inside the Prosecutor's Office in Santa Ana on Angel Rafael Alava street. The individual arrived and fled along with another individual on a motorcycle, which was found abandoned in La Mocorita sector minutes after the incident. There were no fatalities.
On 31 May 2023, in Machala (El Oro), a series of violent shootings and explosions occurred in different parts of the city, killing one person and injuring another. 1 fatality.

On 31 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified individuals riding a motorcycle shot and killed a female delivery worker in a drive-by shooting in a parking lot in the Sauces 6 sector. Amid the attack, the establishment's security guard was shot and injured, and died hours later in a hospital. The same day marked the end of a 60-day state of emergency measure declared by the national government on 1 April, 2023, to combat insecurity and violence in the region (coded separately). There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators of the attack. 2 fatalities.

On 31 May 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), at least seven unidentified armed individuals kidnapped two teenage sisters in front of a house at Km 2 of the road to Puerto Limon. Some of the perpetrators, who arrived in three cars, threatened a group of teenagers who were about to go to their school and forced the two sisters to get into one of the vehicles, while others attempted to enter the property . Minutes later, the individuals released the victims 200 meters away from the abduction site. The police detained one man involved in the kidnapping. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators.

On 31 May 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals aboard two vehicles shot and killed a local transit agent in a drive-by shooting on Elias Villacis Bravo Avenue. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.
Around 31 May 2023 (as reported), two inmates were hung to death and their bodies found in the CPL Esmeraldas No.2 prison. The deaths were likely executions by an unidentified gang. 2 fatalities.

On 31 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of perpetrators abducted an informal taxi driver and hid him in a house in the Socio Vivienda 2 sector. Police discovered and rescued the victim a few hours later during an operation to investigate a separate crime.

On 31 May 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen opened fire outside a store in La Ladrillera sector, killing three men and one young girl. Authorities believe that one of the men was targeted in the attack, while the other two men and the girl were all caught in the crossfire. 4 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 31 May 2023 (as reported), near Pedernales (Manabi), three suspected criminals were set on fire and their dead bodies found on a rural road in the El Monito area near the Barro Colorado and Chibunga de Chone sectors. A white truck suspected of belonging to the victims was also set on fire and found approximately 1km away from the bodies, one of which had also been decapitated. The victims were suspected of having been lynched by locals for attempting to rob a nearby farm. 3 fatalities.

Around 31 May 2023 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), four individuals armed with rifles and pistols got out of a vehicle, which was driven by a fifth individual, and opened fire at an unknown target in La Poza sector of San Alejo community. One person was wounded and hospitalized following the attack. There were no fatalities.

On 31 May 2023, in Machala (El Oro), unidentified armed assailants in a truck shot at a house and set fire to a motorcycle and a car in the 10 de Septiembre neighbourhood, injuring one man. Less than half an hour later, unidentified perpetrators shot at another house in the Los Ceibos neighborhood, followed by two explosions. There were no fatalities.

Around 31 May 2023 (as reported), between Machala and Puerto Bolivar (coded to Machala, El Oro), a man showing signs of torture, with his hands and feet bound, was found dead. No arrests were made, and the motives remain unclear. 1 fatality.

On 31 May 2023, in Chone Municipality (Manabi), residents of the El Monito sector captured and burned alive three men that were involved in criminal activities. They burned them inside of a car and where found the next the by police officers. 3 fatalities.

On 31 May 2023, in Chone (Manabi), an armed individual described as a hitman got off a motorcycle and shot a man at least seven times, killing him in Agua Potable sector. The perpetrator arrived and departed the scene on a motorcycle driven by an accomplice, and the victim was a known social media influencer. 1 fatality.

On 31 May 2023, in La Aurora (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals in two vehicles shot and killed a municipal transit agent driving his car during a drive-by shooting near the intersection of Elias Villacis Bravo street and Leon Febres-Cordero avenue. The victim was likely off-duty (as he was assigned to work in Esmeraldas) and was traveling with a friend, who was unharmed, during the attack. Ballistics evidence indicates the perpetrators fired with at least one rifle in the shooting. 1 fatality.

On 31 May 2023, in Pedernales (Manabi), residents organized as a vigilante group beat up and set three thieves on fire in the Estero Seco sector, killing them. The three victims were involved in a robbery earlier. 3 fatalities.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 1 June 2023, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed the Fe Publica unit prosecutor with over 35 gunshots in a drive-by shooting on Nicolas Lapentti Avenue. The victim was leaving a hearing against two people involved in a crime. That same day, the Attorney General received threatening messages against him integrity and that of his family. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 1 June 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), human body parts were found inside three bags along Casuarina Avenue and two more bags with additional parts were found nearly a kilometer away. Authorities confirmed that the remains belonged to two men. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 1 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified men riding a motorcycle shot and killed an off-duty police sergeant in a drive-by shooting at Juan Montalvo cooperative as he was heading to the police station where he worked. The victim was shot five times. The motives and perpetrators behind the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 1 June 2023 (as reported), between Loja and Catamayo cantons (Loja), a man was killed, and his decomposing body was found with over 60 stab wounds on the Loja-Catamayo road. The victim had been reported missing since 24 May 2023. He had received threats from criminal gangs associated with drug trafficking. The authors of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Ecuador (2021-2023) Prison Guards
notes: On 1 June 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified individuals intercepted a guard from the Machala prison after he finished his shift. They forced him into a vehicle and took him to an unknown location where they beat and tortured him throughout the night. The victim was released hours later, bound and in a state of shock, and was subsequently taken to a hospital. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 1 June 2023 (as reported), in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture on Madero Vargas Avenue in the Simon Bolivar neighborhood. The body had its hands tied behind its back and had gunshot wounds to the head. The victim was a drug user and had a criminal record for theft and drug possession. There is no further information on the motives or the perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

On 1 June 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), two unidentified assailants on a motorcycle threw an explosive device at the Santo Domingo National Transit Agency (ANT) offices (likely there were people inside given that the attack occurred past mid-day). The blast caused property damage but there were no injuries. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. There were no casualties.

Property destruction: On 1 June 2023, in Samborondon (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects described as extortionist set a funeral home truck on fire in the city center. It was not reported if the vehicle was in service.

Around 1 June 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified suspects killed two men and left their dismembered bodies inside at least five bags in a vacant lot of the Janeth Toral neighborhood. Police suspect the attack was linked to rival gangs and territorial drug trafficking dispute. The perpetrators behind the attack are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 1 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), a man was found dead with bullet wounds and his hands tied on the shore of Estero Salado. Authorities suspect that the man was executed by unidentified individuals early that morning. No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear. 1 fatality.

On 2 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno (Guayas), drive-by shootings occurred in the city, with a man being killed on Cuenca and Machala Streets and another on 25 and Argentina Streets. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: Around 2 June 2023 (as reported), in Bahia de Caraquez (Manabi), police forces seized 4,6 tons of cocaine hidden in a storage center. During the operation, officers also found three mobile phones, a satellite phone, a firearm, and 1,700 dollars. The drugs were intended to be shipped to the United States.

Around 2 June 2023 (as reported), in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified individuals on a motorcycle, shot and killed a municipal agent in a drive-by shooting in front of Banco Pichincha. One more person was injured during the attack. The motives and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 June 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), three unidentified individuals on a motorcycle shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting between San Ignacio and Primero de Mayo streets. The victim was taken to a hospital. There is no further information about the motives and perpetrators. There were no fatalities.
Property destruction: On 2 June 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), unknown suspects set a local Judicial Unit on fire damaging part of the infrastructure of the building. There were no casualties.

On 2 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle, described as hitmen, shot and killed a man who had arrived to the Alborada neighborhood with his family members to negotiate the sale of a property (drive-by). The victim who was in a vehicle tried to flee when he saw his assailants, but was fatally shot. His relatives were unharmed. No arrests were made and the motives remain unknown. In the span of a few hours, other drive-by shootings occurred in the city, with a man being killed on Cuenca and Machala Streets and another on 25 and Argentina Streets (coded separately to Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno). 1 fatality coded to this event.

Around 3 June 2023 (as reported), in Arenillas (El Oro), a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic bags on a road in the 9 de Octubre neighborhood. The victim's body was bound at the hands and feet. There is no further information about the motives and perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

On 3 June 2023, between Colon and Santa Ana municipalities (coded to Colon, Manabi), two unidentified individuals shot and killed a vegetable merchant inside his shop on the Colon-Santa Ana road. There is no further information about the motives and the perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

On 3 June 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), a group of locals held and severely beat two men accusing them of a theft attempt in a commercial establishment. Four other suspects managed to escape and the two individuals attacked by the mob were arrested by police forces and taken to hospital. Police seized a pistol with the individuals. There were no fatalities.

On 3 June 2023, in Playas (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects shot and killed three people inside a local bar. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 3 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), five men and two women were kidnapped by unidentified perpetrators from different parts of the city and held captive in a room in Guasmo Sur. The men were stripped, beaten, and all the victims were bound. Authorities rescued them on June 4, also locating the vehicles they had been taken from. The kidnappers had demanded $10,000 from each victim's family for their release. One armed suspect was arrested at the scene. There were no fatalities.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 4 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), between three and six unidentified men on motorcycles opened fire on a group of people who were celebrating a birthday outside a residence in a drive-by shooting in the Isla Trinitaria area. Five people were killed and between seven and eight were injured. One of the deceased victims was an off-duty police officer, and another was a Venezuelan citizen. There is no further information about the motives and perpetrators of the attack. 5 fatalities.

On 4 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals killed three men who were in a vehicle and who had just left a nightclub in the Riveras de Vergeles sector. The perpetrators fired at least 45 shots and are suspected to be members of the Los Tiguerones gang due to flyers found at the scene. One of the victims was an urban music composer and singer who had created songs for members of the Los Aguilas gang. 3 fatalities.

Around 4 June 2023 (as reported), in Pilahuin (Tungurahua), a group of Indigenous people detained two foreign individuals accused of robbing a woman. They subsequently whipped the suspects with nettle branches and threw cold water on them as part of an Indigenous punishment ritual. The individuals were later handed over to the police. There were no fatalities.

On 4 June 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified individuals opened fire on a group of people who were celebrating a birthday in a residence in the Pisloy sector. One person was killed and two others were injured. The motives and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 4 June 2023 (as reported), in Daule (Guayas), two unidentified armed men on a motorcycle ambushed two other men on their motorcycle and killed them in a drive-by shooting in Belen. One victim died instantly from four gunshot wounds to the head and torso, while the other succumbed to his injuries at the hospital shortly after. Following the attack, the victims' motorcycle went missing from the crime scene. Neither victim had a criminal record, and family members suspect the hitmen may have mistaken their targets in the dark. No arrests have been made. 2 fatalities.

On 4 June 2023, in Baba (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified men who arrived in two vehicles opened fire on six members of the same family outside their residence during a celebration in the La Envidia sector, Isla de Bejucal parish. Five men were killed and one was injured. The motives and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 5 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), two unidentified men on motorcycles opened fire on four people traveling in a vehicle in the Pascuales parish in a drive-by shooting. A man and a teenager were killed, and another person was injured. The motives and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 5 June 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified individuals who arrived in a vehicle opened fire on a group of people attending a funeral between 5 de Agosto and 24 de Julio streets in the El Floron neighborhood. A teenager was injured and taken to a hospital. The citizens were at the funeral of a man who was killed on 3 June 2023 in the same neighborhood (coded separately). The perpetrators of the attack are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 5 June 2023, in Picoaza (Portoviejo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Virgen de la Merced settlement, in the Picoaza parish. One minor was also injured during the attack. The motives and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 5 June 2023 (as reported), in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), a group of people beat and set fire to a man accused of robbing a teenage girl in the San Juan de Calderon sector. The man's accomplice escaped from the crowd. The police intervened to protect the suspect and took him to a hospital due to the severity of his burns. There were no fatalities.

Around 5 June 2023 (as reported), in Shumiral (Azuay), two men were killed, and their bodies, along with a vehicle, were found burned and abandoned on a road. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 5 June 2023, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), several heavily armed individuals in a car and on a motorcycle surrounded a house in Atucho neighborhood and started shooting at it. Police authorities then found a dynamite stick at the scene, which they safely defused. No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear.

Defusal: On 5 June 2023, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), a group of unidentified people threw a military-grade fragmentation grenade outside a house in Comite del Pueblo but it did not detonate. According to authorities, the house belonged to an Ex convict who is linked to drug trade, and the incident is linked to a territorial dispute. Authorities safely detonated the grenade. No arrests were made.

Around 5 June 2023 (week of), in Naranjal (Guayas), a man was tortured, shot, and decapitated by unknown assailants. His head was found placed on a cardboard with the phrase 'for being a snitch' written on it, on avenue Taura-Naranjal. A few meters further away, his body with mutilated legs was found. No arrests were made. 1 fatality.

On 5 June 2023, in El Carmen (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified individuals in a vehicle opened fire on a car with three occupants on Latacunga Street in a drive-by shooting. A man was killed and two women were injured. The police said the killed individual was the target of the attack, and the women were collateral victims. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 6 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), police forces seized two tons of drugs in a property in the Pascuales sector and detained seven individuals suspected to be members of an unidentified drug trafficking gang.

Around 6 June 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and his dismembered body found inside multiple sacks at a garbage site in Mapasingue Este. No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear. 1 fatality.

On 6 June 2023, in Naranjal (Guayas), four unidentified armed assailants arrived at a bar, stole phones and money from people celebrating a birthday and killed the person celebrating their birthday with a shot to the head. While committing the crime, they forced people to kneel and screamed 'kill the enemy'. They fled on two motorcycles. No arrests were made. 1 fatality.

On 7 June 2023, in the Guayas province (coded to Guayaquil), a group of citizens detained a man accused of attempting to rob a house minutes earlier. The citizens partially stripped him and tied him to a lamppost on a street. There were no fatalities.

On 7 June 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified individuals on a motorcycle opened fire on the car in which a Manabi provincial criminal judge was traveling in the Fabian Palacios neighborhood in a drive-by shooting. The victim was injured in one of his arms and was taken to a hospital. The motives and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 7 June 2023 (as reported), in Riobamba (Chimborazo), a group of people beat a man accused of robbing a woman moments earlier in the Riobamba Norte area. The crowd also set fire to the suspect's motorcycle. Police intervened to protect the man from the mob by detaining him. There were no fatalities.

On 7 June 2023, in Tachina (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed an active local traffic officer at a checkpoint in front of the local market (drive-by). A person who was next to the victim was injured. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

On 7 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a motorized tricycle (tricimoto) driver providing taxi services was killed, and two bystanders injured by bullets from an unknown number of perpetrators, in El Derecho de los Pobres neighborhood of Guasmo Sur. The perpetrators and motives remain unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 June 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in the La Guacharaca neighborhood. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

On 8 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified men on a motorcycle shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting outside the Policentro Shopping Center. A female bystander was wounded in the shoulder during the attack. The victim, who was taken to hospital, has a criminal record for robbery and illegal possession of weapons. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators. There were no fatalities.

On 8 June 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a taxi driver on Machala Avenue and 19 de Octubre Street. On the same day, unknown individuals killed another taxi driver at the intersection of Bolivar and Esmeraldas streets. Hours later, unidentified assailants shot and injured a motorcycle taxi driver on Boyaca - 13 de Febrero street. There is no further information on the motives and the perpetrators of the attacks. 2 fatalities.

On 8 June 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unidentified individual shot and killed two people and injured one person on 110 Avenue, in the Tarqui sector during a funeral. There is no further information about the motives and perpetrators of the attack. 2 fatalities.

Around 8 June 2023 (as reported), in Montecristi (Manabi), a man was killed, and his body was found with his hands tied and gunshot wounds on the road to the Pacific Refinery. The victim had been reported missing on 13 May 2023. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 8 June 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces seized over two tons (2,048) of cocaine stored in 58 sacks inside a house in the Los Vergeles neighborhood. The drugs were confiscated along with a vehicle, eight cell phones, and some cash. Seven people were also arrested.

On 8 June 2023, in Puebloviejo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects, described as hitmen, shot and killed three men in the San Juan parish. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 8 June 2023 (as reported), in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), 64 prisoners carried out a riot inside the El Inca prison facility by holding four lawyers inside the prison, after police and military forces conducted a search operation days earlier and confiscated cell phones, knives among other electronic devices. The lawyers were rescued unharmed and the prisoners transferred to a different facility. There were no casualties.

On 8 June 2023, in Anconcito (Salinas, Santa Elena), several unidentified armed assailants on three motorcycles shot and killed a man on a motorcycle (drive-by), by shooting him over ten times. The victim had no criminal record. No arrests were made and the motives remain unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 8 June 2023 (as reported), between Babahoyo and Puebloviejo (Los Rios), five men were killed and their bodies were found inside a car in a wooded area on the E-25 highway. Another person was injured and taken to a hospital. Two of the victims were Colombians, two Venezuelans, and one Ecuadorian. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 9 June 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle, described as hitmen, opened fire on a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Isabel la Catolica Street. One man and a minor were injured. The motorcycle used by the attackers was found burned minutes later. There is no further information about the motives and perpetrators of the attack. There were no fatalities.

On 9 June 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified individuals shot and killed a man on a street near the La Primavera road. The perpetrators took the victim out of a vehicle and subsequently shot him multiple times in the head and chest. It is suspected that the attack was a settling of scores. There is no further information about the perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

On 9 June 2023, in Manta (Manabi), three unidentified individuals, described as suspected hitmen, shot and killed a man outside his house in the Paraiso neighborhood. The assailants shot at least eight times. The motives and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Sucre (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a car shot and killed the driver of another car on streets Jose Mascote and Aguirre (drive-by). The victim had no criminal record. No arrests were made and the motives are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 9 June 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), a Venezuelan woman was shot and killed in front of a motel for refusing to sell drugs. The perpetrators remain unknown. 1 fatality.
On 10 June 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), in La Floresta, unidentified armed assailants in a car shot at several people in a drive-by shooting, injuring two. There were no fatalities.

On 10 June 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), in the San Camilo neighborhood, a military man placed in reserve and two others were gravely injured by unidentified armed men that shot at them from a car (drive-by). No arrests were made, and the motives remain unclear. There were no fatalities.

On 11 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unidentified individual shot at least 30 times against a group of people who were outside a commercial establishment in the Gallegos Lara sector. Three people died and one more was injured and taken to a hospital. Hours later, an unknown number of unidentified individuals shot from a vehicle at two people who were traveling in a car in a drive-by shooting in the Martha de Roldos sector. The victims, who had criminal records, died due to the severity of their injuries. There is no further information on the motivations and perpetrators of the attacks. 5 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Ecuador (2021-2023) Prison Guards
notes: On 11 June 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified individuals on a motorcycle shot at least three times at an off-duty prison guard in a drive-by shooting as he left his house. The victim was injured in one of his shoulders. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators of the attack. There were no fatalities.

On 11 June 2023, in the rural area of Posorja (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals, described as hitmen, broke into a home in the Las Penas neighborhood and opened fire against a group of people, killing three women and one teenager. The area is known for the presence of the Los Aguilas, Los Tiguerones and Los Lobos gangs, who dispute the control of drug trafficking and other illegal activities in the area. 4 fatalities.

Around 11 June 2023 (as reported), in Puerto Lopez (Manabi), two unidentified armed men on a motorcycle followed a Venezuelan national, who entered a house in an attempt to escape. He was later reported missing. On June 25, his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition and with bullet wounds in Machalilla. No arrests were made, and the motives remain unclear. 1 fatality.

Around 12 June 2023 (as reported), in Arenillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified individuals on a car and a motorcycle shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting near a sports complex in the San Vicente neighborhood. The victim was injured in his right knee and was taken to a hospital. There is no further information about the motives and perpetrators. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 12 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified individuals on a motorcycle, described as delinquents, threw an explosive device against a Community Police Unit (UPC) in the Flor de Bastion sector. The explosion caused damage to the windows of the establishment but left no injuries. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. There were no casualties.

Around 12 June 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), the two arms and the head of a man were found on a wall in the Monte Sinai area. The police stated that this type of display of human body remains is a message from criminal groups to their enemies. The motives and number of perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals who arrived in a car and two motorcycles opened fire on a house in the Gallegos Lara sector. Four family members were inside the house. The individuals fired at least 40 shots and tried to knock down the door to enter the property. The attack left damage to the house's structure, one child was slightly injured by a bullet. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators. There were no fatalities.

On 12 June 2023, in Palestina (Guayas), two unidentified armed men, described as hitmen, on a motorcycle shot and killed a woman during a funeral in a drive-by. Two people were injured. No arrests were made and the motive remains unclear. 1 fatality.

On 12 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle abducted a teenager outside a school in Flor de Bastion. This kidnapping, along with other incidents of insecurity happening near the school, led parents of students to protest the next day, demanding online classes (coded separately). No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear.

On 13 June 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), residents of the Tu Eres Pedro sector captured, tied to a metal structure, and beat up a man who had attempted to rob a store. They also threw gasoline on the man with the intention to burn him, but police officers rescued him.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2021-2023); MRC: Citizen Revolution Movement
source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Esmeraldas News; Expreso; Primicias
notes: On 13 June 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), three unidentified armed assailants, described as hitmen, on motorbikes shot at an MRC municipal councilman with several gunshots in a drive-by shooting between Vicente Rocafuerte and Antonio Jose de Sucre streets. He received death threats three days before the attack. The councilman succumbed to his wounds in the hospital on 17 June. One suspect was arrested on 21 October and identified as a member of the Los Tiguerones gang. The suspect was involved in killings, extortion and robberies in the Santas Vainas, Los Almendros and San Martin de Porres sectors. Police seized three firearms, ammunition, a ballistic vest and two radio communicators at the time of the suspect's arrest. 1 fatality.

On 13 June 2023, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), around 200 residents of Chillogallo captured and beat up three men with iron sticks, bricks and other elements, accusing the individuals of attempted robbery in a local store. Police officers rescued the men and took them to a police station.

Around 13 June 2023 (as reported), in Machala (El Oro), an Afro-Ecuadorian man was killed and his body was found with multiple gunshot wounds to the head on La Primavera road. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 14 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified individuals on a motorcycle described as hitmen shot and killed a teenage student who was heading to his school in a drive-by shooting in the Guasmo Sur sector. The victim was shot seven times. The teenager's family stated that he resisted an attempted robbery. However, the police indicated that the motive for the crime was unclear since the victim had all his belongings. They opened an investigation to determine the circumstances of the crime. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 June 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified individuals, described as hitmen, fired at least 10 shots at a man in front of Simon Bolivar Park, in the Puerto Bolivar sector. The victim was shot multiple times in the head. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 14 June 2023, in the Napo province (coded to Tena), police forces confiscated a ton of cocaine in blocks hidden in a truck in the Pungarayacu sector. The truck's driver was arrested.

On 14 June 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed minors arrived on a car and motorized tricycle, entered a home in Flor de Bastion, and shot and killed an underage pregnant teenager. According to neighbors the perpetrators are underage and belong to a criminal organization. No arrests were made. 1 fatality.

On 15 June 2023, in Ambato (Tungurahua), residents of 12 de Noviembre and Castillo avenues intersection captured and beat up two men who were robbing a house. Police officers rescued the two men and took them to a police station. The two men were foreigners.

On 15 June 2023, on the Coast of Puerto Lopez (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified individuals engaged in piracy shot and killed a fisherman at sea, near Isla de la Plata. The individuals stole the engine from the fisherman's boat and subsequently shot the victim after he tried to repel the robbery. There is no further information on the perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 15 June 2023 (month of), in Bahia de Caraquez (Manabi), a man was killed and his dismembered body found in the bay of the Chone River, on the Alberto F. Santos boardwalk. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 15 June 2023 (as reported), in Colon (Manabi), a man was killed and his body was found on the Colon-Quimis road with his hands tied and his legs wrapped in packing tape. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 15 June 2023, in Machala (El Oro), four unidentified individuals, described as hitmen, shot and killed a man in his home in the Urseza 3 sector. The attack is suspected to be related to a drug sale debt. The assailants stole the victim's cell phone and belongings before fleeing the scene. The victim had a criminal record for theft. There is no further information on the perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 15 June 2023, in Playas (Guayas), several unidentified individuals opened fire on an ambulance from the Ministry of Health near the Clinica del Pacifico Hospital, injuring the ambulance driver. A neighbour of the ambulance driver reported seeing a suspicious man on a motorcycle loitering around his home the previous evening. No arrests have been made and there were no fatalities.

Around 15 June 2023 (month of), in La Aurora (Daule, Guayas), an unknown number of armed suspects had kidnapped a man at La Aurora de Daule sector, in Mocoli island and were demanding a million dollars for ransom from the victim's family for his release. The victim's body was found at the end of June, but relatives identified the body in July. Police stated the victim died of a heart attack, since he did not have access to his medicine during the time of the abduction.

On 16 June 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), pedestrians around the center of the city captured two men who had tried to rob a man. They flipped the car that the robbers used, with them inside. Police officers captured one of the men and the other one escaped. The man was taken to a police station.

Around 16 June 2023 (as reported), between El Guabo and Machala cantons (coded to El Guabo, El Oro), a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied and showing signs of torture in the middle of a banana plantation. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 16 June 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified individuals who arrived on a motorcycle shot and killed two men in a butcher shop on Alhajuela Street. The victims were the shop's owner and one of his employees. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators of the attack. 2 fatalities.

Around 16 June 2023 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), a man was killed and his body was found on the side of Eloy Alfaro Street. It is suspected that the victim was suffocated because his body had no visible wounds. A note with a threatening message was found next to his body (unspecified). The victim had gone missing two days earlier. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 17 June 2023 (as reported), in Bahia de Caraquez (Manabi), a man was killed and parts of his dismembered body were found in different locations within the municipality. There is no further information on the motives behind the attack and its perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 17 June 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified individuals on a motorcycle shot at two brothers in a drive-by shooting on Universitaria Avenue, near Reales Tamarindos Stadium. One of the victims, who was a minor, died, and the other was severely injured. The perpetrators fired at least seven times at the victims. Motives and perpetrators unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 June 2023, in Palestina (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a car intercepted two men in their car and started shooting at them (drive-by). One of the victims tried to escape and died on the street, while the other was found lifeless in the car.
