After 36 hours of negotiations, the hostages were released, the hunger strike came to an end, and the situation was de-escalated. There were no casualties.

On 30 August 2023, in San Vicente (Manabi), two unidentified crime group suspects on a motorcycle shot and killed a Peruvian woman that sold natural juices, in a drive-by shooting by her house in the vicinity of the San Vicente de Ferrer neighborhood. The reason behind the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.
On 30 August 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a bicycle shot and killed a man at El Mosquito sector (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 30 August 2023, in San Mateo (Esmeraldas), unidentified armed individuals blew up the mechanical maintenance workshop of the City Hall. The attack would be linked to threats directed at the mayor for refusing to pay a large sum of money to extortionists. There were no casualties.

Property destruction: On 30 August 2023, in Latacunga (Cotopaxi), military officers entered the Latacunga prison to seize weapons from prisoners, resulting in the seizure of knives, bulletproof vests, ammunition, money, gallops of homemade alcohol, phone chips and micro SD cards. The objective of the searches is to disarm criminal gangs that control Ecuador's prison centers.

Around 30 August 2023 (as reported), in Tres Postes (Guayas), a man who was kidnapped the previous day in Yaguachi was killed and his body was dismembered, and his remains were found in the Pan American highway in two bags. Los Aguilas gang members are suspected to be behind the attack as part of an ongoing territory dispute with Los Lobos gang. Las Aguilas gang is an ally of Los Lobos. 1 fatality.

Security measures: On 31 August 2023, in El Oro province (coded to Machala), authorities declared the territory in a state of emergency after the murder of a Judicial Police Sergeant in Santa Rosa on 29 August 2023 (coded separately).

Around 31 August 2023 (as reported), in Ambato (Tungurahua), a group of people beat up a foreign man after he perpetrated a cell phone robbery on Victor Hugo with Jacome Clavijo Avenues. The man was arrested by the police. There were no fatalities.

On 31 August 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), at least eight suspects kidnapped a man from Camposanto Parque de la Paz and demanded USD 10,000 for his release. Police authorities rescued the citizen on 6 September 2023 together with a son and father that were kidnapped by the same perpetrators on 2 September 2023 (coded separately). Police arrested eight suspects, of which two had prior criminal records.

On 31 August 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), suspected members of the Los Chone Killers kidnapped a man. The perpetrators had collected $20,000 USD from the victim's family and were demanding an additional $30,000 for his release. The victim was rescued in Duran on 6 September, along with a father and his son, who had also been kidnapped by the group on 2 September (coded separately). At least 8 suspects were arrested and charged for their responsibility in the abduction.

source: El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: Defusal: On 31 August 2023, in Puerto Napo (Napo), police safely neutralized a bomb consisting of 40 to 50 sticks of dynamite, which was discovered inside a taxi during a checkpoint on the Troncal Amazonica road. The three suspects in the vehicle attempted to flee but were apprehended, while a fourth suspect was arrested shortly thereafter. It is suspected that the suspects were involved in an explosion on a bridge that occurred hours earlier (separately coded). In response to security concerns, local authorities transitioned school classes to a virtual format for 1 September.

On 31 August 2023, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), armed suspects shot and killed a merchant at his shop, in a suspected extortion-related attack in the Carapungo sector. There is no further information available at this point in time. 1 fatality.

On 31 August 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of armed assailants entered a bakery, and forced two working teenagers into a car. Shortly after, the owner of the bakery received footage of the two victims naked, restrained and blindfolded, demanding $10.000 for their release. Days prior, a female worker of the bakery was kidnapped and her phone was taken by the perpetrators to access her contacts. Then she was released (coded separately). The bakery owner had been previously targeted by an unknown gang to pay $2.000 extortion fee per month, but he refused to pay. No further information on this incident has been released.

Around 31 August 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), unidentified assailants kidnapped a woman working in a bakery. The perpetrators took her phone to access her contacts. The woman was released shortly after. Days later, unidentified assailants kidnapped two workers from the same bakery, holding them for ransom (coded separately). The incidents are related to gang extortions that the bakery owner refused to pay.

On 31 August 2023, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals, described as hitmen, shot and killed a man, a woman and a child with more than 15 gunshots in the El Recreo Viejo sector. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 31 August 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorcycles shot and killed a man and a woman, in a drive-by shooting in the Margarita Villavicencio neighborhood. Authorities suspect that the attack was related to disputes between criminal groups. Police collected at least 30 bullet casings at the scene. The authorship and the motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 31 August 2023, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), thirteen unidentified suspects, abducted a man in the Carapungo parish, after the victim had promoted his car for sell online. The suspects held the victim and requested USD 150,000 for his release. Police forces carried out an operation in Carapungo and the victim was found and released safely. 12 suspects were arrested and a minor apprehended. Some of the suspects had criminal records, one for extortion. With them police seized three firearms, two cars, two motorcycles, 13 cell phones and an unspecified sum of money.

On 31 August 2023, in Montalvo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle, described as hitmen, shot and killed a woman in the Buena Fe Norte locality, as the victim was on her way to work at the Juan Leon Mera school (drive-by). The assailants fired multiple shots, striking her in the head. Police stated the victim had received death threats weeks earlier. No arrests have been made, and the motive remains unclear. 1 fatality.

Security measures: On 31 August 2023, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), a state of emergency was declared by the mayor following the killings of a police sergeant and a tow truck driver (coded separately). The measures include reallocating $200,000 to support the National Police in Santa Rosa and strengthen security in the canton.

On 31 August 2023, in Duran (Guayas), unknown armed individuals kidnapped a father and his son from La Paz park and then asked for 100,000 USD ransom. The victims were released on 6 September by police officers and eight people were arrested in a joint release with another man (coded separately).

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Ecuador (2021-2023) Prison Guards
notes: Around 1 September 2023 (as reported), in Azogues (Canar), prisoners took control of the local prison and detained an unspecified number of police officers and Penitentiary Security and Surveillance Corps. Authorities report that this was in support of the Cotopaxi prisoners who were raided by police on 30 August 2023. They were eventually released.

source: Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Peru); El Telegrafo; Machala Movil
notes: Property destruction: On 1 September 2023, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), unidentified assailants threw two Molotov cocktails over the wall of Carapungo market, in the Carapungo neighborhood, north area of the city. The two bottles landed within the parking of the market, causing minor property damage and no injuries. Authorities suspect that the explosion was tied to riots in various Ecuadorian prisons the nights before.

On 1 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals opened fire on a group of people in an alley in the El Recreo neighborhood. Two men were killed, another died in hospital, and two others were injured. According to the police, the perpetrators fired approximately 44 shots. There is an ongoing dispute between the Latin Kings and Chone Killers gangs in the area, but the authorities did not confirm the actor responsible for the attack. 3 fatalities.

Weapons seizure: Around 1 September 2023 (as reported), in Archidona (Napo), four unidentified perpetrators who traveled in a taxi, one of whom carried 40 sticks of dynamite were arrested and the explosives seized. Authorities suspect that they intended to destroy a bridge.

Around 1 September 2023 (as reported), in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), an unknown number of prisoners set fire to the facilities of the Virgilio Guerrero juvenile detention center to create chaos and attempt to escape. There were no casualties.

On 1 September 2023, in Parlamento (El Oro), armed suspects described as delinquents opened fire on a group of people that were playing football, killing two and injuring a third person. There is no further information at this point in time. 2 fatalities.

On 1 September 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting between Imbabur and Pichincha Streets, Primero de Mayo neighborhood. The victim was shot dead with at least nine gunshots inside a vehicle. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 1 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), a group of unidentified heavily-armed individuals in a car and on a motorcycle shot over 50 times to a group of people and killed three people in the Margarita Villavicencio sector, during a funeral wake of a couple shot and killed on 31 August (coded separately). Five other people were injured. Police had been guarding the wake, suspecting that the previous killings were linked to a drug trafficking territorial dispute. It is suspected that the perpetrators distracted the police by killing a homeless man nearby before. Moreover, one person was killed and two other were injured in a drive-by shooting in the Dos Bocas sector and in the Ciudadela Los Jardines neighborhood. 5 fatalities.

Around 1 September 2023 (as reported), in Boca de Briceno (San Vicente, Manabi), a man was killed and his body was found floating at a beach. The victim had his hands tied up and was partially naked. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 1 September 2023, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), unknown armed individuals entered the Carapungo market and shot a man to death leading to riots between merchants and residents.

On 2 September 2023, in Jipijapa (Manabi), residents of the La Sultana neighborhood burned trees and tires along the road to Puerto Cayo to voice their grievances over the lack of potable water in their community. This follows similar demonstrations from other neighborhoods in the previous week, after which the Mayor of Jipijapa declared a 60-day state of emergency regarding the municipality's water supply.

On 2 September 2023, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified individuals kidnapped the brother of the governor the El Oro province, leaving his truck empty in a banana plantation and driving him to a rural location. He was later found in a road near Santa Rosa municipality.

On 2 September 2023, in Chacapamba (Deleg, Canar), two armed suspects on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Buil sector. The shooters intercepted their victim when he was walking home, and shot him at least six times. There is no further information at this point in time. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), two suspects armed with high-powered weapons (described as delinquents) opened fire on a group of people at a sports-related social gathering, injuring eight of them. The delinquents arrived at the scene in a car, opened fire on the crowd, and then fled. There were no fatalities.

On 2 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), suspects travelling in a vehicle opened fire on a group of people gathered by a house, killing one and injuring four, in a suspected drive-by shooting in the Floresta I neighborhood. There is no further information on the identity of motive of the perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified individuals shot and killed a man inside a port terminal. It is unclear whether the victim was an employee or an outsider to the port company where the crime occurred. The perpetrators are suspected to have arrived at the scene by boat. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 2 September 2023 (as reported), in Machala (El Oro), a man was killed and his body found wrapped in plastic bin bags and a note stuck to it that read 'this will happen to all the snitches of Sayayin', in the El Coco sector. Later that day, two other wrapped remains were found with the same exact note in the La Barraca sector. It later emerged that the body parts belonged to the same man, who had been abducted (unspecified), tortured, dismembered into twelve parts, and wrapped into three different bundles, which were dumped in the aforementioned sectors. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), two suspects on a motorcycle opened fire on a man that was riding a bicycle, in a drive-by shooting in the Nuevo Pilo neighborhood. The victim was injured taken to hospital for treatment. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 2 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas),suspected members of Los Chone Killers abducted a man and his son in the Samanes neighborhood and took them to an unknown location in Duran municipality. 10 suspects were arrested in Duran on 6 September after releasing videos demanding U$10,000.00 for ransom. The victims were rescued unharmed, along with another person the group had kidnapped on 31 August (coded separately).

source: El Universo (Ecuador); Esmeraldas News; Machala Movil
notes: On 2 September 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men in in a drive-by shooting in the 24 de Mayo neighborhood. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 2 September 2023, in La Concordia (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men and two women, and injured a fifth person, during a party at an abandoned house in the Santa Ana neighborhood. Two suspects were later arrested. Also, four unidentified armed suspects, described as hitmen, opened fire on a house where a birthday celebration was taking place, killing a woman and injuring her father, in an attack in the Santa Rosa neighborhood. The attackers fled in the same car they had arrived in, and detonated a flashbang during their escape. Motivations unknown. 5 fatalities.

Around 2 September 2023 (between 2 - 3 September), in Riochico (Portoviejo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified heavily armed individuals shot and killed one person and injured three to four others in the El Zapote locality, Riochico neighborhood. The victims were participating in a prayer at the time of the shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown armed man shot a man at least twice in the head killing him, in the Santa Lucia neighborhood, Eloy Alfaro parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2023, in Posorja (Guayas), four armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire at other individuals in a vehicle in a drive-by shooting. One man was injured by a stray bullet. Official information did not confirm fatalities, although a media source reported several dead persons. According to another media source, residents have hidden bodies of victims. Unspecified fatalities coded as 3.

On 3 September 2023, in Salasaca (Tungurahua), residents of Salasaca burned down the vehicle that a couple had used to steal the motorcycle after carrying out an Indigenous trial in the community of Manzanapamba Chico. The thieves were stripped naked in the main square and then were let go after a while. There were no casualties.

Around 3 September 2023 (as reported), in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), six unidentified armed assailants opened fire on a house before fleeing in a vehicle. Shortly after, an explosive device accidentally detonated inside their car. No further details are available.

On 3 September 2023, in Daule (Guayas), two unidentified individuals (described as hitmen) opened fire on a group of people attending a woman's funeral. A couple were killed in the attack, and another person was injured. The motivation and perpetrators behind the attack are unknown. 2 fatalities.
On 3 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), a municipal transit agent was killed at the Jardines de Duran cemetery. There is no further information at this point in time. 1 fatality.

On 3 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a bomb was detonated by a house at night in the Carlos Castro sector, in a suspected extortion-related attack. The building sustained some material damage. There were no casualties.

On 3 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), unidentified armed suspects travelling in a car opened fire on a group of people that had gathered in the street, killing three, in a drive-by shooting in the Sauces neighborhood. It is unknown whether other people were injured. Police found at least 20 bullet casings at the scene. Also, two armed suspects on a motorcycle, described as hitmen, shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the 18 de Octubre neighborhood. They opened fire on the victim during their first pass, but seeing that he was still alive, they returned and finished him off. 4 fatalities.

On 3 September 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a social gathering in the El Panecillo neighborhood, killing a man. A woman was shot and injured by three gunshots. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Heraldo (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Machala Movil
notes: On 3 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike opened fire on two men who were also driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the early hours on 11th Street North. One of the victims, the suspected target of the attack, was an off-duty municipal traffic agent who died at the scene. The second victim was injured and taken to a hospital due to the severity of his injuries. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 3 September 2023 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), a man was tied up and killed and his body found wrapped in a sheet in the Ciudadela Eloy Alfaro. The victim had signs of torture and a note was found on the body. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 September 2023, in Salasaca (Tungurahua), residents of Salasaca burned down the vehicle that a couple had used to steal a motorcycle after carrying out an Indigenous trial in the community of Manzanapamba Chico. The thieves were stripped naked, whipped in the main square, and released after some time. There were no casualties.
On 3 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), unknown armed individuals attacked and killed the director of Urban planning of the municipality in the center. The perpetrators fled the scene. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), several residents of Ciudadela El Maestro organized as a vigilante group beat up a suspected robber between Los Cisnes and Educadores y Amigos Streets, El Maestro neighborhood. The suspect was stripped naked and arrested by the police. There were no fatalities.

On 4 September 2023, in El Laurel (Daule, Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man inside a nightclub. The police suspect that the attack is related to a revenge motive, but no further details are known. The perpetrators behind the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 4 September 2023 (as reported), in Salinas (Santa Elena), a taxi driver was killed and his body was found with his hands tied and multiple stab wounds inside the trunk of his taxi in the Puerta del Sol 2 sector. The motives and perpetrators behind the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), two armed suspects described as criminals riding a motorcycle, shot and killed a man travelling on another motorbike, at a traffic light on the Duran - Tambo road. The victim was shot at least ten times. He was the son of a Duran municipality transit agent. It is suspected that the perpetrators confused his identity as, at the time of his killing, he was wearing his mother's transit agent jacket. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), three suspects shot and killed a construction worker at the house in which he was working, in the Ines Maria neighborhood. The three suspects arrived at the scene on the same motorcycle, one of them would briefly dismount to shoot the victim, and then they fled. There is no further information. 1 fatality.

source: El Universo (Ecuador); Esmeraldas News; Machala Movil
notes: On 4 September 2023, in Viche (Esmeraldas), a taxi driver was shot and killed while pulling his cab out of a garage at the start of his shift in the Las Malvinas neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 4 September 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified hooded and armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with two gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Coquito Alto neighborhood. Two other people were injured by stray bullets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the Limonales neighborhood in a drive-by shooting. Police forces carried out an operation and found a motorcycle in the Narcisa de Jesus highway suspected of being used in the attack. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 4 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects described as hitmen on a motorcycle opened fire against a municipal traffic agent and a municipal control agent who were inside the municipality premises at 9 de Mayo and Manuel Serrano intersection. One was shot and killed and the other injured and taken to hospital. The police suspect that the attack was a settling of scores, as the killed agent was the brother of a member of a criminal group operating in the area (unspecified). The perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 4 September 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces discovered 1.2 tons (1,212 kg) of cocaine enclosed in 31 suitcases inside a container that was going to be shipped to Germany, in one of the city's maritime ports.

On 4 September 2023, in Milagro (Guayas), several residents of Roberto Astudillo organized as a vigilante group captured a man accused of theft and beat him. The suspect was stripped naked and arrested by the police. There were no fatalities.

Around 5 September 2023 (as reported), in Pelileo (San Pedro de Pelileo, Tungurahua), an indigenous leader detained a couple suspected to be delinquents and whipped them with nettle branches as part of an indigenous punishment ritual. There were no fatalities.

On 5 September 2023, in Turi (Azuay), inmates at Turi Prison attempted to riot for the second time in a week (unspecified). Prisoners managed to climb onto the rooftops, causing a security response. Authorities closed nearby roads as a precaution but reopened them after regaining control. Around 400 military personnel and 200 police officers were deployed around the facility to prevent further unrest.

Looting: On 5 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), a group of 15 heavily armed individuals, arriving in three vehicles, stormed a car dealership and stole two high-end vehicles. The perpetrators intimidated the employees and forced them to hand over the keys. Police authorities were not able to recover the vehicles.

Property destruction: Around 5 September 2023 (as reported), in Atahualpa canton (coded to Paccha, El Oro), military forces detained six individuals and confiscated 4,000 detonators, 17 rolls of slow-burning fuse, and 7,298 explosive emulsions, along with mobile phones and radios used for illegal mining in the area.

Property destruction: Around 5 September 2023 (as reported), in Bocana de Lagarto (Rio Verde, Esmeraldas), military forces seized 4,200 gallons of fuel suspected of being intended for illegal fuel trafficking along the northern border with Colombia. Military forces confiscated 72 full fuel tanks, several partially filled containers, an outboard motor, and empty fuel tanks. Authorities believe the fuel was destined for criminal groups involved in drug trafficking and precursor chemical smuggling (for use in drug laboratories).

Around 5 September 2023 (as reported), in Cuca (El Oro), a man was shot and killed and his body found with multiple gunshot wounds to the head. Armed suspects had abducted him from his house the night before, a few hours earlier. It is suspected that the victim was killed at a different location, and his body dumped there, as no bullet casings were found at the scene. 1 fatality.

On 5 September 2023, in Valencia (Los Rios), at least two armed suspects opened fire on three men, injuring them, in an attack in the San Agustin sector. The perpetrators escaped on two motorcycles that they abandoned shortly after at an unspecified location. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: Around 5 September 2023 (week of), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), six unidentified armed individuals abducted ten merchants from different locations and on different days. The victims were found tied up and blindfolded inside a private residence in the Monte Sinai sector on 7 September, and released unharmed by police forces. The suspects demanded USD 10,000.00 from the victim's relatives to release them. The individuals, including two minors and two suspects with police records since 2020, were arrested during the operation. Police seized two submachine guns, ammunition, dynamite, 13 motorcycles, several phones, and toy weapons.

On 5 September 2023, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed men on a motorbike fired shots at a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on 14th Street. The vehicle was hit three times but managed to escape. Casualties unknown.

On 5 September 2023, in Manta (Manabi), three unidentified armed individuals abducted a man and kept him inside a private residence in the Urbirrios 2 neighborhood. The suspects demanded USD 80,000.00 for ransom. The victim was rescued by the police unharmed on 12 September and the three suspects (one of which had a police record for extortion and concealment of stolen objects) were arrested. Police seized a firearm, an ammo feeder, a motorbike, and three cell phones.

On 5 September 2023, in between Sucre and Noboa municipalities (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting on the Sucre-Noboa Road, Las Flores sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the 7 de Octubre sector, Isla Trinitaria neighborhood, south part of the city. Police stated the victim had unspecified criminal records. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 5 September 2023, in Progreso (El Oro), police and armed forces seized 12 bags of dynamite, 4000 capsules, slow fuses and explosive emulsions together with cell phones, radios and a van. Six people were arrested.

Property destruction: On 5 September 2023, in Muluncay Grande (El Oro), police and military forces seized explosive devices included 2600 blocks of ammonium nitrate and slow fuses during a security check.

On 5 September 2023, near Mocache (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified individuals kidnapped a man while he was traveling in a vehicle with a friend, who was released shortly after on the Mocache-Vinces road. The perpetrators contacted the victim's family, initially demanding $30,000 for his release. The victim's body was found on 7 September, possibly killed after the family failed to pay the ransom (coded separately).

Weapons seizure: Around 6 September 2023 (as reported), in Paccha (Atahualpa, el Oro), police forces seized 7,000 dynamite sticks, slow-burning fuse rolls, 2 boxes with detonator caps, a vehicle, and cell phones in El Cordoncillo. Six armed individuals were arrested.

Around 6 September 2023 (as reported), near Duran city (Guayas), a man was killed and his body set on fire in the Penon de Rio sector. There is no further information at this point in time. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an armed suspect opened fire on a taxi driver that had just dropped off a customer at La Piazza shopping mall. The taxi driver was taken to hospital for treatment. There is no further information on the identity or motives of the perpetrator. There were no fatalities.

On 6 September 2023, in Valencia (Los Rios), several armed suspects with motorbike helmets shot and killed a man at a park in the town center. The victim was with other people at the time of the attack, but they came out unscathed. The perpetrators escaped on motorcycles; there is no further information on their identity or motives, but it could have been in retaliation for an unspecified violent incident. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Ecuador (2021-2023) Prison Guards
notes: On 6 September 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an off-duty prison guard inside his vehicle in a drive-by shooting in the Las Cuatro Esquinas sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2023, in Riochico (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting between El Milagro and El Zapote localities, Riochico neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2023, in Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified gunmen opened fire on a streaming bingo hall site during a live broadcast. It is suspected the attack was linked with extortionists. The authorship is unknown. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: CREO: Creating Opportunities (Ecuador); Former Government of Ecuador (2021-2023)
notes: On 6 September 2023, in Tosagua (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals fired shots at the car of the former mayor (CREO) of the Bolivar canton in the Cristo Negro sector. A bullet hit the car window but no one was injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2021-2023); PSC: Social Christian Party (Ecuador)
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Mercurio (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 7 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), the councilor of the Duran canton and member of the Social Christian Party (PSC) was kidnapped and killed by unknown individuals who intercepted his vehicle while he was traveling in the sector of El Arbolito in Guayas. On 8 September 2023, his body was found in an empty by the Duale-Salitre road. The identity of the perpetrators is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 September 2023, in Chaflu (Esmeraldas), transport unions blocked the E20 Esmeraldas-Quininde highway by burning tires and placing obstacles on the road. They demanded road maintenance, contractual agreements for workers and trucks, and compensation for transporting contaminated sand from a recent oil spill. They also called for the expansion of the highway to four lanes and the repair of critical road sections. Firefighters extinguished the burning tires and removed obstacles, but authorities were unable to reopen the road. No arrests were reported.

On 7 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), several armed suspects chased, shot and killed a man in the El Mosquito sector, Guasmo sur neighborhood. Once they caught him, the suspects shot their victim multiple times in the head only. There is no further information at this point in time. 1 fatality.

On 7 September 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), armed suspects shot and killed a taxi driver in the Camilo Ponce Enriquez and Los Shyris streets. The victim was intercepted while driving his cab. As a result of the attack the vehicle ended on the sidewalk. Authorship and motives are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 September 2023, in the rural area of Esmeraldas municipality (Esmeraldas), members of the Esmeraldas Transportes Front blocked the E20 highway from Esmeraldas to Quininde with burning tires to demand that local workers be hired by the Ministry of Transport for the reconstruction of the highway instead of the Army Corps of Engineers, and compensation for transporting contaminated sand from an oil spill at Las Palmas beach. There were no casualties.

On 7 September 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving another motorbike in a drive-by shooting on Juan Leon Mera Street, Ciudadela Margarita. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 September 2023, near Palenque (Los Rios), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a man inside a bus traveling the Palenque-Jauneche route. The perpetrator got off the bus and fled on a motorcycle, (possibly with an accomplice waiting for him). The motivation and perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 7 September 2023 (as reported), in Mocache (Los Rios), a man was killed and his body was found floating in the Sara Guerrero area. The victim had no visible wounds from any specific weapon, leading to suspicions that he was drowned. He had been kidnapped on 5 September, and his captors had demanded ransom from his family. It is suspected that he was killed after his family failed to pay the requested amount. The perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

actor1: Farc Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces Of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Other: On 8 September 2023, in Nueva Loja (Sucumbios), residents of the city discovered pamphlets laying around their town and under the doors of media outlets with the insignia of FARC written on them that addressed residents and gangs of Lago Agrio, Elenos, Shushufindi, Sacha, and Coca areas to announce their presence. The pamphlets indicated that the gangs of Los Choneros and La Mafia put an end to their actions of crimes of robbery, extortion, kidnappings and drug sales, particularly in the towns of Orellana and Sucumbios. Reports indicate that these pamphlets were meant as threats to competing factions.

On 8 September 2023, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), residents of the Cabo Quiroz neighborhood rioted and threw stones at the house of a man who sexually abused a boy, demanding justice from authorities who took the man into custody but released him without charges.

Defusal: On 8 September 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), a package with dynamite was discovered along the road to Daule, close to a Metro stop. Authorities confirmed the presence of the explosive and removed it.

On 8 September 2023, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), dozens of merchants from the Centro Historico neighborhood beat up a suspected robber, in the El Tejar shopping center sector. The police prevented the victim, a foreigner who had been arrested at least 10 times, from being lynched. There were no fatalities.

Property destruction: On 8 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), several unidentified armed assailants opened fire on two houses in the Blanca Garcia neighborhood using rifles. The attackers then set one of the houses on fire before fleeing in multiple vehicles and motorcycles. No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear.

Around 8 September 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), several unidentified armed assailants kidnapped 10 merchants from different parts of the city and held them together in the Monte Sinai sector, northwest of the city. Authorities rescued the victims and arrested six suspects, including two minors, while seizing two firearms, toy weapons, ammunition, explosives, and 13 motorcycles.

On 8 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of suspects shot and killed a man and a woman at a fast food stall in the El Recreo neighborhood. The couple were ordering food at the time of their killing. The man was shot twice in the head. Witnesses claim that the perpetrators hopped into a car and fled. There is no further information on their identity or motives. 2 fatalities.

On 8 September 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), armed suspects on a motorcycle shot and killed a man travelling on a motorbike, in a drive-by shooting between 10 de Agosto and Pichincha streets. Authorship and motives unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 September 2023, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting in the Las Cumbres neighborhood. The victim had recently left prison and the suspects fired at him at least 13 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 8 September 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and his dismembered body was found in two bags at the entrance of 8th street, Casuarina Av., north part of the city. The victim was found with a threatening note to thieves in the sector (this goes to thieves at the entrance of 8, 112th St., San Ignacio). The perpetrators behind the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno (Guayas), two unidentified armed suspects in a car opened fire against a group of people at the San Martin and Quito metro line in the south sector in a drive-by shooting. One man died after the attack and another was taken to a hospital where he was pronounced dead. A security guard was shot and injured during the attack and also assisted. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 8 September 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified individuals opened fire from a car at a man at the local marketplace, killing him and injuring a Venezuelan passerby (drive-by). The target was shot five times in the head. There is no further information on the motives and the perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

On 8 September 2023, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators shot and killed a man in the La Mena neighborhood and later set the victim's vehicle on fire. There is no further information on the motives and perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Labor Group (Ecuador); PSC: Social Christian Party (Ecuador); Former Government of Ecuador (2021-2023)
notes: On 9 September 2023, in Chongon (Guayas), a former municipal official of the Social Cristian Party (PSC) and his driver were kidnapped at by unidentified individuals who intercepted his vehicle while on the road toward Salinas, in the province of Santa Elena, from his home in Chongon near Guayaquil. On 10 September 2023, he was discovered in the Los Esteros neighborhood in the south of Guayaquil with injuries and was taken to hospital. The official was previously the head of the Citizen Security Corporation of Guayaquil (CSCG) and was in the cabinet of the previous mayor of Guayaquil. Authorities indicate that the kidnappers may have returned the official to avoid police pressure. The whereabouts of the driver remain unknown.

On 9 September 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), armed suspects shot and killed a man, and injured another one, inside a house in the Los Girasoles neighborhood. The victims were drug users. The perpetrators arrived at the scene on a motorcycle. There is no further information on their identity or motives. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of suspects shot and killed a man at his aunt's house in the Carmen Bautista neighborhood. He was shot multiple times in the head. The perpetrators arrived at and fled the scene on a motorcycle. The authorship and motives are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 9 September 2023 (as reported), in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), a taxi driver was killed and his body found tied up and gagged in a forested area of the Yanacocha natural reserve, by the road to Nono. The number of perpetrators is unknown. He went missing three days before. It is suspected that the attackers stole his cab, and that he died either of asphyxiation from the gag, or hypothermia. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2023, in Patricia Pilar (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in front of his home in a drive-by shooting. The perpetrators called the man, telling him his son was being attacked to lure him outside, then ambushed him. The victim had recently served a prison sentence for robbery and homicide. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2023, in Bahia de Caraquez (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Casa Ceibo sector. The motivation and perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2023, in Jipijapa (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified individuals on a motorcycle opened fire on a group of people in the Primero de Noviembre neighborhood, killing one man and injuring another (drive-by). The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 September 2023, El Triunfo (Guayas), a group of residents captured, tied up, and beat a man who they identified as a local thief and stripped him naked. The residents then forced the man to walk the streets of the town naked while they followed him in motorcycles shouting insults at him. There were no fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 10 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot at a private residence Ciudadela Primavera 2 in Duran. A child inside was killed and a teenager was injured. Relatives of the victims suspect they were attacked by mistake since they had recently moved to the residence. The authorship and the motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 10 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), several unidentified armed individuals in three cars shot and killed a man with at least six gunshots to the head in a drive-by shooting in the Ciudadela El Seguro. The victim was called to the locality by a woman. It is suspected that the deceased was travelling on a motorcycle in the company of another man at the time of the attack; this second man managed to escape, but was shot and killed later that day inside his house in El Coco neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 10 September 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals inside a car shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Ciudadela Circunvalacion. Another person was shot and injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 September 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a man and a woman driving another motorbike in a drive-by shooting on Juan Leon Mera Street, Ciudadela Margarita. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 10 September 2023, in Vinces (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed two brothers in a drive-by shooting during a birthday party at the intersection of Sucre and Jorge Yanez avenues. One victim was shot multiple times in the head, chest, and one hand; he had a police record for robbery. The suspects fired at least 16 shots. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 10 September 2023, in Jipijapa (Manabi), a group of residents held and threw burned oil and tar to a man accusing him of theft attempt in the Colon and Eloy Alfaro streets, city center. The mob intended to set the suspect on fire but he was rescued by police forces and arrested. There were no fatalities.

Around 10 September 2023 (as reported), in Sinincay (Azuay), two men were killed and their bodies were found with stab wounds and their hands bound with packing tape in the Victoria Baja area. A letter with an unspecified message was left by the bodies. Authorities suspect the men were killed elsewhere and left at the scene. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 11 September 2023, in Otavalo (Imbabura), residents of the San Juan neighborhood rioted after three armed men shot at and injured a woman in a drive-by shooting. Nearby taxi drivers gave chase to the attackers who then fled on foot and left their vehicle behind. Angry residents then moved the vehicle to a soccer field and set it on fire. The residents denounced that taking action themselves was the only way to ensure justice in their community.

Property destruction: On 11 September 2023, on the Coast of Manta (Manabi), police forces seized 72 sacks containing approximately 1.5 tons of cocaine, 50 nautical miles offshore of Manta. There were no arrests.

On 11 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), four unidentified perpetrators described as criminals kidnapped a man from an auto repair shop where he worked on the Duran-Tambo road. The whereabouts of the victim are unknown.

On 11 September 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified, heavily armed individuals described as hitmen opened fire on three men in the Blanca Garcia sector, killing two and injuring one. One man died at the scene, while the other two were transported to a medical facility, where one later died from his injuries. The two killed victims were brothers. Authorship and motivation unknown. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 11 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), three unidentified suspects doused a vehicle with gasoline and set it on fire in the Guasmo Sur neighborhood. The vehicle exploded but no victims were reported. The individuals left a threatening note to the owner of the vehicle, who is a merchant in the sector.

Around 11 September 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a man was killed and his body was found in a ditch in the 5 de Junio housing complex. Witnesses stated that unidentified men in a car threw the body in the sector and fled. The victim was found with hands tied up and his face covered, and his body showed signs of being tortured. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed men in a motorcycle, described as hitmen, shot and killed a man outside his house in a drive-by shooting in the Guayacanes housing complex. Another person that was with the victim managed to flee. Police stated he had criminal records for fraud. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2023, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), four unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen opened fire at a group of people at their home, injuring a man and a woman. The perpetrators arrived at the scene in a vehicle and, armed with various weapons including rifles, opened fire on the group of four people standing outside a house. The targeted victims were the owners of the house, a man and a woman, who were a couple. They fled into the house when the perpetrators opened fire. The perpetrators also shot at a neighbour, who escaped into his own house. The perpetrators then fired shots into the house and injured the couple and killed their dog. The male victim had a criminal record for possession (use) of drugs and robbery. There were no fatalities.

On 11 September 2023, in Tosagua (Manabi), several local residents captured and beat up a man suspected of robbery on Salomon Street, Santa Lucia sector. The victim was rescued by the police who prevented him from being lynched. There were no fatalities.

Security measures: On 12 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), the Duran Municipal Council declared a state of emergency in the city for the next 60 days in response to violent crime. The Mayor of the town mentioned that local politicians are equally at threat, citing an attack on himself on the day of his inauguration on May 15 2023 that resulted in the death of two police officers and a merchant (coded separately).

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: Defusal: On 12 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), a remotely controlled drone left an explosive device on the roof of La Roca maximum security prison, high-risk prisoners' wing. Police forces carried out a controlled detonation of the artifact and the explosion damaged part of the roof. The explosive is suspected to have been planted by members of Los Choneros gang to cause structural damage to the prison and prevent some of their members from being detained there. There were no casualties.

On 12 September 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Si Vivienda locality. The suspects fired about 20 shots (likely execution). Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects in a car (drive-by shooting) intercepted and opened fire against two men in a car in the Antonio Parra Velasco and Jose Luis Tamayo Avs., Sauces 6 sector, killing both of them. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 2 fatalities.
Property destruction: On 12 September 2023, off the coast of Muisne (Esmeraldas), elements of the Navy and the police seized a ton and a half of cocaine from an abandoned boat.
Property destruction: On 12 September 2023, in Coast of Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police together with the Navy seized 1.5 tons of cocaine approximately 50 km off the coast in 73 packages.

On 13 September 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), approximately 30 employees at the Esmeraldas government prefecture took to the streets and set fire to tires to condemn an attack that occurred earlier that day, in which armed men shot at a group of workers who were entering the mechanical workshop owned by the institution, killing one and injuring another (coded separately). As a result of the attack and the resulting riot, the Esmeraldas Prefecture released a statement committing itself to the defense of its citizens and its employees.

On 13 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a security guard in a drive-by shooting at the restaurant where he worked in the Mucho Lote 1 sector of the Pascuales district. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), various unidentified armed perpetrators traveling in a taxi kidnapped a man on 25 de Junio Avenue. The man was traveling in a vehicle with a friend when the perpetrators intercepted them and forced the victim into the taxi, taking him to a banana plantation in a rural area around Machala. Police forces liberated the victim on the same day after engaging in a search operation. The perpetrators fled police capture, leaving the victim behind.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Esmeraldas News; Expreso; La Prensa Chimborazo
notes: On 13 September 2023, in San Mateo (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) shot and killed a heavy machinery operator who worked for the City Hall in the Los Puentes sector, in a drive-by shooting. Another worker was shot and injured. This is suspected to be part of a series of extortion-related attacks by criminal groups against the Prefect of Esmeraldas after the public release of her net worth. The authorship is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2023, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), two unidentified armed suspects, described as delinquents, on a motorcycle opened fire against a restaurant in the Giovanni Calles Lascano Av., in a drive-by shooting. A worker at the establishment of Venezuelan origin was shot and killed and a customer injured. It's suspected the attack was linked to extortionist groups, as according to witnesses, the suspects advised before fleeing, that it was the last warning. The perpetrators of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2023, close to San Mateo (Esmeraldas), around 30 employees of the Putrefecture mechanical workshop of Esmeraldas demonstrated and set fire to tires on a road to San Mateo to denounce the attack and death of a colleague and to demand security measures after four attacks against the workshop in the past month.

On 13 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on three motorbikes shot and killed an off-duty security guard who was arriving to his home in the Balerio Estacio sector. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals opened fire from a car at two women in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Nicolas Segovia and Azuay, killing them both. Authorities found 9-millimeter bullets at the scene. One victim had received threats for unspecified reasons. The perpetrators are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 13 September 2023, in Tosagua (Manabi), at least two unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man inside his vehicle with at least 20 gunshots in the Malecon locality in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 14 September 2023 (as reported), in Balao (Guayas), a man was killed and his decapitated body was found with signs of torture in a banana plantation. The victim's body was also tied at the hands and feet, with deep stab wounds to the chest, likely caused by a machete. The victim had been kidnapped on 23 August (coded separately) for ransom. The victim's family indicated that although they paid the ransom, they did not receive any further information about his whereabouts. The number of perpetrators is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 September 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), various unidentified armed perpetrators described as hitmen traveling in a vehicle and on one motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting at a motorcycle workshop along Ochoa Leen and Jubones streets. One other person was also injured in the attack. Police authorities arrested three suspects in connection with the attack. The suspect riding the motorcycle was arrested shortly after the attack and was injured by police officers in the arrest. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 14 September 2023 (as reported), in Huaquillas (El Oro), unknown individuals killed and decapitated a man and his head was found in front of an educational unit between La Republica and Esmeraldas Avenues. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 September 2023, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) shot and severely injured an off-duty municipal traffic agent in the Ciudadela La Aurora. The victim was taken to hospital, where he died the day after the attack. The victim was shot 12 times with a 9mm firearm. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 14 September 2023 (as reported), in Manta (Manabi), at least two unidentified armed suspects, described as hitmen in a vehicle, got off the car and opened fire against a couple man and woman inside a car in a commercial establishment in 10th street and 36 Av., Santa Martha neighborhood. The female victim died after the attack and the male victim, of Cuban origin, was taken to hospital. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 14 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), approximately 1,500 military and police officers carried out an intervention in the prison Litoral to eradicate organized crime within prisons and seized weapon, ammunition, among other.

Property destruction: On 14 September 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), approximately 1,500 military and police officers carried out an intervention in the prison Litoral to eradicate organized crime within prisons and seized weapon, ammunition, among others.

On 14 September 2023, in Jaramijo (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed the owner of a meat shop inside his business in the Terranostra area. The killing is suspected to be linked to extortion, but authorities have not confirmed the motives or perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 14 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), six unidentified individuals (described as hitmen) killed a man inside his home in the Una Sola Fuerza cooperative. The perpetrators entered through the roof before killing the victim. The reasons and perpetrators behind the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), two unidentified individuals shot and killed a motorcycle taxi driver on the road to Daule, near the Pascuales terminal. Two of the suspected perpetrators were arrested and injured minutes later in a clash with the police (coded separately). The motive behind the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_1: Military Forces of the United States (2021-2025); Police Forces of the United States (2021-2025) Drug Enforcement Administration
notes: Property destruction: On 15 September 2023, on the Coast of Manta (Manabi), police forces, in cooperation with the US Coast Guard and US Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA) agents, confiscated 3.5 tons of cocaine discovered on a barge 70 nautical miles from the port of Manta. Police authorities arrested three individuals.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 15 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), three unidentified men dressing as police officers and posing as officers, kidnapped a male judicial servant from the general prosecutor's office in Guayas along the road of Narcisa de Jesus and Terminal Terrestre. Authorities indicated that personnel from the Prosecutor's Office and the National Directorate for Kidnapping and Extortion freed the judicial servant on 16 September 2023 and arrested three suspects.

On 15 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Urdaneta (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators traveling by vehicle opened fire on a group of people in a drive-by shooting along Huancavilca Street in the Garay neighborhood, killing three people and injuring one person. Authorship and motivation unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 15 September 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of armed perpetrators in a vehicle opened fire at a group of five people traveling in a truck in a drive-by shooting along Walter Andrade Avenue, near Paseo La Cuadra, killing two of them. The killed victims were a man and a woman. The other three people in the vehicle were not injured. Authorship and motivation unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 15 September 2023 (as reported), in Naranjal canton (Guayas), two men were killed, and their bodies found with gunshot wounds and their faces mutilated, on the Taura - Naranjal road. There is no further information at this point in time. 2 fatalities.

Around 15 September 2023 (month of), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants shot at a construction materials shop located at Balerio Estacio sector. The attack was claimed to be by Los Tiguerones gang members in an attempt to force the shop owner to pay for protection money (extortion). No one was injured. There were no casualties.

Around 15 September 2023 (as reported), in Picoaza (Portoviejo, Manabi), a woman was shot and killed and her body was found tied up on a road in the Nueva Florida sector. The victim was found wearing her work uniform. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 September 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike opened fire on two men inside a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Bolivar and Espejo Streets, killing both of them. The same day, unidentified armed individuals, described as hitmen in a car, shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the La Pampa sector, Andres de Vera neighborhood. A woman was shot and injured. The authorship and motivations of both attacks are unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 15 September 2023 (month of), in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), a person was killed and their head and limbs were found in an alley of the Autoridad Portuaria neighborhood. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), unknown armed individuals attacked a pharmacy with an explosive device in the Pascuales sector. The attack is being linked to extortion payments after days earlier the pharmacy received messages and calls to demand 5,000 USD.

Property destruction: Around 15 September 2023 (as reported), in Sucumbios province (coded to Santa Rosa de Sucumbios, Sucumbios), military forces dismantled an illegal fuel storage pool in the rural La Granita sector. The pool measured 10 meters in length and 3 meters in width. Reports indicate that these types of pools are used for storing white gasoline, which is a precursor in the production of cocaine by criminal groups.

On 16 September 2023, in El Guabo (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a Venezuelan man at his house. The perpetrators approached the victim at his house and, after a brief conversation, one of them opened fire. Authorship and motivation unknown. There were no fatalities.

Weapons seizure: On 16 September 2023, in Shumiral (Azuay), police and military forces arrested two suspected members of a criminal group and confiscated a large arsenal of weapons, including 4 AR-15 rifles, 1 M16 rifle, 1 mini Uzi, 3 pistols, 3 revolvers, 2 Mossberg shotguns, various types of ammunition, a C4 explosive, and 139 ordinary capsules. Additionally, authorities found 500 meters of slow-burning fuse, 8 rifle magazines, 3 pistol magazines, and 4 Motorola radios, one of which had belonged to the National Police and was suspected by authorities to be used for robberies in local mines.

On 16 September 2023, in Anconcito (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed perpetrators on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Luis Celleri neighborhood. There is no further information on the motivation or the perpetrators behind the attack. 1 fatality.

On 16 September 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), an unidentified armed individual on a bicycle fired four gunshots at a man in a drive-by shooting on Sangurima Street, in the Nueve de Octubre market sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 16 September 2023, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a worker inside a restaurant in a drive-by shooting. The suspects were extortionists who asked for money. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 16 September 2023 (as reported), in Daule (Guayas), at least five unidentified men, suspected gang members, abducted three men in the Lucia bridge while the victims were working delivering a cargo. The suspects requested USD 20,000 for ransom to the victim's relatives for their released but police forces carried out an operation in the Hacienda Victoria sector and the victims were unharmed and released. Five suspects linked to the abduction were arrested in the Cooperativa 5 de Diciembre sector. With the suspects police seized cell phones, a firearm, ammunition, and personal IDs.

Property destruction: Around 17 September 2023 (as reported), off the coast of Manta (Manabi), military forces and coast guards seized around one ton of drugs and arrested three individuals 60 nautical miles off the coast of Manta.

On 17 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), a mob of residents beat two people with blunt objects who tried to rob someone while traveling on a motorcycle along the Pajonal road in the La Mercedes neighborhood. The mob killed one of the robbers and burned the motorcycle while the other one eventually escaped on foot. 1 fatality.

On 17 September 2023, in Pedernales (Manabi), an unknown number of assailants kidnapped a citizen and demanded a large sum of money for his release. Police forces later rescued the victim and arrested one woman, who had contacted the victim through social media before the abduction.

On 17 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen riding a motorcycle killed a foreign national in a drive-by shooting near the Regional Prison on the Daule road. The victim was with his partner at the time, who was unharmed. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 September 2023, in Playas (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals described as hitmen riding a motorcycle killed a man inside his vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Paquisha Avenue in the El Arbolito sector. The attackers fired several shots at the victim's head before fleeing the scene. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 September 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling by motorcycles and in vehicles attacked a group of people in a drive-by shooting at a house in the 12 de Noviembre neighborhood, killing three people. The victims were gathered for a celebration. The victims were two men, who died later at a hospital, and a small girl who was killed at the scene. Authorship and motivation unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 17 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified heavily-armed individuals, described as hitmen, opened fire during a public celebration in the 12 de Noviembre neighborhood. A child and two men were killed. Four other people, three women and one man, were shot and injured. The authorship and the motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 17 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspected gang members, fired at least 15 times against a man who was leaving his home in the Siete Lagos neighborhood killing him. Police suspect the attack was linked with settlement of scores between rival gangs. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspected gang members, shot and killed a man inside his car at Guatemala and Washington streets, in the Barrio del Seguro neighborhood. Police suspect the attack was linked with settlement of scores between rival gangs. The perpetrators of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 September 2023, in Mocache (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of people in front of a bar in the Barrio Lindo neighborhood, killing three men and injuring three more people. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 17 September 2023, in San Jacinto de Yaguachi (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) on a motorcycle shot and killed three men inside a vehicle in a drive-by execution in the El Hielo sector, at the entrance of the municipality. The authorship and motivations remain unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 17 September 2023 (as reported), in La Aurora (Guayas), body parts from a decapitated man were found by fishermen on the banks of the Los Tintos River. The victim is believed to have been dismembered with an electric saw. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting outside a restaurant in the Abel Gilbert neighborhood. The victim was leaving the restaurant and attempted to flee upon noticing the perpetrators, but was fatally shot and collapsed near the entrance of a nearby house. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2023, near Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle attacked two men in a drive-by shooting along the Palenque road. One victim was killed, while the other, who sustained gunshot wounds to the torso, was transported to a medical facility in critical condition. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2023, in El Laurel (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals aboard a motorcycle killed a woman in a drive-by shooting in a tourist local beach. The perpetrators shot her more than three times in the head. There is no further information on the motives or the perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals on two motorcycles shot and injured a woman who was working at her food business in a drive-by shooting in front of the Guayaquil Regional Prison. Authorities suspect the attack is related to extortion. There is no further information about the perpetrators of the attack. There were no fatalities.

Around 18 September 2023 (between 17 - 18 September), in Quevedo (Los Rios), a man was killed and his body was found in the Quevedo River with two gunshot wounds to the head and one to the chest. It is suspected that unidentified individuals had abducted the victim from a nightclub the day before; however, the motives and perpetrators remain unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects (described as hitmen) on a motorcycle shot and killed a man inside a car in a drive-by shooting at the roundabout of Rodriguez Bonin and Barcelona streets, in the southwest part of the city. The victim was shot at least 10 times. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators remain unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), armed forces arrested two leaders of Los Tiguerones criminal group during an operation in La Primavera area. The arrests followed intelligence efforts led by the Joint Task Force of Esmeraldas. Authorities seized firearms, ammunition, Molotov cocktails, a revolver, a double-barrel shotgun, two bladed weapons, and 59 rounds of ammunition.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 19 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), three unidentified heavily armed suspects, described as hitmen, opened fire against two men in the Primavera 2 neighborhood, killing one of them and injured the other who was taken to hospital and later pronounced dead. A girl was shot and injured by a stray bullet. Also, two unidentified armed suspects on a motorcycle, described as criminals, shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Oramas Gonzalez locality. The victim was shot at least seven times. The motivation behind the attacks and its perpetrators are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 19 September 2023, on the road to Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects shot and injured a municipal traffic agent in the Duran-Boliche road, at Km 10. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 19 September 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), at least two women abducted a taxi driver in the 28 de Mayo cooperative and requested an unknown amount of money to the victim's family for his release. The victim managed to flee as informed police officer, who carried out an operation, releasing another victim and arresting two women, one of them a minor.

On 19 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen traveling in a pickup truck and a motorcycle killed three men outside in a drive-by shooting outside their house on Dalila Echeverria and Ricardo Sotomayor streets. Two victims died at the scene, while the third died from his injuries at a hospital. Police authorities suspect the incident is linked to organized criminal groups. Authorship and motivation unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 19 September 2023, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), eight suspected members of a criminal gang abducted a Chinese woman and her daughter on the road to Calacali, taking them in two vehicles to separate locations in the city. Police launched a search operation, and the victims were released hours later. Authorities found police uniforms in one of the vehicles used by the perpetrators, but no arrests were made.

On 19 September 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), two suspects on a motorcycle opened fire on the facade of a bingo, in a suspected extortion-related drive-by shooting. The owner of the premises had received extortion threats in the previous weeks, but had failed to pay the extortion fee. It is suspected that he was inside the building at the time of the attack. The perpetrators fled. There were no casualties.
On 19 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and injured a motorbike taxi driver. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 19 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a group of unidentified armed individuals shot and injured five people and killed another one in a drive-by shooting at a cell phone business in the Ciudadela Alborada 2, near Plaza Mayor shopping center. The four wounded victims were injured with stray bullets. According to the police the motivation for the crime was extortion. Witnesses stated the store owner was the target of the attack. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 19 September 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces seized 1,161 brick-shaped blocks of cocaine (more than 1 ton) inside cylindrical metal tanks, hidden in a banana shipment destined to the city of Malaga, in Spain. Police arrested one person.

On 19 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), at least four unidentified armed individuals abducted four people separately in express kidnappings in the La Floresta sector, after the victims were tricked into taking out loans online. Police forces rescued the four victims unharmed after the suspects demanded USD 20,000.00 as ransom. One suspect was arrested. The authorship is unknown.

On 19 September 2023, in Pedernales (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals abducted a man and asked for USD 50,000.00 for ransom. The victim was released unharmed during a police operation and a suspect was arrested. One cell phone was seized. Authorship unknown.

Around 19 September 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified suspects abducted two taxi drivers. The victims were rescued unharmed by police forces and two women linked with the abduction were arrested.

On 19 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), three unidentified armed men opened fire outside the Terminal Terrestre bus station. The suspects were later arrested by police forces. There were no casualties.
Defusal: On 19 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), a stick of dynamite was found in a flowerbed outside a home in Los Helechos.

Defusal: On 20 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), a package with dynamite was discovered near a home in the block 6 of the Los Helechos neighborhood. Police evacuated various houses of the neighborhood and transported the package to a remote location to safely defuse it.

On 20 September 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas) four unidentified assailants kidnapped, beat, and tied up a taxi driver in the El Coral neighborhood before abandoning him in an unknown location. The victim escaped and alerted police. No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear. There were no fatalities.

Around 20 September 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of armed assailants shot and injured a traffic officer at Km 10 of the Duran highway. His colleagues transported him to a medical facility in a patrol vehicle. No further details were disclosed. There were no fatalities.

Property destruction: On 20 September 2023, between Manta, Portoviejo, Montecristi and Bahia de Caraquez (coded to Manta, Manabi), police forces seized 5 tons of cocaine during a joint operation with the United States National Security Department and the US Embassy in Ecuador. During the operation 10 vehicles, nine firearms, and ammunition were seized. 19 people, including 16 Ecuadorians and three Colombians were arrested.

Property destruction: Around 20 September 2023 (as reported), near Mataje (Esmeraldas), military forces dismantled a base used for illegal mining in the area near the northern border of the Esmeraldas region. Military forces also confiscated In addition, firearms, ammunition, gold bars, and money. They confiscated a carbine, a 9-mm pistol, two pistol feeders, 71 9-mm pieces of ammunition, and 47 12-mm cartridges. They also found four scales, three communication radios and two chargers, two gold ingots, three tools for mining activity, and 450,000 Colombian pesos.

On 20 September 2023, in Tena (Napo), local residents and neighbors of the victim beat up a man in an attempted lynching after he stabbed his ex-wife in their neighborhood, leading to her death. The woman had been seeking protection from her ex-partner. The suspected man was a police officer currently on leave from duty. The suspect was also taken to a hospital under police custody due to injuries he sustained.

Around 20 September 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a man was killed and parts of his dismembered body were found by fishers on the banks of a river in the Penon del Rio sector. The motives and perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.
