On 20 September 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of heavily armed individuals who arrived on two motorcycles, described as suspected hitmen, shot and killed a man in the Luis Vargas Torres area. The victim was a seafood vendor, and the attack took place at his seafood stand. The motives and the perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 September 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire on two men in a drive-by shooting in the Nueva Esperanza neighborhood, killing them. One of the victims was shot four times in the head. On the same day, in the Las Minas neighborhood, two armed individuals on a motorbike, shot and killed another man in a drive-by shooting. There is no further information on the perpetrators or motives behind the attacks. 3 fatalities.

Around 20 September 2023 (as reported), in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), a man was killed, and his body was left with tied hands and feet near a school in the Gonzalez Rubio neighborhood. Locals stated that individuals on two motorcycles and in a car abandoned the man's body and later shot at it. Police indicated that the shots were meant to intimidate residents in the area, as the body already had 21 gunshot wounds, and only two shell casings were found at the scene. There is no further information on the motives or the perpetrators behind the attack. 1 fatality.

On 20 September 2023, in San Francisco de Cerro Alto (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a taxi driver. The victim's body was found inside his vehicle with a gunshot wound on the San Vicente-San Pablo road. Authorities suspect the attack occurred in the early hours of the same day. There is no further information on the motives or the perpetrators behind the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 20 September 2023 (as reported), in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), a man was killed and his dismembered body was found in separate plastic bags in the Federico Intriago sector. There is no further information about the motives, circumstances, or the perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 20 September 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) carrying rifles on a motorbike shot and killed a couple and their infant daughter in a drive-by shooting inside a motorbike repair shop in the El Caserio sector, San Camilo parish. The couple owned the repair shop and the husband was working there at the time of the attack. Another woman was injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 20 September 2023, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), at least six unidentified armed suspects abducted a man in an express kidnapping in the Loma de Puengasi neighborhood, after the victim traveled from Ambato municipality tricked into taking a loan. The victim's relatives were demanded US 10,000 for ransom for his release. Police forces carried out an operation and the victim was unharmed rescued. Six suspects were arrested and one was injured. There were no fatalities.
On 20 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), according to witnesses, armed individuals on three motorcycles shot and killed three men in a drive-by shooting in the Martha Bucaram sector. 3 fatalities.

On 20 September 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), five armed individuals intercepted a taxi driver and kidnapped him in Parque de Las Palmas sector and taken to a home where he was held and where the armed individuals asked for ransom. Police managed to locate the individuals and release the man. One minor was sentenced to six years of prison for the involvement in the kidnapping.

Defusal: On 21 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), police forces responded to an explosive device left by an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators described as extortionists who placed it with a threatening note at a technical center on Balosa Road. The note demanded $10,000 to avoid harm to the female business owner, her family, or the workers. The explosive was a stick of dynamite.

Property destruction: On 21 September 2023, in the rural Punino Alto area of Orellana province (coded to San Sebastian del Coca, Orellana), military forces dismantled various machines used for illegal mining. They destroyed 15 backhoes, 1 suction pump, retained 5 backhoes (to be later destroyed), and confiscated 1 backhoe, 2 motorcycles, 2 water engines, and a thousand gallons of diesel.
Property destruction: On 21 September 2023, near Talag (Napo), military forces dismantled 6 backhoes and 1 concessionaire (machine used for mercury mining) used for illegal mining in the area.

On 21 September 2023, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), three unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an informal taxi driver outside a commercial establishment in the El Senor de los Milagros neighborhood. The victim was shot four times. There is no further information on the motives or the perpetrators behind the attack. 1 fatality.

On 21 September 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unspecified number of armed suspects on motorcycles, described as members of a criminal group, abducted a man. Due to information provided to the victim's relatives under unclear circumstances, police forces located him that evening in the Camino de los Militares sector. He had managed to escape from the house where he was being held captive, along with two other men who had been abducted on an unspecified date; all three were found on a street in the sector.

On 21 September 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), three unidentified armed individuals abducted four students of law from the Universidad del Azuay and kept them hostage for at least five hours. According to the police the suspects wanted information from the student's relatives. The students were physically assaulted and later on abandoned in the Benigno Malo sector. There were no fatalities.

Property destruction: On 21 September 2023, in Manta (Manabi), the national police dismantled a criminal organization dedicated to drug trafficking and raided properties in four cantons (coded separately). A total of 19 people were arrested in the province and 5 tons of cocaine were seized together with 10 vehicles and weapons.

Property destruction: On 21 September 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), the national police dismantled a criminal organization dedicated to drug trafficking and raided properties in four cantons (coded separately). A total of 19 people were arrested in the province and 5 tons of cocaine were seized together with 10 vehicles and weapons.

Property destruction: On 21 September 2023, in Montecristi (Manabi), the national police dismantled a criminal organization dedicated to drug trafficking and raided properties in four cantons (coded separately). A total of 19 people were arrested in the province and 5 tons of cocaine were seized together with 10 vehicles and weapons.

Property destruction: On 21 September 2023, in Bahia de Caraquez (Manabi), the national police dismantled a criminal organization dedicated to drug trafficking and raided properties in four cantons (coded separately). A total of 19 people were arrested in the province and 5 tons of cocaine were seized together with 10 vehicles and weapons.

Property destruction: On 21 September 2023, in Puerto Francisco de Orellana (Orellana), military together with the police raided an improvised camp with machinery used for illegal mining activities including a suction pump, backhoes, motorcycles, water motors and diesel in Punino Alto.

Property destruction: On 21 September 2023, in Talag (Napo), military together with the police raided an improvised camp with machinery used for illegal mining activities including backhoes and a concessionaire used for mercury.

On 21 September 2023, near Isla de Bejucal (Baba, Los Rios), three men were killed, and their bodies were found inside a ranch in the La Cancagua sector in the early hours of 22 September (the attack likely occurred on the night of 21 September, as locals reported hearing gunshots). Two of the victims were security guards for the property, and the third was a construction worker. There is no further information on the motives or the perpetrators of the attack. 3 fatalities.

On 22 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling by vehicle attacked three people in a drive-by shooting as they were in a trimotor at a public transport stop on Oramas Gonzalez Street. One man died from his injuries, while two women were hospitalized. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 22 September 2023 (between 21 - 22 September), in Duran (Guayas), police forces raided a warehouse in the Duran industrial park and confiscated and seized 1,800 brick-type packages of cocaine hydrochloride (over 1 ton). The location was used by a drug trafficking organization as a drug collection center. Police forces arrested three Colombian nationals and one Ecuadorian national.

On 22 September 2023, in El Guabo (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a man while he was walking in a drive-by shooting in the Los Sauces neighborhood. The perpetrators fired at least five shots. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 September 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals kidnapped a security guard near the Children's Park, on his way to work, and later contacted his family to demand a ransom. Hours later, the family received videos showing the victim tied up and being shot and killed by the kidnappers. The victim's family, in collaboration with authorities, initiated a search to locate his body, but it remains unclear whether the body has been found. 1 fatality.

On 22 September 2023, in La Union (Babahoyo), two unidentified individuals shot and killed a ranch security guard as he was opening the property gate to allow workers to enter. There is no further information on the motives or the perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

On 22 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified individuals opened fire from a car at two men sitting in front of a house in the Bellavista neighborhood, killing them both (drive-by shooting). The perpetrators initially fired from the car and then got out to finish off the victims on the ground. The victims were shot 16 times. One of the car's passengers threw pamphlets next to the bodies that read, 'Anyone who collaborates with the Machuca and obeys Malvin will end up like this.' The motives and the perpetrators are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 22 September 2023 (as reported), near Santa Elena municipality (Santa Elena), a man was killed and his decomposing body was found on the road connecting Santa Elena to Punta Carnero beach. The victim's body showed signs of torture, multiple gunshot wounds, and had been partially burned. The victim had been missing for about one week. The motives and the perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 22 September 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a person was killed and two unidentified armed individuals transported the victim's body, divided in two parts inside two bags to a different area on a motorcycle, and set the body on fire, leaving it on the side of a street. Finally, they fired shots into the air. It is unspecified whether the same two perpetrators who dumped the body also killed the victim. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.
Property destruction: On 22 September 2023, in Mataje (Esmeraldas), military officers seized a camp likely linked to illegal mining with weapons, communication radios, explosives, among other.

Property destruction: On 22 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), police officers seized close to two tons of cocaine and arrested four individuals described as members of a criminal group in a warehouse.

On 23 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Malvinas sector, in the Esteros district, near the bridge connecting Malvinas and Isla Trinitaria. The authorship and motivation for each attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 September 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators shot and injured two men while they were riding in a taxi along 11 de Noviembre and Teniente Cordovez streets. The victims were critically injured and were transferred to Machala Hospital for surgery. It is unspecified whether one of the victims was the taxi driver. Authorship and motivation unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 23 September 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), ten individuals forcibly entered a house in the Nuevo Guayaquil cooperative and killed a Colombian man in front of his wife. The attackers intimidated the victim, questioned him about the location of firearms he was suspectedly storing, and then shot him. After the shooting, they took several TVs and three motorcycles from the property. Authorities arrested one person. While they are investigating whether the incident was a robbery, authorities have not confirmed the motives or the perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

On 23 September 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified individuals in a car shot and killed a man riding a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting on the road to Machala. The victim had a prior criminal record for illegal possession of firearms. There is no further information on the motives or the perpetrators behind the attack. 1 fatality.

On 23 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), unknown armed individuals (described as hitmen) shot and killed two individuals behind the Miguel Angel Zambrano school and in a second incident another person near the Fragata school. 3 fatalities.

On 23 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two armed individuals (described as hitmen) on a motorcycle opened fire at least 10 times, killing a man and injuring his son in a drive-by shooting in the Stella Maris sector. The victim had a criminal record for illegal possession of weapons. Authorities suspect that the attack is related to the ongoing territorial dispute between Los Lagartos and Mafia-18 gang, although it is unclear whether the victim was a member of either organization. 1 fatality.

On 23 September 2023, in Chone (Manabi), a worker at the Judicial Council was shot and killed by unidentified armed assailants when he was in his car in Unidos Venceremos citadel. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 24 September 2023 (as reported), in Santa Elena province (coded to Santa Elena, Santa Elena), a fisherman was killed and his dead body was found with signs of violence and was wrapped in sacks and ropes, suggesting an attempt to submerge it. The victim had been reported missing at sea since 15 September along with two other fishermen. The whereabouts of the other two fishermen are unknown. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 24 September 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Stella Maris park of Guasmo Sur. No arrests were made and the motives are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 September 2023, in Samborondon (Guayas), two unidentified individuals on a motorcycle, described as hitmen, shot and killed a man on 24 de Mayo Avenue in a drive-by shooting. The perpetrators shot more than four times to the victim's chest and head. Authorities suspect the assailants used a rifle in the attack. The motives and the perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: Around 24 September 2023 (as reported), in Puerto Lopez (Manabi), three men original from Portoviejo municipality were shot and killed and their bodies were found handcuffed under a bridge near the Punto Lopez beach. A fourth victim was shot and injured and taken to hospital, where he died days later. Police suspect the killings were related with settling of scores between local gangs. The perpetrators behind the attack are unknown. 4 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 24 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), several unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) shot and killed a woman with multiple gunshots to her head and body between Arizaga and Buenavista Streets. The perpetrators arrived in a car, one of them got out, walked up to the victim, and shot her six times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 24 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), seven unidentified armed individuals blew up a nightclub by throwing explosives during a robbery. Another source mentions it was only one individual who entered the club and threw the explosive while people were present. According to the police the attack was related to extortion ('vacuna'). There were no casualties.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 24 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), several unidentified armed assailants (described as criminals) shot and killed five people outside a house and injured two others in the Ciudadela Primavera 2 neighborhood. Four victims were relatives. Police stated the target of the attack was a man, but opened fire against the entire group. The authorship and the motivations are unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 24 September 2023, in Montecristi (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects (described as hitmen) shot and killed two men in the Leonidas Proano parish, in the main municipal Av in a drive-by shooting. The perpetrators shot the victims in the head and chest. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Machala Movil
notes: On 25 September 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) on a motorcycle fired at least 12 times at a renowned lawyer inside a vehicle at the intersection of Olmedo and 9 de Octubre streets in a drive-by shooting. The victim had recently published content on social media regarding irregularities in the local administration. The authorship and the motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 September 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle shot and wounded two people outside a house in a drive-by shooting on the corner of Colon and Sucre streets. The victims were taken to a hospital, where their condition was reported as stable. Authorship and motivation unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 25 September 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle shot at a parked car outside a house in the Las Nieves neighborhood (drive-by shooting). The perpetrators fled the scene after firing several rounds. Police found multiple bullet casings and suspect the incident to be an extortion-related attack. There were no casualties.

On 25 September 2023, in Ventanas (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty police officer outside his mother's house in the La Loma 1 neighborhood. The perpetrators fired at least 15 shots, four of which hit the officer in the head and chest. The officer's mother was also injured and taken to a hospital. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), three unidentified armed men on foot intercepted a man driving a car in the Mapasingue Este area and killed him with several gunshots. The victim was an informal taxi driver who transported passengers in his vehicle. There is no further information on the motives or the perpetrators behind the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 25 September 2023 (as reported), in Ventanas (Los Rios), a man was killed, and his head was found wrapped in a blanket in the 20 de Noviembre area. Authorities initiated a search for the rest of the victim's body. The motives and the perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 25 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals, described as hitmen, on a motorcycle shot and killed a man with at least six gunshots, in a drive-by shooting in the El Recreo locality. The victim had received death threats. The attack is suspected to be related to disputes between the Chone Killers and Latin Kings gangs. The authorship is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 September 2023, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) on a motorbike shot and injured a man at least twice after the suspects got off the vehicle and broke into the victim's house in the Santa Martha neighborhood. The victim managed to escape. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 25 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), at least five armed suspects described as members of a delinquent group abducted a couple in the in the north sector of the city and demanded USD 200,000 for ransom to the victim's relatives for their release. On 29 September police forces carried out an operation and the victims were rescued unharmed in the Las Orquideas neighborhood. Five suspects, including a relative of one of the victims, were arrested. With them police seized portions of drugs, a car and cell phones.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Machala Movil
notes: On 25 September 2023, in La Mana (Cotopaxi), an unknown number of unidentified suspects abducted two men and requested 20,000 USD to the victims' family for his release. Police forces carried out an operation to rescue the victim as the ransom was being paid in Cayo locality and arrested five suspects. The victim was released unharmed.

Looting: On 25 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), five armed individuals boarded a bus, stole the belongings of the passengers and the driver and then set it on fire in Bastion Popular. The individuals are described as persons dedicated to extortion and demanded large sums of money for the bus company.

source: El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 26 September 2023, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals on three motorcycles (drive-by shooting) opened fire against the woman director of the Duran's Property Registry on Loja Street. The victim managed to dodge the attack and was unharmed. There is no information on the motives of the attack. There were no casualties.
tags: local administrators; women targeted: government officials

notes: Around 26 September 2023 (as reported), in Nueva Loja (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), unidentified assailants, suspected to be locals, killed four men and left leaflets on their bodies indicating that the deceased were criminals involved in stealing livestock and vehicles from local farmers. No arrests were made. 4 fatalities.

Around 26 September 2023 (as reported), near Nobol (Guayas), a woman was killed and her incinerated, dead body was found by the side of a rural road in the Bijagual area. The victim was found near a vacant lot along with a suitcase. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.
On 26 September 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), local residents beat up a suspected robber at the intersection of Rocafuerte and San Martin avenues.

On 26 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects on a motorcycle shot and killed a couple in a drive-by shooting on Francisco de Orellana Avenue, in the La Alborada neighborhood. The perpetrators fired at least 12 shots. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 26 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), several armed assailants in two cars and three motorcycles intercepted a public transport bus in Block 1A of the Popular Bastion sector. They forced passengers to exit, poured gasoline inside the vehicle, and set it on fire. The flames spread to a nearby house, causing minor damage. The bus owner linked the attack to extortionist groups, stating that he had previously received threats and payment demands. Criminals had warned they would burn buses if payments were not made. Authorities confirmed no casualties, but the fire completely destroyed the $70,000 vehicle. The perpetrators remain unidentified.

On 26 September 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), at least two unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) in a van shot and injured an off-duty police officer in a drive-by shooting in the parking lot of a community surveillance unit on Jose Maria Urbina Avenue. The victim was shot in the right arm. The vehicle used by the suspects was later found by police forces. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 26 September 2023 (as reported), between Rocafuerte and Manta cantons (Manabi), a dismembered body was found inside several bags near the La Curva nightclub. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 26 September 2023, in La Mana (Cotopaxi), residents arrived at the police station to lynch five individuals linked to a kidnapping and to demand police officers to release the individuals. When the police refused to hand them over, the group threw stones at the building and set fire to tires. Police forces used tear gas to disperse the crowd. There were no injuries.

On 27 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects in a car shot and killed a man after forcing him off the same vehicle they were at in a drive-by shooting in the Samanes 5 locality, north part of the city. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators kidnapped a taxi driver after intercepting his vehicle. The kidnappers demanded a $2,000 ransom for the release of the victim. The vehicle was later recovered in the 4 de Abril neighborhood. Police liberated the victim on 28 September during an operation in the 4 de Abril and La Barraca neighborhoods. There were no arrests reported.

On 27 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen traveling by vehicle killed a man in a drive-by shooting outside a hair salon on 9 de Mayo and Pasaje streets. Police later apprehended the two suspects after they fled to the Las Brisas neighborhood. The perpetrators had traveled from Guayaquil to target the victim. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 27 September 2023, in Zamora Chinchipe province (coded to Zamora, Zamora Chinchipe), during an operation involving 500 members of the military, police, and other institutions, Ecuadorian security forces destroyed six excavators and other related equipment involved in illegal mining in the Podocarpus National Park. Police and military authorities also seized two firearms, 20 rounds of ammunition, 70 gallons of gasoline, three generators, and 19 propane cylinders.

On 27 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified suspects dressed in black on a motorcycle shot and killed a crab seller, in a drive-by shooting at the Caraguay market. The attackers fled. There is no further information on their identity or motive. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Las Malvinas sector. Locals heard more than five gunshots. The motives and the perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2023, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with several gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Cuba neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2023, in Colon (Portoviejo, Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man. The perpetrators ran away, got on a motorcycle and escaped. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2023, in Posorja (Guayas), various unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man and his infant son inside a van on the Data-Posorja Road in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 27 September 2023, in Vinces (Los Rios), an unidentified armed individual (described as a hitman) shot and killed a municipal commissioner with a bullet to the head during his uncle's funeral. The uncle had been killed on 26 September (coded separately). The suspect fled on a motorcycle after the attack. Authorities are investigating possible links between the two killings. The victim had previously received threats. The authorship and motives remain unknown. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 27 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces controlled detonated two explosive artifacts outside a commercial establishment, near a local school in the Balerio Estacio neighborhood left by gang members in a suspected extortion.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 27 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), at least four unidentified suspects on two motorcycles described as members of a delinquent group threw two Molotov cocktails and set a restaurant on fire in Garzota locality, the north area of the city. The owner of the restaurant, who was an Italian national, was abducted months earlier by extortionist groups (coded separately). The attack caused property damage. Authorship and motivation unknown.

Around 28 September 2023 (as reported), in Vinces (Los Rios), three unidentified armed assailants abducted a business owner by forcing him into a car and driving away. No further information was disclosed.

Around 28 September 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and his beheaded body was found in the Balerio Estacio neighborhood. According to police forces, another man, suspected of being involved in the killing of the first victim was also found shot death hours later in the same sector. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 28 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), a group of local residents apprehended and beat up two suspected robbers and burned their motorcycle along Primera Avenue, between Laureles and Ferroviaria streets. Police authorities arrived to detain the two suspects.

Property destruction: On 28 September 2023, in Bocana de Lagarto (Rioverde, Esmeraldas), military and police forces raided several homes, seizing 2,576 gallons of fuel, six vehicles, a boat, six cell phones, and four outboard motors during a joint military and police operation against fuel trafficking in the Bocana de Lagarto sector. Authorities arrested six individuals for illegal fuel trafficking.

On 28 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two armed suspects on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was sitting on his parked motorbike, in a drive-by shooting on Sedalana and Nicolas Segovia alley. After shooting their victim in the back, the attackers fled the area. There is no further information on their identity or motive. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), at least two unidentified heavily armed suspects in two cars (described as criminals) opened fire against a man on a motorcycle in the Polo Sur housing, Isla Trinitaria locality, in a drive-by shooting. The victim tried to flee and shelter inside an ice-cream shop. Two women were injured by stray bullets. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2023, in Montecristi (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals, described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in the Las Jacuatas locality in a drive-by shooting. The suspects fired at least 20 times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2023, in Rocafuerte (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Resbalon locality. An adolescent student who was leaving class was shot dead by a stray bullet. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 28 September 2023, in Zamora (Zamora Chinchipe), a total of 500 military officers and police carried out an operation against illegal mining inside the Podocarpus national park and seized weapons, ammunition, gas cylinders, gasoline canisters and generators.

Around 29 September 2023 (as reported), near Jambeli (El Oro), a man was killed and his dead body was found, with severed arms and legs and with burn marks, in the Bravito estuary. Fishermen working in the area discovered the body and alerted authorities. Police arrived to find the victim's extremities severed and bound, with signs of burns. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man outside his home near the Ecuador-Peru border. Authorities suspect the attack is linked to a dispute between criminal groups. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 29 September 2023 (as reported), in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), a man was killed and his dead and burned body was found inside trash bags alongside an incinerated motorcycle in the Amazonas neighborhood, near the Autoridad Portuaria neighborhood. The body was also cut into five parts. Locals indicated hearing an explosion before discovering the vehicle in flames next to a trash bag. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the 1 de Abril neighborhood. The perpetrators intercepted the victim, who was driving a vehicle, and opened fire before fleeing in an unknown direction. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of assailants set fire to a hardware store on Jose Joaquin de Olmedo and Eugenio Espejo streets, in front of a school. The fire affected combustible merchandise. The owners of the store had previously received threats from individuals demanding extortion money. No arrests were made. There were no casualties.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: Around 29 September 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a man was killed and the dismembered body was found in the Los Algarrobos cooperative. The body parts were found inside plastic bags in three separate garbage bins. The bodies were discovered near the Duran Communal Vigilance Unit (UVC). Locals indicated that various body parts from killed victims have been found near the building over time (unspecified). The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 29 September 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (likely gang members due to extortion threats received in the past) set fire to a hardware store in the intersection of Jose Joaquin de Olmedo and Eugenio Espejo streets. Part of the merchandise was destroyed by the fire. According to the police the owners had received threats by suspected extortionists. There were no casualties.

Property destruction: On 29 September 2023, in Montalvo (Esmeraldas), police officers together with the military carried out an operation against illegal fuel trafficking and seized warehouses filled with fuel, hydrocarbon, vehicles, a boat, phones and motors. Six people were arrested as a result.

Movement of forces: On 30 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), around 800 military personnel raided Litoral prison to gain control of the prison and confiscate unauthorized items from prisoners. Authorities confiscated weapons, ammunition, explosives, and other prohibited items.

On 30 September 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty police sergeant at his home in the 18 de Noviembre neighborhood. The victim had been the target of an attack months earlier, when two unidentified armed perpetrators riding a motorcycle shot at him in a drive-by shooting (date unspecified). Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Nueve de Octubre (Guayas), unidentified individuals on a motorcycle killed a man in the Esmeraldas and A sector. The motives and perpetrators behind the attacks are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 30 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), unidentified assailants in a car shot and killed a man in the Samanes 7 area. 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals using short and long firearms in a car shot and killed a Venezuelan citizen in a drive-by shooting in the intersection of Teodoro Delgado and J-11 streets, Jocay neighborhood. Five other people were shot and injured, including a child (the shooting took place during a children's party). On another attack in the 8 de Abril neighborhood, unknown assailants shot and killed a man with 10 gunshots to the head inside a pool bar. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 30 September 2023, in Machala (El Oro), unidentified armed assailants on a motorbike shot and killed two people outside of a private residence in a drive-by shooting in the 18 de Octubre neighborhood. Four other people were injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Weapons seizure: On 30 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), approximately 800 Army soldiers and police officers intervened in the pavilion four of the Litoral Penitentiary and seized firearms, explosives, and ammunition. This operation was carried out in compliance with the State of Exception Decree 878.

On 30 September 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals opened fire from a car on a group of people at the intersection of 36th and Maldonado streets, killing one man and injuring two others (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 30 September 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), nearly 800 military officers entered the penitentiary center Litoral as part of a raid and seized weapons, ammunition and explosives.

Around 1 October 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and his dismembered body found inside a bag in the Colinas de la Florida locality. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 2 October 2023, in Machala (El Oro), the national police defused/detonated a dynamite stick left by extortionists in a worksite in the Plaza Bicentenario locality. The explosive was wrapped in a newspaper with a threatening message asking for money.

Around 2 October 2023 (as reported), in La Troncal (Canar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two off-duty Army soldiers and two women and their bodies were found in the Ciudadela Brisas del Valle. Police believe the soldiers were tortured before being killed (likely executed) and they had their feet and hands tied up. One of the victims had his head wrapped in plastic. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 2 October 2023, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and a car shot and killed an adolescent with more than 20 gunshots (likely execution) in a drive-by shooting in the America alley, Ursa neighborhood. Two adults and an adolescent were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2023, in San Lorenzo de Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified hooded and armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with at least five gunshots in a park in a drive-by shooting. A woman was hit by a stray bullet in the head and also died. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 2 October 2023, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), a group of Indigenous women beat up two robbers in the La Manosca sector. Other local residents also beat up the two suspects in an Indigenous justice ritual. There were no fatalities.

On 2 October 2023, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), an unknown number of unidentified heavily-armed individuals using long-range rifles fired at least 10 gunshots at the house of the mayor. The projectiles destroyed windows and the front of the house but the mayor and his family who were home were unharmed. It is suspected that the attack was carried out by an organized criminal group as an act of intimidation. Authorship unknown. There were no casualties.

On 2 October 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man with at least 10 gunshots (likely execution) in a drive-by shooting in the La Madre Park, between Rodrigo Ugarte and Colon streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2023, in Tosagua (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving a car in a drive-by shooting in the Ciudadela San Cristobal. Two other passengers were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2023, in Manta (Manabi), a group of fishers organized as a vigilante group from San Mateo neighborhood captured and beat up with sticks a man they claimed to be a robber. There were no fatalities.

On 3 October 2023, in Ambato (Tungurahua), residents of El Cristal neighborhood captured and beat up two men that had threatened to kill a resident after he was unwilling to pay extortion money. One of the two men was foreigner. Both men were later taken by the police to a hospital. There were no casualties.

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Ecuador (2021-2023) Prison Guards
notes: On 3 October 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an off-duty prison guard wearing his uniform in a drive-by shooting on 3 de Mayo Street, Ciudadela California. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting on Machala and 9 de Octubre streets. The victim was shot 12 times in various parts of his body, including the chest, abdomen, and limbs. It is suspected that the attack was related to a settling of scores. Another drive-by took place in Hualtaco Avenue killing one person that had a police record for robbery. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 3 October 2023 (between 26 September - 3 October), in San Joaquin (Azuay), a man was killed. His human remains were found inside a canvas bag filled with rocks inside a lake and his hands tied. The victim had been missing since 26 September and his body had been in a state of decomposition for between 20 and 30 days (body found on 23 October 2023). Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified suspects (likely gang members due to the extortion kidnapping modality used) abducted a man in the El Hueco sector. The suspects tortured the victim and demanded a payment of 100,000 USD to the victim's relatives for his release. Police forces carried out an operation on 5 October and the victim was rescued and one suspect was arrested. There were no fatalities.

Property destruction: On 3 October 2023, on the Coast of Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police and military forces belonging to the joint-operations task force confiscated a submergible containing over 1 ton of cocaine near the border of Esmeraldas with Colombia. There is no further information available.

assoc_actor_2: Former Los Chone Killers Gang; Labor Group (Ecuador)
notes: On 4 October 2023, in Duran (Guayas), members of the Latin Kings gang shot and killed a coconut seller with several rifle gunshots in the Ciudadela El Recreo. The suspects were extortionists and killed the victim because he refused to pay them. The victim was a suspected former member of the Los Chone Killers gang and had police records for drug trafficking from 2018 and possession of firearms from 2021. 1 fatality.

On 4 October 2023, in Montecristi (Manabi), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a man inside his vehicle workshop in the Leonidas Proano neighborhood. Another person was injured. The perpetrator was with an accomplice. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 October 2023, in La Iberia (El Oro), unidentified armed assailants blew up a house with a dynamite stick in the 12 de Octubre neighborhood. The owner of the house was inside and found a note left by the perpetrators outside. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

On 4 October 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), 20 unidentified armed men on motorbikes and cars shot and killed three men at a workshop in a drive-by shooting in the Galo Plaza sector. A man and a woman were shot dead inside a house a few moments later. Authorship and motivations unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 4 October 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified heavily armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the 15 de Abril neighborhood. The victims were cousins. The reasons and the perpetrators behind the attack are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 4 October 2023, in Tres Postes (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a provincial prosecutor in a drive-by shooting in the Dos Puertas sector. The victim was in charge of investigations into cases of violent deaths. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2023, in Dos Puertas (Guayas), armed suspects on a motorcycle killed a Babahoyo state attorney in a drive-by shooting on the Tres Postes - Jujan highway. The motive and assailants are unknown.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Ecuador (2021-2023); PSC: Social Christian Party (Ecuador); Women (Ecuador)
notes: On 5 October 2023, in Milagro (Guayas), three armed suspects kidnapped a woman, who was the former mayor of Duran (Social Christian Party PSC), from the Divino Nino 3 sector. She was also a former councilwoman and former congress representative and had also received threats in the past. She was released on 8 October. The Chone Killers Gang is suspected to be responsible for the kidnapping.
tags: local administrators; women targeted: government officials; women targeted: politicians

notes: On 5 October 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), several unidentified heavily armed men in two vehicles abducted a man on Los Colonos Avenue (suspected express kidnapping). Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

Around 5 October 2023 (as reported), in Picoaza (Portoviejo, Manabi), a man was killed and his burned-out body found inside his vehicle. The had a wire around his neck. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2023, in Machala (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and set fire to his vehicle in the Pueblo Nuevo sector, parroquia Febres Cordero. The victim was an informal taxi driver. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Ecuador (2021-2023); PSC: Social Christian Party (Ecuador); Women (Ecuador)
notes: On 5 October 2023, in Duran (Guayas), four heavily unidentified armed suspects in a car abducted a woman in the Divino Nino sector. The victim was the former mayor of Duran from 2000 to 2008 and a former city council representative (affiliated with Social Christian Party: PSC). She was released unharmed on 8 October in the rural area of the Milagro municipality. The victim's house was shot over 40 times on 11 October (coded separately) and had received threats (unspecified). Authorship and motivations unknown.

On 5 October 2023, in Febres Cordero (Los Rios), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a taxi driver and his body was found inside his burning vehicle in the Pueblo Nuevo sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 5 October 2023 (as reported), on Jambeli island (Santa Elena), human remains (a human leg) belonging to a mutilated body were found floating on the Estero El Bravito beach. A human arm was also found floating on 5 October near Puerto Bolivar, believed to belong to a human torso found in the same area. It is unclear if the remains belong to one single victim. Authorship and motivations unknown. At least 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2023, in Playas (Guayas), two unidentified individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a couple in a drive-by shooting in the Bellavista neighborhood. The reasons and perpetrators behind the attack are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 5 October 2023, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a lawyer inside his vehicle in a drive-by shooting in the Jujan-Tres Postes Road. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), inmates at the El Litoral prison rioted after the killing of six prisoners being investigated for the killing of the presidential candidate Fernando Villavicencio of the Construye Movement (coded separately). The inmate's killing occurred earlier that day. There were no casualties.

On 7 October 2023, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), more than 8 pedestrians around the bus station of Carcelen captured and beat up a man who had shot a municipal police officer to steal his motorcycle. The man was later taken by police.

On 7 October 2023, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting at a volleyball court in the 10 de Septiembre neighborhood. The assailant in the passenger's seat fired several shots at the victim before they fled the scene. The victim died later at a hospital. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 October 2023, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed five men in two sectors, 5 de Junio cooperative and in the El Recreo sector. One of the victims was an off-duty police officer and two others were shot and injured. Police believe all cases are related to drug trafficking disputes. 5 fatalities.

Around 7 October 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), seven gang members involved in extortion abducted a Venezuelan citizen in an express kidnapping in the suburban area of the city. Police forces carried out an operation and seven suspects were arrested and the victim released. During the operation police seized a car, three revolvers, ammunition, and drugs and they found pamphlets signed by a gang with extortion threats for business owners in the area.

On 8 October 2023, in Manta (Manabi), at least two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a Venezuelan man inside his business on 319th Street, Cuba neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 October 2023, in Chongon (Guayas), between eight to 12 unidentified heavily-armed individuals in three vehicles abducted a foreign man inside a private neighborhood at km 11 of the coastal highway. The perpetrators, armed with rifles, disarmed and tied up the guards of the residential complex, and subsequently stole two weapons and five bulletproof vests from them. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

On 8 October 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his nephew in a drive-by shooting in the Tiwintza neighborhood. Both victims were also on a motorbike and were shot about 10 times. According to police the nephew was the target. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 8 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified heavily-armed individuals in a van shot and killed two people in a drive-by shooting between Machala and Rosendo Aviles Streets, Primero de Mayo cooperative. Four other people were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Regional Los Andes; El Diario (Ecuador)
notes: On 9 October 2023, in Guamote (Chimborazo), residents of the San Vicente sector captured, tied up, beat up, and burned alive a man that had been extorting the residents of the sector. They carried out an Indigenous justice ritual on the man for two days. The man was killed, and around his body there were burning tires, sticks, and stones and the body had the hands tied up. Another suspect managed to escape the Indigenous justice ritual. The suspect was captured by community members when he tried to collect money from a local merchant. 1 fatality.

On 9 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals carrying rifles in a van shot and killed four people in a drive-by shooting between Machala and Rosendo Aviles streets. Two other people were injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 9 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving another motorbike in a drive-by shooting on 25 de Julio Avenue. A child who was with the victim was saved by a passerby. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 October 2023, in El Guabo (El Oro), several unidentified armed individuals carrying pistols and rifles in a vehicle shot and killed a man and an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the Barbones neighborhood. The adolescent was shot multiple times in the head and a third person was injured by gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 9 October 2023, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man with more than 10 gunshots (likely execution) in the Ciudadela Maldonado. Two other people were injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 October 2023, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting between 301st Street and 200th Avenue, in the Paz neighborhood. The same day, unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Ciudadela La Pedrera. Six other people were shot and injured. Two suspects were arrested but the police could not confirm if they were involved in the shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 10 October 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorbike fired shots at two people in a drive-by shooting between 6 de Diciembre and Salinas Streets. A police patrol managed to arrest both suspects after a car chase and they were identified as members of a local criminal group. Police seized a pistol, ammunition, a stolen motorbike, and two cell phones. There were no casualties.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 10 October 2023, in Salinas (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Sindicato de Sales neighborhood. The victim was shot three times. According to the police, the victim was threatened by extortionists since he withdrew a large amount of money from the bank in the previous days. The authorship is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 October 2023, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving his motorbike in a drive-by shooting near the entrance roundabout to Puerto Jeli. The victim was shot at least twice. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 October 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle killed a taxi driver in the Manuel Aguirre sector. The victim, who was driving his taxi, was shot three times and subsequently crashed into a truck. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 October 2023, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), an unknown number of individuals on a motorcycle, described as hitmen, shot and killed a taxi driver who was at the municipal market (drive-by). The perpetrators fired more than 15 shots, also injuring other people. The reasons and perpetrators behind the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 October 2023, in Puerto Lopez (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three people inside a hair salon in the Emiliano Vasquez neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.
On 11 October 2023, in Picoaza (Portoviejo, Manabi), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); Esmeraldas News; La Vanguardia; Primicias
notes: On 11 October 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), armed assailants on two motorbikes shot and killed a man with at least five gunshots inside his car in a drive-by shooting near the Roberto Cervantes park, between Colon, Olmedo, and Salinas Avenues. Three suspects were arrested on 13 October between the Mina de Piedra and Isla Piedad neighborhoods. The suspects were identified as members of Los Tiguerones and Los Lobos, and two of them were adolescents. Police seized a rifle, two pistols, cell phones, and ammunition during their arrest. The police believe the killing was related to extortion and that the suspects demanded US$ 5,000 from the victim. 1 fatality.

On 11 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unidentified armed individual dressed as a student shot and killed an off-duty police officer in the Gallegos Lara cooperative, La Florida sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Ecuador (2021-2023); PSC: Social Christian Party (Ecuador); Women (Ecuador)
notes: On 11 October 2023, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals fired shots at the private residence of the female former mayor (PSC). The victim had been kidnapped on 5 October and released unharmed on 8 October in the Milagron canton (coded separately). She was also a city councilor and assembly member. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

Around 11 October 2023 (as reported), in Quito district (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified suspects, abducted a man in his car in the north sector of the city. Relatives of the victim received threats on 11 October and they were asked a ransom of 20,000 to release the victim. Police forces were activated and the victim was released the same day during an operation, in which four suspects with criminal records for theft, drug trafficking, and weapons possession, were arrested. Police seized a firearm and ammunition.

On 11 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), seven unidentified gang suspects involved in extortion abducted two men in the Bastion Popular sector. The suspects demanded a ransom of 50,000 USD to the victim's relatives for their release. Police forces carried out an operation on 15 October and the victims were rescued and the seven suspects arrested. Some of the suspects had criminal records for drug trafficking. With them police seized a car, four cell phones, three firearms, ammunition, knives and ropes.

On 12 October 2023, in Ambato (Tungurahua), residents of the Yacupamba neighborhood of Izamba parish captured and beat up three men, two from Colombia and one local, who had tried to scam them by selling them misleading products and at a very high price. The residents threw a Molotov bomb at the car they were using to burn it down. Police officers later rescued the three men and took them to a police station. There were no fatalities.

On 12 October 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting between Portoviejo and Pichincha Streets. Most gunshots hit the victim in the head. Another victim was shot and killed in the Ciudadela Choferes Sportman by assailants on a motorbike, between San Antonio and Alonso Campoverde Streets. In La Ciudadela Jose Mayon, another person was shot and killed by armed individuals on a motorbike. The assailants threw pamphlets at the victim's body against the allies of an unspecified gang. In another drive-by shooting between Santa Rosa and Teniente Ortiz Streets, armed individuals shot and killed a man. According to the police all killings are related to drug trafficking disputes. Authorship unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 12 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants carrying rifles shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting at the San Francisco cooperative. One of the victims had a police record for robbery. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 12 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police forces seized 1.5 (1,590.408 Kg) tons of cocaine during an operation in the seaport of Guasmo sector. The drug was hidden in a cargo vessel destined to India. One man was arrested during the operation.

On 13 October 2023, in Latacunga (Cotopaxi), residents of La Calera neighborhood captured, beat up, stripped and paraded around the city on a pick-up truck, two men that were accused of robbing cattle. On the center of the city they were punished through Indigenous Justice ritual. They later turned them to the Police.

On 13 October 2023, in Pilahuin (Tungurahua), Indigenous residents captured, stripped of his clothes, placed in cold water, and whipped a man who had been masturbating in front of children inside a bus. The man received a traditional Indigenous punishment for his actions.

On 13 October 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with several gunshots to the head in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) in the Gonzalez Rubio neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 October 2023, in Playas (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two fishers in the seafood plaza of the General Villamil Playas canton. Two other victims were shot and injured. The suspects were extortionists who killed the fishermen because they refused to pay extortion fees. Authorship unknown. 2 fatalities.

Defusal: On 13 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces removed a dynamite stick left by unknown suspects outside a factory in the Mapasingue sector, west part of the city. The explosive was removed and later safely detonated. Police investigates if the device was left by extortionist groups to intimidate the owner of the establishment.

Around 14 October 2023 (weekend of), in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals who arrived in a vehicle shot and killed a man during a birthday party inside a private residence between J-11 and Teodoro Maldonado streets, Miraflores neighborhood. The perpetrators stepped out of the vehicle, entered the house and started shooting. Three children were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 14 October 2023 (as reported), between Portoviejo and Montecristi (Manabi), a woman was killed and her body found with signs of torture on a road near the San Lorenzo locality. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 October 2023, in El Guabo (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man inside his vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Mariscal Sucre Street. The victim died on 16 October in the hospital. Two suspects were arrested and the police seized two firearms, ammunition and cell phones. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 October 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an unidentified gang abducted a mining business man and demanded payment of US$ 35,000.00. The victim was kept in a private residence in the La Sapera sector and was rescued by police forces on 20 October, unharmed. Two suspects were arrested, and a rifle and two stolen motorbikes were seized. The gang Los Choneros operates in the area where the victim was held captive, however, the perpetrators of the kidnapping are unknown.
On 15 October 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), residents beat up a man who moments earlier had stabbed his partner who was transgender. The man was arrested by the police. There were no fatalities.

Elections/referendum: On 15 October 2023, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), Daniel Noboa Azin National Democratic Action (ADN) was elected as president after winning with a 52.12% of votes, defeating Luisa Maldonado (RC5) who earned 47.89% of votes. Noboa will be officialised mid-December. On 13 April 2025, Daniel Noba was re-elected president of Ecuador with 55.95% of the votes, defeating Luisa Gonzalez (MRC) who reached 44.05 of the votes.

Around 15 October 2023 (as reported), in Montecristi (Manabi), a man was killed and his body was found in handcuffs with several gunshot wounds in the Monterrey sector. The victim was abducted between 7 and 8 October in Jaramijo. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an Argentinian lawyer in a drive-by shooting between Manabi Avenue and Paulo Emilio Macias Street. The victim was shot dead inside his office building. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a taxi driver with two gunshots in a drive-by shooting on Walter Andrade Avenue. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2023, in Sucre (Manabi), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Garcia Moreno Avenue, Leonidas Plaza neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 16 October 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a woman was shot and killed and her body was found in an advanced state of decomposition, tied up and wrapped in a sheet inside a sack in a construction site in the Gabriel Garcia Moreno cooperative. The body showed signs of torture. Local residents reported gunshots during the weekend. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals (likely extortionists) blew up a commercial establishment with a dynamite stick between Esmeraldas and 9 de Octubre Streets. A female worker was injured by the explosion. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 17 October 2023 (as reported), in Ambato (Tungurahua), a man was stabbed and killed and his body found wrapped in a sheet with signs of violence in the Pishilata sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
On 17 October 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a man with more than 10 gunshots in La Bahia sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 17 October 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals who arrived on a motorbike shot and killed a disabled man during a live broadcast on a social network (TikTok) in the San Pablo parish. The victim was sitting on his wheelchair in front of his private residence when the perpetrator shot him several times to the head. The victim tried to defend himself with a firearm. Authorities are investigating whether the victim belonged to any criminal organization, as he had posted content on social media related to the Los Choneros gang. However, it is unclear whether the victim was a member of any organization. The authorship and the motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 17 October 2023, in Rio Verde (Esmeraldas), a man was shot and killed in the Rocafuerte neighborhood by a group of armed assailants. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a Peruvian citizen during a car chase in a drive-by shooting in the Miraflores neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 October 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), two unidentified armed individuals tried to rob a person. Both perpetrators fell from the bike which was set on fire by local residents. Both suspects were arrested. There were no fatalities.

On 18 October 2023, in Rocafuerte (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Pasaje locality. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 18 October 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), police forces defused a dynamite stick that was thrown by unknown assailants in front of a house on Machala and 9 de Octubre Avenues, in the Miraflores neighborhood. The local residents were evacuated. Authorship and motivations unknown.
On 18 October 2023, in Machala (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving his car in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the 26 de Febrero cooperative, Ciudadela Martha de Roldos. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
On 18 October 2023, in El Carmen (Manabi), several unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man with at least 10 gunshots on Chone Avenue. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 October 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike tried to rob local residents in the Totoracocha neighborhood. A group of vigilantes set the motorbike on fire but the suspects managed to escape. There were no casualties.

On 19 October 2023, in Puyo (Pastaza), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed three people in a drive-by shooting. One suspect was arrested. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 19 October 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a government's warehouseman in a drive-by shooting in the San Martin de Porres neighborhood. The victim was shot at least five times in the head (likely execution). This is suspected to be part of a series of extortion-related attacks by criminal groups against the Prefect of Esmeraldas after the public release of her net worth. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 19 October 2023 (as reported), in the rural area of the Esmeraldas canton (Esmeraldas), a taxi driver was killed and his body found in a state of decomposition with his hands and feet tied in the La Quinta locality. The victim had been missing for five days. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 October 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in the Ciudadela 8 de Septiembre in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 October 2023, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Ejercito cooperative. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a mototaxi driver in a drive-by shooting in the Paraiso de la Flor sector. There is no further information on the motives or the perpetrators behind the attack. 1 fatality.

On 20 October 2023, in Samborondon (Guayas), about 10 unidentified armed individuals in two cars abducted a man in an express kidnapping. The suspects were arrested on 28 October and the victim released unharmed. Two suspects had police records.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 21 October 2023, in La Mana (Cotopaxi), between 800 to 1,000 locals of 19 de Mayo Avenue armed with knives, sticks, and metal tubes, captured and severely beat three men who were accused of being extortioners. One of the men was burned alive and killed and the other two severely injured and taken to hospital by police forces, where one of them later died. 2 fatalities.

On 21 October 2023, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a barber inside his barbershop in a drive-by shooting in the parroquia Eloy Alfaro. The victim was shot at least 10 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former police officer with around 10 gunshots on San Rafael Street. The victim was a relative of a man shot and killed on 17 October 2023 (coded separately). Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a taxi driver in a drive-by shooting on Tungurahua and Ruminahui Streets, Ciudadela Primero de Mayo. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 21 October 2023 (as reported), in Febres Cordero (Los Rios), unidentified individuals group shot and killed an off-duty police officer, and his body was found tied up. Suspects left a note saying 'stealing and extortion prohibited'. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man with at least six gunshots (mostly in the head) in a drive-by shooting in the Los Ceibos neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 October 2023, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified heavily-armed individuals shot and killed two men with several gunshots in the Ciudadela Nuevo Pilo. Two other people were injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Defusal: On 22 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), police forces carried out a controlled detonation of a stick of dynamite left outside a pharmacy between 23rd Street and La O, in the Portete district. The attempted attack is suspected to be related to extortion.

Property destruction: On 23 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals set fire to a school in the Sauces 4 sector, in the north part of the city. Police suspect the attack was related to extortion threats. Authorship is unknown.

On 23 October 2023, in Rio Verde (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of armed assailants arrived in a truck, forcibly entered the house of a fisherman, and shot and killed him in the Rocafuerte neighborhood. The victim's wife was shot and injured. The fatal victim was related to a man who was shot and killed on 17 October (coded separately). Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 October 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man with several gunshots, mostly to the head (likely indicating an execution), in the Ciudadela Martha Bucaram, between Velasco Ibarra and Portoviejo Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2021-2023); MRC: Citizen Revolution Movement
notes: On 24 October 2023, in Virgen de Fatima (Guayas), a local council member (Citizen Revolution Movement) was shot and killed by an unidentified armed assailant when the council member was leaving a family reunion. 1 fatality.

On 24 October 2023, in Pedro Carbo (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man and injured another in a drive-by shooting. The fatal victim had been released from prison three months earlier. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 October 2023, in Machala (El Oro), between five and eight unidentified armed and hooded individuals in a car shot and killed three men inside a car dealership in a drive-by shooting. Two victims were related and the third was a local worker, but none of them had any police records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 24 October 2023, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man driving a motorbike with more than five gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Jumon sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
Property destruction: On 24 October 2023, in Sucumbios Province (coded to Nueva Loja), police forces seized one ton of narcotics inside a truck during an anti-drug operation. The driver was arrested.

On 24 October 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), five armed individuals (described as delinquents) kidnapped a man who was driving his family's car through the city. The perpetrators also stole the family's vehicle. They held the man in an unspecified location and tortured him for his bank information. Around 15 November, the man managed to escape and was rescued near the Quevedo - Chone bypass. There were no fatalities.

On 24 October 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), six unidentified gang suspects involved in extortion abducted two telecommunication workers at a local company in an express kidnapping in the Flor de Bastion sector. Police forces carried out an operation and the victims were released minutes later and four suspects arrested.

Around 25 October 2023 (as reported), in Manta (Manabi), a man was shot and killed and his body found handcuffed on a road near the Ciudadela Los Gavilanes. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 October 2023, in La Concordia (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting inside a restaurant in the Simon Plata Torres Avenue. The victim was a former police officer. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 October 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), several unidentified heavily-armed individuals in a taxi fired more than 60 rifle gunshots and killed three people in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) in the Ciudadela Milton Reyes. A fourth victim was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 25 October 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Las Palmas boardwalk. After the killing simultaneous arson attacks occurred on four vehicles located in different sectors. Police arrested eight members of the Los Tiguerones gang, who were involved in the attacks. Motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 25 October 2023 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), at least two mutilated corpses and human bones were found inside a mass grave in the El Coral sector.
