On 18 November 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators killed the leader of a local union of taxi drivers in a drive-by shooting in the San Agustin neighborhood. The victim was driving when he was intercepted by the perpetrators. He was the president of the Taxi Tarqui #3 cooperative. A woman was shot and injured by a stray bullet. There is no further information on the identity or motivation of the attackers. 1 fatality.

On 18 November 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of armed perpetrators traveling by vehicle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in front of the Verdi Cevallos Balda hospital. Reports indicate that the man had been waiting outside of the building to see a hospitalized family member. There is no further information available on the motivation or identity of the attackers. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 18 November 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), authorities (coded as police forces) confiscated over 1 ton of cocaine in the port of Guayaquil. Authorities discovered the drugs in a shipment bound for Italy.

On 18 November 2023, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators shot and killed a taxi driver in the Chilibulo sector. Reports indicate that the taxi driver had been extorted by a criminal gang for him to continue working as a driver in the area. The extortion involved demands for annual payments and daily fees. The taxi driver had gotten into a physical confrontation with an extortionist and had received death threats. Police authorities suspect the crime was orchestrated from prison and that it also reflects a territorial dispute among criminal groups. 1 fatality.

On 18 November 2023, in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators shot and killed two people, including an off-duty police officer, outside a home in the Nueva Buena Fe housing cooperative. The other killed victim had a criminal count for drug possession. Authorship and motivation unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 18 November 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Bastion Popular neighborhood. The perpetrators shot the victim five times at close range. The victim worked in the area as an informal street vendor and was a drug user. Police suspect the attack to have been drug-related. 1 fatality.

On 19 November 2023, in Atacames (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of armed perpetrators described as hitmen shot and killed a man inside a bar frequented by tourists. The victim was shot in the head five times. The victim is unidentified as he was carrying no forms of identification. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

On 19 November 2023, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators riding on a motorcycle killed three people outside a residence in a drive-by shooting in the Una Sola Fuerza housing cooperative. One of the killed individuals was a man with an unspecified criminal record and was likely the target of the attack. The other two victims were the man's girlfriend and his younger brother. Authorship and motivation unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 19 November 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number (at least 2+) of unidentified armed individuals traveling by motorcycles and cars killed one man and injured three others in a drive-by shooting in the 25 de Septiembre neighborhood. The perpetrators shot at the victims as they were drinking in front of a local school. Witnesses indicated over 20 shots fired. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 November 2023, in Ambato (Tungurahua), public bus passengers captured and beat up a man that had attempted to rob a passenger. The man was later turned to the police that later took him to a Secure Transition Center.

On 20 November 2023, in Manta (Manabi), various armed men shot and injured two male delivery drivers who were waiting outside of a restaurant in the Buena Vista neighborhood. The armed men shot the victims between 15 and 20 times. Both victims were taken to a local hospital, where one died from his wounds. Authorities suspected that these attacks were connected to two attacks on delivery drivers in Manta on 19 November (coded separately), as they discovered an anonymous pamphlet that threatened to kill all motorcycle delivery drivers. There is no further information on the identity of the attackers. 1 fatality.

Around 20 November 2023 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), at least two unidentified armed individuals (likely criminal gang members due to a criminal record of extortion) shot and killed two people in the Nuevo Mexico neighborhood. On 20 November, authorities arrested two perpetrators linked to the attack, one of whom had a criminal record for theft and extortion. Authorities also confiscated one pistol, 18 ammunition cartridges, and two mobile phones. There is no further information on the motivation of the perpetrators. 2 fatalities.

On 20 November 2023, in Vinces (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators (described as hitmen) shot and killed three women along the Eloy Alfaro waterfront. There is no further information on the identity or motivation of the attackers. 3 fatalities.

On 20 November 2023, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators killed three people traveling by vehicle in the sector known as La 40. The perpetrators intercepted the victims, two men and a woman, on the road to shoot them. Authorship and motivation unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 20 November 2023, in Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators described as hitmen traveling by vehicle intercepted and killed a man in his car in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Guerrero Martinez and Colombia streets. The victim attempted to escape on foot from his vehicle but was shot and killed. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 November 2023, in Urdaneta canton (coded to Catarama, Los Rios), various armed individuals described as hitmen killed four people, including one off-duty police officer, near two nightclubs along the Ricaurte-Caluma road. The attackers first entered a nightclub and targeted one man, whom they shot and killed. As they exited the club, they shot and killed another person by the front entrance. An off-duty police officer, who was attending a nearby club, witnessed the attacks and intercepted the perpetrators. A stray bullet struck and killed him along the road. A stray bullet struck another man at this time, resulting in his death. There is no further information on the identity or motivation of the attackers. 4 fatalities.

On 21 November 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting along Quito street in the La Paz neighborhood. The man was sitting in his home at the time of the attack. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.
On 21 November 2023, in Riobamba (Chimborazo), a group of residents beat a local man they accused of being a delinquent and attempted to lynch him before police intervened. There were no fatalities.

Property destruction: Around 21 November 2023 (as reported), in San Agustin (Santa Rosa, El Oro), military forces dismantled an illegal mining site Authorities confiscated nine backhoes, a mineral sifter, and various other machines used for mining. There were no arrests made.

Property destruction: Around 21 November 2023 (as reported), near Zamora (Zamora Chinchipe), military forces dismantled an illegal mining site. They confiscated two mineral processing machines, 300 gallons of gas, and a backhoe, as well as two suctions engines to search for gold. There were no arrests.

On 21 November 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a taxi driver in a drive-by shooting near a gas station on Eleodoro Solorzano Avenue. The perpetrators fired three shots to the victim's head, causing the taxi to veer off the road and crash into another vehicle. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 November 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling in a red van killed a man in a drive-by shooting on 4 de Noviembre Avenue near the old National Police barracks. The perpetrators used 9mm firearms and a .223 calibre rifle to attack the victim, who had been in a group watching football. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 November 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), at least four unidentified armed assailants kidnapped a lawyer and former local mayoral candidate (Caminantes Movement) from the La California sector. He left a gym when they forced him to get into a pickup truck. The perpetrators were armed with rifles. The motives or culprits behind the kidnapping are unknown.

On 22 November 2023, in Manta (Manabi), two armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a man and injured another in a drive-by shooting along P7 street and La Pradera avenue. The injured victim was taken to a hospital. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 22 November 2023 (as reported), near Portovelo (El Oro), military forces dismantled an illegal mining site along the banks of the Amarillo River. They confiscated a backhoe, various water engines, and a water pump. They arrested two individuals.

On 22 November 2023, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators traveling in two vehicles killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Vida Nueva housing cooperative. The perpetrators fired over 20 shots. One of the victims was the resident of the house at which the attack took place. Authorship and motivation unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 22 November 2023, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), various unidentified armed individuals broke into a private residence and shot and killed a man. Police indicated that it was a targeted attack. Over ten bullet casings were found at the scene. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 23 November 2023 (as reported), near Tonsupa (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators killed a man and left his body hanging from the Salima bridge along the Atacames - Sua lateral pass. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 23 November 2023 (as reported), in Zamora Chinchipe province (coded to Zamora), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators set fire to the home of an Indigenous leader and anti-mining advocate. Part of the home was destroyed. The victim is a social leader and a prominent critic of the Cordillera del Condor mining project in San Marcos de Tundayme Alto. There is no information on the identity or motivation of the perpetrators.

Around 23 November 2023 (as reported), in the rural area of Huaquillas canton (El Oro), an Afro-Ecuadorian man was killed and his dismembered body was discovered wrapped in a tarp and secured with packing tape at a garbage dump in the Las Mercedes area near the Peruvian border. The body, divided into six parts, was discovered alongside a threatening note directed at a Judicial Police officer. Police authorities suspect the perpetrators arrived by vehicle and left the victim's remains at the site. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 November 2023, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), various unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man inside his house in the Los Girasoles neighborhood. The perpetrators shot the victim 10 times. Reports indicate that five members of the same family have been targeted and killed in the past two years by an unspecified armed group described as the mafia. There is no further information on the identity and motivation of the attackers. 1 fatality.

On 23 November 2023, near Santa Lucia (Guayas), up to 29 unidentified heavily armed individuals raided a local hacienda (ranch/estate), holding up its workers and business owners as hostages. The owner and workers were liberated on 25 November during a large-scale police raid (coded separately) where 29 individuals, including 9 minors, were arrested for their involvement in the hostage-taking and raid.

On 24 November 2023, in Buenos Aires (Azuay), residents burned a motorcycle that was left by three drivers who had an accident and left the sector refusing to be taken by an ambulance. They accused the drivers of being robbers and burned the motorcycle.

Property destruction: Around 24 November 2023 (as reported), off the Coast of Puerto Baquerizo Moreno (Galapagos), the Ecuadorian navy intercepted a semisubmersible watercraft carrying between 3.4 and 5 tons of cocaine. Authorities confiscated the craft.

On 24 November 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle (described as hitmen) attacked a municipal male Transit and Mobility Agency (ATM) worker in a drive-by shooting along kilometer 14.5 on the road to Daule, in the north of the city. The victim was directing traffic when the perpetrators rode by and shot him. He was injured and died in an ambulance. There is no further information on the identity or motivation of the attackers. 1 fatality.

On 25 November 2023, in Atacames (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of armed individuals (likely criminal gang members due to extortion threats) riding a motorbike killed a male business owner in a drive-by shooting. The victim was vacationing at a hotel in the Atacames beachfront. He was outside of the hotel when the armed individuals intercepted him. The victim had received various extortion threats from a criminal group and was likely tracked down for not paying. 1 fatality.

Around 25 November 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), Los Aguilas gang members kidnapped two people for extortion (express kidnapping) in a suburban neighborhood of Guayaquil. Authorities rescued the victims on 25 November and arrested one perpetrator after a raid on a local house. Authorities also confiscated a revolver, four ammo cartridges, and one mobile phone.

On 25 November 2023, in La Concordia (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), two armed individuals (described as hitmen) shot and killed two brothers as they were working in the La Florida housing cooperative. Reports indicate that the individuals were likely hired by someone who knew the two brothers and had an ongoing property dispute with them over the land they were working on. There is no further information available. 2 fatalities.

On 25 November 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals (also described as hitmen) traveling by motorcycle shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Amazonas neighborhood, Eloy Alfaro parish. The two men were standing near the entrance of a house when the perpetrators shot at them various times. A bystander was injured in the attack. 2 fatalities.

Around 25 November 2023 (as reported), in Buena Fe canton (coded to San Jacinto de Buena Fe, Los Rios), an unknown number of armed perpetrators shot and killed an off-duty police officer in the rural El Rocio sector. The victim had various gunshot wounds to the head. There is no further information on the identity or motivation of the attackers. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 25 November 2023 (as reported), in the mining area around Zaruma canton (El Oro), members of the National Police and Armed Forces seized over 1,000 unauthorized explosive devices in rural mining zones around Zaruma, including into Portovelo and Atahualpa cantons. Authorities confiscated 160 units of dynamite, 5,400 meters of slow-burning fuse, 1,150 kilograms of ammonium nitrate, 1,145 explosive units, and 100 detonator capsules. Authorities stated that the operation aimed to combat illegal mining and prevent explosives from being used in criminal group activities.

On 25 November 2023, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators traveling in a vehicle killed two men working at a neighborhood carwash in a drive-by shooting in Los Helechos. The victims were a car washer and his assistant. One victim was found inside a car they were cleaning, while the other was gunned down on the sidewalk while attempting to flee. Also on 25 November, in Duran, an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators traveling in a vehicle killed two men standing at a street corner in a drive-by shooting in El Recreo neighborhood. The first victim, who was the target of the attack, died at the scene, while the second victim was shot collaterally and died later at a hospital from his injuries. Authorship and motivation unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 25 November 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed perpetrators shot and killed a mobile accessories vendor inside his stall at the Buenaventura Moreno municipal market. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 November 2023, in Marianita (Guayas), various unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen who arrived on multiple cars and motorcycles shot and killed four members of a family inside their home in the Marianita sector. The attackers entered the house and opened fire on the victims, who were two men and two women. One of the women was pregnant. Authorship and motivation unknown. 4 fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; La Prensa Chimborazo; Primicias
notes: On 26 November 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), police forces arrested the leader of the Los Lobos Gang as he drove his vehicle. Armed individuals fired on police after they arrested the man (coded separately). The man was later released on 27 November because he had a license to carry weapons, avoiding prison time.

assoc_actor_2: Evangelical Christian Group (Ecuador); Police Forces of Ecuador (2023-)
notes: On 26 November 2023, in Machala (El Oro), an armed perpetrator described as a hitman shot and injured an off-duty police officer who prevented him from killing an evangelical pastor at a church in the Nuevo Pilo neighborhood. The armed perpetrator entered the church, pretending to be a congregant, before drawing a weapon to shoot the pastor. The officer was in the church and intervened, resulting in a struggle for the weapon during which both were shot. The officer and the attacker were both hospitalized, but the perpetrator died hours later from a gunshot wound to the thigh. Police authorities later guarded the church after unspecified threats of another attack. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 26 November 2023 (as reported), near Simon Bolivar (Santa Elena), two unidentified men were killed and their dismembered bodies were discovered inside four burlap sacks along the Ruta del Spondylus (highway) near Playa Bruja. A recycler found the sacks, which contained torsos, limbs, and heads wrapped in plastic and blankets, abandoned by the roadside. Fresh blood stains suggest the bodies were dumped shortly before their discovery. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorities suspect the killings were part of a revenge act. 2 fatalities.

On 26 November 2023, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of armed perpetrators shot and killed four men as they were walking along a road. The victims were walking to a party. There is no further information available. 4 fatalities.

source: Ecuavisa; El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Machala Movil
notes: Property destruction: Around 27 November 2023 (between 25 - 29 November), off the Coast of Puerto Baquerizo Moreno (Galapagos), the United States Coast Guard carried out an operation with the Ecuadorian military forces between 300 and 588 nautical miles from Isla Wolf. Three suspects were arrested, and a fishing boat was seized along with one ton of cocaine hydrochloride. Reports differ on whether the event took place on 25 or 29 November.

On 27 November 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators placed and detonated an explosive device at the house of a business man for extortion in the Bastion Popular sector. The business man was later kidnapped by perpetrators for ransom on 9 February 2024, during an attack in which they fatally shot his son-in-law (coded separately). These were likely the same perpetrators. The targets were at home but were uninjured by the explosion. There were no casualties.

actor2: Police Forces Of Ecuador (2023-) Prison Guards
notes: On 27 November 2023, in Jandiayacu (Sucumbios), unidentified perpetrators (described as criminals) piloted a drone that dropped an explosive device into the yards of the medium and minimum security pavilions of the Sucumbios jail. The explosive device detonated but did not cause significant damage. There is no further information on the identity or motivation of the perpetrators. There were no casualties.

On 28 November 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), residents of San Jose de Balzay community attempted to capture and beat up a man that had been accused of being a thief, but police officers stopped them and took the man to a police station. The residents tried to take the man by force and the officers used tear gas to disperse them.

Around 28 November 2023 (as reported), in Montecristi (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators killed two people and left their bodies near two burning vehicles in the rural Bajo 3 sector of the parish. There is no further information available. 2 fatalities.

Around 28 November 2023 (as reported), near Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators killed three men and their bodies were found in the rural Santa Rita sector. Reports indicate that the victims had been missing for three days. Each of the victims was shot multiple times in the head and thorax with 9mm bullets. One of the victims was a Venezuelan national. There is no further information available. 3 fatalities.

On 28 November 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen riding a motorcycle attacked and injured a man in a drive-by shooting in the Mapasingue Este neighborhood, killing a nearby man with a stray bullet. The target of the attack was shot and injured while fleeing into a nearby business for safety. A second man was killed at the scene. Police authorities suspect the attack to be linked to a drug territory dispute. They collected 14 bullet shells from the scene. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a man and former Latin Kings gang leader in a drive-by shooting in front of a gym he owned in the Eloy Alfaro neighborhood. Reports indicate that the man worked as a security guard, but it is unspecified whether he still had connections to the gang or was considered a former gang member. The man had survived two previous attempts on his life by gunmen (unspecified). Police authorities collected three bullet casings at the scene. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 29 November 2023 (as reported), near Gualaquiza (Morona Santiago), police forces dismantled an illegal mining camp in the rural Tinajillas sector. They dismantled three artisanal dredgers and seized seven engines along with 200 gallons of fuel. There were no arrests made.

Weapons seizure: On 29 November 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), military personnel confiscated 60 high-caliber rifles and pistols in a container they raided in the port of Guayaquil. There were no arrests made.

On 29 November 2023, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), two unidentified armed individuals dressed in black on a motorbike shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the El Conde neighborhood. A third person was shot and injured. It is suspected the killing might be related to drug trafficking disputes. 2 fatalities.

Around 29 November 2023 (as reported), near Lomas de Sargentillo (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators described as hitmen and criminals traveling in a vehicle killed two men at kilometer 47 of the Lomas de Sargentillo - Isidro Ayora road (drive-by). The perpetrators intercepted the victim's vehicle and opened fire on them from their vehicle. The victims got out of their vehicle to escape but were shot down on the road. The perpetrators left the scene, but 30 minutes later, two unidentified individuals arrived at the scene on a motorcycle and took pictures of the dead victims. Sources suspect that this was to confirm the killing of the victims. Authorship and motivation unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 29 November 2023, in Cuenca (Azuay), two unidentified perpetrators kidnapped a male teenager. The perpetrators took the victim to a house in the Jesus del Gran Poder area of Machala, where he was tied up and his face covered by a shirt. Police authorities liberated the victim on the same day during a raid in which they arrested one perpetrator.

On 29 November 2023, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Brisas de La Libertad. The perpetrators shot at least eight times at the victim. The victim had a criminal record for attempted homicide. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 November 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Las Brisas neighborhood. The victim had a criminal record for attempted murder. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 November 2023, in Charapoto (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals traveling by vehicle (likely criminal gang members due to extortion) described as hitmen shot and killed a businesswoman in a drive-by shooting in the city center. The victim was driving with her husband. She was killed on the spot, while her partner was injured and transported to a local hospital. The victim had received various extortion threats in the past and had been attacked by armed individuals around 15 October 2022 (coded separately). 1 fatality.

Around 30 November 2023 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of armed perpetrators tortured, shot, and killed a man and threw his body out of a moving vehicle in the Ciudadela Valle Hermoso neighborhood, in the Andres de Vera parish. The unidentified victim had various gunshot wounds. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

On 30 November 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed men on a tricycle killed a man outside his home in a drive-by shooting in the Isla Trinitaria neighborhood. The perpetrators shot the victim twice in the chest. The victim had no criminal record. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 November 2023, in Playas (Guayas), two unidentified individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Asisclo Garay and Alexander Street. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 1 December 2023 (as reported), on the Coast of Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as pirates shot and killed at least four fishermen and injured another on a boat while they were fishing. There were twelve fishermen on the boat that was attacked. Four were found dead and six injured. Three of the twelve fishermen were still missing as of 4 December 2023. At least 4 fatalities.

On 1 December 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike fired shots at a man in a drive-by shooting in the Viva Alfaro neighborhood. The victim managed to escape. Authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no casualties.

On 1 December 2023, in La Union (Esmeraldas), unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle fired shots at the former mayor and former councilor of Quininde (PAIS) in a drive-by shooting while he was traveling in his vehicle. The suspects fired more than 20 gunshots but only the victim's vehicle was hit. Authorship is unknown but the police believe the attack motivation might have been robbery (not confirmed). There were no casualties.

Around 1 December 2023 (as reported), in Chongon (Guayas), three people were shot dead in Casas Viejas commune and their bodies found in the bushes on a road leading to the coast. Neither of the victims were from the area and they were brought there to be killed. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 1 December 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals described as criminals on a motorbike shot and killed a taxi driver in a drive-by shooting in the Nuevo Amanacer sector, Venus parish. The perpetrators fired over 10 times at the victim, causing him to also crash his vehicle. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 December 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving his motorbike in a drive-by shooting on Jose Joaquin de Olmedo and Eugenio Espejo streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) in the Bastion Popular locality. Authorship and motivations of the attacks are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 December 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two people and injured three others in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); La Prensa Chimborazo
notes: On 2 December 2023, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals fired at least 100 gunshots at a group of people on a tricycle cooperative outside a shopping center on Nicolas Lapentti Avenue. Five people from the same cooperative were shot dead and others were injured. The attack's motivation would have been because members of the cooperative refused to pay extortion money to the local criminal group. Authorship is unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 2 December 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) on Octava Avenue. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 December 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in the Gallegos Lara cooperative in a drive-by shooting. The victim was a drug user. 1 fatality.

On 2 December 2023, in Santa Rosa (Tungurahua), unidentified armed individuals in a truck shot and killed a man driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the Ciudadela El Bosque 1. The passenger was injured but escaped. Police believe the killing was related to territorial disputes. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); La Prensa Chimborazo
notes: Around 2 December 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), an unidentified man was killed and his decapitated body was discovered in the Los Cerezos housing cooperative. The victim's body was wrapped in black plastic bags and had its limbs tied up. Number of perpetrators unknown. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 December 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling by vehicle killed a man standing outside his family's home in a drive-by shooting in the neighborhood of El Mango in San Cristobal (Camilo) parish. The victim was not from the area and was visiting family. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 December 2023, in Tres Caminos (Manabi), a mob of people beat up and burned two suspected hitmen alive in the Pedro Angel Giler neighborhood. The men had shot at a person inside a commercial establishment minutes earlier. Both bodies were later found by the police. 2 fatalities.

On 3 December 2023, in Palestina (Guayas), two unidentified armed men on a motorbike shot and killed a man inside his vehicle with more than eight gunshots in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) on Balzar Road. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals on three motorbikes shot and killed two brothers in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) in the Pascuales locality. Another man was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 3 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), police forces seized 289 cocaine bricks inside a car in a parking lot in the San Francisco sector, Pascuales parish, during a police operation. Three member of Los Lobos gang were arrested and besides the drug, police seized two more vehicles.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); La Prensa Chimborazo
notes: On 3 December 2023, in Samborondon (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle carried out a series of drive-by shootings around the city, killing three people and injuring four others. Police recovered 32 bullet casings, including rifle ammunition, from the various crime scenes. Authorship and motivation unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 3 December 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a man who was a drug user in the Brisas neighborhood. The perpetrator, who was wearing a balaclava, was riding a motorcycle but approached the victim on foot to shoot him before fleeing. The victim was a heroin user. Police authorities suspect the attack to have been for a drug-related dispute. 1 fatality.
On 3 December 2023, in Tosagua (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 4 December 2023 (week of), in Guayaquil (Guayas), unidentified armed suspects in a car decapitated a person and left their head on Isla Trinitaria locality. The body was found nearby under the Via Perimetral. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 4 December 2023 (week of), in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), six unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot at least 25 times and killed two people in a drive-by shooting in the Pascuales neighborhood. Another victim was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 4 December 2023 (as reported), in El Banco (Los Rios), three men and a woman were shot and killed and their bodies found inside a vehicle. The police are investigating if the killing was related to the killings of six people in Quevedo on 2 December (coded separately). Authorship and motivations are unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 4 December 2023, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), local residents beat up and tied up a man involved in robberies in the Bellavista sector. Around 30 people were involved. There were no fatalities.

On 4 December 2023, in Naranjal (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men and a child in the 6 de Julio neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 4 December 2023, in La Union (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting in the 2 de Mayo neighborhood. One suspect was arrested on the same day and the police seized a firearm, ammunition, a stolen motorbike and a cell phone. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

Property destruction: On 4 December 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police forces dismantled a private residence where an unidentified drug trafficking group kept around 250,880 doses of marijuana (about 125kg) in the 26 de Junio neighborhood. There were no arrests.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Esmeraldas News; Expreso; Primicias
notes: On 4 December 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed perpetrators (described as hitmen_ riding a motorcycle shot and killed a fisherman and seafood merchant as he worked in a drive-by shooting at a warehouse in the city's fishing port. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators described as hitmen riding a motorcycle injured two people in a drive-by shooting in the Guasmo Sur sector. The target of the attack was walking on the street when the perpetrators opened fire, also injuring a nearby elderly man sitting on his porch. Authorship and motivation unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 4 December 2023, in Salinas (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a food vendor while working at the Salinas Pier. The two assailants arrived on a motorcycle, at which point at least one of them stepped off to approach and shot the victim twice in the head and chest before fleeing. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 December 2023, in Tosagua (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting between Bolivar and Plaza Gaetan streets. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), military and police forces captured 10 members of Los Tiguerones gang in the Estero Nadazero sector, including the leader of the gang. Los Tiguerones are part of Los Lobos gang, which are also part of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) of Mexico.

On 5 December 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), workers at the local government burned tires on the streets around the local government as a demonstration to demand payment of their salaries and contributions to the social security.

Around 5 December 2023 (as reported), in the Coast of Manta (Manabi), three fishermen were killed and their bodies found 80 nautical miles off the port of San Mateo. According to the families they were victims of robberies by suspected pirates. Three other victims remain missing. 3 fatalities.

On 5 December 2023, in Gualaceo (Azuay), an unidentified drug trafficking group shot and killed a man over a drug trafficking dispute. The perpetrators shot at the victim six times. The attack happened after the perpetrators arrived at the victim's house to deliver some drugs and the mother of the victim confronted the perpetrators telling them to leave his son alone. There is no information on the victim having a criminal record. Six suspects were arrested on 13 December. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an off-duty police officer was kidnapped by an unknown number of perpetrators described as criminals for extortion. Police forces liberated the victim and arrested three suspects.

On 5 December 2023, in Manta (Manabi), at least four unidentified perpetrators kidnapped a man for ransom. They demanded a $200,000 USD ransom from the victim's family. Police forces liberated the victim on 8 December during a raid operation in Los Corrales in Montecristi, Manabi.

On 6 December 2023, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man with nine gunshots in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) in the Los Helechos sector. The victim was a local business owner who was shot dead while opening his establishment. Another person was injured by stray bullets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three men inside a vehicle with more than 30 gunshots in the Ciudadela Simon Bolivar. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 6 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators riding a motorcycle shot and killed a man outside an ATM in the Ciudadela Sauces 5 neighborhood (drive-by). The perpetrators shot the victim seven times. Authorship and motivation are unknown, but police authorities suspect that the attack was in retribution for the killing of a criminal gang member on the same day in Ciudadela Simon Bolivar (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 6 December 2023, in Playas (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators riding a motorcycle killed two men walking on the street in a drive-by shooting along Paquisha and Alexander avenues. The attack occurred on a busy shopping street with many pedestrians present. Authorship and motivation unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 6 December 2023 (week of), in Playas (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators kidnapped the son of a local businessman for extortion. The victim's family paid the extortion fee for the liberation of the victim on an unspecified date.

On 7 December 2023, in San Lorenzo de Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), the armed forces and the police arrested three high-profile members of the Los Tiguerones gang in the border with Colombia. One of the suspects was considered the gang leader.
Weapons seizure: On 7 December 2023, in Baeza (Quijos, Napo), the national police seized 288 firearms and 11,850 ammunition inside an interprovincial bus. One suspect was arrested.

Weapons seizure: On 7 December 2023, in Napo Province (coded to Tena), police forces intercepted a shipment of 288 Glock-type pistols and 1,700 ammunition rounds hidden inside an interprovincial service bus circulating through Napo bound for Quito. There were no arrests.

Property destruction: On 8 December 2023, in the rural area of the Balzar canton (Guayas), the national police disabled and destroyed a clandestine runway in the Naranjos locality. During the same operation, more than 28 rounds of ammunition were destroyed. No arrests were made.

On 8 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Letamendi (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects shot and killed a man inside his car between 4 de Noviembre and Venezuela streets. The victim had left his home the day before to sell his car. Relatives attempted to report him as missing, but police forces found them death. Relatives also stated he had previously received threats and extortions. 1 fatality.

Around 8 December 2023 (as reported), in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified gang suspects abducted a woman and were demanding a 20,000 USD ransom for her release. Police forces intervened, but there is no further information regarding the whereabouts of the victim.

Around 8 December 2023 (as reported), in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified gang suspects abducted a family of Colombian citizens and were demanding a 20,000 USD ransom for their release. Police forces carried out a release operation and one person was found and six suspects arrested. There is no further information regarding the whereabouts of the other victims.

On 8 December 2023, in General Farfan (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man while he traveled in his vehicle and left a pamphlet next to his dead body. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 December 2023, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a taxi driver with over 10 gunshots (likely execution) inside his vehicle in the Eloy Alfaro neighborhood. Also in the Santa Ana neighborhood, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed another taxi driver. The same day, unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with over 15 gunshots in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) in the Francisco Pacheco sector. Two other people were injured by stray bullets. The authorship and motivations of the attacks are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 9 December 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), seven unidentified armed individuals invaded a brothel and fired shots on Santo Domingo-Quevedo Road. Two men were shot and injured by non-lethal firearms. Authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 9 December 2023, in Playas (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes fired shots at a group of people on Jaime Roldos Aguilera Avenue in a drive-by shooting. One person died and two were injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 9 December 2023 (as reported), in La Union (Quininde, Esmeraldas), three unidentified armed men shot and killed a man and his body was found inside the Casa de Miduvi Milagro de Dios. Three suspects with several police records (murder, possession of firearms, theft and other crimes) were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 10 December 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), a public worker of the Portoviejo Municipality was shot and killed on a football field at Francisco Pacheco citadel, while he was celebrating his birthday. The assailant came to the celebration and shot at the worker and the guests. Two other civilians were injured. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 10 December 2023, in Viche (Quininde, Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle shot and killed an off-duty second commander of the municipal Viche fire department in a drive-by shooting near a bus stop on the Quininde highway. Reports indicate that the fire brigade had received various extortion threats for months. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 December 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unspecified armed group fired shots against a taxi driver conducting a client, a female adolescent, in the Ursa neighborhood. The adolescent was shot and killed and the taxi driver was injured. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 December 2023, in Samborondon (Guayas), an unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting during a funerary ceremony. The victim was leaving his brother's funeral, who was murdered on 8 December. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 December 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), four unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle abducted a Chinese civilian inside his restaurant. The kidnappers demanded a large amount of money for his release. Authorship and motivations are unknown.

On 11 December 2023, in Jigual de Abajo (Guayas), a government official of the Junquiallal Parish government was shot and killed while she was on her motorcycle near a bridge of the Laurel - La T de Daule highway by two unidentified armed assailants who shot her from another motorcycle. 1 fatality.
tags: local administrators; women targeted: government officials

notes: On 11 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals fired shots at a private residence in the Guasmo Sur neighborhood. Four children were shot dead and their parents were shot and injured. The mother died a few days later in the hospital. According to the police, the real targets were the neighbors and the attack may have been perpetrated by two local criminal groups, Los Lagartos or Mafia 18 gangs. 5 fatalities.

On 11 December 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed three people in a drive-by shooting in front of a brothel. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.
On 11 December 2023, in Montanita (Santa Elena), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 December 2023, in Rio Verde (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting. Both suspects, a man and a woman, were arrested and the police seized 5 shotguns, a revolver and ammunition. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 11 December 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen traveling by motorcycle shot and killed a street vendor in a drive-by shooting at the Jorge Cepeda Jacome market parking lot. Witnesses report that the victim tried to flee and sought refuge among a crowd of people, but the perpetrators caught up with him and shot him three times in the head. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 December 2023, in Tosagua (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified heavily armed individuals shot and killed three men on Tosagua-Bahia Street. Three other people were injured by stray bullets. Also, on 9 de Octubre Street, unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed two men outside a liquor store and injured another. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 11 December 2023, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men inside a vehicle in the Cuatro Varas sector. A third victim might have been abducted by the suspects. A Police sergeant (likely off-duty) was also in the vehicle but managed to escape. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 12 December 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an on-duty male Portoviejo Municipality Hygiene Department worker during a potable water treatment plant inspection in the Cuatro Esquinas sector. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), unidentified armed men on a motorbike shot and killed a man with at least seven gunshots in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) in the Bastion Popular sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), around 40 locals severely beat and one armed civilian shot a man accused of robbery attempt in the Sauces 9 sector, in the north part of the city. The individual was taken to hospital by police forces. Police seized a firearm and ammunition with the suspect. There were no fatalities.

On 12 December 2023, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen traveling by motorcycle shot and injured a woman outside her home on Independencia and Enrique Coello streets (drive-by). The assailants fired four shots, three of which struck the victim in the chest, while she attempted to get into her parked car. The woman was taken to a hospital under critical condition. Authorship and motivation unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 13 December 2023, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified heavily armed individuals shot and killed a man with at least eight gunshots in the Jaime Chavez Gutierrez neighborhood, Los Esteros area. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 13 December 2023 (as reported), in Pedernales (Manabi), two men were tied up, stabbed, shot and killed and their bodies found on the side of a road. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 13 December 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), four unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes arrived at a private residence entered the house, and killed two Colombian men in the 24 de Mayo neighborhood. A woman was tied up but left unharmed, the suspects took money and the police found drugs at the scene. Authorities suspect that the victims were dug consumers and were hiding money in the house. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 13 December 2023, in Vinces (Los Rios), unidentified armed individuals in a truck shot and killed a man in another vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Galapagos Avenue. The suspects fired more than 20 gunshots and the victim had just left the prison system the day before (he had a police record from 14 November 2023 on suspicion of murder). Two of the victim's companions were injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 13 December 2023 (as reported), in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), a child was dismembered and burned and their body was found inside an abandoned house in the El Panecillo sector. Two Venezuelan citizens were arrested. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 December 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near a park in the Virgen del Carmen neighborhood. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: Around 13 December 2023 (as reported), in Santa Rosa de Sucumbios (Sucumbios), the military forces seized 1,600 gallons of illegal fuel during a river reconnaissance operation on the Putumayo River. Three suspects were arrested.

Around 13 December 2023 (as reported), in the rural area of the Mocache municipality (Los Rios), four people were killed and their charred bodies found inside a vehicle in the Quevedo-El Empalme road. 4 fatalities.

On 14 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), approximately 20 bicycle riders blocked the San Jorge avenue in front of Kennedy park as a demonstration to voiced their grievances about a fellow rider being killed after he was ran over by a bus driver. During the demonstration a car trying to go through aggressively was stopped by the demonstrators who attacked his car and attempted to take him out of his car to beat him up.

On 14 December 2023, in Playas (Guayas), an unidentified group of armed individuals abducted a property registry official as he was traveling with a driver on the Playas-Guayaquil highway. The assailants intercepted the vehicle on Paquisha and Sixto Chang avenues, where they threatened the victim with firearms before taking him to an unknown location. The victim is the cousin of a local council member. Authorship and motivation unknown. The whereabouts of the victim remain unknown.

On 14 December 2023, in San Miguel de Ibarra (Imbabura), the national police arrested the second leader in command of the ELN (who is also linked with Los Lobos, the group involved in the killing of presidential candidate Fernando Villavicencio). The suspect was delivered to the Colombian military.

On 14 December 2023, in Rosa Zarate (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a taxi driver with at least eight gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Nuevo Quininde sector. According to family, the victim had been receiving threats for refusing to give money to extortionists. Authorship is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 December 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and injured a man with at least two gunshots inside a taxi in a drive-by shooting. The taxi driver was unharmed. The victim had a police record for intimidation in 2022 and possession of firearms in 2023. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 14 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects on motorcycles opened fire against the car of a traffic officer of the Ecuador Traffic Commission (CTE) in the SocioVivienda sector during an abduction attempt. The officer and other people inside the vehicle were not injured during the attack and the suspects managed to flee. There were no casualties.

Around 14 December 2023 (between 11 - 14 December), in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators (described as extortionists and delinquents) killed a man after kidnapping him and his brother from their home after their father failed to make a required payment. The victims were kidnapped on 11 December, and the killed victim's body was found on 14 December in an advanced state of decomposition in a canal near Chongon. The whereabouts of the other victim remain unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 December 2023, in San Juan (Los Rios), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with at least eight gunshots in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 15 December 2023 (month of), in the rural area of the Machala municipality (El Oro), a person was killed and their body found in a plastic bag with two threatening pamphlets in the road that leads to Pajonal. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 December 2023, near Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed gang suspects in a car shot and killed a man inside his car at Km. 11,5 in the road to Daule, in a drive-by shooting. Relatives of the victim who were also inside the car were injured and taken to hospital. They stated the deceased victim was a former member of Los Lagartos gang. Police suspect the attack was linked to a settling of scores. The perpetrators behind the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 December 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the La Poza de San Alejo locality. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 16 December 2023, in Playas (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle fired multiple gunshots at the garage door of a boarding house and a nearby commercial establishment on Zenon Macias Avenue and Alexander Street (drive-by shooting). The authorship and motivation are unknown.

assoc_actor_2: Civilians (Colombia); Former Government of the United Kingdom (2010-2024)
source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 16 December 2023, in the rural area of the Baba canton (Los Rios), an unidentified armed group dressed as police officers abducted the former honorary consul of the United Kingdom in Ecuador in the El Rodeo farm. A Colombian woman was also taken, and later released in Samborondon (Guayas). The former Consul, who is the current president of an agricultural business in Ecuador, was rescued unharmed on a highway of Manabi province four days after wearing a fake explosive vest. Nine suspects were arrested on 20 December. With the suspects the police seized five grenades, six firearms, 1,500 rounds of ammunition, 30 detonating fuses, two vehicles and other materials.

On 17 December 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), residents captured, beat up and stabbed with knives a man that they suspected had robbed a woman in June Guzman avenue movements before. Police officers rescued the man to a hospital, where he died. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 17 December 2023, in the rural area of the Puerto El Carmen village (Putumayo, Sucumbios), the military forces dismantled a drug lab used as a rest area for drug trafficking groups. Police destroyed/seized tanks, 2,000 gallons of crude oil, 10,000 gallons of acetone, 120 bags of ammonium nitrate, precision and weight scales and a large number of other materials.

On 17 December 2023, in Manta (Manabi), an unidentified number of hitmen shot and killed three men in the Ursa neighborhood. One person was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 17 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals in vehicles shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting during a football match in the parroquia Tenguel, El Carmen sector. A vehicle was burned after the killing. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 17 December 2023, in Duran (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man. The victim's wife was unharmed and they were both working with a delivery service at the time of the killing. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 December 2023, in Atacames (Esmeraldas), at least one unidentified armed individual shot and killed a man with more than 20 gunshots near the city center. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 December 2023, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a Peruvian man inside a bakery he worked at in drive-by shooting (likely execution) in the Gonzalez Rubio neighborhood. According to witnesses the victim had received extortion threats but resisted them. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 December 2023, in Atacames (Esmeraldas), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a municipal government worker in a drive-by shooting in the Los Almendros neighborhood. Two other workers were shot and injured. According to the police the killing was related to drug trafficking disputes. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.
Property destruction: On 18 December 2023, in Shushufindi (Sucumbios), the military forces dismantled a drug lab used to refine cocaine in the Putumayo sector. There were no arrests.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Esmeraldas News
notes: On 18 December 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), members of Los Lobos arrived to a house in a car , approached the residence on foot and shot and killed a man and two women inside in the San Jorge neighborhood. An adolescent was shot and injured and a female child was left unharmed. The victims were father, mother, and daughter, and they were all sleeping when the killing took place. The police believe the killings were related to drug trafficking disputes and four suspects were arrested by the Army on 20 December. 3 fatalities.

On 18 December 2023, in the rural area of the Posorja municipality (Guayas), members of the Los Aguilas gang in a car shot and killed two adults and two children in a drive-by shooting during a birthday celebration in the 12 de Abril neighborhood. According to the police the killings were related to drug trafficking since the target, who was an adolescent girl, had a relationship with a member of the group killed in September. Two suspects were arrested on the same day and identified as professionals working at a local burial house who used bodies to transport drugs. 4 fatalities.
tags: women targeted: girls; women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

notes: Around 18 December 2023 (as reported), in Naranjito (Guayas), two sisters and a man were shot and killed and their bodies found on a road with several gunshot marks, indicating that they were executed in the area. One of the victims was a drug user. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.
On 18 December 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals on a tricycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 December 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a taxi driver inside his vehicle in a drive-by shooting between Manabi and Tungurahua streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 December 2023, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), a group of unidentified armed perpetrators traveling on two vehicles kidnapped three people after intercepting the car they were traveling in at the intersection of Bolivia Avenue and Eustorgio Salgado, near the Central University. One of the victims suffered a gunshot wound. A fourth person managed to escape the perpetrators, leaving the vehicle and running away as two armed individuals boarded the victims' vehicle to drive it with them inside. Police authorities rescued the victims on the same day after they were abandoned in the Zambiza sector. The injured victim was taken to a hospital. Authorship and motivation unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 18 December 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), an unidentified armed perpetrator described as a hitman shot and killed a female attorney in her office. The perpetrator entered the lawyer's office on the first floor, fired various shots at point-blank range, and fled to a vehicle waiting outside. Police recovered eight bullet casings at the scene. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 18 December 2023, in the rural area of the Santa Rosa de Sucumbios municipality (Sucumbios), the armed forces dismantled a drug refining lab on the border with Colombia. The Army seized 2,000 gallons of oil, 10,000 gallons of acetozone and other materials used to refine cocaine. No arrests were made.

On 19 December 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), at least four members of Los Fantasmas gang shot and killed three people. All four members, including the group leader, were arrested by the Armed forces on 20 December during a mobile patrol. The Army seized three revolvers, an automatic pistol, a cell phone, a car and a motorbike. Motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 19 December 2023, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals traveling by vehicle shot and killed a female taxi driver inside her car in the Primavera 2 sector. A passenger was shot and injured. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 19 December 2023 (as reported), in Colimes (Guayas), a man was beaten, blindfolded (likely an execution), shot and killed and his body was found in the El Arenero sector. Police believed the victim was tortured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 19 December 2023, in Guaytacama (Cotopaxi), the police arrested three foreigners and an Ecuadorian man inside a van outside the Cotopaxi prison and seized 285 different types of ammunition, 20 kilos of cocaine, 50 explosives, cash, several bottles of liquor and other drugs that were intended to be delivered to prisoners inside a prison.

Around 19 December 2023 (as reported), in the rural area of the Machala municipality (El Oro), a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a black cover, packed with plastic, with his limbs tied with a rope and abandoned in the Pajonal road. The victim had some writings on him related to a poor distribution of money. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 December 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), five unidentified perpetrators kidnapped a man for extortion in the San Camilo parish. They demanded $50,000 USD for the victim's release. Police authorities rescued the victim on 21 December during a police raid in Quevedo in which they arrested one perpetrator and liberated one other victim who had been kidnapped on the same day in Valencia (coded separately).

On 20 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of heavily armed suspected Los Tiguerones gang members, dressed as policemen, abducted two men in the vicinity of the Jose Joaquin de Olmedo airport and shot them both dead on Narcisa de Jesus highway, Guayacanes neighborhood. Both victims had police records for various crimes. Police forces chased after the suspects after the attack took place and the individuals detonated an explosive device near Fortin shopping center, injuring a police officer who was taken to hospital. The suspects stole a car and set it on fire at the entrance of Socio Vivienda sector, in the Chucho Benitez Av. Later police forces arrested one suspect of participating in the attacks and with him seized a rifle, a feeder, a protective helmet, a bulletproof vest and a grenade. The motivation behind the attack are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 20 December 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), about six unidentified armed individuals in three vans fired shots (drive-by) and abducted a father and his two children from inside a bus on the road to Valencia, near the Baldramina sector. The victim was released during a police operation on 23 December where the kidnappers clashed with officers (coded separately). Five perpetrators were arrested. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

On 20 December 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), three unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two people with over 20 gunshots inside a mechanical workshop in the 25 de Septiembre neighborhood. Three other people were injured by stray bullets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 20 December 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man with two gunshots to the head in the La Brasilia neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 December 2023, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man inside a supermarket where the victim worked in Los Esteros area. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 December 2023, in Anconcito (Santa Elena), four unidentified armed and hooded individuals in motorbikes shot and killed a man inside his private residence in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) in the Revera del Mar neighborhood. The victim's female partner was left unharmed. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 December 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a male taxi driver inside his vehicle in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) in the Colina de Salinas neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 December 2023, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman with four gunshots in the Eugenio Espejo neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) in the Esteros neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 December 2023, in Valencia (Los Rios), an unknown number of perpetrators kidnapped a man for extortion. Police authorities rescued the victim on 21 December during a police raid in Quevedo in which they arrested one perpetrator and liberated one other victim who had been kidnapped for extortion on 19 December (coded separately). This group of perpetrators was likely part of the same group of five unidentified individuals who had kidnapped the other victim and placed them in the same location.

On 22 December 2023, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with at least 10 gunshots in a drive-by shooting (likely execution) in the La Victoria neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 December 2023, in Milagro (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a taxi driver and his passenger in a drive-by shooting in the Ciudadela Las Mercedes, between Jaime Roldos and Martha Bucaram avenues. The police believe the killing may be related to the extortion attempts that one of the victims had suffered days before. Authorship unknown. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Ecuador (2023-); UP: Popular Unity (Ecuador)
notes: On 22 December 2023, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a former government worker of the Vuelta Larga parish and militant of the former Democratic Popular Movement (MPD), current UP party, in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 22 December 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was tortured and killed and their dead body was found in a canal in the Nueva Prosperina sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 December 2023, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed the male owner of a delivery business in a drive-by shooting as he also rode his motorcycle in the Las Mercedes neighborhood. The perpetrators fired four shots at the victim's head before fleeing. Police authorities suspect that the killing is linked to territorial disputes over drug distribution. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 22 December 2023 (as reported), near Machala (El Oro), a man was killed and his dead body was burned in a rural area along the road to Limon. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 December 2023, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting. The victim had a police record for concealing stolen items. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 23 December 2023 (as reported), in Montecristi (Manabi), a man was shot and killed with at least 10 gunshots and his body found underneath a bridge in the Los Espinos sector. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 December 2023, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), an unknown number of armed suspects shot and killed a man with over 10 gunshots between Quilotoa and Rio Coca streets. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 23 December 2023 (as reported), in Cuenca (Azuay), three unidentified armed individuals stabbed and killed a man and his body was found between Via Patamarca and De la Compania streets. Two suspects were adolescents and all three were arrested. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), several unidentified armed men dragged, beat up, shot and killed a woman inside her house in the Ciudad Victoria 2 housing project. The victim had refused to pay an extortion fee and was shot dead in front of her children. Her house was taken by the perpetrators and used as a hideout. Members of Los Aguilas and Los Fatales Gang operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 24 December 2023, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty police officer in the Eugenio Espejo neighborhood. Three civilians were shot and injured in unknown circumstances and the police suspect they were related to the shooting. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 December 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unidentified suspected gang abducted two civilians during an express kidnapping and requested $10,000 for their release. Twelve suspects were arrested a few days later. Police seized a pistol, a handmade firearm, a vehicle and ammunition. There were no casualties.
On 24 December 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), three unidentified armed men forcibly abducted a store owner from a sportswear shop in the city center. The victim's whereabouts remain unknown.

On 25 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno (Guayas), unidentified heavily-armed individuals in a car fired at least 15 rifle shots against four Venezuelan citizens in a drive-by shooting between Guerrero Martinez and B streets, in the Cristo del Consuelo sector. Three victims died and one was hospitalized. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 25 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man in the Ciudadela Guayacanes, in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2023, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a garbage disposal worker in a drive-by shooting while he was working. The victim had no police records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with several gunshots in a drive-by shooting. Police believe the attack motivation was a settling of scores. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2023, in Daule (Guayas), three unidentified armed men in a vehicle shot and killed a man in an attempted kidnapping. The perpetrators attempted to force the victim onto their vehicle but killed him upon resistance. There is no further information available. Police authorities are investigating whether the attack was related to a drive-by shooting in Daule on the same day (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2023, in Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals on a motorcycle killed a man driving his motorcycle in a drive-by shooting along Camilo Destruge and Cesar Bahamonde streets in the Patria Nueva neighborhood. Authorship and motivation unknown. Police authorities are investigating whether the attack was related to an attempted kidnapping where the victim was killed in Daule on the same day (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 26 December 2023, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unidentified armed individual on a motorbike shot and killed a man with eight gunshots to the head in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 26 December 2023 (as reported), in Santa Rosa (El Oro), a person was shot and killed with a gunshot to the head and their body found with hands and feet tied in the El Paraiso sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 December 2023, in Ambato (Tungurahua), around 200 people armed with clubs, stones and bottles captured two robbers and beat up one of them before the police arrived in an attempted lynching. Both suspects were arrested by the police. There were no fatalities.

Around 26 December 2023 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), a man was killed and his dismembered body found inside a jute bag in the Asaad Bucaram cooperative, Pascuales parish. The victim was a drug user. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 26 December 2023 (as reported), in Santa Rosa (Tungurahua), a man was shot and killed with a gunshot to the head (likely execution) and his body found with his hands and feet tied on the side of the road in the El Paraiso sector, parroquia La Victoria. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 26 December 2023 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a woman was shot dead and her body was found in the cemetery with her hands tied, signs of torture, and her legs wrapped up with packing tape. The victim had a relationship with a member of a criminal organization. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
tags: women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

notes: On 26 December 2023, in Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno (Guayas), two unidentified assailants on foot shot and killed a man near a pedestrian bridge over the Estero Salado in the Cristo del Consuelo sector. The perpetrators shot the victim three times. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 December 2023, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting. The victim had ten prior criminal records for drug possession and theft. Police found eight 9-mm bullets at the scene. Also on 26 December, in Quevedo, an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators in a pickup truck shot and killed a man riding his motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in the San Jose Sur neighborhood. Motivation and authorship unknown for both events. 2 fatalities.

On 26 December 2023, in La Tola (Esmeraldas), unidentified armed individuals in vehicles fired shots at a private residence in a drive-by shooting on 316 street with 216 avenues, in the Santa Lucia neighborhood. A man was shot and killed and three other people were injured. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 December 2023, in Guayaquil (Guayas), informal merchants clashed with municipal police in Huayna - Capac Street after the agents attempted to evict them and take their products away for not being in an allowed sector to sell their products. The merchants mentioned that they have been suffering abuse and charging them money for them to sell their products but still evicting them.
