On 15 February 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a male fisherman inside a bar in the Reales Tamarindos neighborhood of the Santa Rosa port sector. The perpetrators arrived on a motorcycle. A man sitting with the victim was shot and injured. Police forces later arrested the two perpetrators on their motorcycle in the Bazen neighborhood. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 February 2024, in San Miguel de Ibarra (Imbabura), residents captured and beat up a man accused of robbery. Police officers rescued the man, but they still hit him when the officers took him away. There were no fatalities.

On 15 February 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number unidentified armed perpetrators traveling in a vehicle killed a man and injured two other people traveling in a car together in a drive-by shooting on Universitaria Avenue, near the San Pablo tourist complex. The perpetrators fired multiple shots, causing the vehicle to crash. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 February 2024, in Muluncay Grande (El Oro), a man driving his car was shot and killed by unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting. The car crashed on a lighting post. 1 fatality.
Around 16 February 2024 (as reported), in Ayampe (Manabi), a man was killed by unidentified assailants and his burned body was found inside of a car. 1 fatality.

On 16 February 2024, in Latacunga (Cotopaxi), four armed assailants kidnapped two university students. They demanded ransom from their family. The perpetrators took the victims to Pujili. The two students were rescued by police officers the next day after they clashed with the assailants in Pujili (coded separately).

On 16 February 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants shot at three people that were hanging out on a park of La Acacias sector. Two of the three people were killed. One of them had physical and mental disabilities. The other was uninjured because he faked being dead. 2 fatalities.

On 16 February 2024, in Isla de Bejucal (Baba, Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a woman in a drive-by shooting while she was walking on the road. The woman was shot eight times. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 February 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), residents of Santa Rosa port captured, stripped of his clothes and beat up a man that had robbed a resident previously. They also hit him with the blunt part of a machete. The man was placed on a motorcycle and moved around the sector. There were no fatalities.

On 17 February 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was shot and killed by an unidentified armed assailant on foot who later fled with an accomplice on a motorcycle who was waiting for him on Las Orquideas sector. The man was with a woman walking outside a restaurant. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: Around 17 February 2024 (as reported), in Buena Fe (Guayas), three men were shot and killed and their bodies were found on a nearby road with their hands tied up, and with a message that stated that it was forbidden to steal or extort in surrounding places. 3 fatalities.

On 17 February 2024, in Vinces (Los Rios), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed two men that were having a conversation outside their house in Obrero neighborhood (drive-by). The two men were father and son. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 17 February 2024, in Ventanas (Los Rios), two unidentified armed assailants came on a motorcycle, entered a shop of car accessories, pretended to be clients to get close to the owner and then shot and killed him. The assailants fled. The owner's wife was injured. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 17 February 2024, at 70 nautical miles from the Coast of Pedernales (Manabi), military and police officers seized more than a ton of cocaine that was being carried on a ship and was being headed to Mexico.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 17 February 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), a woman was shot and killed by two armed assailants on a motorcycle (drive-by) while she was having drinks with friends in the Virgen del Carmen sector. 1 fatality.
On 17 February 2024, around Babahoyo municipality (Los Rios), police and military forces arrested the head of the AK47 gang in Piedrablanca sector.

On 18 February 2024, in Cuenca (Azuay), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a taxi driver while he was working in the Milchichig ravine sector. The victim's body was found inside the taxi, which had rolled to the edge of the ravine. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 18 February 2024, in Sabalucal (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man while he was with his family having a beer (drive-by). Another man was injured. 1 fatality.
On 18 February 2024, in Rosa Zarate (Esmeraldas), military officers captured a leader of Los Tiguerones gang that is known to lead the extorsion cases in Los Angeles sector.

source: Ecuador en Vivo; El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 18 February 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police officers seized six tons of cocaine that were stored inside a container in one of the local ports. The destination of the drug was Mexico. Two people involved were arrested.

On 19 February 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), costumers of a restaurant in Guayacanes sector captured and beat up a man that was attempting to rob the business and the costumers. There were no fatalities.

Around 19 February 2024 (as reported), in La Beldaca (Guayas), a woman was killed and her body was found in plastic bags and wrapped in a bed sheet at the 13 KM of the Salitre - La Aurora highway. The woman was not from the sector. 1 fatality.
On 19 February 2024, in Palestina (Guayas), military officers arrested a leader of Los Lobos gang. The man was also a deserter of the Oliver Sinisterra Front.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 19 February 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants on a car (drive-by) shot at four men that were on a car by the local roundabout. They shot at least 35 times at the car, and killed two men and injured the other two. The car that the assailants used was found burned in Los Gavilanes sector. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2023-); PSC: Social Christian Party (Ecuador)
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 19 February 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants shot at the house of a member of the national assembly (Social Christian Party: PSC) when he was sleeping in the house. The assembly member claimed that the attack directly relates to the unfulfillment of the Portoviejo Justice Palace project culmination, and his desire to continue fiscalization work in Manabi. There were no casualties.

Property destruction: On 19 February 2024, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), police officers seized 1 ton of cocaine that was hidden in a truck-container after they carried out a drug control operation. The driver of the truck was arrested.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 19 February 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), a food business owner, his son and another man that worked with them that were kidnapped earlier that day were killed and their bodies were found in the local land fill. The victims were kidnapped while working. 3 fatalities.
Property destruction: On 20 February 2024, in Chanduy (Santa Elena), military and police officers destroyed two clandestine landing strips that were used for transporting drugs.

On 20 February 2024, in Rio Verde (Esmeraldas), a man was kidnapped by a group of military officers who took him on a car to an unknown location. The victim's body was found around 26 February in Guayabilla (coded separately).

assoc_actor_2: Chachi Indigenous Group (Ecuador); Unidentified Communal Group (Ecuador)
notes: On 20 February 2024, in Borbon (Esmeraldas), unidentified armed assailants shot and injured two Chachi Indigenous leaders at the Camarones sector, in Juan Montalvo community. They were inside a car, and the driver was injured as well during the attack. The driver jumped out of the car, and the car fell on a stream of water with both injured Indigenous leaders inside, who later died. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 20 February 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), a woman who is a person with disabilities and an LGBTQ+ community rights defender was kidnapped with another man by armed assailants. She was rescued on 25 February with a friend after a police investigation. Officers claimed that the kidnapping was related to extorsion.
tags: women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders

notes: On 21 February 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), Police forces carried out several search and seizure operatives in the city, and captured eight gang members of Los Lobos, including a head of the gang.

On 21 February 2024, in La Esperanza (Los Rios), an unspecified number of suspected Los Lobos gang members abducted a taxi driver, and demanded a 10,000 USD ransom for his release. The man had been tricked by three women, who he had driven from Esmeraldas canton to that location. He was tied up and held captive in a rural area in the nearby Valencia canton, until he was liberated during a special security operation some days later. Police arrested 15 suspects, and seized four guns and drugs.

On 21 February 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man at Martin Icaza and 10 de Agosto streets (drive-by). The man had a record of robbery. 1 fatality.

Around 22 February 2024 (as reported), around Duran municipality (Guayas), a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied up and wrapped in plastic on an empty lot at the 9KM of the Duran - Tambo highway. The head had a gunshot injury. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: Around 22 February 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two people were killed and their bodies were found dismembered and burned inside a car in Balerio Estacio sector. One of the victims was identified and he was an auditor who worked for a private company that was auditing municipal works, and the reason for the attack was due to an extorsion to construction companies operating in the city. 2 fatalities.

Weapons seizure: On 22 February 2024, in El Guabo canton (El Oro), a joint unit of police and military forces discovered 240 sticks of dynamite, and some fuse, hidden in a pick-up truck. The finding took place at the El Garrido toll booth, on the Troncal de la Costa Highway. The driver was arrested.

On 23 February 2024, in San Miguel Bajo (Imbabura), indigenous residents applied indigenous justice to a man who had robbed several artifacts from a house. They stripped off his shirt, whipped him, and forced him to walk around the community with two liquid gas tanks tied to his body. The man had a knife that he tried to use to defend himself and injured one of the residents, which prompted the community to punish the man. They also burned down the pick-up truck he used. There were no fatalities.

On 23 February 2024, in Duran (Guayas), armed assailants shot at a man that was eating at a restaurant, but the man escaped. The assailants followed him, and when they found him, they killed him in a 'tiro de gracia' style. 1 fatality.

On 23 February 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man when he was leaving his house in Ejercito and Tercera Transversal avenues (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 23 February 2024 (as reported), in Crucita (Manabi), a person was killed, and its body was mutilated and placed inside three plastic bags and left at Los Ranchos. Inside the bags there was women's clothing, but authorities have not been able to determine the identification of the victim. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Primicias
notes: On 23 February 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants (likely Tiguerones Gang members) came on a motorcycle to a construction materials shop located at Balerio Estacio sector, asked for the owner, but did not get a response. They shot and killed a worker of the shop and fled. Los Tiguerones gang members had attacked and left an explosive (coded separately) previously in an attempt to force the shop owner to pay for protection money (extorsion). 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 23 February 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police officers carried out an operative at an urbanization in Narcisa de Jesus highway and seized two tons of cocaine and arrested four gang members.

Around 23 February 2024 (as reported), in Crucita (Manabi), a transexual woman was killed, her body was dismembered, and her two arms and a leg were found on a trash bag in Los Ranchos beach. Police forces were able to determine the identity of the woman because of a tattoo on her leg. The woman was reported missing since 19 February. 1 fatality.
Around 23 February 2024 (as reported), in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), two unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man in Nuevo Buena Fe sector in a drive-by shooting. 1 fatality.

On 23 February 2024, in Vinces (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle kidnapped a doctor. They demanded money in exchange of the doctor's release (extorsion). The doctor was released on 27 February.

On 23 February 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), armed suspects (described as hitmen) shot and killed three people, in a suspected drive-by shooting in the Los Ficus neighborhood. Two victims were found dead sitting on plastic chairs by the porch of a house; a third person, an adolescent girl, was found in the doorway of a nearby home. There is no further information at this point in time. 3 fatalities.
On 24 February 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in Nueva Esperanza neighborhood (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 25 February 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), armed assailants shot and killed a man inside of his house in Balerio Estacio sector after they arrived on motorcycles, approached the house on foot pretending to be police officers and came into his house and shot him more than 10 times. 1 fatality.

On 25 February 2024,in Quevedo (Los Rios), five armed assailants shot and killed a man in Venus del Rio parish near his home. Another citizen was injured in the attack. The five assailants were arrested after two days. 1 fatality.

On 25 February 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police forces carried out an operative in San Martin neighborhood in which they arrested two gang members of Los Gangsters criminal group. One of the arrested was the leader of the group.

On 25 February 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man while he was driving a pick-up truck in a drive-by shooting in Jaime Roldos neighborhood. 1 fatality.

Around 25 February 2024 (as reported), in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), two men were shot and killed and their bodies were found in La Carolina sector. One body had their feet tied up and the other his hands tied up. 2 fatalities.

On 25 February 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), a man was shot and killed by four unidentified armed assailants on two motorcycles in a drive-by shooting at Roldos and Primer Callejon streets. 1 fatality.

Around 26 February 2024 (as reported), in Guayabilla (Esmeraldas), a man that had been kidnapped by military officers six days ago (coded separately) was killed and his body was found in the sector. 1 fatality.

On 26 February 2024, in Nueva Loja (Sucumbios), unidentified assailants threw a house-made explosive outside the house of a woman activist. The woman is currently suing the state for not shutting down the oil extractor lighters that were ordered by the constitutional court to be removed a year ago because of it was causing damages to the environment and health of the residents around them. There were no casualties.
tags: women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders

notes: On 27 February 2024, in Sinincay (Azuay), a group of unidentified armed assailants kidnapped a man when he was in his car and took control of it. The car was found burned the day after in El Cajas sector.

source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 27 February 2024, in Daule (Guayas), police offices carried out an operative at a house and seized 1.5 tons of cocaine.
On 27 February 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants kidnapped a taxi cab driver. The victim's body was found with around 30 stab wounds days later (coded separately).

On 27 February 2024, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), a taxi cab driver was held captive by three unidentified armed assailants, who tied him up and forced him inside the trunk of his car. The man was able to break free and escaped the trunk. Two of the assailants shot at the man as he escaped, but he was not injured. There were no casualties.
On 27 February 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), residents captured and beat up a man who had attempted to rob one of the pedestrians in the PECA sector. There were no fatalities.

On 28 February 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), two men were kidnapped by unidentified assailants who tied up their hands and feet. Police forces that were carrying out seizures of houses found the two men and rescued them.

On 28 February 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), an unidentified armed assailant shot and killed a fisher that was eating lunch with colleagues in Bajo Alto sector. The assailant fled on a motorcycle driven by another assailant. 1 fatality.
On 28 February 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces carried out an operative in Ciudad Victoria sector, and arrested a leader of Los Fatales gang.

On 28 February 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot a man who was driving through Las Crucitas sector in a drive-by shooting. The man tried to escape when he was being shot but crashed because of the injuries. The man died after two days. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 28 February 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), unidentified armed assailants set fire to the facade of the Municipal Palace. The fired damaged the internet receiver, and part of the facade. They left an intimidating message.

On 28 February 2024, in Playas (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was sitting on a bench in a children's park in the local Malecon, in Santa Martha sector (drive-by). During the attack at least eight people were injured from gunshots, and a woman died from the injuries. 2 fatalities.

Around 28 February 2024 (as reported), in Las Lojas (Guayas), a man was killed and his body was left in a sector near the La Aurora - La T de Daule highway wrapped in plastic bags and bed sheets. 1 fatality.

On 28 February 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants in a car shot at an urban public bus in a drive-by shooting, and killed the driver and a passenger. The assailants shot at the bus at least 20 times and escaped after the driver died. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Esmeraldas News
notes: On 29 February 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), municipal transit agents of the Esvial EP public company burned down tires on the streets in front of their offices to voice their grievances about not receiving their salaries since November 2023.

Around 29 February 2024 (as reported), in Montecristi (Manabi), the body of a taxi driver that was kidnapped in Manta days before (coded separately) was found with 30 stab wounds. His taxi cab was also found in 6 de Marzo neighborhood, close to where the body was found. 1 fatality.

On 29 February 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in Los Helechos sector (drive-by). They shot him at least for times on the head. 1 fatality.
Property destruction: On 29 February 2024, in Cojimies (Manabi), officers of the Ecuadorian Air Force destroyed a clandestine landing strip used for drug transport.

On 29 February 2024, in Playas (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on foot shot and killed a man who was leaving his house in La Cristalina neighborhood. The assailants fled on motorcycles. 1 fatality.
On 29 February 2024, in Playas (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in Juan Gomez Rendon neighborhood (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 29 February 2024, in Atacames (Esmeraldas), unidentified armed assailants kidnapped a local merchant at his workplace and took him to an unknown place. They demanded a ransom for his release. Police forces were able to make them release the man the next day.

On 1 March 2024, in Santa Rosa (Tungurahua), indigenous residents of San Luis sector captured for an entire day two men that were breaking a car's windshield with rocks. The two men were held until they decided their punishment. Both men were released and beat up in accordance to the Indigenous Justice procedures. There were no fatalities.

Around 1 March 2024 (as reported), in Pajan (Manabi), a man was killed and his body was found on the bank of a stream in La Trinidad sector. The victim had several gunshot wounds to the face. Police suspect the victim was killed in a different location and abandoned in Pajan. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 March 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in Las Pampas sector (drive-by). A friend of the man that was with him was injured. 1 fatality.

On 1 March 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), four unidentified armed assailants on motorcycles kidnapped a man before he was able to reach his house. Police officers were able to rescue him after an investigation the same day.

On 1 March 2024, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in El Recreo sector. The men tried to flee but they still died. 2 fatalities.

On 2 March 2024, in Valencia (Los Rios), unidentified assailants in a white car shot at a barber shop in 2 de Agosto and Simon Bolivar streets after getting out of the vehicle, and killed two men, one was the owner of the shop and a LGBTQ+ member, and the other was a former prisoner. 2 fatalities.
On 2 March 2024, in Atascoso (Los Rios), a tricycle cab driver was shot and killed by unidentified armed assailants. 1 fatality.

On 2 March 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), armed assailants kidnapped a man when he was reaching his house at La Aurora sector. The assailants cut a finger from his right hand and right foot and sent it to the man's wife to force her to pay money for his release (extorsion). Police officers rescued the man on 7 March. There were no fatalities.

On 3 March 2024, in El Salitre (Guayas), at least five armed assailants kidnapped a livestock farmer, and then demanded ransom money for his release. Two days later the man was rescued in Nobol and five assailants were arrested.

On 3 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle kidnapped a man and were transporting him with his hands tied. The man was able to break free and started to run. The assailants shot and killed him in an alley in Francisco Jacome sector in the north of the city. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 4 March 2024, 117 nautical miles outside the Coast of Manta (Manabi), police forces seized a small boat with around 1 ton of drugs that were heading to Mexico and Guatemala. Two men were driving the boat simulating to be fishermen and both of them were arrested.

On 4 March 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), an unidentified armed assailant shot and killed a man, and later fled on a motorcycle with another assailant that was waiting for him. This happened in Fortuna estate when the man was saying goodbye to his family. 1 fatality.

On 4 March 2024, in Playas (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at Brisas del Mar sector when he was going to enter his house. His brother threw a rock at the assailants and injured one of them. In retaliation, the injured assailant shot the brother, killing him. 2 fatalities.

On 4 March 2024, in Jipijapa (Manabi), two unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man at 3 de Mayo citadel in a drive-by attack. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 5 March 2024, off the Coast of Manta (Manabi), police forces seized more than a ton of cocaine hidden in the false bottom of a boat 120 miles off the coast. Two suspects were arrested.
On 5 March 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), three members of Los Duendes gang kidnapped two women. Police officers were able to rescue both women in El Guayacan parish, 17 de Marzo sector.

Around 5 March 2024 (as reported), in Manta (Manabi), a man was killed and his body was found wrapped on a bed sheet on a gorge behind Si Vivienda citadel. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 March 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a butcher inside his shop and then escaped on a vehicle. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 5 March 2024, at the international maritime border between Ecuador and Colombia (coded to Coast of Esmeraldas), military officers members of the Navy seized two small boats that carried 1.2 tons of drugs in the Palma Real area.

On 5 March 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on motorcycles shot a municipal transit agent officer that was on a motorcycle as well in a drive-by shooting. The officer escaped and hid in a store until the assailants left. The officer was injured, taken to a hospital and then died. 1 fatality.

On 6 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects shot and killed a man inside his house in the intersection of 17 Avenue and 9-10 street. The victim was shot several times to the head. Police stated he had criminal records for unspecified charges. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 6 March 2024, in El Triunfo (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants in a car shot and killed an off-duty police officer in the parking lot of a hotel (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 6 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified assailants threw gasoline on a car and set fire to it. The car was located at the highway that leads to San Mateo and the owner was a Manta female public worker.
On 6 March 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle and a car followed a woman, entered her house, shot, killed her, and left. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 6 March 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot at a metropolitan transit agent in Tiburon neighborhood (drive-by). The agent ran from the sector into a house while the assailants continued shooting. A girl was killed by a stray bullet. The agent was injured and taken to a hospital. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 7 March 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), a group of locals and merchants on 13 and Capitan Najera streets captured a man accused of robbery and extorsion and beat him up. There were no fatalities.

On 7 March 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of members of the Latin Kings gang shot and killed a man and injured another at 25 street and C avenue (drive-by). The victim had a criminal record for murder and robbery. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
Around 7 March 2024 (as reported), in the rural sector of Valencia municipality (Los Rios), a man was killed and his burned body and a car were found side-by-side in El Zapote sector. 1 fatality.
On 7 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in front of a school in Santa Martha neighborhood (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 7 March 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), at least seven armed assailants kidnapped two men in the Plantabal sector, on the San Carlos - Ventanas road. They demanded a ransom to release the men (kidnapped). On 11 March, police officers carried out an operative and were able to release the two men and arrested seven assailants. No one was injured or killed.

On 8 March 2024, in Cuenca (Azuay), female residents marched through the city as a demonstration to commemorate the International Women's Day. During the demonstration, they clashed with police officers who attempted to remove them from the street. The officers used tear gas to disperse them.
On 8 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a group of locals at Guaranda and Maracaibo streets intersection captured a man accused of robbery and beat him up. There were no fatalities.

On 8 March 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police officers captured a kidnapping criminal group, including the leader of the group, that operated on the south of the city and was also involved with drug trafficking. The leader of the group suffered a heart attack while she was being arrested and died.
Property destruction: On 8 March 2024, in Jaramijo (Manabi), police forces seized a truck with 1.3 tons of drugs and arrested three men, two local and one from Colombia, driving the truck.

On 8 March 2024, in Arenillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot two men that were inside a restaurant in Progreso 1 sector in a drive-by shooting. One of the men was killed and the other was injured. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 9 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), police forces intercepted a truck driven by three men that avoided a police control in the Manta - Jaramijo highway. The truck had a fake bottom that carried more than 1 ton of cocaine. The three men, one of the from Colombia, were arrested.

On 9 March 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on motorcycles shot and killed a municipal transit agent officer that was on a motorcycle as well in a drive-by shooting, in Clemente Baquerizo and Tercera streets, close to the Firefighters station. 1 fatality.

On 9 March 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on motorcycles shot at a pool bar at Mata de Cacao sector, Febres Cordero parish, in a drive-by shooting. As a result, a person was killed and three others injured. 1 fatality.

On 9 March 2024, in Babahoyo (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a taxi cab driver when they pretended to be clients in La Union parish. They left the car and the driver's body on a sidewalk. 1 fatality.
On 10 March 2024, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man that was walking near a school in Abel Gilbert citadel in a drive-by shooting. 1 fatality.
On 10 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man in Guasmo sector. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 10 March 2024, in Puyo (Pastaza), Intervention and Rescue Group (GIR) of the police defused a charge with three explosives successfully. The explosives were left at the entrances of a elderly citizen's house near a church, to intimidate the population to carry out extortions around the city.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 10 March 2024, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), two women and a man were taken by three unidentified armed assailants and later left with bullet injuries in Calderon park. One of the two women died from the injuries. 1 fatality.

On 11 March 2024, in Palo Quemado (Cotopaxi), indigenous residents carried out a demonstration during the National Environmental Ministry's socialization of the environmental referendum that will be carried out for La Plata copper mining project to be carried out by a Canadian company. During the demonstration, the residents attacked the ministry officials, threw Molotov bombs, and attempted to destroy the ministry's cars. According to the Indigenous people, armed assailants affiliated with a Canadian mining company attacked them and clashed with them, which was denied by the police.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 11 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot at a shop in Cristo del Consuelo sector, and killed a girl and injured four people (drive-by). Two of the injured people were the ones targeted. Police claimed that the attack was related to a gang territory dispute. 1 fatality.

On 11 March 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who worked as manager of a recycling factory in a drive-by shooting with at least 10 gunshots in the center of the city. The man had a criminal record for theft. 1 fatality.

On 12 March 2024, in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (El Oro), an owner of a local brothel was shot and killed by unidentified armed assailants outside of the Patria Coliseum. The owner had a criminal record for homicide and theft. Another man was injured during the attack. The father of the victim stated that the deceased had received extortion-related threats the day before. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 12 March 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), several unidentified armed assailants entered a drug rehabilitation center and shot and killed two people and injured a third one. The assailants shot at least 20 times, and later escaped. 2 fatalities.

On 12 March 2024, in Nueva Loja (Sucumbios), unidentified armed assailants on motorcycles shot and killed two men who were in a car waiting for their turn to fill their car with gasoline in a drive-by shooting. One of the victims was Colombian. 2 fatalities.

Around 13 March 2024 (as reported), in Montecristi canton (Manabi), a man was killed and his body was found in the road to Los Bajos locality. The victim had several gunshot wounds to the head. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 13 March 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of El Carmen canton (Manabi), two unidentified hooded armed suspects stabbed a woman to death after breaking into her house. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Property destruction: On 14 March 2024, at the northeast of San Lorenzo canton (coded to San Lorenzo de Esmeraldas, Esmeraldas), military forces destroyed a drug processing lab destined for cocaine production at the Ecuador - Colombia border around El Derrumbe sector. The lab produced around 15 tons of cocaine per month.
Around 14 March 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and dismembered and his remains were left at a street in Balerio Estacio sector. 1 fatality.

Around 14 March 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of Palenque canton (Los Rios), three men were killed and their bodies were found at a rural sector of Vizcaino sector. The three men were kidnapped and taken to this location to be killed. They had bullet and knife injuries in their bodies. 3 fatalities.

On 14 March 2024, in Sucre (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants, described as hitmen, on a motorcycle shot and killed a man at Cesar Ruperti Avenue, Leonidas Plaza sector (drive-by). In a different area, two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot at three people (drive-by) killing two. The motivation behind the attacks and its perpetrators are unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Property destruction: On 14 March 2024, in Jama (Manabi), military forces seized and destroyed a clandestine air-strip that was used for drug trafficking.
On 14 March 2024, in San Miguel de Ibarra (Imbabura), residents captured and beat up a man who had attempted to rob a car and broke the car's window. There were no fatalities.

On 15 March 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), eight informal taxi drivers blocked a public transport bus with their cars around the 10km of La Aurora - La T de Daule y Salitre highway. They started to throw rocks and other objects at the bus. Police forces controlled the situation (unspecified), and claimed that it was an ongoing dispute for passengers because people prefer the bus instead of the informal taxi because it is cheaper, so the taxi drivers want the busses to stop going through the sector. One bus driver was injured. There were no fatalities.

On 15 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in Flor de Bastion sector at the northwest of the city (drive-by). The man was shot at least eight times. 1 fatality.

On 15 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants shot at the armored car of a port worker close to the entrance of the maritime port of Trinitaria Island. The assailants shot at least 30 times with their rifles at the armored car but were unable to kill the worker. The assailants later escaped by car. A private guard (who was near the targeted car) was shot and injured. There were no fatalities.

On 15 March 2024, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), members of the control agency of the municipality of Quito physically assaulted an Afro-Ecuadorian during an operation near the Central University. The victim claimed it was a discriminatory act and one of the agents was fired on 12 November and another received a fine. There were no fatalities.

Around 16 March 2024 (as reported), between Portoviejo and El Rodeo (Manabi), several unidentified armed suspects in a car chased and opened fire against a couple in a car on the road to El Rodeo (drive-by). One of the shots reached the premises of El Rodeo prison facility. The couple in the vehicle was injured and taken to hospital. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: Around 16 March 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), a man was killed and dismembered by unidentified armed assailants, and his remains were left in Pascuales parish inside two bags at Colimes and Leonidas streets intersection. 1 fatality.
On 16 March 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man that was outside a store in El Bosque neighborhood (drive-by). 1 fatality.
Around 16 March 2024 (as reported), in Arenillas (El Oro), a farmer was killed and him and his motorcycle were burned on a old road in 25 de Diciembre sector. 1 fatality.

On 16 March 2024, in Daule (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a national Ecuador Transit Commission (CTE) agent and an underage man that were chatting at La Yolita sector. Another man was shot and injured. 2 fatalities.

On 16 March 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), at least two unidentified armed assailants, described as hitmen, shot and killed two men that were watching a volley game in the Rafael Correa citadel. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 2 fatalities.
On 16 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in Santa Martha sector when he was eating inside a restaurant (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 17 March 2024, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), Metropolitan control agents attacked an Afro-Ecuadorian man. The agents threw to the ground the man that was sitting on the stairs of a shop, and then kicked him three times. Then they threw an object at his face and then left. The man was not injured. There were no casualties.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 17 March 2024, in Pujili (Cotopaxi), residents threw rocks and clashed with police officers who attempted to shut down an event that did not have the required permits to be carried out. During the clash, a civilian was shot by the police. He was injured, taken to a health center, and later died. Seven officers were injured. After the killing, around 25 residents attacked the Community Police Unit (UPC) offices, damaging the facilities and cars. 1 fatality.

On 17 March 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), unidentified armed assailants on a car and two motorcycles shot and killed a man that was driving through Clavijo avenue, in Ecologica sector, Santa Rosa parish. The assailants forced the man out of the car, hit him on the head, threw him to the ground and then shot him on the head. 1 fatality.

On 17 March 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects shot and killed a taxi driver at El Floron citadel. The victim was working at the moment of the attack. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 March 2024, in Anconcito (Santa Elena), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man that was driving his pick-up truck at the Balcon Encantado neighborhood in a drive-by shooting. The man was a neighborhood leader. 1 fatality.

On 17 March 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot at a group of people in Los Laureles sector (drive-by). A man was killed and five were injured. 1 fatality.

On 17 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man inside a restaurant in the La Cultura Avenue (drive-by). They shot at the man at least 15 times. Two other people resulted injured during the attack. Police stated the victim had criminal records for unspecified charges. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknow. 1 fatality.

On 17 March 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), a taxi cab driver was kidnapped by unidentified armed assailants, and they demanded a ransom to the family of the driver for his release. The victim was working at the moment of the event. The driver was rescued by police officers on 22 March, and an assailant was arrested.

On 18 March 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), several unidentified heavily armed suspects abducted a man on the road to Pavon locality. The suspects demanded a US 30,000 as ransom to release the victim. The victim was released unharmed 24 hours later in El Empalme, Guayas municipality. With the victim, police forces found three other kidnapped victims.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 18 March 2024, in Picoaza (Portoviejo, Manabi), several unidentified heavily armed assailants in a car shot at residents in a drive-by shooting in the El Milagro sector. Three men were killed and other three were injured. Police officers who were nearby the attack, chased after the suspects and one individual was arrested and the vehicle used by the suspects seized. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 3 fatalities.
On 18 March 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), between five or six unidentified armed assailants in a white pick-up truck shot and killed a man at the Zona H sector (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 18 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a Transit Municipal Agency worker at La Cultura Avenue in a drive-by shooting. The man was the brother-in-law of the former leader of Los Choneros gang and had a criminal record for illegal possession of weapons. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 March 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man in La Rotonda park. The man was with a woman, who was injured in the attack and taken to hospital. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 18 March 2024 (as reported), in Quito - Tumbaco (Pichincha), a woman was killed and her body was found at the old road to Papallacta. Her body was found burned, with her extremities tied, and she was naked. 1 fatality.

Around 18 March 2024 (as reported), Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a woman was kidnapped (express kidnapping) by unidentified assailants and her body was left in La Herradura citadel at the north of the city. She had violence signs on her face. 1 fatality.

On 18 March 2024, in Palo Quemado (Cotopaxi), indigenous residents and farmers clashed with police and military forces that came to the parish. The indigenous residents were against the mining operations in the sector, and a referendum to allow mining operations in the sector. The officers used tear gas to disperse the indigenous residents. One farmer was injured.

source: Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 19 March 2024, in Palo Quemado (Cotopaxi), indigenous residents from Las Pampas and Palo Quemado localities, clashed with police and military forces during a socialization meeting of a mining project that members of the ministry of environment were carrying out. The indigenous residents were against the mining operations in the sector, and a referendum to allow mining operations in the sector. The officers fired pellets, tear gas, and rubber bullets to displace indigenous residents from their lands and disperse the crowds. Two police officers and 15 indigenous residents were injured. Four officers were taken by the residents and two cars were burned. There were no fatalities.

On 19 March 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), a man was kidnapped by seven members of Los Lobos gang at the Techo Propio sector in the south of the city. Police officers carried an operative and rescued the man and arrested seven gang members.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 19 March 2024, near Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a municipal Transit Authority agent (ATD) and injured another that was carrying out a patrol on the Duran - Yaguachi highway. The agent killed had been connected to an ongoing corruption investigation because he had denounced an irregular layoff he suffered months before. Other follow agents resulted injured during the attack. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 March 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man at 9 de Octubre neighborhood, in the Jose Luis Tamayo parish (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 19 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a merchant was kidnapped by Los Tiguerones gang members at Julio Cartagena sector at the north of the city. The merchant was victim of extorsion by the gang, who had left several letters demanding payment of money.
On 20 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the Altamira neighborhood (drive-by). 1 fatality.
On 20 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), four unidentified armed assailants kidnapped a man that was at a store in Juan Montalvo sector.

On 20 March 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and injured a woman that were travelling on a motorcycle in Jose Luis Tamayo parish (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 20 March 2024, in Palo Quemado (Cotopaxi), indigenous residents clashed with police and military forces by throwing rocks. The officers threw tear gas to disperse them and stop them from advancing. The officers mentioned that their objective was going to where Environment Ministry technicians were carrying out a socialization about the mining operations that will be carried out in the sector. Two residents were injured.

Property destruction: On 20 March 2024, in Petrillo (Guayas), police officers seized two tons of cocaine that were covered with mustard and menthol to avoid being detected by police dogs. The drugs were found in a house that had access to the Daule river on the back of the house, and four people were arrested.
On 20 March 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man that was inside his house in Mejia and Custodio Sanchez streets (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 21 March 2024 (as reported), in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas canton (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), a man was killed and his body was found in La Concordia - Puerto Nuevo highway with his hands tied, gun-shot wounds, torture signs, and covered with a bed sheet. He was missing a shoe, and had a shoelace around his neck. 1 fatality.

On 21 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a woman when she was on an informal taxi cab on Leonidas Plaza and Latamendi streets (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 21 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants shot at a group of people that were inside a GLP tanks shop. The owner of the shop was killed, and his son and nephew were injured. 1 fatality.
On 21 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants shot and injured a man at Ascario Paz avenue. The assailants later burned a car at Malecon avenue. There were no fatalities.

On 21 March 2024, in Bahia de Caraquez (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot at people inside a motorcycle mechanic shop at Acuarela 1 sector (drive-by). The owner of the shop was killed and another citizen was injured. 1 fatality.

Around 21 March 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a retired marine officer was killed and his body was found in La Ladrillera sector. His hands and feet were tied up and had a gun-shot wound on his head. The former officer was kidnapped on 23 May 2023 (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 22 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects on a motorcycle opened fire on a man in the intersection of 16 street and 19 Avenue, Santa Marianita neighborhood, in a drive-by shooting. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. Casualties unknown.

On 22 March 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), three unidentified armed assailants, two on a motorcycle and one in a car, shot and killed a worker of the Manabi Provincial Council in a drive-by shooting, as he was at a car wash near Papagayo bridge. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a car shot at people in 306 street, Urbirrios I sector in a drive-by shooting. One person was killed and four severely injured. Also, in Eloy Alfaro parish two people were killed in a drive-by shooting. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 3 fatalities.
On 23 March 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), residents of El Prado sector captured and tied up a man that was accused of robbing houses. The man was turned to the police.

On 23 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the intersection of 105 Avenue and 106 street, near the old Tarqui market (drive-by). The victim was shot at least 20 times with several shots to the head. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 23 March 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), three unidentified armed assailants came to Otto Arosemena neighborhood in a white pick-up truck and shot a people drinking outside a house (drive-by). Six of them died and two were injured. Police officers claimed that the attack was related to a territory dispute. 6 fatalities.
Defusal: On 23 March 2024, in Latacunga (Cotopaxi), police forces seized explosives that were found in La Cocha stadium during a football match. The officers carried out a controlled detonation.

On 23 March 2024, in San Miguel Briceno (San Vicente, Manabi), three unidentified armed suspects on a motorcycle shot and severely injured the husband of a municipal worker in a drive-by shooting in the Puerto Alto sector. The victim was taken to hospital, where he later died. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 March 2024, in Duran (Guayas), residents of El Arbolito sector captured and beat up a man who was known to rob in buses. They also taped on his chest a sign, in which the word thief was written.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2023-); MRC: Citizen Revolution Movement; Women (Ecuador)
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 24 March 2024, in San Vicente (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) in a car (drive-by) shot and killed a female mayor (MRC) and her communications director. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities

Around 24 March 2024 (as reported), in San Pedro de los Cofanes (Sucumbios), unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a journalist and his body was found with a shot on his head. 1 fatality. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 March 2024, in Colembas (El Oro), five hooded armed assailants kidnapped five people in the Colembas sector. The kidnappers demanded the payment of ransom money to the victims' families for their release. They were rescued by police officers two days later.

On 24 March 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a taxi cab driver that was outside the Venus de Valdivia clinic (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 24 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants riding a cab and a motorcycle shot at a family in the north Guasmo sector (drive-by). One underage man was killed and two underage men were injured. 1 fatality.

On 24 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), military and police officers carried out an operative at La Pradera neighborhood to arrest 13 members of Los Choneros gang, including one of the heads of the gang. They also rescued two people kidnapped, and seized drugs and weapons.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2023-); PSP: Patriotic Society Party
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuador en Vivo; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 25 March 2024, in Balzar (Guayas), several unidentified armed assailants (described as delinquents) shot at the house of the mayor (PSP) around 65 times and later fled. The mayor's wife was inside the house but was unharmed. No one was injured or killed. There were no casualties.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: Around 25 March 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and dismembered and his remains were thrown by unidentified assailants on a motorcycle at Balerio Estacio sector. Another dismembered torso was found in a house close by. 2 fatalities.

On 25 March 2024, in San Vicente (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man. The man was the husband of the treasurer of the local government. This attack happened the day after the mayor and communication director of the city were killed (coded separately). 1 fatality.

Around 25 March 2024 (as reported), in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects (described as hitmen) on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the La Victoria neighborhood, Tarqui parish, in a drive-by shooting. The individuals fired at least 30 times against the victim. The victim was taken to hospital but did not survive the injuries. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 March 2024, in Palo Quemado (Cotopaxi), Indigenous residents clashed with police officers. The Indigenous residents were against the mining operations in the sector, and a referendum to allow them. A resident was injured.
On 26 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), in the Trinitarias Island sector, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and information unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed an informal taxi cab driver that was washing his car at Autoridad Portuaria sector (drive-by). Police officers claim that the attack was related to a score settlement. 1 fatality.
On 26 March 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man at 10 de Agosto neighborhood (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 26 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in Las Malvinas sector in the south of the city in a drive-by shooting. 1 fatality.
On 26 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man at El Pollero sector in San Antonio neighborhood (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 26 March 2024 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), a man was killed and his burned body was found on the side of the Cuatro Esquinas - Zapallo highway. The body was found with its face covered with a rag. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 26 March 2024 (as reported), in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), two men were shot and killed and their bodies were found in La Ferroviaria sector with their hands tied up and gun shots on their heads. 2 fatalities.
On 26 March 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in San Raymundo neighborhood (drive-by). 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_1: CONAIE: Confederation of Indigenous Nationalities of Ecuador; Indigenous Group (Ecuador)
source: Ecuavisa; La Republica (Ecuador); Wambra Medio Comunitario
notes: On 26 March 2024, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), dozens of members of an anti-mining group, environmental activists and Indigenous citizens members of the Confederation of Indigenous Nationalities of Ecuador (CONAIE), including the leader of the CONAIE, staged a demonstration outside the Canada embassy offices to repudiate mining operations in Palo Quemado and Las Pampas, and the current repression the residents are suffering. Police officers attempted to disperse them and clashed with the demonstrators. The officers used tear gas. Demonstrators were injured.

Property destruction: On 27 March 2024, in Bahia de Caraquez (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle threw gasoline and set on fire two cars parked close to Miguel H. Alcivar hospital. The fire was contained by residents and firemen. One car was owned by a public worker of the Sucre municipality government. There is an ongoing territory conflict between Los Choneros and Los Lobos gang in the sector. The perpetrators behind the attack are unknown.

On 27 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a former police officer in Reina del Quinche 1 sector, at Guasmo Sur (drive-by). 1 fatality.
On 27 March 2024, in Portovelo (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man at 28 de Noviembre sector (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 27 March 2024, in San Javier de Cachavi (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man at a construction side near the center court of the city (drive-by). The man was shot a total of eight times. 1 fatality.

Around 27 March 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), three people were killed and dismembered, and their remains were found inside a bag in a highway in Pascuales sector. Inside the bag there were three heads, a torso, and several limbs. 3 fatalities.
On 27 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man in Angel Duarte sector (drive-by). The man had a criminal record. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 27 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), three unidentified armed assailants came to a gas station in the Perimetral highway, next to El Fortin shopping mall, and left an explosive artifact with flames on. The assailants intimidated a worker before leaving. A worker of the gas station extinguished the artifact that did not exploded. Police forces later deactivated the explosive successfully.

On 27 March 2024, in Palo Quemado (Cotopaxi), Indigenous residents destroyed a potable water pipe. The Indigenous residents are against the mining operations in the sector, and a referendum to allow them.
On 28 March 2024, in Otavalo (Imbabura), two unidentified armed assailants killed an Indigenous resident with a knife in La Florida neighborhood. 1 fatality.

On 28 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), around 200 family members of prisoners who are inside the Regional Prison of Guayaquil, most of them women, staged a demonstration outside the prison to demand information about the wellbeing of their relatives after the previous day there was a prison riot (coded separately). Demonstrators threw rocks and other objects to a military vehicle with officers inside. The vehicle was partially damaged. There were no casualties.
On 28 March 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a mechanic inside his shop in La Esperanza citadel (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 28 March 2024, in Ayampe (Manabi), around 20 Los Choneros gang members entered a hotel, tied up, and blindfolded six adult and five children, and abducted them. Five people were shot and killed and their bodies were left at the Ayampe locality, on the highway to Santa Elena. The children were found after the assailants released them. Police suspect the assailants confused the victims with rival gang members, with whom they are disputing territory control in the city. 5 fatalities.

On 28 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), residents of the Paraiso de la Flor sector captured and beat up a man who had been attempting to rob a woman. The man stabbed a child of the woman. Police officers rescued the man.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2023-); MRC: Citizen Revolution Movement; Taxi/Bus Drivers (Ecuador)
notes: Around 29 March 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Samborondon canton (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals killed an alternate councilor and his body was found in a cocoa farm. The victim had been kidnapped the previous day alongside a taxi driver. The kidnappers demanded money in exchange for the victim's release. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 March 2024, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants that arrived in a car shot and killed three people who were inside a house in El Bosque citadel. In Los Helechos sector, unidentified armed assailants in a car shot and killed a man (drive-by). The man had a criminal sector in robbery and weapons possession. 4 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 29 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), several unidentified armed assailants in a car (described as hitmen) shot and killed four people, including an off-duty police officer, in the La Pradera neighborhood in a drive-by attack. Three people resulted injured by stray bullets and were taken to hospital. The perpetrators fired at least 60 times. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 5 fatalities.
On 29 March 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man outside a barber shop in El Guayacan citadel (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 29 March 2024, in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants in a car shot and killed a man in La Caraguay sector (drive-by). The victim had been in a rehabilitation clinic for drug addicts. Also, unidentified armed assailants in two pick-up trucks shot and killed a man in Las Vegas sector (drive-by). 2 fatalities.

On 29 March 2024, around the 26KM of the Milagro - Duran highway (coded to Duran, Guayas), two Peruvian merchants were kidnapped when they were headed to Guayaquil. The kidnapped were a couple, but the husband was released, and a family member of the wife that lived in Huaquillas was called by the kidnappers to demand a ransom for the release of the merchant. The woman was released after an operative and clash of police forces the following day where three people were arrested (coded separately).

On 29 March 2024, in Anconcito (Santa Elena), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a underage boy in Luis Celleri neighborhood (drive-by). The boy was the son of a local fisherman. 1 fatality.

On 29 March 2024, in Puebloviejo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot at a man who was spectating a volleyball game (drive-by). The man shielded himself with another man, who was killed by the gunshots. The assailants then left. 1 fatality.
On 29 March 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man that was walking to a local shop in La Uva sector, Caracol parish (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 30 March 2024, on the highway that connects Quevedo with Valencia (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants kidnapped a woman and demanded a ransom for her release (extortion). After police officers tarted an investigation, the kidnappers left the woman in Valencia canton on 2 April 2024.

source: El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Machala Movil
notes: On 30 March 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), military officers arrested the leader of Los Lobos gang in Santa Ana parish after carrying out an operative. They also arrested seven other gang members. They seized several explosive materials, seven cellphones, 145 munitions, three long scope guns, three guns, two revolvers and a carabine.
On 30 March 2024, in Daule (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a rice field at Musara sector (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 30 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), around four unidentified heavily armed assailants (described as hitmen) in a car and a motorcycle, got off their vehicles and opened fire dozens of times against a group of people in the Mariuxi Febres Cordero neighborhood, in the south Guasmo sector. Nine people were shot and killed, and ten others were injured and taken to hospital. Police stated that only one of the injured victims had criminal records for theft in 2017. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 9 fatalities.

On 30 March 2024, in Colon (Portoviejo, Manabi), at least two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle and in a car shot and killed a man in a drive-by attack. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 30 March 2024 (as reported), in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed suspects shot and killed three people in the Ceibo Renacer sector. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 31 March 2024, in Manta (Manabi), several unidentified armed assailants shot at a group or residents of Eloy Alfaro parish when they were outside a house. The attack left one resident killed and three injured. 1 fatality.

On 31 March 2024, in Atacames (Esmeraldas), unidentified armed assailants shot at a fisher in Canaima Coral sector. The fisher was shot twice on the head, and he was taken to a hospital. There were no casualties.

On 31 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in Pablo Neruda sector (drive-by). The man was a tricycle cab driver. 1 fatality.

On 31 March 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants in a car shot at least seven times and killed a man at Guayaquil Avenue in the El Puno sector (drive-by). They later abandoned the car and fled. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 31 March 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces found and seized 1 and a half tons of cocaine that was hidden in a truck transporting bananas. The drug was found in the Mapasingue sector, and the truck was abandoned.

On 1 April 2024, in Cuenca (Azuay), residents of Bueran and Macchu Picchu streets in Totoracocha sector captured and beat up two Colombian men that had been demanding extortion money to them. They were later turned to the police. There were no casualties.

On 1 April 2024, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on motorcycles shot at a group of residents that were outside a house at Elsa Bucaram sector (drive-by). The attack left two people killed and two injured. 2 fatalities.

On 1 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed three men who were on a cab leaving a music concert in the Portete district (drive-by). The men had a criminal record, and police mentioned the attack might be motivated by a settlement of scores. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 1 April 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car, likely hitmen, shot and killed three men in a drive-by shooting in the 20 de Mayo neighbourhood. Another person was injured and the suspects fired at least 20 times with pistols and rifles. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 1 April 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants in a car shot and killed a man in the 24 de Mayo parish (drive-by). Police officers claimed the attack might be linked to a settlement of scores. 1 fatality.

On 2 April 2024, near Quevedo (Manabi), three men and one woman intercepted a car traveling to Canalito and kidnapped an elderly woman while she was with her family. The woman's hands were tied and then she was placed into the trunk of the vehicle. The perpetrators warned that they would demand ransom for the woman's release and the woman was consequently searched for by the police and found alive without signs of violence.

On 2 April 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), four unidentified armed assailants on motorcycles kidnapped a car sale businessman in his own car. The car was found abandoned on the Perimetral highway. After five hours, the man was released in the El Pedregal sector in Santa Rosa canton. The reason behind the kidnapping is under investigation.

On 2 April 2024, in Daule (Guayas), six unidentified armed assailants on a pick-up truck shot and killed a man in the parking lot of a shopping mall in La Aurora parish after getting out of the vehicle and approaching the victim on foot. The man had a criminal record for gun possession, robbery, and illicit possession. 1 fatality.
Around 2 April 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and his body was found in Janeth Toral cooperative near a river, covered in a white bed sheet. 1 fatality.

On 2 April 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on two cars intercepted a man at Viva Alfaro parish, forced him inside one of the cars, shot him on the head and left him on the highway to Valencia. He was taken to Sagrado Corazon de Jesus hospital, where he died. 1 fatality.

On 2 April 2024, in Mocache (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on two trucks kidnapped an off-duty police officer and a woman. The woman is the sister of a former worker of the local government.
tags: women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

notes: On 2 April 2024, in San Jacinto de Yaguachi (Guayas), six unidentified armed assailants on three motorcycles shot at people who were spectating sports (drive-by). Two men were injured in the attack. There were no fatalities.
On 3 April 2024, in Daule (Guayas), police forces carried out an operative and arrested the head of a drug dealings and other criminal activities network. Another nine people were also arrested.

On 3 April 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man who was hired to clean the streets of the Los Helechos sector while he was working. The man had received threats previously. 1 fatality.
On 3 April 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants shot at least 20 times at a man and killed him in the Jocay neighborhood. 1 fatality.

On 3 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), residents of 17 and Medardo Angel Silva streets captured and beat up a man that had killed a merchant during a robbery with an accomplice. The man was later turned to military officers. There were no fatalities.

On 4 April 2024, in El Empalme (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot at a group of residents at La Coromoto sector. The attack left three killed and five injured. 3 fatalities.

On 4 April 2024, El Rodeo (Manabi) in unidentified armed men (described as criminals) on a motorcycle shot a man outside El Rodeo prison and then fled the scene towards Riochico parish (drive-by) on the El Rodeo-Riochico road. One police officer was hit by a stray bullet leading to the mobilization of police officers. Police arrested one person and seized one abandoned motorcycle and one vehicle. 2 injuries.

On 4 April 2024, around Carchi province (coded Tulcan), two army soldiers shot and injured a man at a weapons control checkpoint in the La Paz sector. The victim was shot while lying faced down on the ground. Both soldiers were arrested. There were no fatalities.

On 5 April 2024, in Machala (El Oro), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle came to a barbershop at Puerto Bolivar parish, where one of the assailants went inside, shot and killed a man inside and fled. 1 fatality.

On 5 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants shot at a merchant and his family at Puente Lucia sector when he was closing his shop. The merchant was killed and three family members were injured. The family mention that they had been demanded money for extortion and had paid, and they were still attacked. 1 fatality.

Around 5 April 2024 (as reported), in Atacames (Esmeraldas), a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied up and with torture signs at Galera road. The man had been missing for five days. 1 fatality.
On 5 April 2024, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a merchant of the Bahia de Guayaquil market (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador en Vivo; El Universo (Ecuador); Huffingtonpost Spain; Primicias
notes: On 5 April 2024, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), police forces entered by force the Mexico embassy, and arrested a former vice-president of Ecuador. He had been sentenced to prison and was carrying out a sentence, but was released with parole, and took refuge in the embassy asking for asylum. Earlier that day, the president of Mexico had given the asylum, but the president of Ecuador, Daniel Noboa, claimed that they would not allow the former vice-president to leave the country. During the police incursion, the officers hit the head of the embassy, hit him in the eye and threw him to the ground, injuring him. While being kept by the police, the former vice-president tried to kill himself with an overdose of medicine. There were no fatalities.

Around 5 April 2024 (as reported), in Coronel Marcelino Mariduena (Guayas), three men were killed and their bodies were found inside a car at El Paraiso sector, with gun shots wounds. There was a note that claimed that they were robbers and alerting other robbers from carrying out criminal activity in their sector. 3 fatalities.

Around 5 April 2024 (as reported), in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), a man was killed and his body was found in a street with a gun shot wound on his head and tied up. The body was left by unidentified assailants on a car. 1 fatality.
Property destruction: On 5 April 2024, in Puerto Rico (Manabi), military officers found and seized an illegal landing pad that was used for transporting drugs.

On 5 April 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), armed men arrived in a car and one man got out and opened fire at a man inside his pool together with his family in Las Cabras. The parents and two children were injured as a result. The attack is being linked to extortion payments after the father received threats of extortion payments for having a pool. There were no fatalities.
On 5 April 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants in a pick-up truck shot and killed a man that was outside his house in Los Laureles citadel (drive-by). 1 fatality.
Around 6 April 2024 (as reported), in Samborondon (Guayas), a man was killed and his body was found floating on a river. The body had been tied up and had violence marks. 1 fatality.

On 6 April 2024, in Pillaro (Tungurahua), unidentified armed assailants in a car shot at a roastery restaurant at Monsenor Abel Vasconez and Ruminahui streets (drive-by). The owner had received moments before a threatening call. No one was injured or killed. There were no casualties.
On 7 April 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), three Colombian armed assailants kidnapped a man. Police forces rescued the man and arrested the assailants the next day.

On 7 April 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants in a car shot and killed two civilians inside a taxi cab near El Guabito bridge (drive-by). The taxi cab driver was also killed. Minutes after the killing, a car was reported burning. 3 fatalities.
