On 7 April 2024, in Vinces (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot at civilians at the local malecon in Balzar parish (drive-by). During the attack, two civilians were killed, one of them was a politician and a business owner. It was later known that the other man was the one targeted, and the business owner was a collateral victim. 2 fatalities.
On 7 April 2024, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man at Abel Gilbert (drive-by). The man had a criminal record. 1 fatality.

Around 7 April 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of Arenillas canton (El Oro), two people were killed and their bodies were burned inside a car and found at the entrance of the city. 2 fatalities.

Defusal: On 7 April 2024, in Machachi (Pichincha), police and military forces seized ten boxes of explosives being transported in an provincial bus. They carried out a controlled explosion successfully.

Property destruction: On 7 April 2024, in the rural area of the Las Pinas municipality (Manta, Manabi), police forces seized two tons of narcotics hidden inside three coves in a house. All evidence is suspected to belong to a drug trafficking group and the drugs were divided in a thousand 2kg blocks ready to be shipped. There were no arrests.
On 8 April 2024, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on motorcycles shot and killed a man that was driving his car in El Condor sector. 1 fatality.

On 8 April 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot at the house of a construction materials shop owner and left an intimidation note (drive-by). The shop owner had been victim of extorsion months before and had been threatened with a dynamite to pay, but the extortionists were arrested. There was an audience to sentence the extortionists, and the family members of them had tried to convince the shop owner not to go to the audience. The attack was later that day to intimidate the shop owner even more. There were no casualties.
On 8 April 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man that was outside his house (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 8 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a couple with a child who were driving a motorcycle in Eloy Alfaro cooperative (drive-by). The man and the woman were killed, but the child was unharmed. 2 fatalities.

On 9 April 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), two armed assailants kidnapped an informal taxi cab driver while pretending to be clients. The man was tied up and taken to a house at the southeast of the city. Police forces intervened, arrested both men and rescued the driver.
On 9 April 2024, in Bahia de Caraquez (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants in a car shot and killed a lawyer that was driving through Azcazubi and Morales streets (drive-by). 1 fatality.
On 9 April 2024, in Naranjal (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man that was walking through Villa Nueva sector (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 9 April 2024 (as reported), in Babahoyo (Los Rios), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in a river. The man had been abducted the previous day by three men and shot in the leg the moment he was kidnapped. His body was found with the gun shot wound in his leg, and nine stab wounds in his thorax. 1 fatality.

On 10 April 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a car in the Jocay neighbourhood. The car crashed into the wall of a school after the attack, but the man was already dead. The man was the former director of the municipal transit entity. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 April 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unknown armed assailants (described as criminals) arrived aboard a vehicle and opened fire(drive-by) at two men more than 20 times in the neighborhood Nueva Esperanza. Both died as a result. 2 fatalities.

On 10 April 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), at least two unidentified armed assailants in a car shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Boyaca and Azuay streets. The assailants stopped the car, one of them came out of the car, shot the man four times, and fled. The man later died in hospital. 1 fatality.

On 10 April 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), three unidentified armed assailants in a taxi cab shot at two men at Vicente Macias street (drive-by). The attack left one of the men dead and the other injured. 1 fatality.
Around 10 April 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Letamendi (Guayas), a man was killed and his body was found on the Salado river at La Chala sector. His body was tied up. 1 fatality.

On 10 April 2024, in La T (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed two men who were in a car that was driving through the highway to Salitre (drive-by). 2 fatalities.
On 10 April 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle and a car shot and killed a man in La Puntilla sector (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), dialysis clinics patients, workers, and owners blocked the highway to Buena Fe with burning tires as a demonstration to demand payments of the owed money that the central government has not paid for ten months.

On 11 April 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), several merchants captured a man accused of theft, tied him to a pole and beat him in an attempted lynching. Police officers arrived at the site to arrest the man.

On 11 April 2024, near Quevedo (Los Rios), patients and doctors demonstrated and blocked the Quevedo-Buena Fe highway with tires set on fire, stretchers and wheelchairs at the exit of Quevedo to denounce the lack of access to dialysis treatment after three days without access to dialysis treatment.
On 11 April 2024, in Duran (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man in Hector Cobos cooperative. The man was a military officer that was with a medical leave. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno (Guayas), four unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle and a car came to a field in Cristo del Consuelo sector and shot at a group of residents (drive-by). Three men died instantly, and two others died after being taken to a hospital. 5 fatalities.
On 11 April 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants shot and killed two people that were inside a car at a gas station. They were shot more than 30 times. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 11 April 2024, in Baeza (Napo), police officers seized a truck in which they found one and a half tons of cocaine that was hidden inside. The man driving the truck was arrested.

On 12 April 2024, in Pilahuin (Tungurahua), Indigenous residents captured a man that had robbed a cellphone in the center of the city and carried out an Indigenous justice punishment. He was beaten up with nettle and thrown cold water. He was later released after being advised and warned not to carry out criminal activity again.
On 12 April 2024, in Anconcito (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants entered the fishing port offices, shot and killed the administrator of the port and fled. 1 fatality.
On 12 April 2024, in Daule (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting on the Olmedo - Colimes highway, in the Esquel de Abajo sector. 1 fatality.

On 12 April 2024, in El Empalme (Guayas), unidentified armed assailants shot and killed an informal taxi driver and a passenger inside the taxi cab on Quevedo Avenue. The attack was presumed to be against the informal taxi driver since he had a criminal record (unspecified). 2 fatalities.

On 12 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle killed one person in a drive-by shooting at a bar in the Mucho Lote 2. Four others were injured. 1 fatality.

On 12 April 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot at people outside a nightclub in the Abdon Calderon neighborhood (drive-by). Two men were killed in the attack. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Ecuador (2023-); Shuar Indigenous Group (Ecuador)
notes: On 12 April 2024, in Sucua (Morona Santiago), a group of Shuar Indigenous citizens followers of the former president of the Shuar Federation Government Council (FICSH) used rocks and Molotov bombs to remove the people inside the FICSH offices including the new president. Police forces intervened to stop them from removing the people inside of the council. This happened after the former president was destitute after he signed an agreement with a mining company.

On 13 April 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle and in a car shot at three elderly citizens in a drive-by shooting in the El Orito neighborhood when they were outside a house chatting. The three citizens were injured. There were no fatalities.

On 13 April 2024, in Nueva Loja (Sucumbios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting at a park. Also, an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a car and several motorcycles killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Cisne neighborhood. 2 fatalities.

On 14 April 2024, in Quito - Los Chillos (Pichincha), more than 150 residents captured, tied up. and beat up three men that they accused of being robbers. The residents claimed that the three men were driving a car and robbing pedestrians that were alone to rob them. The three were injured and then rescued by police officers. The residents also damaged the car the men used.

Defusal: On 14 April 2024, in Tulcan (Carchi), residents of San Cristobal neighborhood reported that they found two explosive artifacts placed on an abandoned truck. Military officers came to the sector, and removed the explosives. They were taken to a Weapons control facility in the north of the city. The artifacts were identified as Proximity Mines.

On 14 April 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle came to a restaurant, one of the assailants came close to the establishment and shot and killed a man, and later fled. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 14 April 2024, in San Lorenzo de Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), military and anti-narcotics police forces found and destroyed a processing plant for drugs. The plant was constructed in Mina de Piedra sector, in front of Mira river. It produced around 5 to 10 tons of cocaine each week.
On 14 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a car killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Mapasingue sector. 1 fatality.

On 14 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Letamendi (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting outside a mechanic shop located at Gallegos Lara and Yolanda Sandoval streets. The victim had a criminal record. 1 fatality.
On 14 April 2024, in Vinces (Los Rios), two hooded unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man who was cutting his hair in a barber shop in the Nicaragua sector. 1 fatality.

On 15 April 2024, in Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Primavera 1 sector, when he was walking to pharmacy. 1 fatality.

On 16 April 2024, in Naranjal (Guayas), around 20 residents burned tires outside the electricity substation as a demonstration to voice their grievances about the lack of electricity service pro more than 20 hours.

Defusal: On 16 April 2024, in Zaruma (El Oro), military forces found 160 explosives that are commonly used for illegal mining operations. The explosives were seized and taken to El Oro Gun Control Center.

On 16 April 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a hair-stylist and LGBT member at Homero Lopez street. The LGBT resident was called on his cellphone and when he left his house he was shot. 1 fatality.
On 16 April 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle killed an dentist in a drive-by shooting in La Libertad. 1 fatality.

On 16 April 2024, in Petrillo (Guayas), an armed assailant shot and killed a man inside a pharmacy at La Primavera citadel. The assailant shot the man on the back a dozen times, and shot at his head, back, and thorax. The assailant fled getting on a motorcycle that was driven by another man. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Alianza: Ponceno Historic Change Alliance; Government of Ecuador (2023-); Private Security Forces (Ecuador)
notes: On 17 April 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), at least eight unidentified heavily-armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed the local mayor (Alianza party) of the canton in a drive-by shooting in the Ciudadela Nueva Ponce. Two of his security guards were also shot dead while jogging. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 17 April 2024 (as reported), in Quevedo (Los Rios), a man was killed and his body was found dismembered at the shore of the Quevedo River in the Montoya sector with several knife cuts around his body and with out his head. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 17 April 2024, in Puerto Cayo (Manabi), military forces found and destroyed a clandestine landing strip, that after an investigation they claimed was used for transporting drugs.

Around 17 April 2024 (as reported), in Pilahuin (Tungurahua), a man was killed and his body was found in San Isidro hill. His hands and feet were tied up and he had several wounds from being beat up. The man was killed in another location and later brought to the sector and left there. 1 fatality.

On 17 April 2024, in El Arenal (Bolivar), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants kidnapped two men from the Ambato - Guaranda highway and took them to an unknown location. They demanded a ransom to release both men. Police officers rescued the men two days later.

On 19 April 2024, in Tulcan (Carchi), police officers who were alerted about a contraband truck coming from Colombia where attacked by residents of the sector with bats, sticks, and other objects to stop them from taking the merchandize and taking the drivers after they resisted the officers from inspecting the truck. They also burned down the police car of the officers and later fled.

On 19 April 2024, in Jipijapa (Manabi), citizens captured a man accused of assaulting and robbing a taxi driver by three armed individuals and beat one of the men in an attempted lynching. Police officers arrived at the scene and intervened.

On 19 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), armed men described as hitmen chased a man and shot him to death in Pascuales. The victim had a criminal record and police suspect that the crime was linked to a dispute between gangs. One girl was hit by a stray bullet and died. 2 fatalities.

On 19 April 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man during a wake of a friend who was killed the previous day (coded separately) and was involved in a conflict between gangs. The man was shot more than 50 times (likely execution). In another event in the Los Helechos sector, an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man. The man received more than 30 shots (likely execution). 2 fatalities.

On 19 April 2024, in Valencia (Los Rios), an unknown number of armed assailants kidnapped a farmer from the Gallo Giro sector. They demanded a ransom for his release. Police officers rescued the farmer two days later and arrested three people responsible of the kidnapping. The farmer was tied up and blindfolded.

assoc_actor_2: CREO: Creating Opportunities (Ecuador); Government of Ecuador (2023-)
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 19 April 2024, in Portovelo (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed the mayor (CREO) in a drive-by shooting on El Artesano Avenue, El Oro neighbourhood. The police arrested both suspects on 7 June and on 4 June 2025 they were sentenced to 34 years in prison. The motivation was because the mayor refused to cooperate with gangs linked to illegal mining. The authorship is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 April 2024, in Arenillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and his son while they were fixing a motorcycle in the La Estacion neighborhood (drive-by). 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 20 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police officers seized 2,5 tons of cocaine that were destined to be transported to Spain, after they detected the drugs in an export container in a port in the Isla Trinitaria sector. The legal representative of the export company and the driver of the truck carrying the container were arrested.

On 21 April 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), prisoners attempted to initiate a riot which ended in the injury of four inmates upon which military and police officers arrived at the prison to restore order.

source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 21 April 2024, in Jipijapa (Manabi), armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed the off-duty director of the prison El Rodeo in Portoviejo canton in a drive-by shooting and shot him to death and injured the man's wife, while they were at a restaurant in front of the Santa Monica Church. The victim was also a lawyer and had been prison director of the Jipijapa prison. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Property destruction: On 21 April 2024, at 110 nautical miles from the shore of San Cristobal island (coded to Coast of Puerto Baquerizo Moreno, Galapagos), military forces seized a boat in front of the coasts of the islands that was transporting a 1.5 tons of drugs valued in 31.5 millions USD. The three men driving the boat were arrested.

On 21 April 2024, in El Vergel (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed two men who were walking near the multiple sports complex (drive-by). One victim had been threatened by Los Lobos gang, who likely perpetrated the attack. 2 fatalities.

On 21 April 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man in the Amazonas neighborhood near a sports field. The assailants shot at the man more than 20 times (likely execution). 1 fatality.

On 21 April 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a car shot and killed three men who were outside their house at Vicente Veliz citadel (drive-by). 3 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 21 April 2024, in the rural area of the Las Pinas municipality (Manta, Manabi), police forces seized nine cars, three motorbikes and falsified documentation in the El Aromo sector. All evidence is suspected to belong to a drug trafficking group.

On 21 April 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was inside his house in the La Union parish (drive-by). During the attack, a stray bullet killed an elderly man. 2 fatalities.

Around 22 April 2024 (as reported), in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), two men were killed and their dismembered body were placed inside a bag, and left on the Yanaconas street, in the El Condado sector, by a man on a motorcycle. According to authorities, these two bodies are suspected to be linked to recent threats to the attorney general. 2 fatalities.
On 22 April 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed two men who were outside a house in the 9 de Mayo neighborhood (drive-by). 2 fatalities.

On 22 April 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a car killed two men who were on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting near the Ecologica route. 2 fatalities.
On 22 April 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a car shot at a group of people at Tarqui parish (drive-by). Four people were killed. 4 fatalities.

On 22 April 2024, in Puerto Quito (Pichincha), after an investigation and operations carried out by police officers for several months, the leader of Los Lobos gang was arrested in a farm. Another four people were arrested that were with him.

On 23 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified gang members shot and killed a man at Las Acacias citadel. The victim had refused to sell drugs for their gang and that is why he was shot. 1 fatality.

On 23 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting at 47 and Rosendo Aviles streets. 1 fatality.

On 23 April 2024, in Milagro (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants entered a private house in the Puertas del Sol sector and shot and killed a couple. The man was a worker at the Ecuador Transit Commission and the woman had a criminal record for murder. 2 fatalities.

On 23 April 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in an alley behind the Pablo Anibal Vela school, at El Floron 7 sector (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 24 April 2024, in San Rafael (Carchi), a group of residents of La Caldera community captured, beat up, and burned a man who had robbed avocados from a farm. The man died from the burns. 1 fatality.
On 24 April 2024, in Manta (Manabi), one unidentified armed assailant entered LAMS health center, shot and killed the owner of the health center. 1 fatality.

On 24 April 2024, in El Empalme (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a Venezuelan man inside a strip club. He was shot five times in different parts of his body. Police forces mentioned that the attacks might be linked to relations with criminal organizations. 1 fatality.

On 24 April 2024, in El Empalme (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a couple who where on a motorcycle on the Guayas - El Empalme highway. Another man was killed on the same highway moments later. Police forces mentioned that the attacks might be linked to relations with criminal organizations. 3 fatalities.

On 24 April 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants in a car killed a man and injured a woman on the highway to Manta, close to the Portovial municipal agency (drive-by). The woman died days later in hospital due to the injuries. 2 fatalities.
Around 25 April 2024 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), an elderly woman was killed and her hands were tied up inside the bathroom of a store. 1 fatality.
Property destruction: On 26 April 2024, in the 24 km of the highway Tena - Coca (Napo), police forces seized a truck with a ton of cocaine hidden inside corn bags. Two drivers were arrested.

On 27 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), three unidentified armed assailants came in front of a clandestine addiction treatment center in the Batallon del Suburbio sector, two of them got off the car and shot at people that were at the entrance of the center. Three people were killed and one person injured. The attack is suspected to have been carried out by a recently created gang, called Nueva Generacion Suburbio. 3 fatalities.

On 27 April 2024, in El Aromo (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants killed two men by burning them inside their car. Both victims had been captured, tied up, beat up, and later burned the same day. One of them was an informal cab driver. 2 fatalities.

On 27 April 2024, in El Empalme (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on motorcycles stopped outside a house in the Coromoto sector, and shot at people that were outside a house in a drive-by shooting. The attack left two killed and one injured. 2 fatalities.

On 27 April 2024, in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed two taxi cab drivers in the 12 de Agosto sector, close to a synthetic grass field (drive-by). Both of them were outside a house celebrating one of the driver's birthday. 2 fatalities.

On 27 April 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on motorcycles shot at two men in the Munoz Rubio sector (drive-by). The men were brothers, one was killed and the other injured. 1 fatality.
Around 27 April 2024 (as reported), in Babahoyo (Los Rios), a man was killed and his body was found burned inside a house in the El Topacio sector. 1 fatality.

On 28 April 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), two armed assailants entered a ceviche restaurant inside La Cuadra shopping mall at El Guayacan parish. Inside they shot and killed a former candidate for Miss Ecuador and model. The woman had been mentioned to be involved with a drug dealer, mentioned in chats with his lawyer, that are being investigated in Metastasis case carried out by the State Attorney office. The woman's boyfriend was there during the attack but he was unharmed. 1 fatality.
tags: women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

notes: On 28 April 2024, in Daule (Guayas), three unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot an killed a man at Juan Bautista citadel (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 29 April 2024 (as reported), in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped two people and held them for ransom. The victims were held hostage and rescued by the police on 29 April in Quevedo. There is no further information available.

On 29 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot at a shop in the Guasmo sector. The attack was pointed to be part of an extorsion, because the assailants left a note that demanded money the shop. During the attack, a woman was killed by a stray bullet. 1 fatality.

On 29 April 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a car shot at people that were walking in a park at Floresta 2 near a school (drive-by). A woman was killed and two others were injured. 1 fatality.

Around 29 April 2024 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), a man was killed and his body was found floating on the Teaone River, with his hands and feet tied up, his mouth covered with duct-tape. 1 fatality.

On 29 April 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants shot at a Venezuelan citizen outside a transport cooperative, at Teniente Cordovez and 19 de Octubre streets. The man was injured and was taken to hospital. There were no fatalities.

On 29 April 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot at a group of friends that were eating and drinking at a restaurant in the La Union parish (drive-by). The attack left two men killed and another injured. 2 fatalities.

On 29 April 2024, in Chone (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle fired shots at a couple in a drive-by shooting in the El Bejuco sector. Both the man and the woman were injured and taken to a hospital. The woman was pregnant.

Around 30 April 2024 (as reported), in La Troncal (Canar), a man was killed and his decapitated head was found outside the police headquarters inside a bag. A message was found next to the head with a threat from a criminal group. 1 fatality.

Around 30 April 2024 (as reported), in Ancon (Santa Elena), a man was shot and killed with gunshots to the shoulder and head and his body found in a kneeling position (likely execution) on the Tres Cruces road. According to the police the victim was tortured before being killed. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 30 April 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), a woman who had been missing since 12 February 2024 was found dead with signs of torture. According to her family she was shot, set on fire, her hands were tied and she had acid poured on her face. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
On 30 April 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 April 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), three unidentified hooded and armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two brothers inside their private residence in a drive-by shooting in the Arena y Sol neighbourhood. The victims did not have police records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 30 April 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Mindo municipality (San Miguel de los Bancos, Pichincha), at least five suspected members of the Los Lobos gang abducted six members of the same family, of whom one was a child. The victims were held inside an inn for 30 days and the suspects demanded $500,000 for their release. On 30 May, police forces rescued the victims unharmed and arrested five suspects, two of them adolescents. Police seized two firearms, four cell phones, and two machetes. There were no casualties.

On 30 April 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unidentified armed assailant shot and killed a man inside a bus going through the La Union - Babahoyo highway, near Caracol parish. The assailant left the bus and was picked up by a man on a motorcycle instantly and fled. 1 fatality.

On 1 May 2024, in Buenos Aires (Cuenca, Azuay), police forces shot and killed a man during an operation between 33rd and Brasil Streets. According to the police, the officers were shot at and returned fire; however, the victim's family claimed the victim was not a criminal and only ran because he was scared. One suspect was arrested. 1 fatality.
Around 1 May 2024 (as reported), in Daule (Guayas), an informal taxi driver was killed and his body found on a road between Villa Bonita and Daule. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unidentified armed group fired shots in the Guerreros del Fortin sector. One person was shot dead and another injured. According to the police, the shooting was related to drug trafficking disputes. 1 fatality.

On 1 May 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants captured an informal taxicab driver, tied up his hands and feet, and strangled with a rope and covering his face with a bag and killing him in the Villa Bonita citadel. 1 fatality.

Around 1 May 2024 (as reported), in La Troncal (Canar), a man was killed and his head found in front of a police station between 25 de Agosto and 13 Streets. According to the police unidentified men in a motorbike threw the severed head and drove away. The head was left with a sign threatening the police. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man at Los Angeles cooperative, in Isla Trinitaria (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 1 May 2024, in Jaramijo (Manabi), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the San Martin neighbourhood. The victim's brother was shot and injured. The fatal victim had a police record for murder. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Other: On 1 May 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), president Daniel Noboa signed a presidential decree 250 to implement a state of emergency to allow police and military officers to intervene in hostilities in the provinces of El Oro, Guayas, Los Rios, Manabi and Santa Elena due to the security problems and the persistence of the internal armed conflict. The duration of the state of emergency will be 60 days. There will be no curfew.

On 1 May 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Juan X. Marcos and Isaias Chopites Avenues. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 2 May 2024 (month of), in Estero Lagarto (Vinces, Los Rios), a farmer was killed and his dismembered body found in a state of decomposition tied up on top of a garbage area. According to the victim's family, he was missing since 28 April. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 May 2024, in Jaramijo (Manabi), four armed assailants kidnapped a woman from a car when she was leaving a gym in the city centre. Police forces later rescued the woman and arrested the four assailants. One of the assailants is Venezuelan.

On 2 May 2024, in Cuenca (Azuay), police forces captured the leader of a unnamed criminal group, who had an active arrest warrant. The gang leader had an arrest warrant after he did not fulfill the order of a judge to present himself periodically after benefiting from an habeas corpus.

On 2 May 2024, in Febres Cordero (Babahoyo, Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man with 28 gunshots in the Los Laureles sector. The victim had two police records from 2021 for drug trafficking and possession of firearms in 2022. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 2 May 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Vinces municipality (Los Rios), a person was killed and their dismembered and beheaded body was found inside a jute bag on Vinces-Isla de Bejucal Road, in the Candilejo area. Authorities were not able to define if it was a female or male victim. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 May 2024, in Colon (Portoviejo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car and three motorbikes shot and killed two people in a drive-by shooting. Three people were injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 2 May 2024, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), a group of residents of the Monjas sector captured, hanged from a arc, and beat up a man that was accused of being a rapist. Police forces intervened and rescued the man.

On 2 May 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman in the Barreiro Nuevo Sector. The victim was hit at least 14 times and she had a police record from 2024 for possession of narcotics. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 3 May 2024 (as reported), around Santa Elena district (coded to Ancon, Santa Elena), two women were tortured and killed, and their bodies were found wrapped with plastic, and covered in bed sheets on the Ancon - El Tambo highway. 2 fatalities.

On 3 May 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on motorcycles shot at a group of people in a drive-by shooting in the Nuevo Pilo citadel. The attack left two men killed and a woman injured. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 3 May 2024, in Cuenca (Azuay), police forces seized 4,000 gallons of fuel, 44 gas cylinders and two vehicles during an operation to curb illegal fuel sales. Three suspects were arrested. The same operation was also carried out in the province of Manabi.

Property destruction: On 3 May 2024, in Guayas province (coded to Guayaquil), police forces seized more than 2 million doses of cocaine during an operation to curb drug trafficking in the province. The narcotics were hidden inside a stolen vehicle. One suspect was arrested and the police seized the vehicle, two cell phones and cash. There were no casualties.

Around 3 May 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and his body found in the Canal de la Murte locality, San Ignacio cooperative. It is suspected that a drug trafficking group was behind the killing. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 May 2024, in the rural area of the Quevedo municipality (Los Rios), three unidentified armed individuals abducted a man in an express kidnapping in the 7 de Octubre sector. The suspects asked for U$10,000 for ransom but the police managed to arrest them and rescue the victim unharmed. The three suspects did not have any police records and the police seized several cell phones, four firearms, ammunition, a car, and a motorbike. There were no casualties.

On 4 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a truck driver with five gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the El Ejercito cooperative. The suspects were extortionists and the victim was receiving threats. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Maria Piedad cooperative. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 May 2024, in Eloy Alfaro (Duran, Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man with several gunshots in a drive-by shooting outside a workshop in the Ferroviaria cooperative. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 4 May 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces seized 2 tons of cocaine (at least 2,000 blocks valued at U$ 14 million) hidden behind banana boxes. The shipment was headed to Russia. Two suspects without criminal records were arrested.

Around 4 May 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals killed a man and his body was found handcuffed on the Perimetral Road. The victim was kidnapped alongside his grandson who was rescued by the police. The suspects demanded a large sum of money (around U$100,000.00) as ransom but the victim did not resist the torture. A suspect was arrested on 6 May. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 4 May 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle killed a man and his body was found tied up in the Flor de Bastion sector. The victim had been kidnapped days earlier. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
On 4 May 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), members of the Los Freddys gang abducted two men and asked for ransom in the suburbs of the city. The perpetrators are suspected extortionists.

On 4 May 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed one person and injured two during a funerary ceremony at 9 de Octubre and Manabi intersections. At least seven gunshots were fired and the funeral was held for a man who was killed on 3 May (coded separately). Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 May 2024, in Sangolqui (Ruminahui, Pichincha), two unidentified assailants beat up and killed a man with mental disability. The suspects brought the victim to hospital and were eventually arrested. The victim had signs of torture, was tied up and was a drug user. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 May 2024, in Valencia (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle killed an off-duty Army soldier in a drive-by shooting in the La Union sector. Another off-duty soldier was shot and injured. The suspects fired more than 15 times and used rifles. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 4 May 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), police forces dismantled a drug trafficking ammo and weapon storage centres inside two private residences. A suspect was arrested and the arsenal belonged to Los Lobos gang. Police seized three rifles, three other firearms, one grenade, six ammo feeders, a vehicle and narcotics.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 5 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Fortin Cooperative, Guasmo sector. Two other people, including an adolescent, were shot and injured and at least six gunshots were fired. The victim had a police record from 2022 and the police suspect the killing was a settling of scores. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two suspected members of the Los Lagartos gang on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Cristal cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. The victim was shot several times and at least three gunshots were pointed at the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 5 May 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed two people in a drive-by shooting in the Maria Auxiliadora neighbourhood. At least 13 gunshots were fired. The victims are suspected to be related to a high-profile drug trafficker and leader of Los Choneros, who's a fugitive from justice, but the police have not confirmed it. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 5 May 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a van killed a woman and injured three other people in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
On 5 May 2024, in Quito district (Pichincha), Army forces arrested over 30 members of Los Tiguerones during a birthday celebration. Soldiers seized two firearms.

On 6 May 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of Venezuelan informal merchants clashed with municipal agents and police forces. The merchants were suspectedly not allowing free pedestrian traffic in the area and had taken foot walks and cut off citizen circulation.

On 6 May 2024, in Cotacachi (Imbabura), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle abducted two men and demanded U$50,000 as ransom. The victims were rescued unharmed on 6 May and the suspects arrested in Quevedo. There were no casualties.

Around 6 May 2024 (week of), in Guanujo (Guaranda, Bolivar), three unidentified armed individuals in a van abducted two people. Police forces rescued the victims unharmed and arrested the three suspects after a police chase. There were no casualties.

On 6 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in two cars injured a man in a drive-by shooting on the 31 and Nicolas Augusto Gonzalez intersection. The suspects fired more than 30 gunshots but their target managed to escape. A pedestrian was shot and killed. 1 fatality.

On 6 May 2024, in Nueva Loja (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals abducted a man and kept him inside a house in the Puerto Ecuador neighbourhood. Police seized two stolen vehicles. The suspects demanded a sum of money to release the victim but the police rescued him unharmed on 7 May. There were no arrests. There were no casualties.

On 6 May 2024, in San Lorenzo de Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in front of his commercial establishment in a drive-by shooting. The suspects were suspected extortionists who demanded a 'vacuna' (vaccine type of bribery), a large sum of money. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 May 2024, in San Lorenzo de Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a truck killed two people during a street party in a drive-by shooting in the La Siete neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 6 May 2024 (as reported), in Palenque (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three adolescents and one man and their bodies were found inside bags in the Tres Jaboncillos compound. According to relatives, the victims had just sold a motorbike. Their bodies had cuts, blows and shots and none of the victims had police records. Authorship unknown but the motivation might have been robbery. 4 fatalities.
On 7 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a man was shot in the Guasmo Sur area. Authorship and motivations unknown.

Property destruction: On 7 May 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), police forces dismantled one safe house belonging to the Los Choneros gang. The suspects managed to escape. Police seized two rifles, a large ammount of ammunition, one container with gunpowder, three radio communicators, three portable radios and other materials.

Around 7 May 2024 (as reported), in El Salitre (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a person and their body was found wrapped in three sheets on the La Aurora-Salitre Highway. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
On 7 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in the Bastion Popular sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 7 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces dismantled a drug lab and seized 5.024.500 doses of narcotics (half a ton) in the Guayacanes region. One suspect was arrested and the police seized a vehicle, cell phones and cash.

On 7 May 2024, in San Sebastian del Coca (La Joya de los Sachas, Orellana), three unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Moretal neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 8 May 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces seized one ton of cocaine hidden inside a shipment of cocoa bound to Bulgaria, in Europe. In total there were 20 gunny bags containing 900 packages. Two suspects without police records were arrested during operation 'Poseidon XIII'.

On 8 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces dismantled an armed group specialised in acquiring properties in the Ciudad Victoria, Nueva Prosperina, Ciudad de Dios and Monte Sinai regions for the Los Fatales gang. 10 suspects were arrested (including six gang leaders), 42 houses raided and 13 recovered. According to the police the operation took place after a man was killed for refusing to give away his house to the suspects (coded separately). There were no casualties.

On 8 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of members of the Los Fatales gang shot and killed a man for refusing to vacate his house in the Ciudad Victoria sector. Ten suspects were arrested on 8 May (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 8 May 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Jaime Nebot neighbourhood. The victim's wife was unharmed. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 May 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car killed two Venezuelan citizens in a drive-by shooting on 15th Street and 10th Avenue. The suspects fired at least 20 gunshots and two other people were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 8 May 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), five unidentified hooded and heavily-armed individuals set fire and threw a grenade inside a house in the Amazonas 1 neighbourhood. The family was left unharmed. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

Around 8 May 2024 (as reported), in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his body was found in the Nuevo Pilo estuary. The body showed signs of torture. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 8 May 2024, in the rural area of the Las Pinas municipality (Manta, Manabi), Army forces seized firearms, a large amount of explosives and exotic animals in the Pacoche locality. It is suspected that three private residences in the area were used as logistics and planning centres for drug trafficking groups.

Around 8 May 2024 (between 8 - 9 May), off the Coast of Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three men after throwing them into the sea from a boat. It is suspected that the attack was related to drug trafficking disputes. Authorship unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 8 May 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed and hooded individuals blew up a dock in the Amazonas 1 neighbourhood. The suspects arrived on a boat and fled after the attack. The attack caused structural damages to the establishment.

Around 8 May 2024 (as reported), in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his body was found with signs of torture in the Munoz Rubio citadel. The victim had been missing for three days. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 May 2024, in San Jacinto de Yaguachi (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals abducted three people in an express kidnapping, demanding U$80,000.00 as ransom. Police forces rescued the victims unharmed and arrested both suspects on 10 May. Police seized a firearm, two cell phones, and two motorbikes. There were no casualties.

On 9 May 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), a group of patients and health workers burned tires and marched on Quito Avenue due to the lack of supplies and medications in two dialysis clinics. The claim made by patients, doctors and dialysis clinic workers is the million-dollar payment that the government owes them.

assoc_actor_2: Labor Group (Ecuador); MRC: Citizen Revolution Movement; Private Security Forces (Ecuador)
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Prensa Chimborazo; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 9 May 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car killed the security guard and the driver of a city councillor (MRC) in a drive-by shooting in the Santa Monica neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 9 May 2024, in the Coast of Puerto Lopez (Manabi), seven heavily-armed individuals, suspected pirates, attacked a civilian boat near Salango Island. All seven suspects were arrested by Navy soldiers. Police seized six mobile terminals, tools, and firearms. There were no casualties.

Around 9 May 2024 (as reported), in El Guabo (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals stabbed and killed a female adolescent and her body was found on the Bajo Alto beach. The victim's body showed signs of torture. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), seven unidentified armed individuals placed an explosive artefact in a commercial establishment located in the Nueva Prosperina sector and fired shots to pressure the owner to give them money. The seven extortionists were arrested. There were no casualties.

Around 9 May 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals killed a person and their dismembered body was found in the Canal de la Muerte area. The limbs were in two bags and the torso was found in the open. Police suspect the killing is related to drug trafficking disputes. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 9 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces dismantled a drug lab in the Flor de Bastion region. Five suspects were arrested. Two pamphlets with extortion threats, narcotics, three dynamite sticks, firearms and other evidence were seized.
Property destruction: On 9 May 2024, around Puerto Baquerizo Moreno (San Cristobal, Galapagos), Navy forces seized 1.5 tons of drugs in 38 packages. There were no arrests.

Property destruction: On 9 May 2024, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), police forces dismantled a drug trafficking safe house on Hermanos Utreras and Gonzalo Zaldumbide Streets. Two suspects were arrested and the police seized narcotics and various stolen objects.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Prensa Chimborazo
notes: On 10 May 2024, in the rural area of the Guayaquil canton (Guayas), police forces arrested 34 members of the Los Aguilas gang (including a leader of Los Choneros Gang and other high-value targets) during a party on Guayaquil-Playas Highway, in the Chongon region, at San Andres farm. At least 300 people were present. Amongst the suspects arrested is the son of an ex-president of Ecuador who was using an electronic ankle bracelet. Other suspects arrested had several police records for possession of illegal firearms, drug trafficking, theft, illicit enrichment and illegal association. Police seized 34 pistols, three carbines, four rifles, 1,306 cartridges of ammunition, 14 communication radios, one ballistic vest, 208 cell phones, a submachine gun, cash and high-end vehicles. The leader of Los Choneros Gang was released from prison on 25 July.

Around 10 May 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals killed two people and their dismembered bodies were found in the Canal de la Muerte region. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 10 May 2024, around Machala (El Oro), police forces dismantled a private property used to store heavy weapons by the Los Lobos Gang. Police seized firearms, cartridges, three ammo feeders, and other evidence. Six suspects were arrested.

Around 10 May 2024 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals killed a man and his head was found inside a plastic bag in the Razabala Alley, El Progresso citadel. It is suspected that the head belonged to a man who was killed in Portoviejo a few days earlier and his body parts were left in the San Pablo and El Floron sectors by men on motorbikes. Next to the body parts there was a pamphlet with a threat. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 10 May 2024 (as reported), in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals killed a person and their severed head was found in the San Camilo Chiquito sector, between Benigno Sotomayor and Jaime Roldos Streets. The rest of the body was found nearby with several stab wounds. The victim was a drug user and had a police record. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 10 May 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two people were killed in unknown circumstances in the Los Mangos sector, Flor de Bastion. Police suspect the killing might be related to drug trafficking disputes. Authorship unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 10 May 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man with 14 gunshots, four of them to the head, inside a vehicle workshop. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a Colombian man in a drive-by shooting in the Las Gaviotas cooperative, Juan Montalvo sector. The suspects fired four to five times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 May 2024, in La Union (Babahoyo, Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with at least nine gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the La Cajita Pool Hall. Four other men were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 11 May 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police forces dismantled a safe house that served as a supply centre for members of Colombian gangs. One suspect was arrested and the police seized ammunition and nine radios.

On 11 May 2024, in Chanduy (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a taxi and two motorbikes killed eight people in a drive-by shooting in the 12 de Octubre neighbourhood. The victims were five men and three women who were at a bar in the Pechiche compound, celebrating a birthday. The bar's owner was shot and injured alongside another person and some of the victims had police records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 8 fatalities.

On 11 May 2024, in Ventanas (Los Rios), several unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Puerto Pechiche neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 May 2024, in the rural area of the Quevedo municipality (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man. The victim was kidnapped, tied up and then shot dead (likely execution). Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
Around 11 May 2024 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), a man was killed and his head found near the cemetery. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 May 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces arrested a Colombian and an Ecuadorian citizen linked to international drug trafficking. One of the suspects was a faction leader from the Las Palmas gang and considered a high-value target in Colombia. Police seized 120 packages of cocaine (1,194,000 doses).

Around 12 May 2024 (as reported), in Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed in the Marianita 1 neighbourhood shot dead three people, being two of them brothers. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 12 May 2024, in Riobamba (Chimborazo), two unidentified armed individuals stabbed and killed a man in the 9 de Octubre and Espejo Avenues. The victim was stabbed 22 times and two other people were injured.

On 12 May 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman with a gunshot to the head during a Mother's Day celebration in a drive-by shooting in the San Antonio sector. The husband and the son-in-law of the victim were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 May 2024, in Manta (Manabi), several unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and injured a woman in a drive-by shooting in the Nueva Esperanza neighbourhood. The suspects fired at least six times. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 12 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man outside of a supermarket in a drive-by shooting in the Pascuales neighbourhood. An adolescent was shot and injured and later, nearby, another man was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting (believed to be perpetrated by the same group). Authorship and motivations unknown. Nearby, an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man on 28 de Agosto and Salitre Streets, Pascuales neighbourhood. The suspects fired at least eight times, mostly to the head. According to police the victim had given them security footage from a previous attack. 3 fatalities.

On 12 May 2024, in Vinces (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified hooded and armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in front of his mother's house in a drive-by shooting in the San Ramon sector, Antonio Sotomayor neighbourhood. Two other relatives of the victim were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 12 May 2024 (as reported), in San Antonio de Pasa (Ambato, Tungurahua), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his body was found on the Ambato-Pasa Road. The victim was shot at least 17 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Movement of forces: On 12 May 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), Army and police forces in tanks moved into the five most conflictive neighbourhoods as a response to the ongoing shootings between drug trafficking groups (one of them being the Los Lobos gang). Around 200 military and police personnel moved into the 4 de Abril, 5 de Diciembre, Amazonas 1, Wilson Franco and Venecia del Mar neighbourhoods.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 12 May 2024, in Tosagua (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed four people inside a hair salon on Eugenio Espejo Street. One of the victims was the owner of the establishment who chaired an LGBTQ+ organisation. The suspects fired more than 20 gunshots and three other people were injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 13 May 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of local residents burned a motorbike following the stabbing of a man inside an abandoned house in the San Francisco neighbourhood (coded separately).

On 13 May 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unidentified armed individual stabbed and killed a man inside an abandoned house in the San Francisco neighbourhood. Both victims were drug users. Police forces arrested the perpetrator during a raid. Motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with several shots in the head in a drive-by shooting on 40th Street, in the Una Sola Fuerza cooperative. The victim was the director of an urban transportation cooperative that operates in the city. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man inside a private residence in the 18 de Octubre cooperative. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Diario Regional Los Andes; El Diario (Ecuador)
notes: On 13 May 2024, in Manta (Manabi), members of the Los Pepes gang in a vehicle killed four men in a drive-by shooting in the Centenario neighbourhood. The suspects used rifles and fired more than 23 times and another man was injured. The four fatal victims were two pairs of brothers. The vehicle used during the killing was found burned out later near the Si Properiedad locality. It is suspected that the killing might be related to the fact that one of the victims worked at a mechanical workshop. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 4 fatalities.
On 13 May 2024, in Tosagua (Manabi), an unknown number of local residents beat up a man accused of robbery on 24 de Mayo Street. The victim was left naked. There were no fatalities.

On 14 May 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), at least three prisoners of the Tungurahua Uno Detention Centre clashed inside the prison. Three prisoners were injured and hospitalised. There were no fatalities.

On 14 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed six people inside a private residence in the Abel Gilbert citadel. Another six people were shot and injured during a birthday celebration. It is suspected that the killing is related to drug trafficking disputes and the suspects would be members of the Latin Kings gang. 6 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador)
notes: On 14 May 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), members of the Los Pepes gang shot and killed five people in the Leonidas Proano parish. Three other people were injured. The motivation is unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 14 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man during a birthday celebration inside a private residence in the Divino Nino sector. Five other people were injured. In the Finca La Delia sector, unknown assailants shot and killed a man on a dirt road. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 14 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals blew up a house between 20th and Calicuchima Streets. It is suspected that the attack is related to extortion. There were no casualties.

Property destruction: On 14 May 2024, in San Vicente (Manabi), police forces raided a private residence which was used as a collection centre of firearms, ammunition and explosives. Police seized hundreds of high-impact explosives (600 blocks of explogel, detonating capsules, mortar and grenades), firearms, several license plates and documents. There were no arrests.

Defusal: On 14 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), police forces defused a dynamite stick left outside a private residence between Calicuchima and 29 Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown.

On 14 May 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a youth (drive-by shooting) in the 5 de Junio neighborhood. The youth's mother was also wounded in the shooting after she attempted to intervene. 1 fatality.

On 15 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Bastion Popular sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 May 2024, in a rural area of Palenque canton (coded to Palenque, Los Rios), suspected gang members abducted two youths. Police later freed the victims during an operation in El Mosquito area of Vinces canton, though the perpetrators were not found.

On 15 May 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle (drive-by) shot and killed a man between 306 and 203 Avenue. The suspects fired at least six times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 May 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike, likely hitmen, shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Velasco Ibarra area of Cumbres neighbourhood. Another victim was shot and injured. The two victims were also on a motorbike and the suspects shot more than 15 gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), likely gang members opened fire on a group of people at the corner of Argentina and 15th streets, killing one person and injuring another. The shooting was believed to have been related to a drug dispute. 1 fatality.

On 15 May 2024, overnight in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an aunknown number of people on a motorcycle shot and killed a man outside his home (drive-by shooting) on 27th street in Portete district. 1 fatality.

On 16 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Bolivar (Guayas), a likely gang member on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the corner of Franco Davila and Pio Motufar. The victim had a previous criminal record. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 16 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), suspected gang members in a vehicle shot and killed a professional chouffer in a drive-by shooting after he and a passenger got out of his car outside a store on Ernesto Alban avenue in Las Malvinas sector. A youth was accidentally wounded in the crossfire, while the chouffer's passenger, who was also injured in the attack, was believed to have been the intended target due to having a criminal history. 1 fatality.

Around 16 May 2024 (as reported), in Picoaza (Portoviejo, Manabi), two likely gang members on a motorcycle (drive-by) shot and killed the owner of a farm as he was driving on his property in the Higueron Afuera area. 1 fatality.
On 16 May 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two likely gang members on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the Venezuela neighborhood in a drive-by shooting. 1 fatality.
On 16 May 2024, in El Empalme canton (coded to El Empalme, Guayas), a suspected gang member shot and killed the leader of a local orchestra outside his home in Las Tecas sector. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: Around 16 May 2024 (as reported), in San Vicente canton (coded to San Vicente, Manabi), police seized a cache of grenades, revolvers, mortar shells, and more than 600 explosives belonging to a suspected criminal group.

source: Diario Regional Los Andes; Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 17 May 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two likely gang members on a motorcycle killed the Portoviejo Director of Security and Territorial Control in a drive-by shooting targeting her car on Reales Tamarindos avenue. The event occurred three days after police uncovered evidence of a suspected plot to assassinate the city's mayor. A second woman was also wounded in the attack. 1 fatality.
tags: local administrators; women targeted: government officials

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 17 May 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed four people in a drive-by shooting at a park in the Buenos Aires neighborhood. Six other people were injured. It is likely the shooting was perpetrated by members of Los Lobos gang who are involved in illegal mining in the region. There were at least 25 people present during the attack. One suspect was arrested and the police seized four firearms, one ammo charger, two cell phones, and cartridges. 4 fatalities.

On 17 May 2024, in Manta (Manabi), likely gang members shot and killed two people attending a wake in the San Pedro neighborhood. The victims were the son and brother-in-law of the man whose wake they were attending, who had been killed in the same area on 15 May (coded separately). 2 fatalities.
On 17 May 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), unidentified armed men opened fire at two men at a construction site in El Floron 4 area, killing one and wounding the other. 1 fatality.
On 17 May 2024, in Canaquemada (El Oro), unidentified armed men shot and killed a man on a farm estate. 1 fatality.

On 17 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), three unidentified armed individuals abducted a man from the Los Ceibos neighbourhood. When the suspects were fleeing, they crashed the vehicle. Authorship unknown. There were no casualties.

On 17 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), several armed individuals on motorbikes and cars abducted a person in the Flor de Bastion sector. The kidnappers asked for $8,500 to return the victim alive. There were no fatalities.

On 18 May 2024, in Tena (Napo), a group of local residents lynched two robbers suspected of having shot and killed a taxi driver. Both suspects were arrested and hospitalised with serious injuries. There were no fatalities.

Weapons seizure: On 18 May 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), police and Army forces seized rifles, a shotgun, a pistol, ammunition, one cell phone, a holster and other materials inside a private residence used by an organised group. One suspect was arrested.

On 18 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown group of hitmen killed a man with 15 gunshots (almost all of them in the head, likely an execution) on Camilo Destruge and 31 Streets. The victim had two police records, being one of them for drug possession, and was also threatened with death. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 May 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man with several gunshots to the head in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Machala Movil; Policia DMZ Zona 9
notes: Property destruction: On 18 May 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), police forces seized 1.4 tons of cocaine (1,276 brick-type packages) hidden inside a banana container. The shipment was destined to the United States and Guatemala. One suspect was arrested.

On 18 May 2024, in Quito - Tumbaco (Pichincha), four members of Los Lobos gang in a vehicle robbed a person in an express kidnapping on Simon Bolivar Avenue. One victim was physically assaulted causing him several injuries. The victims were released in a desolate place. There were no fatalities.

On 18 May 2024, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), two police officers on active duty shot and killed a man in the Carapungo neighbourhood. It is suspected the killing took place after the victim's companions punctured the suspect's car tires. 1 fatality.

On 18 May 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) on a motorbike shot and killed a lawyer and former local prosecutor in a drive-by shooting. It is likely the shooting was related to the victim's job. One suspect was arrested and sentenced to 34 years in prison. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 19 May 2024, in Manta (Manabi), several hitmen from the Los Pepes Gang carrying rifles and pistols invaded the Manta Transit Agency and shot and killed a municipal transit agent. A threatening pamphlet was found near the body claiming responsibility for the attack saying that all those who copy Los Choneros gang will die. More than 24 gunshots were fired and more than 10 people were injured, including local workers. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
On 19 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Bolivar (Guayas), a member of Los Lobos gang shot and killed a person on 6 de Marzo and Ayacucho Streets. Motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 19 May 2024 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an armed individual affiliated with Los Lobos gang beheaded two women and their bodies were found inside a grave. The victims had been reported missing since 3 August 2023. It is suspected that the killing was ordered by an inmate from Turi prison. The suspect was arrested on 19 May 2024 in Tena, Napo province. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Esmeraldas News
notes: On 19 May 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed hitmen on a motorbike killed a Venezuelan motorbike taxi driver in a drive-by shooting between Manabi Street and Libertad Avenue. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 May 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed hitmen on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the 19 de Noviembre neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
On 19 May 2024, in Machala (El Oro), a foreign national was shot and killed by armed men on a motorbike, outside the El Paraiso health centre. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 19 May 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the San Jacinto de Buena Fe municipality (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals killed a person and their skull and body parts were found in the La Playita de Buena Fe region. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 19 May 2024, in the rural area of the San Lorenzo municipality (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), army forces seized and destroyed two hectares of a coca leaf plantation and other materials inside a farm. There were no arrests.

On 19 May 2024, in San Miguel de Ibarra (Imbabura), four unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a Venezuelan man inside a commercial establishment between Rafael Sanchez and Obispo Mosquera Streets. The four suspects were arrested on 20 May inside a private residence on Eugenio Espejo Avenue. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 19 May 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed hitmen on a motorbike killed a woman with more than four gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Muro de Las Cabras sector, Barreiro neighbourhood. The victim was working at the time of the killing. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 20 May 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unidentified armed group of heavily armed individuals shot and killed three people inside an apartment between Marcel Laniado and Santa Rosa Streets. Several other people were injured and the suspects fired over 30 gunshots. One victim jumped out the window to escape but was hit by gunfire and died on impact. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 20 May 2024, in Manta (Manabi), members of the Los Pepes gang carrying long-range firearms shot and killed four people in a volleyball court in the La Pradera 2 citadel. Eight other people were injured and at least 50 gunshots were fired. The suspects left a pamphlet signed by Los Pepes gang claiming responsibility for the attack against their enemies, Los Choneros. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.
On 20 May 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), an unknown number of hitmen shot and killed three people and injured five others. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 20 May 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), police forces seized 310 blocks (100kg, or 20,000 doses) of marijuana inside a private residence in the Las Cuadras sector. Other narcotics were also seized alongside explosives. Four suspects were arrested.

On 20 May 2024, in Rio Verde (Rioverde, Esmeraldas), two hitmen on a motorbike killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Montalvo neighbourhood. Another person was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 21 May 2024, in Loja (Loja), a group of informal vendors attacked municipal control agents with sticks, stones, baskets, buckets and other objects during a raid. Police forces intervened and got the situation under control. There were no casualties.
On 21 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), six unidentified armed individuals on a tricycle abducted a man in the Bastion Popular neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown.

On 21 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), about five armed men in two vehicles fired at least six gunshots and abducted two men from the 11 and 4 de Noviembre streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: Around 21 May 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals stabbed and killed a Venezuelan man and his body was found wrapped in sheets and tied up between Jose Mascote and Piedrahita Streets. Security camera footage showed the victim being dragged along the road by the suspects. The victim was a drug user and it is suspected the attack was due to a fight over a stolen bicycle. Four suspects were arrested and they had police records for robberies, drug trafficking and one of them was a Venezuelan citizen. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of hitmen killed a man with more than 10 gunshots (likely execution) in the Floresta 2 citadel. According to locals the victim was a drug user. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 May 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of hitmen in a car killed a man with a gunshot to the head in a drive-by shooting inside a restaurant. Two people were abducted and the police chased the suspects, but they managed to escape. In another event, an unknown number of hitmen shot and killed four people. Authorship and motivations unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 21 May 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a man with at least three gunshots in the Santa Lucia neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.
