On 21 May 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals blew up a dock in the Amazonas 1 neighbourhood. The suspects arrived on a boat and fled after the attack.

On 21 May 2024, in the rural area of the Puerto Limon municipality (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), two unidentified armed individuals in a truck abducted a man. The victim's brother managed to escape. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

On 21 May 2024, in Rio Verde (Rioverde, Esmeraldas), an unidentified armed group of hooded hitmen on a motorbike killed five people in a drive-by shooting in the Nuevo Rocafuerte neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 21 May 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals abducted a man from the San Camilo parish. The victim was released unharmed on 26 May and the suspects arrested. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

Other: On 22 May 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), president Daniel Noboa announced executive decree 275 requesting a new deployment of the Armed Forces in the provinces of Guayas, Manabi, El Oro, Los Rios, Santa Elena, Sucumbios, Orellana and the canton of Camilo Ponce Enriquez in Azuay. This is the second phase of the declaration of the state of emergency due to the ongoing internal armed conflict. Human Rights Watch indicated evidence of human rights violations after the declaration of the internal conflict.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 22 May 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), eight unknown extorsionists killed a delivery man while he was working in the San Camilo Chiquito sector. At this moment the group was kidnapping another man (whose body was found on 25 May, coded separately). Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 22 May 2024 (as reported), in Atacames (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of armed assailants shot and killed a man and his body was found in the 18 de Febrero neighbourhood. The victim was found in a prone position with several gunshots to the head (likely execution). Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 May 2024, in Buena Fe (San Jacinto de Yaguachi, Guayas), four extortionists shot and killed a food delivery worker in the San Camilo Chiquito sector. The suspects were trying to abduct the victim. The victim's wife claimed that they were receiving death threats and extortion requests ($10,000). Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 May 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), police forces carried out an operation and raided a private residence in which they arrested the suspected leader of the Los Choneros gang. Four other members were arrested, two of them adolescents. Police seized a rifle, two ammo feeders, 67 cartridges of ammunition, four cell phones, a ballistic vest, a digital scale and personal documents.

On 22 May 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Velasco Ibarra sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 May 2024, in Lican (Riobamba, Chimborazo), police forces arrested the leader of an organised drug trafficking group in the El Arenal sector. The suspect was identified after stealing a truck and the police seized several items, two trucks, three cell phones, a signal jammer, and a vehicle battery. There were no casualties.
Property destruction: On 22 May 2024, in Machala (El Oro), police forces seized 750 gallons of illegally obtained petrol being transported on a truck. The driver was arrested.

On 22 May 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of hitmen on motorbikes killed a truck driver in a drive-by shooting in the 15 de Septiembre neighbourhood. The victim was delivering water and was shot at least 10 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 22 May 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), an unknown number of hitmen in a car carrying rifles killed a man sitting outside a house in a drive-by shooting in the El Prado sector. The fatal victim had a police record and two other people were shot and injured. The vehicle used in the shooting was found burned out in the Las Jacuatas locality. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 May 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), several armed individuals shot and killed a man at the entrance of his house between Rodrigo Ugarte and Enrique Coello streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Expreso
notes: On 22 May 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown group of armed individuals abducted a man from the Chipe compound. The victim was released unharmed by the police around 26 May. Police arrested three women, and seized 14 motorbikes, firearms, and large-calibre ammunition. On the same day, at least 10 heavily-armed men, suspected extortionists, in a vehicle abducted a man from a bakery in the San Camilo parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

On 22 May 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), two hitmen on a motorbike killed a man inside a taxi in a drive-by shooting on Guayaquil Avenue, San Camilo parish. The victim was a passenger in the taxi and the driver was shot and injured in the arm. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 22 May 2024, in Rio Verde (Rioverde, Esmeraldas), Army forces (river patrol) seized two boats carrying 2,200 gallons of illegal fuel in the Rocafuerte dock. A gunfire exchange took place right after the discovery (coded separately).

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 22 May 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals abducted a woman from the La Crucita neighbourhood. Two suspects were arrested and their testimonies led to a massive dynamite apprehension. The victim released unharmed in the Tres Cerritos de Chanduy sector. There were no casualties.
Weapons seizure: On 22 May 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), police forces seized around 2,000 dynamite sticks, a firearm and other materials. One suspect was arrested.

On 23 May 2024, in Buena Fe (San Jacinto de Yaguachi, Guayas), an unknown number of hitmen shot and killed a man with gunshots to the head on Franklin Torres and Miguel Mendez Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 May 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two hitmen on a motorbike killed an adolescent with at least four gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the 15 de Marzo neighbourhood. The killing caused a civilian unrest that had to be controlled by the police and the military (coded separately). Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 May 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces arrested one of the leaders of the Los Tiguerones gang. Police seized one firearm, cartridges, two cell phones, narcotics and a Tiguerones pamphlet.

Property destruction: On 23 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals fired shots at several houses in the Flor de Bastion sector. The suspects left extortion pamphlets with a number asking the local residents to call (likely with extortion intentions).

On 23 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike blew up a house on Jose Mascote and Argentina Streets. The explosion caused damages to a wall and a door (likely related to extortions). Authorship unknown. There were no fatalities.

Property destruction: On 23 May 2024, in La Joya de los Sachas (Orellana), Army forces seized two tanker-type trucks with over 250 gallons of illegal petrol in the Lago San Pedro parish. In a less crowded area, the soldiers seized 6,000 gallons of petrol. Five suspects were arrested.

On 23 May 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), an unknown number of gunmen using long-range firearms killed a man with several gunshots in the Maximino Delgado neighbourhood, Anibal San Andres parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 23 May 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Rosa Zarate municipality (Quininde, Esmeraldas), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed an adolescent and his body was found tied up, mouth covered, and with burns and lacerations (signs of torture, likely an execution). The body was found in the Malimpia parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
On 23 May 2024, in Naranjal (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Pan-American Highway. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 May 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), local residents demonstrated and demanded justice for the killing of an adolescent earlier in the 15 de Marzo neighbourhood (coded separately). Military and police forces had to intervene to bring peace back into the area. There were no casualties.
Property destruction: On 24 May 2024, in Daule (Guayas), police forces seized 1,088 packages of cocaine intended for drug trafficking during an anti-drug operation. Two suspects were arrested.

On 24 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), three unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle abducted a person from the Florida neighbourhood. Police forces managed to rescue the victim unharmed and arrest the suspects. Authorship unknown. There were no casualties.

On 24 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals aboard vehicles killed a person and injured another in a drive-by shooting on General Gomez Streets and Quito Avenue. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Property destruction: On 24 May 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), members of the Los Tiguerones gang fired shots at a taxi cooperative and left extortion pamphlets demanding $8,000. At least five gunshots hit the windows. There were no people present during the attack.

On 24 May 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed a man with several gunshots to the head near La Madre Park. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 24 May 2024 (as reported), in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Loma de Guineo sector. The victim's body was found near the Gallina River. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of armed men shot and killed two men. The suspects fired about 30 shots and another person was injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Policia DMZ Zona 9
notes: Property destruction: On 25 May 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces seized 2,497 packages of cocaine (total of 2,4 tons of narcotics) hidden inside a container that was going to be sent to Russia. In Los Ceibos sector, 510 packages of narcotics (around 507,450 grams of cocaine) were found inside a private property. Police also seized two vehicles, two motorbikes, eight cell phones, and $2,420 in cash. Seven suspects were arrested.

On 25 May 2024, in La Union (Quininde, Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men in the La Ica sector. One victim was an off-duty police officer. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 25 May 2024 (as reported), in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of armed individuals killed a woman and her body was found tied up and with signs of torture in the 7 de Octubre parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 25 May 2024 (as reported), in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed a man and his body was found in the Gallina River. The victim had been abducted on 22 May from the San Camilo Chiquito sector (coded separately) after receiving extortion threats for a week. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 May 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals in a car killed a man inside a barbershop in a drive-by shooting in the Cinco de Junio sector. The vehicle was found burned out on Montecristi-La Pila Road. Later, an armed group in a vehicle fired shots at a family near the Virgen de Monserrate church and injured one person. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 May 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two hitmen on a motorbike injured three people in a drive-by shooting on Las Americas and Circunvalacion Sur Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 26 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of armed men in a vehicle killed a man with six gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Atahualpa cooperative. The victim was beaten up and tied up. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Pie de Lucha cooperative, Pascuales parish. The victim's mother was shot and injured and the victim had no police record. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 May 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), about 20 armed and hooded individuals in vehicles fired shots inside a barbershop in a drive-by shooting in the Tenguel parish. Three people were shot dead and one was injured. The suspects set the vehicles on fire and escaped by boat. They used rifles and robbed several houses before escaping firing shots into the air. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 26 May 2024, in Jaramijo (Manabi), four hitmen in a car killed two men in a drive-by shooting on El Fondeadero beach. Three other men were injured and the suspects used rifles. Four suspects were arrested (among them a Colombian and a Venezuelan nationals) shortly after the shooting and the police seized the firearms. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 26 May 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), an unknown number of hitmen on speedboats and motorbikes killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Rio Bonito parish. The suspects left several threatening extortion pamphlets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.
On 26 May 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Cachari locality. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Property destruction: On 27 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals fired shots at a city council building. A vehicle with explosives blew up earlier (coded separately) and another was defused by the police (coded separately). There were no fatalities or casualties.

Around 27 May 2024 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals killed a person and their dismembered body was found inside two bags in the El Guabito sector. Another bag with the victim's arms and legs was found in the El Becker sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Defusal: On 27 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), police and armed forces defused a dynamite stick left inside a vehicle near a city council building. Another vehicle with explosives blew up earlier (coded separately). Later, a controlled detonation was carried out by authorities.

On 27 May 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals in a truck abducted two men from La Primavera Road. One victim was shot multiple times in the head and killed and the other managed to escape through the mountains and hide until the morning. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed a man and injured another. Both victims were related to a mayor's official. It is suspected the attack is related to the bombing attacks perpetrated against a municipal building in the city (coded separately). Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), a group of hitmen on a motorbike and a truck killed two brothers in a drive-by shooting in the Recreo Viejo sector. Additionally, a group of armed individuals aboard a truck killed a man in a drive-by shooting. Another man was shot and injured. The action took place near a municipality building where explosions were reported on 27 May (coded separately). Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Los Aguilas Gang (Ecuador); Los Tiguerones Gang (Ecuador)
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Policia DMZ Zona 9
notes: Property destruction: On 28 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces carried out a raid on several properties used as hideouts of armed groups in the Nueva Prosperina neighbourhood. It is suspected that armed groups used the places to keep victims of kidnappings. Five suspects were arrested and the police seized firearms. In total there were 42 houses in the Monte Sinai, Flor de Bastion, and Nuevo Guayaquil (territories where Los Aguillas gang, Los Fatales gang and Los Tiguerones gang operate) sectors which are to be returned to their legitimate owners.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 28 May 2024, in the Coast of Salinas (Santa Elena), police forces seized 127 packages of drugs (around 3 tons valued at $60 millions) inside a semi-submersible boat and arrested three suspects. Later, after the boat sank, the Navy forces managed to recover two of the three tons. Two suspects were Colombian nationals.

On 28 May 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of armed assailants shot and killed a man with several gunshots to the head in the La Ladrillera sector. It is suspected the killing is related to drug trafficking disputes. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 May 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), two armed men on a motorbike, suspected hitmen, killed a man with at least six gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Gallegos Lara housing project. Earlier, unknown armed men described as executioners shot and killed a man in the Floresta 2 sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 28 May 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of armed individuals abducted a man and the victim was kept around the road to Canalito. The victim managed to escape four days later, unharmed. Authorship and motivations unknown.

Property destruction: On 28 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown armed group invaded a house, fired shots, broke windows, and set it on fire in the Florida neighbourhood. It is suspected that local residents refused to pay an extortion fee to the perpetrators.

Around 28 May 2024 (as reported), near Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of suspected Los Fatales gang members abducted a person. The victim was likely abducted around Guayaquil due to the rescue location. The victim was rescued on 28 May 2024 during a police operation in the Monte Sinai sector that also resulted in the arrest of five suspected Los Fatales members including a local gang leader. Police also confiscated five vehicles, two bulletproof vests, dozens of bullets, and five guns including a glock and a submachine gun during the rescue operation.

On 29 May 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), two armed individuals suspected to be hitmen on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Leonidas Proano parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 May 2024, in Portovelo (El Oro), three armed individuals dressed as soldiers (likely hitmen) on a truck killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Gonzalo Diaz Avenue. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 29 May 2024, in El Oro province (coded to Machala), police forces seized 6,320 explosives and 335kg of ammonium nitrate (likely used to manufacture dynamite). There were no arrests.

Weapons seizure: On 29 May 2024, in El Oro province (coded to Machala), police forces seized 3,939 dynamite sticks, 1,750kg of ammonium nitrate, 2,200m of explosive cord, 330 detonating capsules, and two compressors. There were no arrests.

On 29 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), four armed individuals in a vehicle, likely hitmen, injured a security guard and a custodian in a drive-by shooting in the Los Ceibos sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Primicias
notes: On 29 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), three armed individuals, in a car abducted the cousin of an assemblyman (National Democratic Action Movement - ADN) from the La Florida sector. The suspects asked for a large sum of money to free the victim. The victim was rescued in a delicate health state on 31 May and two suspects, both of them with criminal records for robbery and illegal possession of firearms, were arrested in the Isla Trinitaria sector.

On 29 May 2024, in Playas (Guayas), four armed individuals, described as extortionists, on motorbikes killed a taxi driver inside his car in a drive-by shooting between Alexander Street and Sixto Chang Avenue. A threatening pamphlet was found inside the car with the victim. The suspects fired at least nine times. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 29 May 2024 (as reported), in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed a couple and their bodies were found inside the boot of a car in the La Entrada commune. Both had their hands and feet tied and showed torture signs. A pamphlet left inside the car said, 'nobody messes with the mafia.' Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 29 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), police forces dismantled two drug storage houses in the El Recreo citadel. Three suspects, two men with police records for drug trafficking, and a woman were arrested and the police seized two firearms, 180 ammunition cartridges, $1,923, a radio, and a camera.

Around 29 May 2024 (as reported), in Naranjal (Guayas), five members of the Los Lobos gang abducted a man and tied him up with a rope during an express kidnapping. The victim was rescued unharmed by the Judicial Police on 29 May. There were no casualties.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 30 May 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), four unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) on motorbikes killed a lawyer who worked at the prosecutor's office in a drive-by shooting in the Enrique Candell neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
On 30 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Letamendi (Guayas), several armed individuals in two vehicles abducted a man from Guerrero Valenzuela and Portete Streets.

On 30 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Letamendi (Guayas), two unidentified armed men, likely hitmen, on a motorbike killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting between Domingo Savio and Gallegos Lara Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; Policia DMZ Zona 9
notes: Property destruction: On 30 May 2024, in Quito - Tumbaco (Pichincha), police forces seized more than 1,100kg of cocaine (1,145 packages valued at more than 2 million dollars and bound to Belgium) inside a property in the Pifo parish. Two Colombian nationals were arrested, one of them with a police record.

On 30 May 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals (described as hitmen) on motorbikes killed a man in a drive-by shooting inside a private residence in the Estero Medina sector. According to police, the victim had a police record. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Chongon (Guayas), several armed men in a vehicle fired shots at another vehicle in a drive-by shooting in the Puerto Azul urbanization. One person was shot and injured and the suspects fired at least seven gunshots. One source mentions that a person was killed. Authorship and motivations unknown.
On 30 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), several armed men, described as criminals, in a vehicle abducted a man driving his car on Olmos Avenue, Lomas de Urdesa locality.
Weapons seizure: On 30 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), Armed Forces destroyed over 3,000 firearms seized from armed groups in the Andec neighbourhood.

On 30 May 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of individuals in a vehicle killed a man in front of his house in a drive-by shooting in the Barreiro parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 31 May 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an armed group (described as extortionists) blew up a restaurant with explosives in the Monte Sinai sector. In total eight buildings were destroyed and several people were injured. Casualties unknown.

Around 31 May 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a person was killed and their dismembered body parts were found inside jute bags in the Reinaldo Quinonez cooperative, Nueva Prosperina neighbourhood. The body parts were in a state of decomposition and belonged to two different men. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 31 May 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Unidos Venceremos 2 cooperative. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 31 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces dismantled a clandestine firearms factory in the Jardines del Salado urbanisation. The factory belonged to the Los Choneros gang and the police seized several manufacturing machines and materials. There were no arrests.

Around 31 May 2024 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of armed individuals killed a man and his body was found tied up inside a bag with his mouth gagged by tape in the Propicia 1 sector, floating in the Teaone River. The body was in an advanced state of decomposition. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 31 May 2024 (as reported), in San Vicente (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed a man with several gunshots to the head and his body was found tied up floating in the sea. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 31 May 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the El Guabo municipality (El Oro), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in a banana farm in the Pensilvania sector. The victim's face was disfigured by rifle gunshots and his body showed signs of torture. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 31 May 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), around seven armed and hooded individuals suspected extortionists abducted a man between Leonidas Plaza and Portete Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Ecuador (2023-); PSC: Social Christian Party (Ecuador); Women (Ecuador)
notes: On 1 June 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces arrested the female former mayor (PSC). According to the victim, she was arbitrarily ambushed; however, the police claimed they were suspicious about her high-end vehicle with tinted windows.

On 1 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of heavily armed individuals shot and killed four people inside a clandestine pool hall in the Casas del Tigre sector, Balerio Estacio cooperative. It is suspected that the perpetrators are members of the Los Tiguerones gang and they fired at least 60 gunshots, injuring four other people. According to police, one of the fatal victims had a police record for rape in 2011. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 1 June 2024, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), four armed individuals on motorbikes, suspected hitmen, killed a woman and injured three other people in a drive-by shooting in the Solanda sector. It is suspected the killing is related to a settling of scores. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), six hooded and heavily armed members of the Los Lagartos gang carrying rifles in a vehicle killed two people in a drive-by shooting in the 12 de Septiembre cooperative, Guasmo Central sector. One of the victims was a female adolescent and the suspects shot at least 29 times. Another person was shot and injured. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 1 June 2024, Santa Rosa (Eloy Alfaro, Esmeraldas), Armed Forces seized a semi-submersible vessel and dismantled a shipyard used by suspected drug traffickers. There were no arrests.

Around 1 June 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals killed a man and his dismembered body was found inside two bags in the Pedro Quinonez cooperative, near the Canal de la Muerte locality. The body had signs of stab wounds. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 June 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two armed individuals, likely hitmen, shot and killed a couple inside a sports centre in the El Floron citadel. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 1 June 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), a group of armed individuals shot and killed a person and injured three others outside a pool hall on Carchi and B Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2023-); Journalists (Ecuador); Los Choneros Gang (Ecuador); MRC: Citizen Revolution Movement
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Expreso; Primicias
notes: On 2 June 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed three people inside a circus in the La Poza sector. The victims were an alternate assemblyman of the Citizen Revolution Movement (MRC), his wife, and a spectator of the show. Two other people were injured, including a journalist covering the event. A burned-out vehicle was found in the Los Artesanos sector. According to police, the assemblyman had a connection with one of the leaders of the Los Choneros gang in Babahoyo. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Ecuador en Vivo; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo
notes: On 2 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Carbo (Guayas), police officers and agents of the Prosecutor's Office arrested a judge involved in the 'Purga' case who was trying to leave the country on a flight to New York, United States. The suspect will be charged with organised crime.

On 2 June 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Buenavista and 13th North. The victim was shot twice in the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 2 June 2024, around San Lorenzo (Manabi), police forces seized 22 jute bags with 874 blocks (over 1,000kg) of cocaine hydrochloride in the San Lorenzo parish. There were no arrests.

Around 2 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a man was shot and killed and his body found in the Miami Beach cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. The victim had his feet and hands tied with a rope. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), several suspected hitmen on motorbikes killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Valle de la Flor cooperative. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 3 June 2024, in the rural area of the Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas municipality (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), a group of local residents organised as a vigilante group set fire to a vehicle with three suspected extortionists inside on the road between Buena Fe de los Rios and Santa Maria del Toachi. The victims were lynched and were involved in robberies and extortions. 3 fatalities.

source: Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 3 June 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two armed individuals in a truck described as hitmen shot and killed an adolescent with five gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Primavera 2 citadel. The victim was also on a motorbike dropping off an infant relative at kindergarten. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 3 June 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of armed individuals described as gunmen in a vehicle killed three people with 11 gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the San Pedro 1 neighbourhood. It is suspected the killing is related to drug trafficking disputes. Two other people were injured by stray bullets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 3 June 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Ambato municipality (Tungurahua), an Afro-Ecuadorian man was shot and killed and his body found in a mine in the Palahua El Carmen sector. The victim was shot 16 times. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 June 2024, in Guano (Chimborazo), local residents organised as a vigilante group beat up three men involved in a robbery that left two truck drivers dead (coded separately). The lynching happened between Guayaquil and Espana Streets. One of the suspects was killed during the lynching with blows to the head and his body was set on fire. The two other suspects were arrested. The number of perpetrators is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 June 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of armed individuals described as hitmen in a car and a motorbike killed two brothers inside a van in a drive-by shooting in the Machala Libre neighbourhood. The suspects used rifles and pistols to carry out the killings and the victims were shot several times on the head and chest. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 4 June 2024, around Riobamba (Chimborazo), local residents organised as a vigilante group carried out a lynching of a suspected robber in the San Martin community. One suspect was beaten to death. Three members of the community were arrested and dozens of community members gathered in front of the police station to request their freedom. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 4 June 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of perpetrators kidnapped a man and held him for ransom (express kidnapping). The victim's body was found on 8 June (coded separately). There is no further information available.
On 5 June 2024, in Playas (Guayas), three armed individuals suspected extortionists abducted a man. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

Around 5 June 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the El Guabo municipality (El Oro), a man was shot and killed with several gunshots to the head in the Chalacal sector. Police found at least three ballistic evidence. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); Policia Ecuador; Primicias
notes: Weapons seizure: On 5 June 2024, in Milagro (Guayas), police and military forces seized 11 assault rifles, five pistols, one hand grenade, one grenade launcher, 24 ammo feeders, 17 rifle cartridges, seven cell phones, and 1,396 ammunition cartridges. Several firearms were 3D-printed. One member of Los Aguilas Gang was arrested.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: Property destruction: On 5 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), dozens of police and armed forces demolished and blew up two of 10 hideouts used for illicit activities such as hitmen training and kidnappings in the Nueva Prosperina cooperative. There were no arrests.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 5 June 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed two men between the Amazonas and 15 de Abril neighbourhoods, Eloy Alfaro parish. The suspects fired more than 20 times and one of the victims was a taxi driver. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 5 June 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man with an arrest warrant in a drive-by shooting in the Otto Alvarez neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Policia DMG Zona 8
notes: On 5 June 2024, in Valencia (Los Rios), an unknown number of armed individuals in two vehicles kidnapped two people and held them for ransom (express kidnapping) in the La Union parish. Police managed to rescue the victims unharmed from a hideout in Quevedo. There were no arrests.

Around 5 June 2024 (as reported), in San Vicente (Manabi), a man was shot and killed and his body found at the beach with his hands tied up. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 5 June 2024 (as reported), off the coast of Machala (El Oro), a man was killed and his beheaded body found floating in the sea, near the Jambeli archipelago. The victim had been missing since 4 June. The number of perpetrators is unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 6 June 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), police forces seized 405 dynamite sticks, 1,500m of detonating wire, 600m of fuse, and 69 detonating capsules from inside a house. Likely related to extortions. There were no arrests.

On 6 June 2024, in Anconcito (Salinas, Santa Elena), five armed assailants engaged in piracy driving a boat shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the fishing port. Two other fishers were injured while at work. The killings were related to extortions. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 6 June 2024 (as reported), off the coast of Santa Rosa (Santa Rosa), a person was killed and their beheaded body found floating in the Jambeli archipelago. It is suspected that the victim was beheaded with a machete and the body was found in an advanced state of decomposition. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 6 June 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a man was killed and his body found tied up wrapped in sheets in the Isla del Valle cooperative, Isla Trinitaria sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Policia Ecuador
notes: On 6 June 2024, around Manta (Manabi), police and at least 30 soldiers from the Armed Forces arrested 27 suspects, some members of the Los Choneros gang and others members of the Los Lobos gang, involved in drug trafficking, extortions, kidnappings, killings, and other crimes. Operations were also carried out in the Eloy Alfaro, Ceibo, Montecristi, La Pradera, and Villamarina parishes, and the Montecristi and Jaramijo cantons.

Around 6 June 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed, and his dismembered body was found in jute bags in the Balerio Estacio cooperative. Local residents claimed that individuals aboard a tricycle threw the bags on the road. On the same day, the dismembered body of a man was found wrapped in sheets outside of a school on La Consolata Avenue, in the El Fortin sector. The motivation behind the attack and its perpetrators are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 6 June 2024, in El Cambio (Machala, El Oro), several armed individuals in a taxi killed a man inside his private residence in a drive-by shooting in the Mario Minuche neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 June 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of armed individuals in a vehicle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Carlos Alvarado citadel. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 June 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), four unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes injured four people in a truck in a drive-by shooting in the Munoz Rubio sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 6 June 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Barreiro Viejo sector. One of the victims had a police record for robbery, illegal possession of firearms, and murder from 2008, and he was hit four times. An hour earlier, armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in another drive-by shooting in the Isabel Maria sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 7 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as delinquents on motorbikes killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Flor de Bastion sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car injured eight people, mostly adolescents, in a drive-by shooting in a sports field in the Vergeles sector. The suspects fired at least 18 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 7 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of perpetrators kidnapped a man and held him for ransom (express kidnapping) in the Monte Sinai sector. The victim was working at a workshop when he was abducted. The victim was rescued unharmed by the police on 8 June but there were no arrests. There is no further information available.

Around 7 June 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Guayaquil municipality (Guayas), a man was killed and his body found wrapped in sheets and plastic. It is suspected the victim was asphyxiated and beaten up. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 7 June 2024 (as reported), in Pansaleo (Salcedo, Cotopaxi), a man was killed and his body found by the road near a garbage dump in the Lamapata Chasqui neighbourhood. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 7 June 2024, off the coast of Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), Navy Forces seized a speedboat carrying around 49 packages, at least 1,000kg of narcotics, 40 nautical miles from the coast. The suspects managed to escape.

On 7 June 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man with two gunshots to the head in a drive-by shooting in the El Pacifico neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 8 June 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed a man driving a car on the Walter Andrade and San Rafael Avenues. The victim's wife was shot and injured. It is suspected the victims were being extorted. The fatal victim was a candidate for the National Assembly in the 2023 early elections for the RETO party. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) in a car killed a man inside a car in a drive-by shooting in the Mapasingue locality. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 8 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police forces carried out a controlled detonation of explosives left in businesses and private residences with extortion pamphlets in the Isla Trinitaria sector.

On 8 June 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man with eight gunshots, several to the head, in the 15 de Noviembre neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 8 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces incinerated a hideout used by unidentified armed individuals to keep kidnapping victims in the Monte Sinai sector. There were no arrests.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 8 June 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed a man with several gunshots to the head and his body was found on the Guayaquil-Chongon highway. The victim showed signs of having been beaten and it is suspected the perpetrators were extortionists. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 8 June 2024 (week of), in the rural area of the Posorja parish (Guayaquil, Guayas), three men and one woman were killed and their bodies found inside the Canal de la Muerte in a state of decomposition. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.

source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Property destruction: On 8 June 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces seized 500 packages of cocaine (566kg) hidden inside a truck during operation Cero Impunidad 569. One suspect was arrested. In total 15,153,520 doses of cocaine (or 1.7 tons, valued at $68 million) were seized in three different operations carried out in three cantons (coded separately).

Property destruction: On 8 June 2024, in Posorja (Guayaquil, Guayas), police forces seized a container with 140 packages of cocaine (158kg) destined for Germany during operation 'Poseidon XIX'. One suspect was arrested. Later, a vehicle was seized carrying 399 blocks of cocaine (446kg) and one suspect was arrested. In total 15,153,520 doses of cocaine (or 1.7 tons, valued at $68 million) were seized in three different operations carried out in three cantons (coded separately).

source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Property destruction: On 8 June 2024, in Machala (El Oro), police forces seized 456 packages of cocaine destined for Belgium during operation 'Poseidon XVIII.' Two suspects were arrested. In total 15,153,520 doses of cocaine (or 1.7 tons, valued at $68 million) were seized in three different operations carried out in three cantons (coded separately).

Property destruction: On 8 June 2024, off the coast of Manta (Manabi), Navy Forces seized a panga-type boat carrying 1,500kg of narcotics valued at $20 million, during an operation 200 miles west of the coast. Three suspects were arrested. Later, another boat was seized carrying 80 fuel drums that were supposed to fuel the boat carrying the drugs. Four suspects were arrested.

On 8 June 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed individuals described as members of a criminal group kidnapped a Colombian citizen and held him for ransom (express kidnapping). The victim was rescued unharmed by the police. Two suspects were arrested. There is no further information available.

On 8 June 2024, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), three unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle kidnapped two women from the Barrionuevo neighbourhood. The kidnapping was related to extortions. The police arrested one suspect after a police chase in the Centro Historico neighbourhood and the suspect was sentenced on 3 June 2025 to 17 years in prison. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 9 June 2024, in Anconcito (Salinas, Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes, described as hitmen, killed a person driving a car in a drive-by shooting in the Gonzalo Chavez neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 9 June 2024, in Ventanas (Los Rios), at least six unidentified armed individuals on several motorbikes (described as hitmen) killed seven people in a drive-by shooting at a sports field in the Rincon de El Cura locality. It is suspected the killings are related to drug trafficking disputes. Authorship and motivations unknown. 7 fatalities.

Around 9 June 2024 (as reported), in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of members of Los Choneros gang kidnapped a person and held the victim for ransom (express kidnapping). The victim had received threats and gunshots in their private residence. Two suspects were arrested by the police and the victim rescued unharmed. There is no further information available.

On 9 June 2024, in Pedro Carbo (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a tricycle kidnapped a woman and held her for ransom (express kidnapping) in the La Quirigua neighbourhood. Another victim managed to escape. Police rescued the woman unharmed and arrested a suspect with an arrest warrant for murder. Police seized two firearms and ammunition. There is no further information available.

On 9 June 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at a restaurant in the El Recreo 2 sector. The suspects fired at least 10 times and another person was injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 9 June 2024, in La Iberia (El Guabo, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes and a truck killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the 12 de Octubre neighbourhood. One of the fatal victims had a police record and several other people were injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 9 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a couple inside a taxi tricycle in the Pascuales parish. The driver escaped unharmed. The victims had been receiving extortion threats. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 10 June 2024, in Charapoto (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car (described as hitmen) killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Charapoto parish. The victim was a drug user and he was killed inside a rehabilitation clinic. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 10 June 2024 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), a man was killed and their body found with signs of torture floating on Teoane River. The victim's head was covered with a bag and was in a state of decomposition. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

On 10 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the La Fragata sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 June 2024, in Zaruma (El Oro), several unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes fired several shots at a store and injured one person in a drive-by shooting on Honorato Marquez Street. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

actor2: Police Forces Of Ecuador (2023-) Prison Guards
notes: On 10 June 2024, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), an unknown number of inmates injured a prison guard during an escape at the Pablo Arturo Suarez hospital. There were no fatalities.

On 11 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as criminals) injured two people inside a car in a drive-by shooting in front of a bank on Benjamin Carrion Avenue, in the Alborada sector. Witnesses suspect the perpetrators were hitmen. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuador en Vivo; Policia Ecuador; Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 11 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces seized 1,000kg of cocaine (1,155 brick-type packages) in a private urbanisation that belonged to Los Choneros gang in the Los Ceibos sector. There were no arrests.

On 11 June 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), five unidentified armed assailants abducted a woman and held her for ransom inside a private residence (express kidnapping). All five suspects were arrested on the same day and some of them had police records for drug trafficking. There is no further information available.
Property destruction: On 11 June 2024, in Duran (Guayas), police forces dismantled a drug laboratory. Three suspects were arrested.

On 12 June 2024, in El Empalme (Guayas), police and armed forces arrested a high-profile drug trafficker and member of Los Choneros gang during a party with over 100 guests in the La Chiquita sector. The suspect had connections with two leaders of the gang, one of which was arrested and the other is a fugitive from justice. Two active police officers were present at the party and were also arrested alongside several other gang members. Police seized $2,000 and two vehicles. There is no further information available.

Property destruction: On 12 June 2024, in Manta (Manabi), police and armed forces dismantled a drug collection centre in the Maria Auxiliadora neighbourhood. Police seized 400kg of cocaine and arrested four suspects.

Around 12 June 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), a fisher was shot and killed with a gunshot to the face and his body found in the Estero Salado locality, Guasmo sector. The victim's uncle is still missing. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 12 June 2024, in Daule (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man and injured two others in a drive-by shooting in the El Memoria citadel. The victim was a student who was taken by the suspects when he was leaving school to La Yolita citadel and shot several times in the head and chest. It is suspected the killings are related to a drug war between Los Choneros gang and Los Chone Killers gang. A van driver was also shot and killed. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 12 June 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces seized 1,244,440 doses of cocaine (2,366 boxes with around 124kg and 40g of hydrochloride) hidden inside banana boxes on a shipment bound to Italy during operation 'Poseidon XX'. Four men and a woman were arrested.

On 13 June 2024, in Pedernales (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals fired shots at the Transit Commission building. There were people inside the building at the time of the shooting but no one was injured. Authorship unknown. There were no casualties.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 13 June 2024, in Buena Fe (San Jacinto de Yaguachi, Guayas), an unidentified armed individual described as a delinquent on a motorbike shot and killed a man working at his food stand in a drive-by shooting on 7 de Agosto Avenue. It is suspected the victim was killed because he refused to pay extortionists. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), three members of Los Tiguerones gang on a tricycle shot and killed a man selling tortillas outside a hospital in a drive-by shooting the El Fortin sector. It is suspected the victim was killed because he refused to pay extortionists. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unidentified armed individual on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Cristal cooperative. The victim was a drug user with a police record for robbery in 2017 and was killed by three gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 June 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man during a funeral wake in the Machala Libre neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two armed individuals on a motorbike killed an illegal taxi driver in a drive-by shooting in the Virgen del Cisne, San Eduardo cooperative. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Mercurio (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 13 June 2024, in Manta (Manabi), police forces carried out an operation in the Cuba neighbourhood, Eloy Alfaro parish, and seized more than 1,000kg of cocaine (a shipment of narcotics valued at $75 million). Four members of Los Lobos gang were arrested and two vehicles, three cell phones, two metal detectors and cash was seized.

Property destruction: On 13 June 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), police and armed forces raided a warehouse used by a criminal group to store illegal fuel in the El Tropezon sector. Around 2,050 gallons of petrol were seized alongside a firearm and ammunition. There were no arrests.

Around 13 June 2024 (as reported), in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals described as gunmen on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the San Jose Sur sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 13 June 2024 (as reported), in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty female police officer and her body was found in the Jambeli island. The victim had been missing since 7 June and her body was found in a state of decomposition, buried in the sand. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 13 June 2024, in Manantiales (Manabi), armed forces used remote explosives and destroyed a clandestine runway found in the Manantiales sector in a controlled explosion. The runway had already registered light aircraft traffic linked to drug trafficking. There were no arrests.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Policia DMG Zona 8; Primicias
notes: On 13 June 2024, in Daule (Guayas), police and armed forces arrested 10 members of Los Pechiches gang, including their leader. Police seized six firearms, 670 ammunition cartridges, eight ammo feeders and two motorbikes. There is no further information available.

On 13 June 2024, in La Aurora (Guayas), an unidentified armed individual on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Leon Febres-Cordero Avenue, in the La Aurora sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 14 June 2024, in Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals fired shots at the municipal Transit Detention Centre. Several vehicles were hit by bullets but there were no victims. Authorship unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 14 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Cuba neighborhood. The victim's wife was not injured. It is suspected the victims may have been targeted by extortionists or robbers. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 June 2024, in Olmedo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed three men in the La Italia sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 14 June 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a Spanish woman and a man and held them for ransom. The victims were held for four days and rescued by the police on 18 June. Five suspects were arrested and the police seized four trucks, a motorbike, eight cell phones, a laptop and documents.

Other: On 14 June 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), the Constitutional Court overthrew the state of emergency Executive Decree 275 put in place within the context of the armed conflict. During the implementation of the state of emergency, president Daniel Noboa focused on seven provinces and the canton of Ponce Enriquez, province of Azuay.

Weapons seizure: On 14 June 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), armed forces seized 158 emulsion explosive blocks, 679 blocks of ammonium nitrate, 1,200m of slow fuse, 337 explosive capsules, and other materials. There were no arrests.

Property destruction: On 14 June 2024, in Manta (Manabi), police forces dismantled a drug lab and arrested two suspects described as delinquents. In total police seized 146 drug packages and three cell phones.

On 14 June 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman in a drive-by shooting on Jaime Roldos Street and 25 de Junio Avenue. The victim's daughter was injured by a stray bullet. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 June 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified heavily armed individuals described as hitmen in a car shot and killed two brothers riding a motorbike in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.
Defusal: On 15 June 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police and armed forces defused a homemade explosive inside a restaurant. There is no further information available.

On 15 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Pascuales sector. The victim had a police record for robbery and had been recently released from prison. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 June 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Jaime Roldos sector. The victim had recently been freed from prison for drug trafficking and possession of a firearm and he was shot dead by five gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 June 2024, in Milagro (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals carrying rifles on a motorbike shot and killed an off-duty security guard in a drive-by shooting in the Roberto Astudillo parish. Another person was injured by stray bullets but it is suspected that both were shot at by mistake. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 June 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a taxi driver when he was working in the Cielito Lindo sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 June 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Libertad Avenue, El Floron sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 June 2024, in Samborondon (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed five people and injured two others in the Lechuceras neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 5 fatalities.

Around 15 June 2024 (month of), in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), a man was strangled and killed and his body was found tied up and with signs of violence (unspecified) inside his house in the La Gasca sector. The victim was engaged in the sale of medical supplies. One of the two perpetrators, a Colombian national, was arrested on 5 November in the Carcelen Bajo sector. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 15 June 2024 (month of), in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and a woman with more than 30 gunshots on 25 de Junio Avenue. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuador en Vivo; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: Property destruction: On 16 June 2024, off the Coast of Puerto Velasco Ibarra (San Cristobal, Galapagos), military and police forces seized 40 bags of drugs (approximately 1.5 tons valued at $60 million) and fuel on a boat during a sea surveillance patrol 258 nautical miles from San Cristobal Island. Three suspects were arrested.

On 16 June 2024, in Bahia de Caraquez (Sucre, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen in a vehicle shot and killed three people and injured three others in a drive-by shooting in the Francisco Paco Marasita neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 16 June 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting the Valle Hermoso sector. Three other people were injured by stray bullets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 16 June 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), four members Los Tiguerones gang in a vehicle shot and killed three people in a drive-by shooting in the Alto Cenepa Bajo neighborhood. Five other victims were injured and a suspect was arrested on 19 June. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 16 June 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with at least four gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Paraiso de la Flor cooperative. The same day, two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Floresta 2 citadel. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 16 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Guasmo Sur sector. The victim had a criminal record for robbery, possession of firearms, drug possession and murder. 1 fatality.

Around 16 June 2024 (as reported), in La Libertad (Santa Elena), a man was shot and killed with gunshots to the head and his body found with torture signs (unspecified) in a garbage dump on the La Libertad-Anconcito Road. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Policia Ecuador; Primicias
notes: On 16 June 2024, in Manta (Manabi), police forces arrested a high-profile member of Los Choneros Gang in the Maria Auxiliadora sector. The suspect was involved in killings, robberies and drug trafficking. A pistol, 10 ammunition cartridges and an ammo feeder were seized.

On 16 June 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man on Junin and General Paez Streets. Later, unknown suspects shot and killed another man in the Amazonas 1 neighborhood. It is suspected both cases are related to disputes between two criminal groups. 2 fatalities.

On 16 June 2024, in Sucre (24 de Mayo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three people in the Francisco Marazita citadel, Leonidas Plaza parish. It is suspected the killings may be related to drug trafficking disputes between Los Lobos and Choneros. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 16 June 2024 (as reported), in Chongon (Guayaquil, Guayas), a person was killed and their upper limbs were found in the Chongon dam. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 June 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a taxi shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in front of his private residence. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 June 2024, in Balzar (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three men in the Las Pajitas neighborhood. It is suspected the killing was a settling of scores. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.
Property destruction: On 17 June 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), police forces dismantled a drug laboratory and seized 23kg of marijuana. One suspect was arrested.

On 17 June 2024, in Samborondon (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Santa Ana and Los Rios Avenues. The victim was shot at least three times and the killing might have been related to extortion. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 June 2024, in Sucre (24 de Mayo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a bus driver while he was working in the El Cambio parish. The victim died hours later at the hospital. It is suspected the killings may be related to drug trafficking disputes between Los Lobos and Choneros. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 June 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed three people in a drive-by shooting on 8 Avenue, Barrio Lindo sector. The suspects were carrying rifles. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

notes: On 18 June 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed at least eight fishers in the Bajo Alto coastal area, La Puntilla sector. Some of the victims were kidnapped and taken on a boat which was set on fire in the high seas. One suspect was arrested on 20 June and the police seized an assault rifle. It is suspected the killings were related to extortion. At least 8 fatalities.

On 18 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two Mafia-18 gang members on a motorbike shot and killed a truck driver in a drive-by shooting in the Flor de Bastion sector while he was working. Two private security guards were shot and injured. Local residents stole the guards' firearms. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 June 2024, in Junin (Manabi), two members of Los Choneros gang on a motorbike shot and killed a person driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 June 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of armed individuals described as gunmen shot and killed a truck driver on 27 Avenue and 30 Street, 25 de Septiembre neighborhood. The victim was shot four times and he had a police record for drug trafficking from 2007, 2012, and 2016, and family members stated that he had abandoned that lifestyle. It is suspected the killing was due to retaliation. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 18 June 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in vehicles shot and killed three men during a funeral wake in a drive-by shooting in the Voluntad de Dios neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Policia DMZ Zona 9
notes: Defusal: On 18 June 2024, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), police forces defused an explosive artefact thrown inside the North Judicial Complex, in the Inaquito sector. The bomb was thrown inside by an unidentified individual wearing a motorbike helmet and the building was evacuated.

On 18 June 2024, in Sucre (24 de Mayo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Leonidas Plaza Gutierrez parish. It is suspected the killings may be related to drug trafficking disputes between Los Lobos and Choneros. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 June 2024, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), local residents of Carapungo parish organized as a vigilante group tied up and beat a suspected robber of foreign nationality. The suspect was arrested but released minutes later for lack of police complaints. There were no fatalities.

On 19 June 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a motorbike taxi driver. The victim was shot three times while dropping off a passenger at Las Palmas resort. It is suspected the killing might have been related to drug trafficking disputes. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 19 June 2024 (week of), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two people were killed and their decapitated bodies were found floating in the Guayas River, Miami Beach, near Playita del Guasmo. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 19 June 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Machala municipality (El Oro), a man was shot and killed and his body found in a banana plantation with his hands tied behind his body. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 19 June 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed three men in a drive-by shooting in the San Jose sector. A fourth person was injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 19 June 2024 (as reported), in Valencia (Los Rios), a man was shot and killed and his body found hanging from the neck on a viaduct over the San Pablo River. notes: On 19 June 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as criminals shot and killed a woman in the Las Cabras sector, Barreiro parish. The victim was shot at least five times and her photograph appeared on a target list shared on social networks. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 20 June 2024 (as reported), in El Empalme (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a person and held them for ransom (express kidnapping). The victim was rescued by the police. Four suspects were arrested.

On 20 June 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals dressed as electricity company workers on a motorbike shot and killed a man with two gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Juventud Progresista neighborhood. The victim had a police record from 2013. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 June 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the 24 de Septiembre neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

notes: On 20 June 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen in a car shot and killed three men in a drive-by shooting on Primero de Mayo Street, Andres de Vera parish.
