source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; El Diario (Ecuador); Expreso; Primicias
notes: On 20 June 2024, in El Zapote (Portoviejo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed two man driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the Zapote sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 20 June 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals blew up a taxi with Molotov cocktails in the Teniente Hugo Ortiz neighborhood. The suspects also fired shots at the vehicle. The driver was inside the vehicle but there were no reports on his whereabouts after the attack. There were no fatalities.
On 20 June 2024, in Tonsupa (Atacames, Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 20 June 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as members of a criminal group fired shots and set fire to an empty taxi in front of a taxi cooperative where members were meeting. The suspects demanded an extortion tax which the workers refused to pay. There were no casualties.
On 20 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), local residents from Malvinas sector attacked vehicles belonging to electric company workers with rocks to avoid having their meters checked.

Around 20 June 2024 (as reported), in Mocache (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a man and held him for ransom (express kidnapping) in the El Progreso compound. The victim was rescued by the police on the same day.

source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 20 June 2024, in La Aurora (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as gunmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Leon Febres-Cordero Avenue, in the La Aurora sector. The victim had a police record for robbery from 2014 and was shot more than 10 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 June 2024, in Barbones (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a Venezuelan man in a drive-by shooting. The suspects fired at least four times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuador en Vivo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Primicias
notes: On 21 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Nueve de Octubre (Guayas), two members of Los Tiguerones gang on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Tungurahua and Medardo Angel Silva Streets. A suspect was arrested in the 9 de Octubre neighborhood but the other escaped. The suspect arrested had police records for robbery from 2021 and 2023. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 June 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in the Abel Gilbert 3 citadel in a drive-by shooting. Another victim was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 21 June 2024 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), a person was killed and their mutilated body was found in a drug storage cove in the Las Planateras sector. The Armed Forces found the body and it is suspected the killing is related to drug trafficking. The number of perpetrators is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 June 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with four gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Los Ceibos sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 21 June 2024 (as reported), in Ventanas (Los Rios), a man was killed and his body found with his hands tied and his head covered with a cloth on the road to Los Canales. The victim was found next to a cardboard sign saying it was forbidden to commit robberies in Ventanas, which might be the killing motivation. The number of perpetrators is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 June 2024, in Simon Bolivar (Guayas), several members of Los Aguilas gang dressed as police officers kidnapped a person in the Mata de Platano area and held them for ransom. The victim was rescued by the police on 3 July and three suspects were arrested. There is no further information available.

On 21 June 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes described as hitmen shot and killed a man with several gunshots to the head in a drive-by shooting during a wake in the Barreiro parish. On 22 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man inside a workshop in a drive-by shooting in the Bastion Popular sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 June 2024, in Montanita (Santa Elena), members of Los Choneros gang shot and killed a man. The victim had a police record for drug trafficking and firearm possession from 2023. On 22 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), seven unknown shooters fired shots in the Pascuales neighborhood during a killing attempt. On 22 June 2024, in Quito - Tumbaco (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle fired a shot at a man driving his car in a drive-by shooting on Ruta Viva, towards Cumbaya. It is suspected the perpetrators were kidnappers. Authorship unknown. There were no casualties.

On 22 June 2024, in Samborondon (Guayas), five unidentified armed individuals in a truck shot and killed a man inside his home in a drive-by shooting in the Antonio Hanna cooperative. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Letamendi (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Gallegos Lara and Domingo Savio Streets. The victim was shot several times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 23 June 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), armed and police forces arrested one of the leaders of Los Lobos gang, who have been arrested three times in 2024. The suspect also has other police records for robbery, killings and illegal possession of firearms from 2023, 2020, 2021, and 2016. Police seized a carbine and 12 ammunition cartridges.

On 23 June 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Colinas del Sur sector. The suspects fired at least 10 gunshots and it is suspected both killings are related to territorial dispute between criminal groups. One of the victims was a Venezuelan national. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 23 June 2024 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), a man was shot dead and his body found with two gunshot wounds to the head in the Casa Bonita sector. The victim was a drug user. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 23 June 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the 5 Esquinas sector, between Francisco Pacheco, 9 de Octubre, and Pedro Gual Streets. The victim was a famous football player. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 June 2024, in Pajan (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting on the corner of Manuel Lorenzo Nieto and 9 de Octubre Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 23 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a Venezuelan man with eight gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Alamos Norte citadel. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 23 June 2024, in Machala (El Oro), police forces seized more than two tons of cocaine, or 1,950 packages (more than 19 million doses, 2,364,530g valued at $145 million), inside a shipping container bound for Spain. Two suspects were arrested.

On 24 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals kidnapped three people, one of them a foreigner, and held them for ransom in the Nueva Prosperina neighborhood. Police rescued the three victims and arrested both suspects.

On 24 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police forces shot and injured a man inside his house in the Union de Bananeros cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. According to the victim's family, the officers asked for them to leave and shot him three times in the leg. The victim had no police record. There were no fatalities.

Around 24 June 2024 (as reported), in Rio Bonito (El Oro), a man was killed and his mutilated body found inside a black sack. The victim showed signs of having been set on fire and he had been missing since 23 June. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 June 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Bellavista Sur neighborhood. The victim was hit at least five times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 24 June 2024, in Machala (El Oro), four unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on motorbikes shot and killed a man driving a vehicle in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Buenavista and 13va Norte Streets. The victim's female companion was unharmed. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 24 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed two brothers driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting on Domingo Comin Avenue and Cotacachi Street, Las Malvinas sector. It is suspected the victims were confused with snitch by a criminal gang. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Defusal: On 24 June 2024, in Machala (El Oro), police forces defused an explosive device from the national assembly building during the celebration of the bicentennial of the city on Santa Rosa and Rocafuerte Streets. There were no arrests.

On 24 June 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), residents of San Luis de Chillogallo organized as a vigilante group beat up and tied up a man involved in robberies. The suspect was arrested by the police. Another suspect managed to escape on a motorbike. There were no fatalities.

On 24 June 2024, in Santa Lucia (Guayas), three unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man inside a house. The victim's body was found inside his father's house moments later and it is suspected he was shot dead while he was sleeping. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 25 June 2024, in Lomas de Sargentillo (Guayas), local residents beat up and tied up a transexual woman and another woman involved in a robbery to a lighting pole. The victims had their hair cut with a machete and their bodies set on fire. The police arrested both victims who were hospitalized. There were no fatalities.

On 25 June 2024, in Latacunga (Cotopaxi), 200 residents from the Nueva Vida neighborhood threw stones at 50 police officers during a demonstration demanding that they hand over two women of foreign nationality who tried to kidnap an adolescent. Police threw tear gas to disperse the crowd. One demonstrator and one officer were injured. There were no arrests.

On 25 June 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a taxi driver and forced him to drive to the hospital. The motivation was to kidnap another person who was at the hospital. There is no further information available.

On 25 June 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a motorbike delivery driver while at work on Jose Delgadillo and Cristobal Colon Streets. The perpetrators arrived on a motorcycle and one of then stepped off the vehicle and shot the victim. The victim took at least five gunshots to the head and he had been receiving threats. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 June 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), an unidentified armed individual who arrived on a motorbike, described as a gunman, shot and killed a man inside a hair salon in the Santa Rosa locality. The victim was the brother of a community leader. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 June 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), two men were killed and their beheaded bodies found in the La Independencia community. From the clothing the victims were wearing they appear to be local miners. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 25 June 2024 (as reported), in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car fired shots at a man in a drive-by shooting in the Jaime Roldos and 36 Avenue, in El Desquite sector, Viva Alfaro parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

On 25 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a group of merchants threw stones at municipal traffic control agent inside a vehicle in the Martha Bucaram de Roldos sector. The car windows were broken. There were no casualties.

On 25 June 2024, in Chone (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a person and held them for ransom (express kidnapping) in the Tres Bocas sector. The victim was rescued by the police on the same day. There were no arrests.

On 26 June 2024, in Playas (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified heavily-armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man driving a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Progreso-Playas Highway. The victim was a former financial director in the previous municipal administration and he was shot multiple times in the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 26 June 2024 (as reported), in Puerto Jeli (Santa Rosa, El Oro), a fisherman was shot and killed and his body found in the La Puntilla sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 June 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals who arrived on a motorbike described as gunmen shot and killed a man inside a restaurant. The perpetrators approached the restaurant on foot. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 26 June 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen who arrived on a motorbike shot and killed two men in a pool house in the Santa Isabela sector. The suspects fired at least 15 gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 26 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals described as delinquents in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Condor citadel. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as delinquents shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Casitas del Guasmo cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. It is suspected that the killings were related to a drug trafficking dispute between Los Lagartos gang and Mafia-18 gang. 2 fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Policia DMZ Zona 9; Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 26 June 2024, around Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces seized more than 8 tons of calcium chloride bound to Colombia. Police also arrested 11 unidentified individuals involved in large-scale drug trafficking and described as members of a drug-criminal organization.

Around 26 June 2024 (week of), in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators kidnapped a businessman for extortion along Juan Gomez Rendon Avenue. The victim had been kidnapped for around 40 days. Police forces liberated the victim on 1 August 2024 during a police operation in Taura, where they also arrested three perpetrators. Police forces had also conducted raids between 26 and 27 June where they apprehended five other suspects in connection with the kidnapping.

On 27 June 2024, in Patricia Pilar (Buena Fe, Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as delinquents kidnapped a family and held them for ransom (express kidnapping). There is no further information available.

On 27 June 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), at least 10 unidentified heavily-armed individuals described as criminals fired several shots at a small plane carrying a large amount of gold bars and cash during landing. The plane was hit and fuel spilled while landing at the Jose Joaquin de Olmedo airport. The captain and two passengers were unharmed but had to fly back to Guayaquil. Police forces chased after the criminals but three vehicles were affected by caltrops. There were no casualties.

Around 27 June 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as delinquents shot and killed a man inside a workshop in a drive-by shooting. One suspect was arrested and given a 24-year prison sentence. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified heavily-armed individuals in a car fired shots at an armored vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Bombero Avenue, Los Ceibos sector. It is suspected it was a killing attempt. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

Property destruction: Around 27 June 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals described as members of a criminal group destroyed 23 video surveillance cameras located in several streets in the Nueva Prosperina neighborhood. The footage was being used to prevent kidnappings, robberies and other emergencies.

On 27 June 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), unregulated merchants clashed against metropolitan police agents in the Mercado Central area. The merchants used stones, sticks and other objects and the agents responded with pepper spray. Two agents were injured.

On 27 June 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Barreiro parish. The victim had recently been released from prison with a police record for theft, but was also being investigated for possession of firearms and explosives. The perpetrators shot him at least 12 times. 1 fatality.

On 28 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the Flor de Bastion sector. Three suspects were arrested on the same day, one of them an adolescent also. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 June 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals dressed as police officers in a vehicle kidnapped a man. One suspect was arrested by police forces after a car chase. There is no further information available.

On 28 June 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as members of a criminal group fired shots and threw an explosive at members of a taxi cooperative in several different attacks as acts of intimidation to force them to pay an extortion tax. The suspects also left a threatening pamphlet. Casualties unknown.

On 28 June 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as criminals shot and killed a man inside his barbershop in a drive-by shooting. Later, two of the victim's friends were shot at in the Parque Plaza sector by men on motorbikes described as gunmen. One of them died. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 28 June 2024, in Sucre (24 de Mayo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed two men inside a taxi in a drive-by shooting in the Fanca sector, Leonidas Plaza parish. One of the victims was a taxi driver and the perpetrators fired at least seven times. It is suspected the killing is related to territory dispute between Los Lobos gang and Los Choneros gang. 2 fatalities.

On 28 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Olmedo (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a woman driving a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Febres Cordero and Cacique Alvarez Streets. The victim's husband who was also in the vehicle was not injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Heraldo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 29 June 2024, in Quito - Tumbaco (Pichincha), police forces and agents from the prosecutor's office arrested one judge and raided the homes of 17 suspects who were put in pre-emptive prisons around the country. All suspects, including justice operators, were being investigated for favoring prisoners during the 'Plaga' case. Police seized phones, folders, computers and other evidence. The judge arrested facilitated the release of members of Los Lobos gang.

source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Heraldo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 29 June 2024, in Cuenca (Azuay), police forces and agents from the prosecutor's office arrested one judge and raided the homes of 17 suspects who were put in pre-emptive prisons around the country. All suspects, including justice operators, were being investigated for favoring prisoners during the 'Plaga' case. Police seized phones, folders, computers and other evidence. The judge arrested facilitated the release of members of Los Lobos gang.

source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Heraldo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 29 June 2024, in Milagro (Guayas), police forces and agents from the prosecutor's office arrested one judge and raided the homes of 17 suspects who were put in pre-emptive prisons around the country. All suspects, including justice operators, were being investigated for favoring prisoners during the 'Plaga' case. Police seized phones, folders, computers and other evidence. The judge arrested facilitated the release of members of Los Lobos gang.

source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Heraldo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 29 June 2024, in Riobamba (Chimborazo), police forces and agents from the prosecutor's office arrested one judge and raided the homes of 17 suspects who were put in pre-emptive prisons around the country. All suspects, including justice operators, were being investigated for favoring prisoners during the 'Plaga' case. Police seized phones, folders, computers and other evidence. The judge arrested facilitated the release of members of Los Lobos gang.

source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Heraldo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 29 June 2024, in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), police forces and agents from the prosecutor's office arrested one judge and raided the homes of 17 suspects who were put in pre-emptive prisons around the country. All suspects, including justice operators, were being investigated for favoring prisoners during the 'Plaga' case. Police seized phones, folders, computers and other evidence. The judge arrested facilitated the release of members of Los Lobos gang.

On 29 June 2024, in Duran (Guayas), four members of the Latin Kings gang in a vehicle shot and killed a Peruvian national in a drive-by shooting in the 28 de Agosto cooperative. The victim had a police record for drug possession. The target of the shooting was an Ecuadorian man who was also shot dead. Motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 29 June 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (likely Los Lobos Gang members due to their intention to control local mines) shot and injured three members of the same family in the La Patricia sector. One of the victims was the owner of a mining company. Los Lobos gang has been trying to seize control of local mines. There were no fatalities.

On 29 June 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), two unidentified heavily-armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Miraflores neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a person and held him for ransom (express kidnapping) in the Florida neighborhood. The victim was a merchant and police forces rescued him on the same day. There is no further information available.

On 30 June 2024, in Anconcito (Salinas, Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting. The victim's body was found moments later in a vacant lot and he had no police records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 June 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), several unidentified hooded and armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the Reina del Quinche cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. Another adolescent was shot and injured and the perpetrators fired at least 11 gunshots. It is suspected the killing is related to a dispute over territory between two criminal organizations. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 30 June 2024 (as reported), in La Joya de los Sachas (Orellana), a man was shot and killed with a gunshot to the head and his body found with his hands tied in the Morena sector. The perpetrators used a long-range rifle. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 30 June 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unidentified armed individual dressed in homeless clothing in a car shot and killed two people in a drive-by shooting in a sports field in the Los Naranjos neighborhood. Six other people were injured and the perpetrators fired at least 16 gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 30 June 2024 (as reported), in El Carmen (Manabi), a man was killed and his dismembered body found at kilometer 2 of the El Carmen bypass. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 30 June 2024 (as reported), in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed the leader of the La Chorrera motorbike club in a drive-by shooting during a funeral wake in the Barreiro parish. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The victim had a police record for murder in 2013 and robbery in 2015. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman in a park in the Casitas del Guasmo cooperative, Guasmo Norte sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 1 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Roberto Serrano Avenue, near the Floresta 2 citadel. The victim was working at a pizza stand at the time of the killing and he was shot several times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an adolescent and injured another in the Reina del Quinche cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. It is suspected the killing is related to a dispute over territory between criminal groups. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: Around 1 July 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Santa Rosa canton (El Oro), three men were killed and their bodies found in a banana plantation tied up with gunshot wounds to their heads and signs of torture (unspecified) in the La Alcira farm, La Victoria parish. The victims had been missing for a few days. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.
Defusal: On 1 July 2024, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), police forces and the anti-bomb squad defused explosives left inside a suitcase on Naciones Unidas and Inaquito Streets.

source: El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: Property destruction: On 1 July 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), police forces with the support of a canine unit seized over 3 tons of cocaine, around 3,190 brick-shaped packages weighing 3,183,620kg valued at $6.3 million ($254 million in Europe), during a raid carried out in a shipment of bananas bound to Ruled, a city in Russia.

Property destruction: On 1 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike fired shots at a house and a car parked outside in the 25 de Enero cooperative, Guasmo Norte sector.

On 1 July 2024, in Samborondon (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three men driving a vehicle in a drive-by shooting along Arrocero Avenue. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_1: FEUE: Federation of University Students of Ecuador; Labor Group (Ecuador); Students (Ecuador); Teachers (Ecuador); UNE: National Union of Educators
notes: On 2 July 2024, between San Miguel de Salcedo and Latacunga (Cotopaxi), an unknown number of demonstrators carrying signs and banners led by UNE, FEUE, and other labor unions blocked traffic and set tires and tree trunks on fire on the Panamericana Sur highway. The motivation was the end of fuel subsidies which would increase the price of petrol considerably.

On 2 July 2024, in Salache Grande (Latacunga, Cotopaxi), a large crowd of people blocked the E35 highway with burning tires and demonstrated with banners and flags against the end of fuel subsidies and the rise in fuel prices. Similar marches were also reported in Quito and Guayaquil (coded separately). There were no arrests.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Prensa Latina; Primicias
notes: On 2 July 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two members of the Los Pepes gang on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man sitting inside his car in a drive-by shooting in the Municipal neighborhood. The armed and police forces arrested one suspect on 2 July and another 12 members of the gang, including a Venezuelan and an operational leader behind the assassination, during operation 'Gran Fenix 46', carried out in the provinces of Manabi, Pichincha, Los Rios, Azuay and Cotopaxi. The arrests were described as a dismantling of the gang. The leader arrested had nine criminal records for illicit association, robbery and aggravated robbery. The victim was a former mayoral candidate (Avanza) and he had run for city hall twice. The victim had also been an advisor for the Manabi Mayor's Office, an official at the Manabi Comptroller's Office, and procurator of Santa Ana. The motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of demonstrators members of unions carrying banners and signs burned tires and objects to block Narcisa de Jesus Avenue. The demonstration was led by the Popular Front (FP) and they also marched in Quito (coded separately). They demonstrated against the elimination of fuel subsidies which was approved by the government on 28 June.

assoc_actor_1: FP: Popular Front; Labor Group (Ecuador); Students (Ecuador); Teachers (Ecuador); UNE: National Union of Educators; FEUE: Federation of University Students of Ecuador
notes: On 2 July 2024, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), hundreds of demonstrators, workers and teachers carrying banners and signs burned tires, objects and closed Amazonas Avenue. The demonstration was led by the National Union of Educators (UNE), the Popular Front (FP) and the Federation of University Students of Ecuador (FEUE). They also marched on Mariscal Sucre Avenue, Chillogallo neighborhood (coded separately). They demonstrated against the elimination of fuel subsidies which was approved by the government on 28 June.

On 2 July 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped two workers from their food van and held them for ransom in the La Herradura sector. Police forces rescued both victims and arrested six suspects without police records. There is no further information available.

source: El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 2 July 2024 (as reported), in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), around 20 members of Los Lobos gang kidnapped 46 miners from the Punto Dorado mine and held them for ransom in the Puntudo sector, Santa Martha complex. The next day, military officers clashed with the group in a rescue operation (coded separately). Police and armed forces rescued the victims, including two victims of Venezuelan nationality, and found five dismembered bodies of miners killed by the gang. Two Colombian suspects were arrested. Police also seized ammunition, an ammo feeder, ammunition cartridges, two explosives and used helicopters and drones to patrol the area. 5 fatalities.

On 2 July 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting on Guabo and 9na Oeste Streets, 19 de Noviembre neighborhood. The suspects left a pamphlet suggesting links to a gang war in the city and both victims were drug users. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: Other: On 2 July 2024, in Quito (Pichincha), President Daniel Noboa (ADN) declared a 3rd state of emergency with Executive Decree 318 in several provinces due to the internal armed conflict. Armed and police forces will be deployed to cover the provinces of Guayas, Los Rios, Manabi, Orellana, Santa Elena, El Oro, and Camilo Ponce Enriquez. On 3 March 2025, through executive decree 552, the president renewed the order for another 30 days in the same provinces adding Orellana and Sucumbios. On 12 April 2025, the president declared a new state of emergency for another 60 days and also put a curfew in place in the same provinces, cantons and also prisons. On 4 October, the government issued executive decree 174 and declared a new state of emergency for 60 days in 10 provinces and no curfew was imposed. On 5 October, the president renewed executive decree 175 in four other provinces. On 5 November, the president declared a new state of emergency in the provinces of Manabi, Guayas, Santa Elena, Los Rios and El Oro, and in the cantons of La Mana, Las Naves and Echeandia.

On 3 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as delinquents dressed in military uniforms kidnapped a man in the Garzota citadel. There is no further information available.

On 3 July 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a man and held him for ransom (express kidnapping). The victim was rescued by the police hours later which found him with his hands and feet tied, his mouth covered with tape and in critical condition, from a house in the Carlos Carriel sector, Ventanas canton. There is no further information available.

On 3 July 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), four unidentified armed and hooded men dressed as police officers (likely Los Lobos Gang members due to internal disputes between the group going on in the area) shot and killed a man inside his house in the Los Laureles subdivision. The perpetrators were dressed in police uniforms and left the scene in a van. The victim had a criminal record for robbery in 2021 and intimidation from 2023. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a taxi driver in the Santa Ana hill, La Pampa sector. The same day, four unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a taxi driver in the Juan Montalvo sector. The suspects stole the vehicle after the killing. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 3 July 2024, in Vinces (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men in the Nicaragua sector, on the road to Mocache. One victim was hit 12 times and the other five, with several shots in the head of both victims. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 3 July 2024 (as reported), in Puerto Limon (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his head was found inside a jute sack at the intersection between Manuel Muriel Street and an alley, 5 de Junio neighborhood. The victim was an artisanal fisher and his killing was attributed to gang rivalries. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 July 2024, in Loja (Loja), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a Venezuelan national in a drive-by shooting in the Borja sector. The victim was not involved in criminal activities and did not receive any threats. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Policia DMZ Zona 9; Primicias
notes: Property destruction: On 3 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police forces with the support of canine units seized more than six tons of cocaine, around 6,287 brick-shaped packages equivalent to 17 million doses valued at $68 million in Ecuador but around $250 million in Europe, inside a container in the Esteros sector. The shipment was found during operation 'Gran Fenix 31' and was bound for Malaga, Spain. Eight suspects were arrested.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 3 July 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a student in a drive-by shooting in the Calderon neighborhood. The student was leaving the Maria del Carmen Gavilanes school at the time of the shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 July 2024, around Guayas province (coded Daule), a lawyer was killed and his dismembered body found on a road to Daule. It is likely the victim's job was the attack motivation. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship is unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 3 July 2024 (as reported), in Simon Bolivar (Guayas), at least three unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a man and held him for ransom. Police forces rescued the victim, seized seven cell phones and one laptop and arrested three suspects, two of them involved in multiple crimes. There is no further information available.

On 4 July 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of people physically assaulted two robbers and set their stolen motorbike on fire on June Guzman and Decima Segunda Streets. The two suspects were rescued by the police and arrested on 12 de Octubre Street before they were burned alive. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_1: FP: Popular Front; FUT: United Workers' Front; Labor Group (Ecuador); Students (Ecuador); UP: Popular Unity (Ecuador); FEUE: Federation of University Students of Ecuador
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Wambra Medio Comunitario
notes: On 4 July 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), 4,500 demonstrators led by the Popular Front, the United Workers Front and Popular Unity clashed against the police at the intersection between Bolivar Street and Guayaquil Street. The demonstrators removed the fences covering one of the entrances to the Plaza Grande, threw stones at the officers and set tires and objects on fire. Some demonstrators also burned cardboard figures of president Daniel Noboa (ADN). Four demonstrators were arrested and one officer was injured. The marches against the increase in fuel prices decreed by the government were part of a national strike organized by FEUE, FP and more than 40 workers unions including FUT.

On 4 July 2024, in Daule (Guayas), police and armed forces arrested six members of Los Choneros gang, two of them leaders, who were involved in robberies. At least seven other members of Los Fatales gang were also arrested and five properties were raided during operation 'Cero Impunidad'. 154 grams of heroin, three motorbikes, 47 ammunition cartridges, three cell phones, one ammo feeder and one bag of drugs were seized.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 4 July 2024, in Sosote (Manabi), armed forces arrested a leader of Los Choneros gang and raided two homes. The suspect was the security chief of another leader killed in Manta on 8 December 2020 (coded separately). Two ballistic vests, a submachine gun, a knife, several radio communicators and cell phones were seized.
On 4 July 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Oscar Paladines neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 4 July 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a lawyer. It is likely the victim was forced to withdraw money from ATMs and his body was found dismembered on 14 July (coded separately). There is no further information available.

assoc_actor_1: FEUE: Federation of University Students of Ecuador; FP: Popular Front; FUT: United Workers' Front; Labor Group (Ecuador); Students (Ecuador); Teachers (Ecuador); UNE: National Union of Educators
notes: On 4 July 2024, around Tulcan (Carchi), an unknown number of demonstrators led by the Popular Front and UNE carrying signs, banners and shouting slogans set tires on fire and voiced their discontent against the increase in the fuel prices and the end of subsidies. The demonstration was part of a national strike organized by the Federation of University Students of Ecuador (FEUE), the Popular Front (FP) and more than 40 workers unions including the United Workers' Front (FUT).

assoc_actor_1: FEUE: Federation of University Students of Ecuador; FP: Popular Front; FUT: United Workers' Front; Labor Group (Ecuador); Students (Ecuador)
notes: On 4 July 2024, in the rural area of the Tena canton (Napo), a group of people set tires on fire and blocked a road to show their rejection of the elimination of petrol subsidies by the government of president Daniel Noboa (ADN). The demonstration was part of a national strike organized by the Federation of University Students of Ecuador (FEUE), the Popular Front (FP) and more than 40 workers unions including the United Workers' Front (FUT).

On 5 July 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), local residents set fire to a motorbike used by two unidentified armed individuals for the killing of a man earlier (coded separately). The suspects were suspected to be extortionists. There were no fatalities.

On 5 July 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the La Propicia neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 5 July 2024, in Santa Marta, (Camilo Ponce Enriquez, Azuay), armed forces seized a stolen freight truck during a surveillance and reconnaissance operation in the Santa Martha sector. Inside the truck soldiers found 700 ammonium nitrate sticks (dynamite), an explosive commonly used in illegal mining activities. It is likely that the explosives belonged to Los Lobos gang because of the location and the fact the group has been attacking local mines to seize control of illegal mining to finance criminal activities.

On 5 July 2024, in Colon Eloy Alfaro (Esmeraldas), armed forces arrested a high-profile target and member of Los Tiguerones gang involved in killings and extortions in the Pambilar sector. The suspect was in the national most wanted list and the armed forces seized a Chinese rifle, a pistol, a revolver, a large quantity of ammunition, communication radios, cell phone sim cards, cell phones, a tablet and drugs (marijuana and cocaine paste).

On 5 July 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as gunmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the San Martin de Porres sector. The perpetrators took a taxi driver hostage to escape. Local residents set fire to the motorbike used in the killing (coded separately). Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 July 2024, in El Garrido (El Guabo, El Oro), several unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a transit agent of the national Ecuador Transit Commission (CTE) who was driving a vehicle. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 6 July 2024 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), a man was shot and killed and his body was found inside a car in the San Rafael neighborhood, Valle Hermoso sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The victim was an employee of the Esmeraldas Port Authority, ascribed to the national Ministry of Transportation. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 July 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of people described as vandals set fire to two motorbikes on Mejia Street, between Antonio Jose de Sucre and Jose Joaquin de Olmedo Avenues. It is suspected that the attacks were intended to distract authorities carrying out operations to find the perpetrators of a killing (coded separately). There is no further information available. There were no fatalities.

Around 6 July 2024 (as reported), in Santa Marta (Camilo Ponce Enriquez, Azuay), two men and a woman were killed and their dismembered and decomposing bodies were found in the Santa Martha sector. 3 fatalities.

On 6 July 2024, in Duran (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Hermano Gregorio 2 cooperative. The victim had no police records, but the perpetrators fired about 30 gunshots of which two hit the victim. Another man was also shot but escaped. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 6 July 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the El Limon canton (Portoviejo, El Oro), a man was shot and killed and his body found in a banana plantation. The victim was shot multiple times in the head by unidentified armed men in a pickup truck. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Rocafuerte (Guayas), five unidentified armed individuals in a car kidnapped a man and held him for ransom (express kidnapping) between 10 de Agosto Street and Quito Avenue. The victim was a local merchant and he was physically assaulted by the perpetrators. There is no further information available.

On 6 July 2024, in Jipijapa (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Dagal sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 July 2024, in Patricia Pilar (Buena Fe, Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Los Angeles neighborhood. It is suspected the victim had issues with drug traffickers. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 July 2024, in Picoaza (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as gunmen shot and killed a man driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the Picoaza parish. The victim was a shrimp merchant and it is likely the killing is related to extortions. The suspects fired at least seven times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 7 July 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), armed forces shot and killed a municipal transit agency worker during a weapons check in the La Perla Park, El Guayacan neighborhood. According to the military the driver of a vehicle avoided an armed patrol, reason why he was shot at by a soldier. The perpetrator was arrested on 11 July. 1 fatality.

Around 7 July 2024 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a man was shot and killed and his body found with signs of torture (unspecified) in an abandoned lot in the Ismael Perez Castro subdivision. The victim was shot several times in the head and was likely left there after being killed elsewhere. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a woman in a drive-by shooting in the Fertisa sector, Santiaguito Roldos cooperative. The victim was shot twice in the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man in the Centenario neighborhood. The perpetrators were carrying large-calibre firearms. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 7 July 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men during a football championship in the Unioro neighborhood. The suspects fired at least 40 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 7 July 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three people outside a store in the La Yadira sector. The perpetrators fired rifles and pistols against the victims who had police records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 7 July 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), three unidentified armed men who arrived on a motorbike shot and killed a man inside a house in the Atahualpa neighborhood after kicking the door down and breaking into it. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 July 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man on Estados Unidos Street, in the Air Libre sector, Las Americas neighborhood. The victim was a worker at the municipal department of culture and sports. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 8 July 2024, in La Iberia (El Guabo, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man inside his vehicle on Panamericana Highway, El Cambio parish. The victim was a worker at the national intelligence office, a local government official of the canton, and was shot at least 15 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes and a tricycle (drive-by shooting) shot and injured a girl near a school in the Bastion Popular sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 8 July 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting the Amazonas neighborhood. The victim was shot four times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 July 2024, in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a man at the entrance to the Velasco Ibarra school. One victim was injured. The perpetrator was arrested and he had police records for robbery, criminal association and possession of firearms. It is suspected the perpetrator is a member of an unidentified gang. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 July 2024, in Santa Lucia (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two cousins in the Bermejo neighborhood. The perpetrators fired a dozen shots with automatic pistols at the victims. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 9 July 2024, in Balzar (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a truck driver driving from Daule to Buena Fe and held him for ransom (express kidnapping). The victim was rescued by the police unharmed. There is no further information available.

On 9 July 2024, in Cuenca (Azuay), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a man and held him for ransom (express kidnapping) in the Miraflores Park. The victim was called by a potential client but was ambushed upon arriving at the agreed-upon location. The victim was rescued by the police with his hands tied on the same day in the Totoracocha parish. Police seized drugs and arrested two suspects who were set free on the same day.

Around 9 July 2024 (as reported), around Cutuglahua (Mejia, Pichincha), a taxi driver was killed and his body found with his hands and feed tied up and his mouth covered by tape. The victim had been reported missing on 5 July in the La Argelia sector of Quito. It is suspected the victim was killed by extortionists.

On 9 July 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two hooded and unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting the Bellavista Norte neighborhood. The victim was shot at least five times and he had two police records, one for homicide from 2005 and another for murder from 2007. It is likely this killing was a settling of scores between Los Gangsters gang and Los Lobos gang. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), two members of Mafia-18 gang on a motorbike shot and injured two adolescents in a drive-by shooting in the Los Vergeles sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 9 July 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and his dismembered body divided into eight parts was found inside plastic bags in a ravine in the Balerio Estacio sector. Five unidentified armed men in a tricycle were responsible for the killing. There is no further information available. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
On 9 July 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), members of the public caught a man involved in robberies and beat him up. There is no further information available.

On 9 July 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), three members of Los Choneros gang kidnapped a bus driver and held him for ransom (express kidnapping) in the Venus del Rio Quevedo parish. Police and armed forces rescued the victim on the same day in the Grito de la Libertad sector and arrested three suspects. A shotgun and two revolvers were seized. There is no further information available.

Around 9 July 2024 (as reported), in a rural area of Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), two men were shot and killed and their bodies found covered in garbage bags in a vacant lot in the La Libertad de Cataguango area. Both victims were tied up and showed signs of torture (unspecified). It is likely the perpetrators were on a vehicle. Police authorities suspected that the victims were taken to be shot there as the area has become a site for executions due to its lack of security cameras and poor lighting. There is no further information available. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 9 July 2024, in Zaruma (El Oro), three unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting outside of his house on Alonso Mercadillo Avenue. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 July 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed three men inside a private property in the La Samaritana sector, El Salto parish. One of the victims was a retired police officer. Los Lobos gang and Los Choneros gang operate in the city. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 10 July 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the UNE neighborhood. The victim was a lawyer who worked as a secretary at the Santa Elena attorney's office and the perpetrator fired 11 times, but only one bullet hit the victim in the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 July 2024, in Valencia (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a city councilor on the Quevedo-Valencia Highway. The victim was rescued by the police on 17 July. There is no further information available.

On 10 July 2024, in Puerto Limon (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), dialysis patients blocked a street and set objects on fire as a pressure measure so that the government would pay off its debt to the clinics they depend on. According to officials the debt dates back 13 months and exceeds $20 million. Police officers used pepper spray to disperse the demonstrators.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 10 July 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), a man was killed and his dismembered body was found divided into head and limbs into jute bags on Causarina Avenue. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The next day, a torso was found in the same area and it is suspected to belong to the same victim. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 10 July 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and his dismembered body was found divided into head and limbs into jute bags on Causarina Avenue. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The next day, a torso was found in the same area and it is suspected to belong to the same victim. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 10 July 2024, in Bajo Alto (El Guabo, El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a private driver while he was working in a drive-by shooting. The victim had no police records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 July 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man near the 16 de Octubre cooperative, on Jaime Roldos Aguilera Avenue. The victim was the owner of a local car washing and it is likely his killing was related to extortions. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 10 July 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a man was killed and his dismembered body found in the Guasmo Sur sector. It is suspected the body was left there by a vehicle or a tricycle and it was divided into three parts, head, torso, and lower limbs. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 10 July 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), armed forces seized 1,600 gallons of diesel stored in plastic bags during an operation to control weapons, ammunition and explosives inside a warehouse. A stolen motorbike was also seized and it is likely the seized materials were used in illegal activities.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Policia Ecuador
notes: Weapons seizure: On 10 July 2024, in Santa Ana (Manabi), police forces dismantled several houses used as weapon and ammunition storage places by the Los Choneros gang. Three suspects were arrested. Police seized eight firearms, four magazines, 107 ammunition cartridges, a ballistic vest, five cell phones and a motorbike.

Around 10 July 2024 (as reported), in Rio Verde (Rioverde, Esmeraldas), two men were killed and their incinerated bodies were found in the San Pedro neighbourhood. They were reported as missing on 10 July and the main suspects of the killings were soldiers from the armed forces who had arrested them during an operation carried out near a football field. The motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 10 July 2024 (as reported), in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an adolescent was killed and his beheaded body was found tied up with pamphlets of Santa Muerte on him in the El Guayabo sector. The victim had been missing since 9 July. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 11 July 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), police forces seized 21 dynamite sticks, 276 ammonium nitrate sticks (dynamite), 50 pounds of ammonium nitrate, one handmade carbine and one ammunition cartridge. It is likely the explosive material was to be used in illegal mining by Los Lobos Box gang due to location.

Property destruction: On 11 July 2024, in El Progreso (Simon Bolivar, Guayas), police forces seized 5,630 brick-shaped packages of cocaine hidden inside export containers bound for Germany. One suspect was arrested.

On 11 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Nueve de Octubre (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Octava and Maldonado Streets, 9 de Octubre neighborhood. The victim had three previous convictions for robbery and nine open cases for other crimes and he was shot at least 15 times. The victim was actively involved in illegal activities and his companion managed to escape. One firearm was seized. 1 fatality.

On 11 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Rocafuerte (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a motorbike described as hitmen shot and killed two men and injured another in a drive-by shooting on 6 de Marzo and Luque Streets, Centenario sector, 9 de Octubre neighborhood. It is suspected one of the victims was dedicated to lending money and had a police record for robbery and that the property was inhabited by Venezuelan and Colombian nationals. Several other people were injured. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former Police Forces of Ecuador (2023-); Taxi/Bus Drivers (Ecuador)
notes: Around 11 July 2024 (as reported), in Junin (Manabi), a man was shot and killed and his body found inside a burned-out taxi he owned. The victim was a taxi driver and retired police officer. It is suspected the killing is related to territory disputes between criminal groups. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 July 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Adolfo Bucaram neighborhood. The victim was shot at least four times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 11 July 2024 (as reported), in Quevedo (Los Rios), a taxi driver was shot and killed and his body found inside his car in the La Baldramina sector. The victim was shot once in the head and crashed his car while driving. It is suspected the driver was followed by an unknown number of armed individuals on a motorbike. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Other: On 12 July 2024, in Manta (Manabi), police forces raided two homes of a former judge as part of the investigation into alleged bribery. The investigation is a part of the 'Metastasis' and 'Purga' cases.

Around 12 July 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was killed and his dismembered body found divided into two parts inside a jute sack on Casuarina Avenue. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 July 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Alejandro Castro Benitez Avenue and Canada Street. The victim was shot in the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 12 July 2024 (between 12 - 13 July), in Catarama (Urdaneta, Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Los Barberos sector, Ricaurte parish. The assailants crashed onto a police car as they were escaping from the police in a chase. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 July 2024, in Jaramijo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Jhon F. Kennedy Street. The perpetrators fired at least 10 gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 12 July 2024, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), four unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed three people inside a barbershop in the Jaime Roldos sector (La Roldos). One person was injured. It is suspected the shooting is related to territory disputes between criminal groups. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 13 July 2024, in San Francisco (Baba, Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an off-duty security guard with several gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Isla de Bejucal parish, San Francisco sector. The victim had a police record for robbery in 2014. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 July 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as gunmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Arenal neighborhood. 1 fatality.
Property destruction: On 13 July 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces raided an apartment used as a drug storage center and seized 100 brick-shaped packages of drugs.

Property destruction: On 13 July 2024, in the rural area of the La Mana canton (Cotopaxi), 30 soldiers and 15 police officers destroyed and improvised landing strip in the La Playita sector. It is suspected the 800m long runway was used by criminal groups to transport drugs, money and firearms to Central America and Mexico. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 13 July 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed men in a car shot and killed two men and injured between five and six others outside a sports center in the El Progreso neighborhood, Eloy Alfaro parish. The perpetrators were aboard a vehicle stolen in Pascuales which was set on fire in the Montecristi canton. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 13 July 2024, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), three unidentified men beat up a man to death on Arenillas Street. The victim's wife was also beat up with sticks. One of the suspects had two police records for drug trafficking. 1 fatality.
On 13 July 2024, in San Isidro (Sucre, Manabi), three unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a banana trader with eight gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 July 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a person and injured another in a drive-by shooting in the Oscar Paladines neighborhood, near the El Coliseo de Deportes sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 July 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), a man was shot and killed in front of the Sucre Park, near the Estadio Universidad Indoamerica. Two unidentified armed individuals shot the victim twice and fled. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 14 July 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), a lawyer was killed and his dismembered body found buried in the Los Pinos compound, Puente Lucia, on KM-26 of the road to Daule. The victim was missing since 4 July and the investigators verified the withdrawing of money from ATMs. It is likely the victim was killed by extortionists after being kidnapped. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: Around 14 July 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Machala canton (El Oro), a person was shot and killed and his dismembered body found on the side of the La Primavera Road. The victim was killed elsewhere, the body was divided into four parts and placed in a jute sack near a banana plantation. The number of perpetrators is unknown but the body was found beside a paper which attributed the killing to Los Carnes Fritas gang. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 14 July 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals described as gunmen shot and killed a woman and injured a man in the El Floron 2 neighborhood. The locality is known for drug trafficking. Neither of the victims had police records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 July 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in the Bazan neighborhood in a drive-by shooting. It is suspected the perpetrators were drug traffickers. The victim was a man who had recently left a rehabilitation center. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 July 2024, in San Pablo (Santa Elena), three unidentified armed and hooded men described as bandits strangled and killed a man inside a house in the 25 de Julio neighborhood. The victim had no police records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 14 July 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals who arrived on motorbikes described as hitmen shot and killed five people in the Reina del Cisne neighborhood. It is suspected the attack happened at an LGBTQ+ clandestine bar and one of the victims was the owner. The perpetrators fired at least 40 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 14 July 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as gunmen in a car shot and killed a man and his son in a drive-by on Francisco Becerra Street, Ibarra citadel. The perpetrators fired at least five times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 14 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of local citizens beat up a suspected robber in the 11 Portete neighborhood. The suspect was rescued by the police. There were no fatalities.

source: Ecuador en Vivo; El Diario (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 15 July 2024, in Quito (Pichincha), police forces with the support of the state attorney's office conducted seven raids and arrested three people involved in money laundering. One of the suspects was an official of an entity that is in charge of preventing the crime and the three suspects together had laundered approximately $21 million between 2016 and 2023.

assoc_actor_1: Labor Group (Ecuador); Teachers (Ecuador); UNE: National Union of Educators; FP: Popular Front
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 15 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), over 20 people, led by UNE teachers and the Popular Front, carrying flags set tires on fire and blocked the Narcisa de Jesus highway, near Metropolis in the Pascuales-Terminal Terrestre direction, against the end to fuel subsidies and the increase in petrol costs. In another region, between 29 and Q Streets, another group of demonstrators also set fire to tires.

Property destruction: On 15 July 2024, on the Coast of Puerto Velasco Ibarra (San Cristobal, Galapagos), navy and police forces seized 1,300 brick-shaped bags of cocaine valued at $72 million in Europe and $36 million in the US and weighting 1.6 tons hidden inside a boat. The navy arrested three suspects. The drugs were bound for Mexico and then United States. Petrol was also seized and the seizure was made 350 nautical miles from the continent.

Property destruction: Around 15 July 2024 (month of), around Tobar Donoso (Carchi), armed forces dismantled an improvised camp dedicated to illegal mining near the El Ojal sector, Tobar Donoso parish. Explosives, 350m of slow fuse and other materials were seized.

Around 15 July 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Buenavista canton (Pasaje, El Oro), a man with intellectual disabilities was killed and his body found at the entrance of a banana plantation in the Ricager citadel. The victim had multiple cuts on his face and neck and his skull was shattered, indicating that he was likely attacked with a machete. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 July 2024, in Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as gunmen in two vans shot and killed a man driving a motorbike on El Laurel Road, La Lorena compound. The perpetrators stepped out of the vehicles, tried to kidnap the victim but shot him four times, two in the head, when he resisted. It is suspected police officers took the victim's money from the crime scene. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 July 2024, in Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed a man and a woman outside the Vicente Pino Moran hospital in a drive-by shooting. The perpetrators fired at least 30 times and it is suspected the victims were killed as targets of a retaliation. Authorship unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 15 July 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), armed and police forces arrested the leader of Los Tiguerones gang in the El Arenal sector. The suspect was involved in extortions, robberies and intimidation and was linked to the killing of 9 fishermen in the Esmeraldas artisanal fishing port in April 2023 (coded separately). The suspect had also escaped from prison in January 2024 and the police seized a revolver and five ammunition cartridges.

On 15 July 2024, in Manta (Manabi), several members of Los Pepes gang carrying assault rifles fired 19 shots against a house in the El Porvenir 1 neighborhood, Tarqui parish. They left threatening pamphlets addressed to the owners. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 15 July 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man inside a workshop on Bolivar Street, in the Anibal San Andres parish. The victim was shot at least 10 times and two other victims were injured while working. The vehicle used in the killing was set on fire on the road to Colisa, which connects Montecristi with Jaramijo. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 July 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), three unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a man and held him for ransom. The armed forces rescued the victim and a woman, who was later discovered to be a fourth member of the group. Four suspects were arrested. There is no further information available.

On 15 July 2024, in San Isidro (Sucre, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed three merchants near a market area. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 15 July 2024, in Samborondon (Guayas), an unknown number of local citizens beat up an unidentified armed individual described as a delinquent. The suspect was rescued by the police. There were no fatalities.

Around 15 July 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Babahoyo canton (Los Rios), a man was killed and his body found in a state of decomposition in a vacant lot. The victim had been missing and it is suspected he was a victim of kidnapping in the Yaguachi canton. The victim was kidnapped by unidentified perpetrators who held him for extortion and sent threatening messages to his family. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 16 July 2024, on the Coast of San Mateo (Manta, Manabi), armed forces seized 33 packages of drugs weighting approximately a ton of drugs hidden inside three boats. The drugs were valued at $72 million on the European market. The armed forces also seized 810 gallons of fuel and four boat engines. Three suspects were arrested. No further information is available.

On 16 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police forces raided eight houses owned by members of the Mafia-18 gang and arrested some leaders of Los Lagartos gang, in the Guasmo Sur sector, Las Palmas cooperative.

On 16 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with several gunshots in the block 10 of El Fortin, Nueva Prosperina neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 16 July 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Machala canton (El Oro), a man was killed and his half-naked body found with his throat cut in a garbage dump in the Ceibales sector. The man's head was attached to the body by skin only and his hands and feet were tied up. The number of perpetrators is unknown. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

On 16 July 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), three unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a man. The victim was to meet a woman with whom he was in contact through social networks. The victim was rescued by the police two days later in a palm plantation with his hands tied up and face covered with tape. Four suspects were arrested, three of them with police records for drug trafficking, weapon trafficking and fraud. There is no further information available.

On 17 July 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped four people and held them for ransom (express kidnapping). The victims were rescued by the police on the same day. Two suspects were arrested. There is no further information available.
