On 17 July 2024, in Quito district (Pichincha), at least five metropolitan agents physically assaulted a man during a public space patrol who objected to the merchandise seizure of an elderly person. The victim was hospitalized in serious condition. There were no fatalities.

On 17 July 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Morochal sector. The victim was the brother-in-law of the mayor of the Santa Lucia canton. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 July 2024, in the rural area of the Babahoyo canton (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a farmer in a drive-by shooting on Corral Viejo Road, El Salto parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_1: CONAIE: Confederation of Indigenous Nationalities of Ecuador; Indigenous Group (Ecuador); Kichwa Indigenous Group (Ecuador)
notes: On 18 July 2024, in San Clemente (Ibarra, Imbabura), an unknown number of Indigenous people from the Kichwa Karanki people held a demonstration and prevented the passage of a governmental delegation led by the first lady. The demonstrators held signs, banners and set objects on fire to reject the economic measures of the government. CONAIE supported the demonstration.

assoc_actor_1: FP: Popular Front; Labor Group (Ecuador); Students (Ecuador); Teachers (Ecuador); UNE: National Union of Educators; FEUE: Federation of University Students of Ecuador
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Primicias; Wambra Medio Comunitario
notes: On 18 July 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), around 20 workers, students, teachers and demonstrators led by the UNE, FEUE and the Popular Front set tires on fire on 10 de Agosto Avenue with Tarqui Avenue, El Ejido sector. The act lasted a few minutes only, with union members chanting anti-government slogans and waving flags. The demonstrators occupied the vicinity of the Caja del Seguro to voice their dissatisfaction with the end of fuel subsidies and the consequential increase in petrol prices. Similar demonstrators were also reported on the 4 July during a national strike (coded separately). Three people were arrested, including a Popular Front leader.

Weapons seizure: On 18 July 2024, in Buenos Aires (Pimampiro, Imbabura), police forces seized 73 explogel explosives, 247m of delayed cord, 21 ammunition cartridges and several other materials used in illegal mining. It is likely the equipment was being used by a criminal group involved in illegal mining.

Property destruction: On 18 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified individuals described as extortionists set fire to a pharmacy in the Los Vergeles sector. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 18 July 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed two students in a drive-by shooting on Voltaire Medina Street, between 27 de Octubre and Quito Streets, in the Rayito de Luz neighborhood. The students were leaving school and the perpetrators fired at least six shots. One of the students had received threats. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 18 July 2024, in San Isidro (Sucre, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Leonidas Plaza parish. The victim was an informal tricycle driver who was working at the time of the attack. He received three gunshots to the head and he had a police record for rape from 2021. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 July 2024, in Pedernales (Manabi), an unknown number of local residents threw rocks and stones at military vehicles and soldiers in the Nuevo Pedernales sector. The riots happened because the citizens did not allow searches to be conducted by the soldiers. Two men and two women were arrested by the police, one of them a minor. There were no fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); Policia Ecuador; Primicias
notes: Around 19 July 2024 (as reported), around Guayas province (coded Duran), police forces arrested 81 people during 60 interventions and raids with the operation 'Cero Impunidad'. At least one member of Los Chone Killers gang was arrested on 18 July. There is no further information available.

On 19 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Nueve de Octubre (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Quito Avenue and Quisquis Street, 9 de Octubre neighborhood. The victim was shot twice. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 July 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting outside the Pacifico Hotel (Tarqui Viejo), in the Tarqui parish. The victim was shot about 15 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 20 July 2024 (as reported), in Camilo Ponce Enriquez canton (Azuay), two men were killed and their bodies found wrapped in sheets with gunshot wounds to the head near the Leonor mine, El Villa sector. The victims died in a clash between rival gangs. It is likely the killings were related to territory disputes between Los Lobos gang and Los Choneros gang due to location. One of the victims was a Venezuelan national and the perpetrators were eight heavily-armed individuals, four of them suspectedly Colombians wearing security guard attired and carrying rifles. It is suspected the perpetrators killed the two victims out of revenge for the burning of facilities and dump trucks at La Tormenta mine. 2 fatalities.

On 20 July 2024, in Vinces (Los Rios), two unidentified armed and hooded men shot and killed a man inside a pool bar on 14 de Junio and Nicolas Coto Infante Streets, Antonio Sotomayor parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 July 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the Las Palmeras neighborhood. The victim had no police records and he was shot dead while playing football. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 July 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving a car in a drive-by shooting on 13 Street and 16 Avenue. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 July 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), four unidentified armed individuals (who were likely drug traffickers due to drug debt and previous threats received by the victim) on motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Atahualpa neighborhood. The victim was a drug user with drug debts. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 20 July 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man and a woman inside a restaurant in the Barbasquillo sector in a drive-by. Another woman was killed by stray bullets and a fourth victim was injured. None of the victims had police records. One of the hypotheses is that the intended target of the attack was the widow of a drug trafficker who had left the restaurant ten minutes before the attack, while another version indicates that one of the victims was being extorted. The killed woman was also the daughter of a well known businessman. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_1: Military Forces of Colombia (2022-); Military Forces of Ecuador (2023-); Military Forces of the United States (2021-2025)
source: Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 21 July 2024, in Manta (Manabi), armed and police forces with the support of the US and Colombian army intelligence support arrested a drug trafficker of high-value and with ties to the Frontier Command armed group that operates in Putumayo, in Colombia. Seven other suspects were arrested and in total six houses were raided in the Umina neighborhood. Two firearms, 20 ammunition cartridges, cell phones, a tablet, six vehicles, two magazines and a large amount of cash were seized.

On 21 July 2024, in El Limon (Portoviejo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals dressed as police officers shot and killed a man inside his house. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 21 July 2024, in Posorja (Guayaquil, Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed four people at the intersection of Gutierrez Chagay Avenue and Simon Yaki Avenue, Progreso neighborhood. None of the victims had police records and at least one of them was a Colombian taxi driver waiting for clients. It is suspected the killings were related to drug trafficking disputes between Los Lobos gang, Los Choneros gang and Los Tiguerones gang, which is actively trying to take over the region. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 21 July 2024, in Borbon (Eloy Alfaro, Esmeraldas), police and armed forces dismantled a drug shipping center and arrested three drug traffickers, one of them from Colombia, in the Garrapata facility. 277kg of cocaine hydrochloride valued at $11 million in the European market, 10 firearms including high-calibre assault rifles, 15 ammo feeders, more than 200 ammunition cartridges, five communication radios, cell phones and other materials were also seized during operation 'Cruzada por la Seguridad'.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 22 July 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a municipal government official. Another worker was also injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 22 July 2024, off the Coast of Bajo Alto (El Guabo, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals carrying rifles on a boat shot and killed three Venezuelan fishermen out in the open sea, in the Puntilla sector. The victims were shot at least 30 times. It is suspected the killings were related to a territory dispute between two factions within the Los Lobos gang. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 22 July 2024 (as reported), near Santa Marta (Camilo Ponce Enriquez, Azuay), four people were killed and their beheaded bodies found alongside several burned-out vehicles. It is likely the perpetrators were members of Los Lobos gang and the victims were miners killed during territory disputes and the gang's attempts to seize control over illegal mining locations. Armed clashes and other attacks were also reported in the same area (coded separately). The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former Military Forces of Ecuador (2023-); Labor Group (Ecuador)
notes: On 22 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of Los Tiguerones gang members shot and killed two taxi drivers on Perimetral Highway. One of the victims was a retired army soldier and the attack motivation was related to extortions. 2 fatalities.

On 22 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike and a tricycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting outside a restaurant in the Pastor Vera cooperative, Juan Montalvo sector. The victim was shot about 10 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 July 2024, in Puebloviejo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man during a drive-by shooting at a quinceanera party on Aurora Estrada Avenue and 10 de Agosto Street. Another person was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 July 2024, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting between Ana Paredes de Alfaro and Juan Bautista Streets, Chaguarquingo sector. Police officers chased the perpetrators and arrested one of them inside a workshop on Alpahuasi and Piedra Ayala. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 22 July 2024, in Vega Rivera (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man driving a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Paccha Road, Vega Rivera sector. The victim was shot at least nine times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 July 2024, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), two members of the Los Vatos Locos gang armed with knives and pistols kidnapped a man and held him for ransom (express kidnapping) in the Concha Acustica Park, Pisuli neighborhood. The victim was rescued by the police on the same day and two suspects were arrested. There is no further information available.

On 23 July 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty police officer on his way home between Velasco Ibarra and Bolivar Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 July 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unidentified armed individual on a motorbike shot and injured an adolescent dressed as a student in a drive-by shooting between Abdon Calderon and Septima Streets, Chone neighborhood. The victim was shot five times in the head and body. It is suspected that the victim is a relative of a gang member. Authorship unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 23 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a tricycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Colinas de la Alborada cooperative. The victim had just left his daughter at school when he was ambushed. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 23 July 2024 (as reported), in Manta (Manabi), a man was strangled and his body found with apparent signs of torture (unspecified) inside the bathroom of his house in the Rincon de los Ceibos urbanization, Colinas de Rocafuerte neighborhood. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 23 July 2024, in Delia (Duran, Guayas), police forces dismantled a weapons storehouse owned by Los Chone Killers gang on Atacames Street. Police seized assault rifles and anti-personnel landmines.

On 23 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a group of local residents beat up two men involved in robberies in the Los Rosales sector. One of the suspects had broken bones and both were attacked by people using sticks and motorbike helmets. One of the suspects fired shots at a police officer earlier (coded separately). There were no fatalities.
On 23 July 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), a group of local residents on motorbikes beat up a man involved in robberies. There were no fatalities.

source: Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); Policia DMZ Zona 9
notes: On 24 July 2024, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving a vehicle in a drive-by shooting between 9 de Agosto and Independencia Streets, Calderon parish. A female suspect was arrested the day after and police seized three firearms, seven cell phones, marijuana and cocaine. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 24 July 2024, in Moraspungo (Pangua, Cotopaxi), police forces dismantled an illegal weapons manufacturing facility. Two suspects were arrested, and 19 firearms and several other materials were seized.

On 24 July 2024, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), an unknown number of Los Lobos gang members shot and killed a man in the La Mariscal neighbourhood. The perpetrators were collecting a debt from the victim and the victim's friends took him to the hospital but he was already dead. Two suspects were arrested, one of them a Venezuelan national, but were released right after. Police seized firearms, drugs and other evidence. 1 fatality.
On 24 July 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), local residents beat up an unidentified individual described as a delinquent. It is suspected the victim was committing robberies. There were no fatalities.

On 24 July 2024, in El Carmen (Manabi), police and military forces arrested one of the leaders of the Los Lobos gang involved in extortions, intimidation and fraud in the provinces of Canar, El Oro, Pichincha (specifically in Quito), Napo, Guayas, Azuay and Manabi. The suspect was arrested at the Sumita Pita site and another suspect, a woman, was also arrested. Police seized a revolver, one car, 35 ammunition cartridges, three cell phones, 14 debit cards, one credit card, and five identity cards.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 25 July 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with six gunshots in a drive-by shooting outside a house on Napoleon Mera Street and Zaruma Alley. The victim had a physical disability and he was the brother of a former candidate for mayor. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 July 2024, in Cuenca (Azuay), dozens of relatives of patients who require hemodialysis set tires on fire at the corners of Bolivar and Luis Cordero streets. They displayed signs asking the government to pay off the $3 million in debts with health service providers. During the demonstration, a mother knelt down to beg the mayor for help.

Property destruction: On 25 July 2024, off the Coast of Puerto Velasco Ibarra (San Cristobal, Galapagos), armed forces seized two tons of drugs valued at $50 million hidden inside a boat 250 nautical miles off the coast. Three suspects were arrested.

On 25 July 2024, in Bahia de Caraquez (Sucre, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a former police officer on Montufar Street. The victim was shot eight times and he was known as a war hero and former security guard of president Lucio Gutierrez. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 July 2024, in Atacames (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man at the Atacames boardwalk in a drive-by shooting. A woman was injured by stray bullets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle fired shots at a car with three brothers inside in a drive-by shooting at the Reina del Quinche 2 cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. The vehicle was hit more than 40 times. One victim died and the others were injured, including a child. None of the victims had police records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
Defusal: On 25 July 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), a police anti-bomb squad defused an explosive in the America neighborhood. There is no further information available.

On 25 July 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals blew up a car on Venezuela and Buenos Aires Streets. A woman was inside the vehicle and was getting out of it when the detonation happened but was not harmed. Authorship and motivations unknown. There is no further information available. There were no casualties.

On 25 July 2024, in Guaranda (Bolivar), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a worker inside a petrol station near the Guaranda Bridge. It is suspected the perpetrators were extortionists. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 July 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a backhoe operator in a drive-by shooting in the El Recreo sector. The victim was working for the canton council and actively engaged in cleaning a water channel at the time of his killing. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 July 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a taxi driver in the 4 de Mayo sector. The suspects fired more than five gunshots and the victim died near the Emigdio Esparza Moreno educational unit. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unidentified armed individual on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Bastion Popular sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 26 July 2024, around Guayas province (coded Guayaquil), police forces dismantled several properties used as drug labs for the production of edible substances, mainly chocolate, containing drugs. Four people were arrested and 7,345,800 doses of drugs, six cell phones, two precision scales and 54 packages of cocaine bound for Europe were seized.

Property destruction: On 26 July 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals described as gunmen on a motorbike blew up a vehicle with a Molotov Cocktail and fired shots near a wholesale market. There is no further information available.

On 26 July 2024, in Balzar (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at a children's park. The victim was shot four times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 July 2024, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), an active-duty police officer shot and killed a man in the Mariscal neighbourhood. The officer claimed he acted in self-defence against two unidentified individuals; however, he did not inform his superiors of the shooting and was therefore arrested. 1 fatality.

On 26 July 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in two vehicles kidnapped a father and his infant daughter and held them for ransom in the Los Arenales sector. Both victims were rescued by police in the Puerto Loor sector of the Rocafuerte canton. There is no further information available.

Around 26 July 2024 (week of), around Manabi province (coded Sucre, 24 de Mayo), four unidentified armed individuals in a car kidnapped a cattle rancher and held him for ransom. It is unknown if the victim was rescued. There is no further information available.

On 26 July 2024, in the rural area of the Posorja canton (Guayaquil, Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as criminals shot and killed an official of the National Traffic Commission of Ecuador (CTE) and injured another. It is suspected the shooting might be related to drug trafficking disputes between Los Choneros, Los Lobos and Los Tiguerones, who are trying to seize control of the area. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 July 2024, in El Carmen (Manabi), a group of local residents and the family of victims beat up three men on a motorbike after a robbery on the San Luis de Cajones Road, Atenas neighbourhood. One suspect escaped and the motorbike used during the robbery was set on fire. Both suspects were arrested. There were no fatalities.

On 27 July 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), three unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a driver in a drive-by shooting in the Ricajer citadel, Buenavista parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 July 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with eight gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Central de Pasaje neighborhood, Nuevos Horizontes sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 27 July 2024, in Rocafuerte (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in two motorbikes shot and killed two people in a drive-by shooting in the San Juan community, Sosote parish. Two other people were injured. It is suspected the shooting was related to territory disputes between the Los Choneros and Los Lobos gangs due to its location. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 27 July 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man in the El Floron sector. It is suspected the shooting was related to drug trafficking due to location. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman in the 25 de Enero cooperative, Guasmo Norte sector. The victim's ex-partner was killed on 8 October 2023 (coded separately). The victim was shot at least five times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
tags: women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 27 July 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen in a vehicle shot and killed three people and injured another in a drive-by shooting in the Martha Bucaram de Roldos Avenue with 8 de Febrero Street, Ibarra citadel. The perpetrators fired at least 20 gunshots and left a warning sign at the scene. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 27 July 2024, in the rural area of the Samborondon canton (Guayas), between four and 10 unidentified armed individuals dressed as police officers who arrived on a boat through the Babahoyo River shot and killed five people inside a house in the Villa Mercedes area. All five victims were farmers and members of the same family. The perpetrators also robbed the house and three of the victims had police records for intimidation. Authorship and motivations unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 27 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on at least two motorbikes shot and killed a man driving a vehicle with three gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Paraiso 2 cooperative, Isla Trinitaria. The victim was being investigated for murder and attempted murder, had criminal records for fraud from 2013 and robbery from 2010. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 27 July 2024, in Duran (Guayas), members of the Latin Kings gang in a van shot and killed two firefighters inside a fire station in a drive-by shooting on Huayna Capac and Juan Montalvo Streets, Maldonado citadel. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 28 July 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), a crowd of people attacked and injured two men on Anibal Granja Avenue, Huachi Belen sector. Both victims claimed the attackers accused them of being thieves. The police arrived at the site and rescued the men from the mob and took them to a police station, where one of the rioters also assaulted them. There were no fatalities.

Around 28 July 2024 (as reported), in Ventanas (Los Rios), a man was killed and his burned body found in the La Polvadera compound. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
Property destruction: On 28 July 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), armed forces destroyed an illegal runway used take-offs and landings of low-performance aircrafts transporting drugs.

On 28 July 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man recently released from prison at the intersection of Jaime Roldos and Juan Montalvo Streets. The victim had recently been released from prison on charges of drug trafficking. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 29 July 2024 (as reported), in San Lorenzo de Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), three people were shot and killed and their bodies found outside of an abandoned car in the Ricaurte parish. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 29 July 2024, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen in a van shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting on Ajavi Avenue and Paquisha Street, Santa Anita sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 29 July 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty police officer during a house party on 21 and El Oro Streets. The perpetrators were trying to rob the building and four of them were arrested soon after the killing. The victim tried to resist but was shot at least seven times before using his service weapon. Two suspects were arrested and the police seized a firearm, ammunition rounds, and cell phones. 1 fatality.

On 29 July 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting between Sucre and Margarita Cortes Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 29 July 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and injured a former candidate for city councillor of Machala inside a restaurant on Ferroviaria Avenue with Septima Este. The perpetrators fired more than four times. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: Ecuavisa; El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 29 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals dressed in police uniforms on a motorbike shot and injured three people inside a house in the El Guasmo sector, Amazonas 2 cooperative. One adolescent died in a nursing home and one injured victim was a child. The perpetrators fired at least six times and their main target was the children's father, who managed to escape. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 29 July 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed three men in a drive-by shooting on Juan E. Verdesoto and Isaias Chopitea Streets, behind the Rafael Vera Yepez Stadium. The perpetrators fired at least 50 times but their main target managed to survive with injuries. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 30 July 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unidentified armed individual described as a hitman on a motorbike shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting on Ricaurte and Bolivar Streets, outside Parque Vicente Amador Flor. One suspect, an adolescent, was arrested. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 July 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the San Vicente neighbourhood. A man was shot and injured and another victim died in the hospital on 3 August. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 30 July 2024, in Cuenca (Azuay), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting on Republica Dominicana and Ecuador Streets, Feria Libre sector. The vehicle was abandoned on Belisario Andrade and Francisco Cuesta Streets, Tres Puentes sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 30 July 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a taxi driver in a drive-by shooting in the Parque Lineal. The perpetrators shot the victim at least five times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two suspected Los Chone gang members on a motorbike shot and killed an off-duty police officer in a drive-by shooting in the Reina del Quinche cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. The victim was shot at least six times and he had been receiving death threats after an operation in January, reason why he was to move to the Galapagos. Two suspects, one of them an adolescent, were arrested on 31 July. 1 fatality.

On 30 July 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the entrance to Catahuango Bridge, El Cementerio area. The victim was shot at least five times in the chest. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 July 2024, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), four unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen in a van shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting between Mediterraneo and Paquisha Streets, Santa Anita neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 July 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling by motorcycle shot and killed an off-duty municipal police officer at his birthday party in a drive-by shooting in the Barreiro parish. The victim was sitting outside house with various friends and was shot various times and died later at the Social Security Hospital. Two of the victim's male friends were also injured in the attack, being shot in the right shoulder and head. he attackers arrived on a motorcycle and fired at the victims as they sat outside the house. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; Machala Movil
notes: On 30 July 2024, in Petrillo (Nobol, Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed five men in a container factory, in a logistics site. The victims were the owner of the place, his stepson, two security guards and a driver, and three of them had criminal records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 31 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), two unidentified masked individuals riding a motorcycle killed a man and injured his son in a drive-by shooting outside the Camilo Destruge school at the intersection of Novena and Argentina streets. The man's son was a student and the attack occurred as students were leaving the school. Police stated that the perpetrators had waited for school dismissal to carry out the attack. Witnesses reported hearing about six shots. A young girl was also injured. Police authorities suspect that the attack was directed at the student. 1 fatality.

On 31 July 2024, in Playas (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty policeman dead and injured his woman partner while they were dining at a local eatery in the San Antonio neighborhood. The man died at the scene, while the woman was transported to a hospital in critical condition. 1 fatality.

On 31 July 2024, in Posorja (Guayas), an unknown armed individual on a motorcycle fired shots at a bus carrying Spanish citizens in a drive-by shooting at a roundabout on the Data-Posorja road. The bus, transporting the individuals to a hostel after working on a tuna boat, was targeted by the armed assailant who aimed at the body and windshield of the vehicle. The driver managed to evade the attack and continued driving, subsequently calling the National Police for assistance. Police authorities suspect the attack to have been planned, given the abandoned and poorly lit location where it occurred. There were no casualties.

Around 31 July 2024 (as reported), in Zaruma (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators described as extortionists shot at a local business. There is no further information available. There were no casualties.

Defusal: On 31 July 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces carried out a controlled detonation of an explosive device in Ciudadela Urdenor 1 neighborhood of the Modelo district. There is no further information available.

On 1 August 2024, in Zaruma (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Fray Justo Gaona public steps leading to San Francisco Street. 1 fatality.

On 1 August 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the Casa Para Todos housing complex. The victim was shot at least 12 times in the thorax and abdomen. The victim was initially injured but died later at a hospital from his wounds. 1 fatality.

Around 1 August 2024 (as reported), in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified perpetrators kidnapped two persons. Police authorities liberated the victims on 1 August in a house in Machala. Police did not disclose the identities and condition of the two victims. During the rescue operation, police seized a rifle, 23 cartridges, four magazines, and a recovered vehicle.

Around 1 August 2024 (as reported), in Naranjal (Guayas), at least three unidentified perpetrators kidnapped a person for extortion. Police authorities liberated the victim in a rescue operation on 2 August in the Taura parish. One more kidnapped person was rescued. Police arrested three individuals who had demanded a significant ransom and were holding the victim in captivity.

On 2 August 2024, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals riding a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the La J sector of Solanda. Also on 2 August, in Quito, an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals traveling by vehicle shot and killed a man and woman along Michelena Street in the El Pintado sector. Both victims survived, with the woman sustaining a back injury and the man a foot injury. Initial reports suggest this attack may have been a settling of scores. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

On 2 August 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed perpetrators (likely to be Los Pepes gang members due to similar attacks) shot and killed a man at a sports court in the Las Cumbres neighborhood, in Tarqui parish. The perpetrators entered the court and shot the victim as he was conversing with friends while others played the sport. The incident follows a series of violent events in sports courts linked to the Los Pepes gang, a faction of Los Lobos. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: Property destruction: On 3 August 2024, off the Coast of Puerto Velasco Ibarra (San Cristobal, Galapagos), armed forces seized a boat loaded with at least 2 tons of drugs in 58 packages valued at approximately $60 million. The seizure was made approximately 250 nautical miles from San Cristobal. Three suspects were arrested, one of them a Colombian national.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 3 August 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed an off-duty police officer in a drive-by shooting on Guayacanes and Octava Este Streets, La Ferroviaria sector. The victim was shot at least seven times, predominantly in the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed two women in a drive-by shooting in the Urdesa neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 3 August 2024, in Posorja (Guayaquil, Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals fired shots at a bus on a road. The bus was carrying 30 professional Spanish nationals who worked at the port. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 3 August 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Puebloviejo canton (Los Rios), a man was killed and his beheaded body found in a banana plantation in the Juana de Oro sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 3 August 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), police forces arrested a member of the Los Pepes gang in the El Conde sector, Turubamba neighbourhood. The suspect is suspected to be the leader of a group of hitmen. Police seized a firearm, a computer, a printer and notebooks.

On 4 August 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man riding a motorbike in a drive-by shooting at the intersection between Guayaquil and Libertad Avenues, Panecillo sector. The victim was shot at least five times. Two other men were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 August 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in front of his house in the block 18 of the El Ejercito cooperative. It is suspected the perpetrators were extortionists and that the victim refused to pay them. The victim was shot at least four times. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), at least three unidentified armed individuals kidnapped two women from the La Florida sector. The victims were in a taxi from Los Ceibos to Urdesa. All three suspects were arrested and the victims rescued. There is no further information available.

On 4 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individual dressed as police officers shot and killed two men in the Los Cisnes cooperative, San Eduardo sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 4 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed a girl in a drive-by shooting at the La Olla Road, Union de Bananeros cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. Two men were shot and injured, including a child. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 4 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed the owner of a mechanic's workshop on block 74 of Los Vergeles sector, Pascuales neighbourhood. The victim had several criminal records for robbery and drug possession and he was shot multiple times in the head. It is suspected the motivation is related to drug trafficking disputes and that the killing was due to a fight that the victim had with his former partner. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 August 2024, in Lomas de Sargentillo (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the 12 de Octubre neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 August 2024, in Puerto Cayo (Jipijapa, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former police officer during a sports match. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 4 August 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. It is likely the killing is related to extortion since the victim was a businessman who had received threatening pamphlets demanding money. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 4 August 2024 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), a man was killed and his dismembered body found on the side of the Portoviejo-Manta Highway. The limbs and the torso were found inside a bag near a cemetery in the Ciudad Perdida neighborhood. The head was found in a bag on the next day in the San Alejo citadel. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 August 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an off-duty private guard in a drive-by shooting in the Sinai neighbourhood. The victim was shot three times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Other: On 4 August 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), local residents of the El Buen Pastor neighbourhood joined together in a torchlight march to warn criminals that if they are caught in the area, they will be punished and handed over to the police.

On 4 August 2024, in Estero de Platano (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed and hooded men on a speedboat kidnapped a man and his wife in the Estero Platano sector. The male victim was the former president of the Galera parish government. It is suspected the suspects were extortionists. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Policia DMZ Zona 9; Policia Ecuador
notes: On 4 August 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting at a restaurant on Juan X Marcos and Garcia Moreno Avenues, Barrio Lindo neighbourhood. The victim was a doctor. One of the perpetrators was shot dead during an armed clash with the police hours later (coded separately). Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 5 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), local residents attempted lynching an unidentified armed individual described as a delinquent involved in robberies who shot a man dead (coded separately) while hiding in the Los Vergeles sector. Police rescued the suspect, who had over 10 criminal records, and arrested him. There were no fatalities.

On 5 August 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Orito neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 August 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as extortionists shot and killed a man in the El Ejercito cooperative. It is likely the killing was related to extortion due to the victim's job. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 5 August 2024 (week of), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals killed a woman and injured three other people in the Luchadores del Norte cooperative. Police arrested an adolescent, seized a motorbike and a tricycle and it is suspected the killings were related to drug trafficking disputes. 1 fatality.

Around 6 August 2024 (as reported), in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), a man was killed (unspecified) and his body found with signs of torture (unspecified) on the Panamericana Highway, Machala-Guayaquil direction, in the San Alfonso sector. The victim was a truck driver and it is suspected he was killed during an attempted robbery. The number of perpetrators is unknown. It is suspected the attack was perpetrated by drug traffickers trying to seize control of the region. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

On 6 August 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike fired shots at people in a drive-by shooting at a hair salon located between Boyaca and Santa Rosa Streets. The suspects fired at least five times but no one was injured and it is likely the attack was related to extortions. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

On 6 August 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals carrying rifles in a car shot and killed two men inside a taxi in a drive-by shooting on Bolivar Madero Vargas Avenue. One of the victims was the driver and his wife and daughter were shot and injured. The suspects fired at least 11 times and the vehicle used in the shooting was found burned out on the road to Balosa. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Policia DMG Zona 8
notes: On 6 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals travelling in two cars and a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man inside a pizzeria in a shopping centre on Isidro Ayora Avenue. The victim had no criminal records and was working at the time of his death. The main perpetrator was wearing a helmet and the victim had been targeted before. One of the vehicles was located and a suspect, member of the Chone Killers gang, was arrested. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 6 August 2024 (as reported), in Taura (Naranjal, Guayas), two men were shot and killed and their bodies found with signs of torture (unspecified) on a road to Cascol compound. The number of perpetrators is unknown. It is suspected both victims were tortured and killed elsewhere and brought thereafter. There is no further information available. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 6 August 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as hitmen shot and killed a man inside a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on 319 Street, Eloy Alfaro parish, Cuba neighbourhood. The victim's companion was seriously injured by gunshots. The suspects fired more than 60 gunshots and the vehicle used in the shooting was found on fire in the San Pedro neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 6 August 2024 (as reported), near Chongon parish (Guayas), three people were killed and their bodies were found floating in the Chongon dam in the Progreso district. One of the bodies was mutilated, decapitated and missing a limb. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 7 August 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Primero de Mayo neighbourhood. The victim was shot eight times in front of his house. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 August 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals riding a motorbike and carrying pistols shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Laurice Anton Avenue, El Recreo citadel. The victim was a mechanic and he was shot dead with at least eight gunshots, some in the head, at his place of work. Another person was injured by stray bullets but his condition is unknown. Police sources revealed that suspicious people had been seen in the workshop and it is likely they were extortionists. Authorship and motivations unknown. At least 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 7 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces carried out controlled explosions in properties used as criminal hideouts in the Nueva Prosperina neighbourhood. It is suspected Los Tiguerones gang owned the buildings and that they owned at least 16 other properties. Two suspects were arrested (coded separately).

Defusal: On 7 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), police forces with the support of the anti-bomb squad carried out a controlled detonation of an explosive device left on 43 and P Streets. There is no further information available.

On 7 August 2024, in Pedro Carbo (Guayas), five unidentified armed individuals in a taxi described as hitmen shot and killed three men in a drive-by shooting outside of a rock bar on Colon and Argentina Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 7 August 2024 (as reported), in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), four people, two men and two women, were shot and killed and their bodies found with signs of torture (unspecified) inside black plastic bags on Ruta del Spondylus, in the La Curia commune, Manglaralto parish. The victims had been missing since 3 August (coded separately). At least one of the victims was a Colombian national. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Heraldo (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 7 August 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), several unidentified armed individuals in two vans shot and killed a Venezuelan national in a drive-by shooting at the intersection between Alberto Valdivieso Street and Bolivariana Avenue, in the Quebrada Seca sector. Authorship and motivation unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 7 August 2024 (as reported), in Ambato (Tungurahua), a man was shot and killed and his body found on Victor Hugo and Pareja Diez Canseco Streets. The victim was shot several times and it is suspected the perpetrators were members of the Los Lobos gang. The number of perpetrators is unknown. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.

Around 7 August 2024 (as reported), in Arenillas (El Oro), a man was stabbed to death and his body found with his fee tied up in a state of decomposition inside an abandoned house with his head wrapped in plastic in the Colinas de Santa Fe sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 August 2024, in El Cambio (Machala, El Oro), three unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with more than 10 gunshots on the Panamericana Highway in a drive-by. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 8 August 2024 (as reported), in Santa Rosa (El Oro), a male foreigner was killed and his body found with signs of torture wrapped in a blanket in the Las Minas sector, Santa Marianita neighbourhood. The victim's genitals had been cut off and he was hanged. It is suspected the killing is related to a settling of scores. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 8 August 2024 (week of), in Quevedo (Los Rios), at least eight unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a person and held them for ransom inside an abandoned property in the San Jose sector. Police forces rescued the victim and arrested all eight suspects. There is no further information available.

source: Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: Other: On 8 August 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), president Daniel Noboa ordered a curfew in 20 cantons of four provinces to reinforce security measures due to the ongoing internal armed conflict. The provinces affected by Executive Decree 351 are Azuay, Los Rios, Guayas and Orellana, and the curfew will remain in effect until 31 August and may be renewed for another 30 days.

Property destruction: On 8 August 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), armed forces located a clandestine runway of almost a kilometer used for take-offs and landings of low-performance aircrafts. The runway was likely used by drug trafficking groups to transport narcotics.

On 8 August 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped two farmers on the Quevedo-Buena Fe Road and held them for ransom. They were both rescued by the armed forces on 11 August. There is no further information available.

On 8 August 2024, in Manta (Manabi), three police officers on motorbikes physically assaulted a man driving his motorbike in the Los 3 Reyes sector. The victim was hospitalized with several injuries. There were no fatalities.

Around 9 August 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the El Guabo canton (El Oro), a man was shot and killed and his body found near a farm in the Bocatoma sector. The victim was shot 16 times in the head and he was a drug user. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 August 2024, in Rio Verde (Rioverde, Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals tied up, tortured and shot a man who was later rescued alive by the armed forces. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 9 August 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of hooded and unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men inside a barbershop in the Nueva Vida cooperative. The perpetrators were armed with a rifle and a pistol, and they shot at least 11 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 9 August 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a person was killed (unspecified) and their body found showing signs of torture (unspecified) in the Isla Trinitaria sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 9 August 2024 (as reported), in El Salitre (Guayas), a woman was stabbed, cut and killed and her body found tied up with a rope and wrapped in a plastic bag floating on the Vinces River, Tintal precinct, Junquillal parish. The victim had cuts made with a sharp weapon on her face, neck and right leg. It is suspected the victim was killed elsewhere and then thrown into the river. The number of perpetrators is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 August 2024, in Chongon (Guayaquil, Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Parque Chongon, Los Ceibos neighborhood. The victim was shot at least four times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 August 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Playita Mia beach resort, Tarqui parish. The victim had no criminal records and was shot at least three times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Property destruction: On 10 August 2024, off the Coast of Manta (Manabi), armed forces, coast guard and navy seized a ton of drugs hidden in an artisanal fishing boat 200 nautical miles off the coast. Two suspects were arrested during operation 'Cero Impunidad 1442' and eight fuel bottles seized. There is no further information available.

On 10 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Nueve de Octubre (Guayas), six unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a man from a store in the 9 de Octubre neighborhood and held him for ransom (express kidnapping). It is likely the kidnapping is related to extortions because the victim is a local businessman. The police rescued the victim on the same day and arrested one suspect. There is no further information available.

On 10 August 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), a member of Los Choneros gang beat up a man with a baseball bat and stabbed him with a screwdriver in the Turubamba neighborhood. The victim died and the perpetrator was handed to the authorities by two local residents. The suspect had several criminal records for a killing in 2009, robbery in 2010, a rape in 2010, drug trafficking in 2023, and another killing in 2024. 1 fatality.

On 10 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), three hooded and unidentified armed individuals who arrived on two motorbikes shot and killed a man inside a pool hall in the block 3 of the Balerio Estacio cooperative. The victim received death threats before being killed and he was shot four times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 10 August 2024, in Jipijapa (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by and injured another inside a bakery on Parrales and Guale neighborhoods. The two suspects, both adolescents, were rammed down by one of the victim's relatives and eventually arrested. Police seized six ammunition cartridges and a motorbike. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 August 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as members of an armed group shot and killed a person and injured another in the El Pampon sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 10 August 2024 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a taxi driver was shot and killed and his body found next to a car on the train tracks in the 28 de Agosto cooperative. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 August 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the intersection between San Vicente and Manuel Canizares Streets. The victim was shot at least five times, most of them in the head and he had criminal records for robberies in 2020 and 2022. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 August 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed a Venezuelan man in a drive-by shooting in an alley in the Eugenio Espejo neighborhood. The victim was also driving a motorbike and the perpetrators fired more than 15 gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Policia DMG Zona 8
notes: Weapons seizure: On 10 August 2024, in the rural area of the Guayaquil canton (Guayas), police forces seized 20,000 explosive devices valued at $22,000 used by extortionists in a sugarcane plantation on 21 and Chambers Alley, in the Cisne sector, Portete neighborhood, Salado estuary. There is no further information available.

On 10 August 2024, in the rural area of the Guayaquil canton (Guayas), local residents tied a man to a tree, doused his body with petrol and set him on fire in the San Gabriel area. The victim was involved in several robberies but was rescued by the police before dying. The robber had a criminal record for theft and possession of drugs. There were no fatalities.

Around 11 August 2024 (as reported), off the Coast of Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as members of a criminal group attacked a fishing boat with explosives in the high seas between Punta Jambeli and La Puntilla. One body was found, an adolescent, with gunshot wounds in the Santa Rosa canton. It is suspected the fishing boat had 15 occupants and that some of them were kidnapped and others thrown into the sea. At least 1 fatality.

On 11 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man driving a vehicle in a drive-by shooting in the Paquisha sector, Assad Bucaram cooperative, Pascuales neighborhood. Two other people were shot and injured, including a tricycle driver. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 August 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals carrying automatic firearms on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Elsa Bucaram cooperative. Two other men were injured and the perpetrators fired at least 20 gunshots. None of the victims had criminal records. It is suspected the killing is related to drug trafficking disputes. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man with three gunshots in the Mapasingue Este sector, Florida neighborhood. The victim was a drug user and he was shot mostly in the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 August 2024, in Valencia (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man at a party in the Luis Felipe Diaz subdivision. Another man was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 August 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two people in the 15 de Abril neighborhood. The perpetrators fired at least 27 times with long and short weapons. It is suspected the attack is related to drug trafficking disputes. 1 fatality.

Around 11 August 2024 (as reported), near Chongon parish (Guayas), three people were killed and their bodies found floating with signs of violence (unspecified) in the Chongon dam in the Progreso district. One of the bodies was in a state of decomposition, the other had no head or lower limbs. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Ecuador en Vivo; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: Property destruction: On 11 August 2024, in Manta (Manabi), police forces seized 631 packages of cocaine which amounts to 728,900g or 7,289,000 doses abandoned inside a boat in the Santa Marianita sector. The drugs were valued at around $1,417,800 in Ecuador, $14,578,000 in the United States and $29,156,000 in Europe.

On 12 August 2024, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), an unknown number of local residents beat up a man who attempted to rob a pregnant woman with a knife on Angamarca Street, La Mena sector. The robber was arrested by the police. There were no fatalities.

On 12 August 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Ficus Sur neighborhood. It is suspected the perpetrators were members of Los Lagartos gang. Motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 12 August 2024 (as reported), in Puna (Guayaquil, Guayas), three fishers were stabbed and killed and their bodies found buried in an abandoned shrimp farm near Puerto El Morro. The victims went missing on 5 August in the Aguas Piedras sector, near Puerto Chojon, while going from Posorja to Puna Island. It is suspected the perpetrators were criminals engaged in piracy and their two fishing boats were also taken with the fishers. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; Machala Movil
notes: Around 12 August 2024 (as reported), in Puerto Bolivar (El Oro), a fisherman was shot and killed and his body found floating at a marina near the El Bravito estuary. Later another fisherman was found near Jambeli, his body burned and missing limbs. Another body was found on the same day in the El Coco mangrove, victim of bullets. A fourth body was found that day, too. It is suspected the victims were four of the 15 fishermen kidnapped or killed during an attack off the coast of Machala on 11 August (coded separately). The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 12 August 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man near a workshop in a drive-by shooting in the Nueva Vida cooperative. The victim was a mechanic. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 12 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle and described as hitmen shot and killed a female street vendor in a drive-by shooting in the Union de Bananeros cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. It is suspected the perpetrators were looking for the victim's son. Two other women were injured by stray bullets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
tags: women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

notes: On 12 August 2024, in Daule canton (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Marianita Dos neighborhood. The victim had an unspecified criminal record from 2015 and he was shot six times in the head and chest. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 August 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unidentified armed individual on a motorbike shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting on 23 and N Streets. The suspect fired at least five times and he had no criminal records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of hooded and unidentified armed individuals dressed as police officers driving several cars shot and killed a man inside his home in the block 4, El Fortin sector. The perpetrators used a sledgehammer to break open the door and shot the victim 50 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 August 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on J-10 and J-11 Streets, Jocay neighborhood. The perpetrators fired at least 10 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 12 August 2024, in Santa Marta (Camilo Ponce Enriquez, Azuay), armed and police forces seized 50 dynamite sticks, 1,535 explosives, 800 detonating capsules, 1,800m of detonating cord, five 50kg bags of ammonium nitrate, a laptop with evidence of extortion payments and a motorbike during a weapons and ammunition control operation in the Jerusalem mine. One unidentified armed individual described as a member of a criminal group was arrested and an illegal mining camp was dismantled. It is suspected that the suspect was an extortionist member of an organized armed group, likely Los Lobos gang, which's trying to seized control of illegal mining in the region. There is no further information available.
On 12 August 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of local residents beat up a man who tried to take a girl from a school. There is no further information available.

Around 12 August 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Baba canton (Los Rios), two men were shot and killed and their bodies found in the Las Tecas sector, Isla de Bejucal. The perpetrators fired at least 10 gunshots and the victims were both father and son. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 13 August 2024 (as reported), in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), two fishermen were killed and their dismembered bodies found charred near the beach of Punta de El Faro. It is suspected the victims were two of the 15 fishermen kidnapped or killed during an attack off the coast of Machala on 11 August (coded separately). The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 13 August 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was tortured, shot and killed and his body found with signs of violence in the Nuevo Guayaquil cooperative, Nueva Prosperina neighborhood. The victim was also shot 11 times while his hands were tied up. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 August 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed two men after stepping out of a car between the Los Helechos and the 2 de Mayo cooperatives. It is suspected at least one of the victims had a history of robberies and that the reason for the attack was a dispute between gangs. Authorities have not confirmed in the victims were gang members. Authorship unknown. 2 fatalities.

Weapons seizure: On 13 August 2024, in the rural area of the Chanduy canton (Santa Elena), police forces dismantled a weapons and drugs storage located in a farm during an operation. Three suspects were arrested, two of them Venezuelan nationals, and the police seized several firearms, explosives and drugs.

Defusal: On 13 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces carried out the controlled detonation of a dynamite stick left outside commercial premises on Agustin Freire Avenue, Sauces 1 sector. It is likely the explosive device was used with the purpose of extortion.

source: Diario Regional Los Andes; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Property destruction: Around 13 August 2024 (as reported), in Posorja (Guayaquil, Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals carrying rifles fired shots and set two boats on fire in the La Posa sector. One of the boats on fire drifted to Isla Manglecito Chico. It is likely the attack is related to extortions. Another ship was found in the buoy 16 of the Guayaquil Channel.

Around 13 August 2024 (as reported), around Los Rios province (coded Babahoyo), five unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a woman and held her for ransom. The victim was rescued by the police and all five suspects arrested. It is likely the kidnapping was related to extortion. There is no further information available.

On 14 August 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man near a church in a drive-by shooting near the El Coco resort, Urseza 3 sector. The victim was a former candidate for councilor from 2023, an ex-football player and he was shot six times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Property destruction: On 14 August 2024, off the Coast of Puerto Velasco Ibarra (San Cristobal, Galapagos), armed forces seized 4.5 tons of narcotics, seized four boats and a fishing boat, and arrested 17 suspects, around 290 nautical miles from the coast of the Galapagos Islands. One of the suspects was a Colombian national. around 106 bottles which amounts to 2,000 gallons of petrol were also seized.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 14 August 2024, in Jaramijo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on section 3 of the Circunvalacion Highway, near the El Imperio roundabout. The victim was a mechanic and he was shot several times. It is suspected the attack motivation was related to extortions. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 August 2024, near La Iberia (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on the El Cambio-La Iberia Route, El Porton site. The victim was shot 10 times and his partner was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 August 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man driving his motorbike with a woman in a drive-by shooting in the Los Ficus neighborhood. The woman was injured and the man was shot at least five times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 14 August 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the 9 de Octubre Alley, Miraflores neighborhood. The victim had no criminal records and the perpetrators fired at least five times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 August 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a van shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the intersection between Perimetral Sur and Braulio Rios Streets, Rosita 3 sector. Two other men were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 14 August 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces carried out operation 'Poseidon XXXIII' and seized 1.4 tons of drugs hidden inside a banana shipment bound for the Netherlands. The drugs are valued at $2,288,500 in Ecuador but upon arrival in Europe it's estimated the price would go up to $45,770,000. Three suspects were arrested.

On 14 August 2024, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man with six gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Pisuli sector. The victim had a criminal record for homicide and robbery. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 August 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), a group of people apprehended a man and beat him up while taking him to the police. The man was involved in robberies but there was no officer available to arrest him. There were no fatalities.

On 15 August 2024, in Cuenca (Azuay), a group of local residents lynched two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike who had just robbed the Cristo del Consuelo restaurant, Cuatro Esquinas neighbourhood. The robber's motorbike was set on fire and the two suspects were arrested. Police seized a firearm, cell phones and credit cards. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 15 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), three unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Francisco de Orellana Avenue with Perimetral Highway, Pascuales neighborhood. The victim was shot at least eight times and so was his dog. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 15 August 2024 (as reported), around Machala (El Oro), a man was killed and his burned body was found on the Pajonal Road. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 15 August 2024 (as reported), off the Coast of Machala (El Oro), a man and a woman were killed and their bodies found in the El Bravito estuary. The female body was decapitated and the man's body was found in an advanced estate of decomposition near Isla del Amor. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Policia Ecuador
notes: Weapons seizure: On 15 August 2024, in El Triunfo (Guayas), police forces carried out an operation and seized one assault rifle, two pistols, one stolen motorbike, 214 ammunition cartridges, two hand grenades, drugs, two cell phones, dynamite sticks, telephone signal inhibitors and police clothing. The arsenal belonged to Los Choneros gang. Two suspects were arrested.
