Property destruction: On 15 August 2024, around Pichincha province (coded Quito), police forces seized more than a ton of cocaine during an anti-drug operation in the Ecuadorian port system. The drugs are valued at more than $45 million. Three suspects were arrested.

Around 15 August 2024 (month of), in Ambato (Tungurahua), three members of the Los Lobos gang shot and killed a man and choked another one to death in the Santa Marianita neighbourhood, on the way to Las Minas. The three suspects were condemned to 40 years in prison on 3 June 2025. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 15 August 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man on 25 de Junio Avenue, in the Barrio Lindo neighborhood. Both suspects were arrested on 16 August and the police seized a firearm, several cell phones, narcotics and extortion pamphlets. One of the detainees was a high-value target with criminal records for possession of firearms and the other had criminal records for drug trafficking. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 16 August 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Huaquillas canton (El Oro), a man was shot and killed and their body found in a shrimp farm on the road in the El Estero Robalo sector going towards La Huada. The victim had hands and feet tied and his face was covered with a rag. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 16 August 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police forces with the support of the anti-bomb squad carried out a defusal procedure on an explosive device left by an unknown group at the entrance of a warehouse in the central market, on Antonio Jose de Sucre Street, between Victor Lavayen and Ramon Tello streets.

Property destruction: On 16 August 2024, in Arenillas (El Oro), armed forces seized a truck transporting 4,500 gallons of diesel destined for smuggling to Peru in the 25 de Diciembre citadel. The driver escaped.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: Around 16 August 2024 (as reported), in Huizho (El Oro), six people were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and asphyxiation inside plastic bags in the Huizho sector, Casacay parish, on a road that connects to the Pucara canton, in Azuay. The bodies were left by unidentified people in two vans but they did not have gunshot wounds. It is suspected that the victims were miners and that they were dragged to the place where their bodies were found. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 6 fatalities.

On 16 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes kidnapped a man driving a vehicle in the Urdesa neighborhood. The victim was rescued by the police on the same day in the Duran canton and three suspects were arrested. There is no further information available.

On 16 August 2024, in Samborondon (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a fishmonger working at the municipal market in a drive-by shooting. The victim had previously been the victim of an extortion kidnapping but was rescued by the police. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 August 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals carrying automatic firearms shot and killed a man riding a motorbike in the Masato neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 August 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), at least two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed a man riding a bicycle in a drive-by shooting in the Bellavista citadel. The victim was shot at least four times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 August 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), six hooded and unidentified armed individuals (described as members of a criminal group) shot and killed a person in the Turubamba sector. The victim was ambushed after an online deal and another person who was in the vehicle was kidnapped and released a few kilometers away. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 August 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals fired shots at a national customs vehicle. The driver was inside the car but was unharmed. It is suspected that the attack was an attempt to stop operations against smuggling. There were no casualties.

On 16 August 2024, in El Lirio (Colta, Chimborazo), two unidentified armed individuals in a pickup truck kidnapped a truck driver on the Riobamba-Guayaquil Highway and held him for ransom in Jujan for 48 hours. Authorities arrested both suspects and recovered the truck and the cargo in the Pallatanga canton after they were beaten up by local residents (coded separately). There is no further information available.

Around 17 August 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the El Guabo canton (El Oro), a person was shot and killed and their body found wrapped in a bag and with signs of torture in the El Garrido-Tendales road. Since the area where the body was found is very close to Camilo Ponce Enriquez canton, it is likely the killing was related to territory disputes in the mining sectors. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 August 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Pescador sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 17 August 2024, around El Oro province (coded Pasaje de las Nieves), military and police forces through the security block dismantled several illegal mining camps and seized firearms in the Calichana, El Aserrio, La Avelina and Monjas areas. Two motorbikes, a revolver, a carbine, two water engines and several other mining equipment and machinery were seized.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 17 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Los Geranios cooperative. The victim was shot several times in the head. He had criminal records for robbery from 2011 and 2012. Later, an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle killed another person in a drive-by shooting in the Urdesa neighbourhood. Authorship unknown and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.
On 17 August 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting outside a brothel. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 August 2024, in Tabacundo (Pedro Moncayo, Pichincha), local residents beat up a man involved in a killing during a robbery. Police rescued the suspect and arrested him. There were no fatalities.

On 18 August 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) and carrying rifles on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Rafael Moran Valverde neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Esmeraldas News; Expreso
notes: On 18 August 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) carrying large-calibre rifles in a vehicle killed four people during a birthday celebration in a drive-by shooting in the 26 de Junio neighbourhood, aka Tripa de Pollo. More than 10 other people were injured by stray bullets. it is unclear if whether perpetrator's target was killed. The attack motivation is suspected to have been revenge or a settling of scores. 4 fatalities.

On 18 August 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed six people inside a house in the El Recreo neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 6 fatalities.

On 18 August 2024, in Duran (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and a car two men and a woman in a drive-by shooting in block 17 of the Julio Coll cooperatives. A child was shot and injured in the leg and none of the victims had criminal records. One of the victims was a drug user who was threatened by members of Los Chone Killers gang days before and the perpetrators fired around 27 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 18 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car killed a couple driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting between the Juan Montalvo and La Bahia sectors, Las Gaviotas cooperative. The suspects fired at least 13 shots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.
On 18 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals on at least five motorbikes fired at least 50 shots in the Flor de Bastion sector. Casualties unknown.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: Around 18 August 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Febres Cordero canton (Babahoyo, Los Rios), three men and three women were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in sheets and inside plastic bags on the El Guayabo-Las Tecas Road, between El Lechugal and El Guayabo compounds. At least one victim had stabbing wounds, and all victims had their hands tied behind their backs and signs of torture. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 6 fatalities.

source: Cronica (Ecuador); Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Esmeraldas News
notes: Around 18 August 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the San Placido parish (Portoviejo, Manabi), a couple were shot and killed and their bodies were found in a state of decomposition buried in the Edison farm, between La Tablada and Las Torres sectors. The victims had been missing since 7 August and two men were arrested in El Empalme and another, a farm worker, in San Placido on 18 August. It is suspected the victims had been dead between eight and eleven days before their bodies were found. The male victim was the brother of the vice-mayor of Esmeraldas. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 18 August 2024, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes (described as hitmen) killed three people in a drive-by shooting in the Solanda neighbourhood. Two other people were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 18 August 2024 (as reported), in Pallatanga canton (Chimborazo), local residents organized as a vigilante group beat up two men involved in a kidnapping in the El Lirio parish, Colta canton (coded separately). Authorities arrested both suspects. There were no fatalities.

Property destruction: On 19 August 2024, off the Coast of Puerto Velasco Ibarra (San Cristobal, Galapagos), navy forces seized 2.71 tons of cocaine bound for the United States and Europe hidden inside several boats, 290 nautical miles off the coast of the Galapagos Islands in the high seas. 17 suspects were arrested involved in the crime of large-scale drug trafficking.

Property destruction: On 19 August 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), armed forces seized 1,800 gallons of petrol in a clandestine warehouse in the 12 de Octubre neighbourhood. 25 bags of gasoline, four plastic tanks and eight metal tanks filled with gasoline were also seized. One suspect escaped.

On 19 August 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man. The victim was shot twice in the head and he had no criminal records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals killed two men riding a motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the Pastor Vera cooperative, Juan Montalvo sector. Neither of the victims had criminal records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Policia DMG Zona 8
notes: On 19 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of Los Tiguerones gang members, including active police officers, kidnapped members of the same family in the California industrial park and held them for ransom for four days. Seven suspects involved in extortions were detained, including three police officers, and the victims were rescued in the Nueva Prosperina neighbourhood. There is no further information available.

On 19 August 2024, in El Matal (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a pickup truck killed two men and injured another in a drive-by shooting on El Matal beach. One victim had a criminal record for robbery from 2023 and the injured victim had no criminal record. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 19 August 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), three unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot a man and his father in a drive-by shooting in the Las Minas neighbourhood. The victim's cousin was also injured. The perpetrators fired more than 15 gunshots. One victim had a criminal record and it is suspected the killing is related to revenge. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 20 August 2024, around Guayas province (coded Duran), police forces arrested a leader of the Los Chone Killers gang in the central district during a hideout raid. A car, a motorbike and several falsified car plates were seized.

On 20 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed a man and injured his mother in a drive-by shooting in the Luchadores del Norte cooperative, in the Juan Montalvo sector, Florida neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 20 August 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a foreign woman. The victim was rescued unharmed by the police in the Nueva Prosperina neighbourhood. The four suspects were arrested. There is no further information available.

On 21 August 2024, in Samborondon (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man near the morgue. The victim worked as a municipal garbage collector and he was driving a municipality truck at the time of his killing. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 21 August 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Centenario sector. The victim was shot at least 10 times while playing on a slot machine. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 August 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police forces arrested a leader of a local faction of Los Tiguerones gang during a car chase. The suspect was involved in the killing of a police officer, kidnapping, extortion and other crimes. Police seized a firearm.

On 21 August 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle (described as hitmen) killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Juan Leon Mera Avenue, in the Elsa Bucaram cooperative. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Defusal: On 21 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police forces with the support of the anti-bomb squad removed several dynamite sticks from inside a bag left at the port. There is no further information available.

On 21 August 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man in the Cumbres neighbourhood. The perpetrators fired at least five gunshots. On the same day, an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) shot and killed two men at the border of the Las Palmeras and Las Minas neighbourhoods. The perpetrators fired more than 15 shots and two of the victims had criminal records, one for homicide and another for robbery. It is suspected the killings are related to drug trafficking disputes. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 22 August 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a man in the San Camilo parish. It is likely the perpetrators were extortionists because of the victim's job, who is a prosecutor, and since the victim was attacked during a kidnapping attempt. Authorship unknown. There were no fatalities.

Property destruction: On 22 August 2024, off the Coast of Manta (Manabi), police forces with the support of the coastal guard seized more than one ton of drugs, 60 nautical miles off the coast. The drugs were hidden inside two fiberglass boats and seven suspects were arrested.

On 22 August 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Orito neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 August 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped and mutilated two workers at an internet company. Both men had fingers cut off from their hands and were forced to record a video in which they beg for their boss' help. It is unclear if the two victims were killed or if the ransom was paid. Authorship unknown.

On 22 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Urdesa neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 22 August 2024, in Samborondon (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals driving a tricycle shot and injured a couple and their child inside a health centre on 31 de Octubre Avenue. The father had received threats and the perpetrators fired more than 10 gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 22 August 2024 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), a man was shot and killed and his body was found inside his abandoned vehicle in the La 13 sector, Nueva Esperanza neighborhood. Seven members of Los Tiguerones gang were arrested for the attack and two of them were foreigners. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 22 August 2024 (as reported), in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), a Venezuelan man was killed and his dismembered body was found inside a suitcase and jute sacs on Yanacona Street, San Enrique de Velasco neighborhood, close to the state attorney's home. It is suspected the killing was carried out with the aim of intimidating a state attorney general. Two suspects were arrested. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Urdesa neighbourhood. Earlier, two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed another man inside a restaurant in the Fioca cooperative, Juan Montalvo sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 23 August 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Nueva Esperanza neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 23 August 2024 (as reported), in El Pangui (Zamora Chinchipe), a man dressed as a local miner was killed (unspecified) and his body found tied up in the Pashkus sector. No visible gunshot or stab wounds were found on the victim. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 August 2024, in Nobol (Guayas), an adolescent was shot and killed and his body found on the side of the road to the Artilleria compound, Petrillo commune. The victim was shot eight times in the head, face and back and his body was found with its hands and feet tied up. The victim had been missing since the morning of the same day. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 August 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen in a car shot and killed a man driving a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on the Portoviejo-Crucita Road, El Limon curve. The victim was shot several times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Letamendi (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a person on 28th Street, between the C and Ch. Police arrested both perpetrators around the Trinipuerto and seized their vehicle. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of members of Los Tiguerones on motorbikes shot and killed three homeless people in a drive-by shooting in the bloco 17, Flor de Bastion sector. The three victims were bell-ringers working for said group and were supposed to warn the faction of any police operations. The victims were killed in retaliation for not warning about a police operation in the area. Another person was injured. 3 fatalities.

source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 24 August 2024, in the rural area of the Quevedo canton (Los Rios), police and armed forces through the security block arrested 30 people during an operation and rescued nine kidnapping victims from a banana farm in the La Virginia sector, El Guayacan parish. One of the detainees was a target of high-value and leader of Los Lobos gang.

source: Cronica (Ecuador); Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Policia Ecuador
notes: On 24 August 2024, in Milagro (Guayas), police forces arrested the leader of Los Choneros gang during an operation between Ernesto Albuja and 1 de Mayo Streets, Los Vergeles neighborhood. The arrests took place during a narco-party and members of the transit agency, police and navy forces who were members of Los Aguilas gang were also arrested. Between 20 and 36 other suspects were also arrested and charged with illicit association during operation 'Gran Libertad 13'. Two pistols were seized. A total of 70 people were arrested nationwide as part of this operation.

On 24 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of members of Los Tiguerones gang shot and killed two men and injured two others in the Paraiso de la Flor. In the Nueva Prosperina cooperative, members of Los Tiguerones gang on a motorbike shot and killed another man for refusing to pay an extortion tax in a drive-by shooting. Two other victims were killed by members of the same group in the area, one of them with a record for drug possession. Several of the victims were drug users and they received death threats before the shooting. 5 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 24 August 2024 (as reported), in Jaramijo (Manabi), a man was killed (unspecified) and his body found tied up with signs of violence (unspecified) next to a pile of rubbish in the Mar Abierto sector. The victim was a taxi driver who had been missing since the morning of the same day and it is likely he was killed by extortionists due to his job. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and injured another in a drive-by shooting in the La Floresta sector, Nueva Granada cooperative. 1 fatality.

On 24 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Union de Bananeros cooperative. The victim was the administrator of an illegal drug rehabilitation center who informed to drug trafficking groups about the situation at these centers. It is suspected the victim was killed for poor management of several clandestine rehabilitation centers. Criminal groups have interests in these centers to better control illegal activities. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 24 August 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) on a motorbike shot and killed two people in a drive-by shooting on the Portoviejo-Santa Ana Road, on the El Limon curve. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 24 August 2024, in the rural area of the Crucita (Portoviejo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified heavily-armed individuals shot and killed two men in the courtyard of a house in the Los Ranchos sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 24 August 2024, in the rural area of the Daule canton (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and his nephew driving a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on San Francisco del Sur Avenue. The perpetrators fired 12 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 24 August 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men inside a pool hall in the Laguna de Canas sector. One of the victims was a well-known footballer. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 24 August 2024, in the rural area of the Quevedo canton (Los Rios), members of Los Lobos gang kidnapped nine people and held them for ransom in a banana plantation in the La Virginia sector, El Guayacan parish. All victims were rescued unharmed by the armed forces and the leader of Los Lobos gang who is a high-value target was arrested alongside six other suspects. Eight cell phones and two vehicles were seized.

source: El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 25 August 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), police forces arrested three members of the Los Choneros gang, a leader and his two brothers, one of which was a first corporal in the armed forces in active duty.

On 25 August 2024, in El Salitre (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a tricycle shot and killed a man and injured his wife and son in the La Delicia area in a drive-by shooting. A third person was also injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 August 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Voluntad de Dios sector. The victim was shot seven times and his girlfriend was injured by a stray bullet. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Urdaneta (Guayas), three unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man on 19 and Medardo Streets in a drive-by shooting. The perpetrators were in a vehicle. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 25 August 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of Samanga (Ambato, Tungurahua), a person was killed and their foot found in the yard of a house in the San Pedro neighborhood. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 25 August 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen in a vehicle shot and killed a man and an adolescent in a drive-by shooting on Juan Montalvo and Enrique Coello Avenue. The perpetrators fired more than 15 shots. One of the victims had five criminal proceedings pending against him and the killing might have been related to a settling of scores. 2 fatalities.
Property destruction: On 25 August 2024, in Crucita (Portoviejo, Manabi), police forces seized 1,000 blocks of narcotics hidden inside 28 jute bags loaded on a truck. There were no arrests.

Property destruction: Around 25 August 2024 (as reported), around Sucumbios province (coded Nueva Loja), police forces seized four tons of marijuana hidden inside oil pipelines. One suspect was arrested.

Property destruction: On 25 August 2024, in Lomas de Sargentillo (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike fired shots at a vehicle from the national Ecuador Traffic Commission (CTE) unit parked inside a police station. There were no personnel inside the car. It is suspected the attack was related to a retaliation.

On 26 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Rotaria Road, bloco 4 of the Flor de Bastion sector. Four other people were injured. Earlier, two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed another man in the same area. Five suspects were arrested and identified as members of Los Tiguerones gang. Police seized three firearms, one motorbike, two balaclavas, one ballistic vest, seven cell phones and other materials. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 26 August 2024, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), three members of Los Vatos Locos gang physically assaulted a man and a woman in the La Ofelia area, Carapungo neighborhood. The woman was stabbed on the chest. The attack began because of a physical fight and the three perpetrators were arrested. There were no fatalities.

On 26 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Mapasingue Este neighborhood. The victim was shot about five times and a woman who was nearby was injured by a stray bullet. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 26 August 2024 (as reported), in Huaquillas (El Oro), a man was killed (unspecified) and his body found with signs of torture in the Primero de Mayo citadel, at the intersection of Carchi and Atahualpa Streets. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 26 August 2024 (as reported), in Picoaza (Portoviejo, Manabi), three people were shot and killed and their bodies found inside plastic bags and in a state of decomposition on the Manta-Rocafuerte Road. The victims had been missing since 25 August and were last seen near the San Jacinto resort. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

Weapons seizure: On 26 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces raided two properties used by the Los Fatales gang and dismantled their weapons storage in the Monte Sinai neighborhood. Police seized a pistol, a revolver, two ammo feeders, 80 ammunition cartridges, a motorbike and two cell phones. One suspect was arrested.

Property destruction: On 26 August 2024, in Crucita (Portoviejo, Manabi), armed forces seized 28 sacks containing 1,200 blocks of narcotics hidden inside three fiberglass boats. All 20 suspects managed to escape and two firearms were seized.

On 26 August 2024, in Lomas de Sargentillo (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals attacked members of the national Ecuador Traffic Commission (CTE) with a stone and a threatening pamphlet. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

Around 27 August 2024 (as reported), around Esmeraldas province (coded Esmeraldas), four unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a person in the Guarapera sector. The victim was rescued by police forces unharmed. There is no further information available.

On 27 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting on the Perimetral Highway, Francisco Jacome cooperative. Another person riding the motorbike was injured and the perpetrators fired approximately six times. Both victims were family members and one of them had a criminal record. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 27 August 2024 (as reported), around Manabi province (coded Portoviejo), a man was killed and his dismembered body found in the El Guabito sector, on the Portoviejo-Santa Ana Highway. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 August 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Nueva Esperanza neighborhood. One of the victims was a collateral victim and the perpetrators fired more than 15 gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Defusal: On 27 August 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police forces seized and defused a case full of explosives abandoned at the intersection of Vicente Rocafuerte Street with Antonio Jose de Sucre and Jose Joaquin Olmedo Streets. The explosives were found with a threatening pamphlet signed by a local criminal group.

On 27 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), six members of Los Tiguerones gang kidnapped two women, cut off their fingers, tortured them and demanded a ransom. Both were sexually assaulted and were rescued on 2 September by the police from a hideout in the Trinidad de Dios cooperative, Monte Sinai sector. All six perpetrators were arrested, including a gang leader (coded separately). There were no fatalities.

On 28 August 2024, in Guaytacama (Cotopaxi), five unidentified armed individuals in a car beat up three men with steel beams and knives in the Guaitacama parish. One of the victims was hospitalized in critical condition. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.
Property destruction: On 28 August 2024, around Pichincha province (coded Quito), armed forces with the support of the ministry of the interior incinerated 10 tons of narcotics.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador)
notes: On 28 August 2024, in La Esperanza (Quevedo, Los Rios), members of Los Lobos gang in a vehicle kidnapped a person near a cemetery in the Ruta del Rio sector and held them for ransom. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 29 August 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed the local director of the Citizen Revolution Movement (MRC) in the Primavera 2 sector. The victim was shot dead inside his car and it is suspected the killing was because the victim refused to pay an extortion tax. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 August 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Sara de la Cruz de Chavez and Bolivar Madero Vargas Streets, Autoridad Portuaria neighborhood. notes: On 29 August 2024, in Jaramijo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting at a barbecue grill on Jhon F. Kennedy and Anibal San Andres Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

notes: Property destruction: On 29 August 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), armed forces seized 1.3 tons of cocaine or about 1,3459 brick-shaped blocks hidden in boxes of bananas destined for export in the Amazonas neighborhood. Four suspects were arrested and one firearm seized.

Around 30 August 2024 (as reported), in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), a woman was killed and her body found in an advanced state of decomposition inside a bag on a road near Gallina River, Loma de Guineo sector. It is suspected the perpetrators were on motorbikes. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Florida Norte neighborhood. The victim's female companion was shot and injured. The victims had no criminal records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 30 August 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in a mechanic's shop located on Santa Rosa and 11 Norte Streets, Cristo del Consuelo neighborhood. Another person was injured by stray bullets and the perpetrators fired at least six gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 30 August 2024, in Naranjal (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen aboard a vehicle shot and killed a man and a child in a drive-by shooting on Guayacanes and Miraflores Streets. The victim was the brother of a detainee being held in the Guayaquil detention center. It is suspected the killing was due to a settling of scores or revenge. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 30 August 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), a crowd of 100 people attempted to lynch a person by beating him up in the Guamani sector and set his motorbike on fire. The victim was a Colombian man and he was rescued by the police. There were no fatalities.

The victim was released on 3 September in the Arenillas canton and two suspects were arrested. There is no further information available.

Around 31 August 2024 (as reported), in Vinces (Los Rios), a man was stabbed, shot and killed and his body found on a road in the Abras de Mantequilla sector. The victim's motorbike was found abandoned in the Vuelta Larga sector and he had been missing since 29 August. The victim was shot twice and near the body there was a cardboard claiming that the responsible for the killing were members of the Los Militares gang. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 31 August 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Balao canton (Guayas), a man was killed and his body found in a banana plantation with his hands tied up and his face bandaged in the Naranjal neighborhood. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 31 August 2024, in Naranjal (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man with five gunshots to the head in the Nueva Naranjal neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 31 August 2024 (as reported), in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), a man was killed and their dismembered body was found inside a plastic bag on top of a motorbike. The head was found nearby with a pamphlet attributing to the victim the crimes of extortion and robberies. A local criminal group took responsibility for the killing. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 31 August 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man and a woman in a drive-by shooting in the Los Geranios neighborhood. Another person was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 31 August 2024 (as reported), in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two men were shot dead and their bodies found tied-up and with signs of torture on a road in the Pedregal sector. The perpetrators fired 15 gunshots and the attack motivations might have been related to a drug seizure that happened in Puerto Bolivar on 29 August (coded separately). The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 31 August 2024, in the rural area of the Tenguel parish (Balao, Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed three men and injured another inside a pool hall in the Esperanza del Carmen sector, Barrio Association 9 de Agosto. Property destruction: On 31 August 2024, in Buenos Aires (Pimampiro, Imbabura), police forces dismantled 20 illegal mining camps and seized 500 bags of mineralized material, 32 dynamite sticks, 94 detonating capsules, 80 meters of detonating cord and other materials. There were no arrests.

Property destruction: On 31 August 2024, in Machala (El Oro), police forces seized 1.3 tons of cocaine distributed in more than a thousand packages in the Amazonas neighborhood. Four members of Los Lobos Box were arrested. A van and a firearm were also seized.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Esmeraldas News; Expreso
notes: On 1 September 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified hooded and armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Mina de Piedra neighborhood. The victim was shot at least 10 times. Another person was injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 1 September 2024 (as reported), in La Union (Atacames, Esmeraldas), a person was killed and their dismembered body found inside a suitcase on the Pacific Road, Nueva Esperanza neighbourhood. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 1 September 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), a man and a woman were shot and killed and their bodies were found near a tricycle. Another person was shot and killed in the Isla Trinitaria sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. The area is being disputed by Los Aguilas and Los Carniceros Gang, that is why authorities suspect the attack is related to territorial disputes. 3 fatalities.

Weapons seizure: On 1 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), police and armed forces through the security block seized 29 explosive devices, 20 fuses, 19 detonating capsules, five cell phones, a firearm and 367 ammunition cartridges inside a criminal hideout. Three suspects were arrested.

Around 1 September 2024 (as reported), in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), four members of Los Lobos gang kidnapped a state company worker and held him for ransom in the San Sebastian de Calderon housing complex, La Magdalena neighborhood. It is suspected that the kidnapping orders came from an inmate in a Cotopaxi prison and two of the kidnappers were of Venezuelan nationality and the other two Colombians. The victim was released eight days later. There is no further information available.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 2 September 2024, in the rural area of the Pelileo (San Pedro de Pelileo, Tungurahua), a group of Indigenous people brought three men accused of cattle stealing in the Salasaca parish to an indigenous justice tribunal. As a part of the indigenous trial process, the three suspects were paraded half-naked in a square in front of around 500 people and beaten with whips and nettles. The calves were recovered and the three suspects were detained by the police. There were no fatalities.
On 2 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces arrested a leader of Los Tiguerones gang in the Monte Sinai sector. In total five suspects were arrested and one vehicle was seized.

On 2 September 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man outside a motorbike workshop in a drive-by shooting in the Rayito de Luz neighborhood. The perpetrators fired at least six gunshots at the victim who was the workshop's owner. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 2 September 2024 (between 2 - 6 September), in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed at least three people in four different localities, Eloy Alfaro parish, Nueva Esperanza, El Prado, La Pradera and the Los Esteros parish. All three victims were taxi drivers and none of the victims had criminal records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 2 September 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a taxi driver with six gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Nuevo Pilo neighborhood. It is likely the perpetrators were extortionists and that the killing was related to extortions due to the victim's job. The victim had also received death threats. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) on a motorbike shot and killed a taxi driver in a drive-by shooting in the El Prado neighborhood. The victim had no criminal records. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2024, in Pedro Carbo (Guayas), three unidentified armed individuals in a taxi shot and killed three people in a drive-by shooting in their commercial establishment. It is suspected the killing was motivated by extortion and the three victims were father, mother and son. Authorship unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 2 September 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with three gunshots to the head in a drive-by shooting. The victim had been threatened by extortionists. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2024, in Bajo Alto (El Guabo, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Tropezon sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Paraiso neighborhood, Muey parish. The victim had no criminal records and used himself as a shield to protect his family. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen in a tricycle shot and killed two people in a drive-by shooting on 38B Avenue, Juan Montalvo sector. The victims were in a sports field playing football in the Ficoa cooperative and none of the victims had unspecified criminal records. It is suspected the main target managed to escape. The perpetrators fired at least nine gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Weapons seizure: On 2 September 2024, in Manuel Cornejo Astorga (Mejia, Pichincha), police forces seized one firearm, 38 ammunition cartridges, 96 dynamite sticks, 33 detonating capsules and one roll of detonating cord in the Tandapi circuit. Two suspects were arrested.

Property destruction: On 2 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces set a criminal hideout on fire in the Trinidad de Dios cooperative, Monte Sinai sector. Three people had been held for ransom and rescued on 27 August (coded separately). The fire spread to the adjoining house.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2023-); Los Choneros Gang (Ecuador); Police Forces of Ecuador (2023-) Prison Guards
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 3 September 2024, around Nueva Loja (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), an unknown number of unidentified heavily-armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed the director of the Sucumbios prison center travelling in a van on the bridge over the Aguarico River, at KM-3 of the road between Nueva Loja and El Coca, province of Orellana. The perpetrators fired 39 gunshots and left a pamphlet attributing the motivation to the support given by the victims to incarcerated members of Los Choneros gang. Two other prison guards were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Policia DMZ Zona 9
notes: On 3 September 2024, in Quito - Tumbaco (Pichincha), six unidentified armed individuals beat up and kidnapped a man and his son and held them for ransom (express kidnapping) in the Pifo parish. One victim was abandoned after transferring money and his son was rescued by armed forces. Both victims were rescued unharmed. Police seized six firearms, eight cell phones, and one motorbike. All six suspects were arrested and sentenced to prison terms ranging from 12 to 31 years. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 3 September 2024, in Bajo Alto (El Guabo, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in about ten boats, two cars and four motorbikes shot and killed two men inside restaurant. Two fishing boats were set on fire, one of the victims was a local worker of Colombian nationality and the other the son of the owner. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 3 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on 316 Street, in the El Chaparral locality, Eloy Alfaro parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 3 September 2024 (as reported), around Guayas province (coded to Daule), a man was burned alive and found with 75% of his body burned on the KM-34 of the Nobol-Daule Road. The victim also had drag marks on his body and was tied up. The number of perpetrators is unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 3 September 2024 (as reported), in Santa Rosa (El Oro), a man was killed and his body found with signs of torture and gunshot wounds on the guardrail of Vega Rivera Road, La Victoria parish. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men with more than 40 gunshots in the Puerto Principal sector. It is suspected the killing was related to territorial disputes. 2 fatalities.

On 4 September 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police forces arrested the leader of Los Aguilas gang involved in drug trafficking and criminal association. Two other suspects were arrested and the police seized drugs.

On 4 September 2024, in San Isidro (Sucre, Manabi), three unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man inside a nightclub. All three suspects were arrested on 6 September by the armed forces in the El Tormento locality. A revolver, a pistol and several ammunition rounds were seized. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car fired shots at a man driving a vehicle and killed his dog in a drive-by shooting in the Las Cumbres neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

On 4 September 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Los Sauces 1 neighborhood. The victim had a criminal record for theft and was a drug user. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 4 September 2024 (as reported), in Machala (El Oro), a person was killed and their body found packaged and wrapped on plastic on La Primavera Street. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 4 September 2024, in San Miguel de Ibarra (Imbabura), police and armed forces through the security block dismantled an illegal mining camp and seized 74 meters of detonating cord, 10 explosives, 33 detonating capsules, 32,000kg of mineralized materials and 132 gallons of fuel. There were no arrests.

Around 4 September 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the La Iberia (El Guabo, El Oro), a man was killed and his body found near a banana plantation. The victim was left beside threatening pamphlets relating the killing to drug trafficking disputes. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), five people beat up a man with a bat and a hammer and killed him during an attempted robbery in the 24 de Mayo sector, Centro Historico neighborhood. The victim had entered a private residence and was beaten up by workers from a local business. Two women involved in the killing were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2024, in San Vicente (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals who arrived on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a beauty salon. Both suspects were arrested and on 29 July sentenced to 40 years in prison. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 September 2024, in La Mana (Cotopaxi), a group of local residents beat up and tried to burn a man alive after an attempted robbery. A motorbike was set on fire during the lynching. One robber was rescued by the police and arrested and another suspect managed to escape on a motorbike.

Property destruction: On 5 September 2024, in San Francisco de las Pampas (Sigchos, Cotopaxi), police and armed forces seized 400 sacks of mineralized material, 88 dynamite sticks, about 200 meters of slow fuse, 33 detonator capsules, three light engines and two water pumps during an operation carried out to curb illegal mining. An illegal mining camp described as owned by a criminal group was dismantled in the Las Golondrinas sector.

On 5 September 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a van shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on the corner of Junin and 2da Norte Streets. The perpetrators fired at least 10 gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 5 September 2024, in Daule (Guayas), police forces defused an explosive device placed outside a company on the KM-11.5 of the road to Daule. It is suspected that extortionists left the bomb as a threatening warning.

Around 5 September 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Jesus Maria parish (Naranjal, Guayas), a man was shot and killed and his body found with three gunshot wounds to the head. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 6 September 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Rio Bonito parish (El Guabo, El Oro), three men were killed and their dismembered bodies found inside jute sacks on the Tendales-El Garrido Road. It is suspected the killings might be related to gang disputes between the Sao Box gang and the Los Lobos gang. All three victims worked in gold mines in the Camilo Ponce Enriquez canton. Another corpse with bullet wounds to the head and signs of torture (unspecified) was found in an abandoned shack in a banana plantation nearby. The last victim had been missing since 5 September and it is suspected that his killing was related to a reprisal for being involved in car thefts in Camilo Ponce Enriquez. The number of perpetrators is unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 6 September 2024, in Machala (El Oro), approximately 15 unidentified armed assailants in five vans shot and killed a man inside his private residence in the Rayito de Luz neighborhood. It is likely the perpetrators were members of a gang due to the number of suspects, the two vehicles, the tactics and the fact that the victim was shot several times in the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man driving his car in a drive-by shooting between 121 Street and 108 Avenue, Los Esteros parish. The perpetrators fired about eight times and a woman was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), members of Los Tiguerones gang in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on the Limoncocha Avenue, Assad Bucaram cooperative, Guamote sector, Pascuales parish. The perpetrators escaped on the victim's motorbike. Later, seven suspects, including three adolescents, were arrested by the police. It is suspected that the killing order came from a Los Tiguerones gang leader who wanted to silence the victim after he left the gang. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2024, in Barbones (El Guabo, El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals who arrived on a motorbike shot and killed a man inside his barbershop. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as hitmen shot and killed a man driving a car in a drive-by shooting on 108 Avenue. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen in a vehicle shot and killed a municipal agent at a municipal camp at the intersection of Galo Garcia and Municipalidad Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Policia Ecuador
notes: On 7 September 2024, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), police and armed forces through the security block arrested the leader of Los Tiguerones gang in the Pisuli neighborhood. The suspect was involved in extortions, kidnappings, contract killings and drug trafficking. Police seized 61 rifle ammunition rounds, a bag of marijuana and cash.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 7 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified heavily-armed individuals described as members of a criminal group in a car shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting along Antonio Parra Velasco Avenue and Agustin Freire, Puerto Principal sector, Sauces 2 sector. The victim was driving an armored vehicle, but the perpetrators, who had threatened the victim, fired 11 times using assault rifles. The victim also had criminal records for robbery in 2009 and 2013 and drug possession from 2014. The suspects abandoned the vehicle on Venezuela Street. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 September 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), three unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on the Portoviejo-Santa Ana Highway, El Becker locality, El Guabito sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 September 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as members of a criminal group shot and killed a man between the Amazonas 1 and Amazonas 2 neighborhoods. It is suspected the victim had problems with a local criminal group and he had received death threats. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed four men in the 5 de Junio cooperative. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 4 fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 8 September 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), several men physically assaulted four agents of the Ecuador Transit Commission (CTE) after being stopped for driving in the wrong direction on 12 Avenue, Puerto Lucia sector. There were no fatalities.

On 8 September 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), armed forces arrested two faction leaders from the Los Chone Killers gang during an operation in the 28 de Agosto cooperative. Both gangs are involved in extortions, drug trafficking and contract killings.

On 8 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on 313 Street and 221 Avenue, between the Maria Auxiliadora and Las Vegas neighborhoods. The perpetrators fired at least 15 shots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Juan Montalvo sector. The perpetrators fired 17 times and one of them was arrested in the Florida sector. One motorbike, a pistol, two magazines and ammunition rounds were seized by the police. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 September 2024, in Samborondon (Guayas), nine unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle kidnapped a person in the Barranca sector and held them for ransom. The victim was rescued unharmed on 23 September, 15 days after being kidnapped. All nine suspects involved in robberies, criminal association, drug trafficking and carrying firearms were arrested in the Isla Trinitaria sector, Guayaquil. There is no further information available.

Other: On 8 September 2024, in Playas (Guayas), the citizen security council declared a state of emergency for 60 days due to the increase in criminal acts and violent deaths. The measure seeks to strengthen security and maintain order in the canton.

On 8 September 2024, in the rural area of the Mocache canton (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals armed with rifles shot and killed three men in a drive-by shooting on the Jauneche-Mocache Road. The perpetrators fired more than 20 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 8 September 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), military forces dismantled a drug laboratory in the La Universitaria sector. One suspect was arrested and drugs and materials to manufacture drugs were seized.

On 9 September 2024, in Daule (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a former police officer in a drive-by shooting on Vicente Piedrahita Avenue. The perpetrators were members of Los Lobos gang and they fired more than 12 times at the victim. A threatening pamphlet was left at the crime scene claiming responsibility for the Los Lobos gang and threatening members of Los Fatales gang and Ben 10 gang. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2024, around Pichincha province (coded Quito), a member of Los Pepes gang shot and killed a man. The suspect was a medium-value target and he was arrested by the police after a pursuit. Motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting during a funerary ceremony on Circunvalacion Sur Avenue, near Las Americas Avenue. Another person was shot and injured and they were both carrying the coffin of a man shot and killed on 7 September in Puerto Bolivar (coded separately). Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 9 September 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Machala canton (Manabi), a man was killed and his dismembered body found cut into four parts and with signs of torture (unspecified) inside two jute bags in a banana plantation on the San Vicente-El Guabo road. The victim also had stab wounds and it was found beside a threatening pamphlet alluding to drug trafficking disputes. It is suspected the victim was killed elsewhere and their body abandoned in the rural area. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Florestal 2 neighborhood, Eloy Alfaro parish. The victim's wife was shot and injured and one suspect with an extensive criminal record was arrested. It is suspected the killing was related to drug trafficking disputes between Los Choneros gang and Los Lobos gang. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2024, in Naranjal (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a woman driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the Casa Para Todos neighborhood. The victim was shot more than 10 times to her head, chest and back. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 September 2024, in Naranjal (Guayas), an unidentified armed individual on a motorbike shot and killed a man in the La Esplanada neighborhood. It is suspected the killing is related to retaliation over drug trafficking disputes between Los Choneros gang and Los Lobos gang. 1 fatality.

Around 10 September 2024 (week of), in Naranjal (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man inside his mechanical workshop. The victim was shot at least eight times and the perpetrators left a note for the victim. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 September 2024, in Naranjal (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. The perpetrators fired at least 15 times and the victim was an official of the civil judicial unit parking his car outside of his office. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 11 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen and carrying long-range rifles fired 30 gunshots at a vehicle in the Nueva Esperanza neighborhood, Eloy Alfaro parish. Both women inside the vehicle, mother and daughter, were shot and injured and hospitalized in critical condition. The perpetrators also used a hand grenade during the attack which is suspected to be related to drug trafficking disputes since the victim's husband was one of the leaders of the Los Lobos gang killed on 7 April in Manta, province of Manabi (coded separately). It is suspected the shooting was perpetrated by members of Los Choneros gang, which is a rival of the Los Lobos gang. There were no fatalities.
tags: women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

notes: Property destruction: On 11 September 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), members of Los Lobos gang attacked a house in the Esquina Bochinche, 5 de Junio neighbourhood. It is suspected the attack was a distraction for two shootings that happened later (coded separately). There were no arrests.

Around 11 September 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), a kidnapping victim was killed and their body found during police operation 'Resurgir 34'. Eight members of Los Tiguerones gang and Los Fatales gang were arrested and it is suspected they were the perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2024, in La Carmelita de Colope (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a man around and held him for ransom (express kidnapping) at a farm on the way to Rioverde. Two suspects were arrested, one with a criminal record for firearms possession and the other was a Colombian national and the police seized two homemade shotguns and a vehicle. There is no further information available.

Property destruction: On 11 September 2024, in Shushufindi (Sucumbios), armed forces raided a clandestine petrol manufacturing facility and seized an artisanal pool with illegal hydrocarbon derivatives (white gasoline) in the 28 de Marzo cooperative. It is suspected the locality was managed by a drug trafficking group.

On 11 September 2024, in the rural area of the Colon parish (Portoviejo, Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as members of a criminal group shot and killed an ice cream delivery man while driving his vehicle in a drive-by shooting in the Mapasingue sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals carrying long-range firearms in a car fired several shots at a man driving an armored vehicle in a drive-by shooting in the San Felipe citadel. The perpetrators fired more than 20 gunshots but the victim was not injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

Property destruction: On 11 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Rocafuerte (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as delinquents set fire to a cell phone and repair shop on Noguchi and Colon Streets. It is suspected the perpetrators were extortionists trying to kill the local owner.

On 11 September 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two men were shot and killed and their bodies found on Cuatro Esquinas-El Zapallo Road. The victims had been kidnapped earlier the same day by six unidentified and heavily-armed individuals. The perpetrators left a cardboard next to the victims saying they were members of an organized group who killed their rivals. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 11 September 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Autoridad Portuaria neighborhood. The victim was shot at least 10 times and he had a criminal record for unauthorized possession of firearms. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen and on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting outside the Angela Loayza de Ollague maternity, Bosque 1 sector. The perpetrators fired 10 shots. The victim's companion was shot and injured. It is suspected the killing is related to drug trafficking disputes. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: Property destruction: On 12 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as members of a criminal group set fire to a parked vehicle belonging to the Ecuador Transit Commission (CTE) on Nicolas Lapentti Avenue, in front of Petrocomercial. There were no arrests.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2023-); Labor Group (Ecuador); Women (Ecuador)
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 12 September 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a woman in a drive-by shooting on the Guayaquil-Daule Highway. The perpetrators fired four times and the motorbike used in the shooting was abandoned in the Ladrillera locality. The victim was the director of the El Litoral Prison and her driver was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 12 September 2024, off the Coast of Puerto Velasco Ibarra (San Cristobal, Galapagos), navy forces carried out an operation 140 nautical miles from the Galapagos islands and seized thirty-six jute bags containing 1,466 brick-shaped blocks of cocaine weighing 1.71 tons hidden inside a fiberglass boat and arrested two suspects.

Around 12 September 2024 (as reported), near Agua Clara (Muisne, Esmeraldas), a man was shot and killed inside his car and his body found with signs of torture (unspecified) and in an advanced state of decomposition on the road to Sandoval. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 12 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), police forces seized 1,100 brick-shaped packages hidden inside a truck weighing 1,094kg of drugs during an operation carried out in the Montebello sector, Pascuales neighborhood. The drugs were valued at $2,189,000 in Ecuador and $43,780,000 in Europe, and estimated at around 10,945,000 doses. There were no arrests.

On 12 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Primavera 2 citadel. The victim's mother was shot and injured and a witness, a local resident, was also shot dead. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 12 September 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), a man was shot and killed and his body found tied up, with his eyes covered and wrapped on a sheet and showing signs of torture. It is suspected the victim was carried on a motorbike. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on 107 Street and 111 Avenue, Buenos Aires neighborhood. The victim was shot five times. It is suspected that the killing was related to drug trafficking disputes. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 12 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man and a woman riding a motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the El Porvenir neighborhood. The vehicle used during the shooting was set on fire in the Ceibos Renacer sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 12 September 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at a car wash on Carlos Falquez Batallas Street, Simon Bolivar neighborhood. The victim was the owner of the establishment and he was shot at least eight times in the head. Earlier, two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a mechanic in a drive-by shooting at a motorbike shop in the Los Naranjos neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 12 September 2024 (week of), in El Empalme (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped two workers and held them for ransom. The victims were held hostage for three days and rescued by the police on 15 September while still wearing their work uniforms. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 12 September 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the La Iberia (El Guabo, El Oro), a man was shot and killed and his body found with signs of torture (unspecified) packed in a plastic bag between Barbones Road and La Primavera Road, in an improvised garbage dump near a banana plantation. The victim was a delivery motorbike driver who was working at the time of the killing and his bike was found burned-out. It is suspected the body was thrown from a moving vehicle and it was found with several gunshots to the head. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 September 2024, in Petrillo (Nobol, Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the La Primavera neighborhood. The perpetrators fired at least 12 times and another victim was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2024, in Salango (Puerto Lopez, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as members of a criminal group beat up the woman president of the parish because she allowed military presence in the area. Authorship unknown. There were no fatalities.
tags: local administrators; women targeted: government officials

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Diario Regional Los Andes; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 13 September 2024 (as reported), in Cayambe (Pichincha), a truck driver was killed and his body found with signs of violence (unspecified) in a ravine in the San Francisco de Oyacoto commune. The victim was kidnapped and killed while he was working on a delivery with his truck. One of the suspects was caught by a large group of people and lynched (coded separately) and the other was handed to the police, but eventually released. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Paco Onate 2 cooperative. The perpetrators fired more than 10 gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man inside a car in a drive-by shooting in the El Palmar neighborhood, Los Esteros parish. Two other people who were inside the victim's car were shot and injured by the hitmen who fired seven gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 13 September 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Vinces canton (Los Rios), two men were shot several times and their bodies found with signs of torture (unspecified) in the La Saiba sector, Abras de Mantequilla compound. One of the victims was shot multiple times in the head and at least one of them had marks made by a rope. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Diario Regional Los Andes; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 14 September 2024, in Cayambe (Pichincha), a large group of people, including a local indigenous group acting as a vigilante group from the Santa Isabel community lynched a man (indigenous justice) involved in the killing of a truck driver (coded separately). The suspect was lashed with whips in the central square of Juan Montalvo parish, Rumoloma sector. After the lynching the suspect was hanged at a bridge in the Parque Central. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 14 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man driving a car in a drive-by shooting on Avenida del Ejercito and Jose Mascote. The victim had legal proceedings for document forgery, fraud and material damages. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.
