Around 14 September 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of Machala canton (El Oro), a man was killed and his body found with signs of torture (unspecified) and packaged on La Primavera Road. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 September 2024, in Convento (Chone, Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting on Tres Esquinas and 8 de Diciembre Roads, La Alianza sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 14 September 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting during a funerary wake on 26 de Septiembre Street. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 14 September 2024, in Chongon (Guayaquil, Guayas), armed forces seized approximately 30,000 gallons of illegal petrol hidden inside 10 trucks in the Cerecita-Chongon Highway. Five suspects were arrested.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Policia Ecuador
notes: Property destruction: On 14 September 2024, in Jaramijo (Manabi), police forces carried out operation 'Aniversario Plateado', dismantled a drug storage house and seized 297 brick-shaped packages of cocaine hydrochloride valued at $15 million, two pistols, three cars, a motorbike and cell phones. The drugs were hidden inside the false bottom of the three vehicles seized. Six suspects were arrested, four of them with criminal records for illegal possession of substances, drug trafficking, robberies and homicide.

Property destruction: On 14 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot at doors and windows of a meat business between 25 and 26 Streets. The shooting only caused material damage and it is suspected the attack was related to extortions. There were no arrests.

On 15 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an adolescent who was also a drug user in a football field in the Casitas del Guasmo cooperative. Another person was injured. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 15 September 2024 (as reported), in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), a man was killed and his head found wrapped in a plastic bag between the 19 de Noviembre and the 12 de Noviembre neighborhoods. The head was thrown from moving motorbikes in front of a house and with it there was a threatening pamphlet suggesting that the killing was related to drug trafficking disputes between cells of Los Lobos gang. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 September 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), an unidentified armed individual described as a hitman and in a car fired shots at a person in a drive-by shooting. It is unknown if the victim was injured. The suspect was arrested and the car and a motorbike seized. There were no casualties.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 15 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and injured two people on 316 and 216 Streets, between the Las Vegas and Santa Lucia neighborhoods, Eloy Alfaro parish. The vehicle used in the shooting was set on fire and sent rolling down a slope against a house. It is unclear if it was a drive-by shooting. Also, an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen in a car shot and injured a man and his infant daughter in a drive-by shooting on 122 Street with 105 Avenue, El Paraiso neighborhood, Los Esteros parish. The perpetrators fired six times and also injured a woman. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 15 September 2024, in San Sebastian del Coca (La Joya de los Sachas, Orellana), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen fired shots during a football match on the Guadalupe Larriva field. The hitmen fired at least eight gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no casualties.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 15 September 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed and hooded assailants described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed two football players in a drive-by shooting during a football match in the El Tablazo sector. The perpetrators fired at least 10 gunshots and one of the victims was hit at least five times, mostly in the head. Two other people were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 15 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), 10 unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed three people near a supermarket in a drive-by shooting at the entrance of the Flor de Bastion sector, near the Mayaicu cooperative. Later, four unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a person in a drive-by shooting in the Florida neighborhood. All four suspects were arrested and the police seized 14 dynamite sticks, 51 ammunition rounds, two motorbikes and drugs. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Mercurio (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: Weapons seizure: On 15 September 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), armed forces carried out a weapon, ammunition and explosives control operation in the Puntudo sector. In total, 300 gel explosive sticks, 250 dynamite sticks, six bags of ammonium nitrate, two communication radios, several meters of detonating cord and six explosive capsules with slow fuse were seized. There were no arrests.

Around 15 September 2024 (as reported), in Mocache (Los Rios), three people were shot dead and their bodies were found on the road to the Jauneche compound, Guarumal sector. The bodies were taken by relatives who refused to follow legal procedure. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 16 September 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Marcos Gorozabel and Gabriela Mistral alley, Plaza Central sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 16 September 2024 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a man was killed and his dismembered body found wrapped in a plastic on the slopes of Las Cabras hill, near the old market. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man riding his motorbike in a drive-by shooting at KM-3.5 of the road to Boliche. The victim was shot several times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Paraiso de la Flor sector. The victim was shot 12 times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); Policia Ecuador
notes: Weapons seizure: On 16 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), police and armed forces through the security block seized an arsenal of large-calibre firearms and ammunition hidden inside a weapons storage in the La Pradera citadel. Four suspects were arrested. In total, five M4 assault rifles, Uzi ammunition, a Taurus pistol and a homemade pistol, alongside over 1000 ammunition rounds were seized. Marijuana, cocaine paste, cell phones and other materials were also seized.
On 16 September 2024, in Chone (Manabi), a group of local residents beat up and tied up a man carrying a knife who tried to capture an adolescent. There were no fatalities.

On 17 September 2024, in Cuenca (Azuay), local residents beat up and captured a man involved in robberies near the university of Azuay sector. The suspect was handed over the police. There were no fatalities.

On 17 September 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at a car washing business at the intersection between Sucre and Ramon Chiriboga Streets, Parada 11 sector. The victim was shot at least five times while he was working. It is suspected the victim was targeted by extortionists and that the attack motivation was that he could not pay an extortion. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 17 September 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as delinquents fired shots and set fire to a bus belonging to the San Cristobal cooperative inside a garage on Cotopaxi and 10 de Agosto Streets, Primero de May neighborhood. The perpetrators used a homemade petrol bomb, likely a Molotov cocktail. It is suspected the attack was related to extortions and the motorbike used in the attack was abandoned near the scene. The driver, who was inside the bus, died and another victim was shot several times and injured. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 17 September 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman sitting inside a car in a drive-by shooting near the Portoviejo cathedral, on Jose Maria Urbina Avenue. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), off the Coast of Machala (El Oro), a person was killed and their beheaded body found at sea in the La Garza estuary sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a person was killed and their dismembered body found inside a jute sack in the Union de Bananeros cooperative. The torso and arms were abandoned by people on a tricycle and left in front of a property used by the Mafia-18 gang. Also in Guayaquil, a thigh and both legs that are believed to belong to the same victim were found inside another sack on Ernesto Alban Avenue, Las Malvinas sector. 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), a man was killed and his head found inside a cardboard box between Junin and 5ta Norte Streets, Autoridad Portuaria neighborhood. Next to the box there was a threatening pamphlet. On the same day unidentified armed individuals fired shots around the area. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 September 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the intersection between 23ava Oeste Street and 9na Sur Avenue, La Paz neighborhood. The victim was shot at least nine times. It is suspected the killing was related to drug trafficking disputes. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2024, in Sucre (24 de Mayo, Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a taxi driver in a drive-by shooting at the intersection between Rocafuerte and Virgilio Stoper Streets, Ciudad de Bahia cooperative, Leonidas Plaza parish. The victim was working at the time of the shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 18 September 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed two students from the Maria del Carmen Gavilanes school riding another motorbike in a drive-by shooting on Loja and N Streets, Las Palmeras neighborhood. Five suspects involved in the killing were arrested on 19 September. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 18 September 2024, in Pajan (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman in a drive-by shooting near a bakery. The perpetrators fired at least five shots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting between the Vida Nueva and Oramas Gonzalez cooperative. Neither of the victims had criminal records and three other people were injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 18 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed two people in a drive-by shooting in the 2 de Agosto sector, Eloy Alfaro parish. The perpetrators fired at least eight gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.
Weapons seizure: On 18 September 2024, in Loja (Loja), police forces seized 217 explosive devices which were supposed to be used for illegal mining. There were no arrests.

On 18 September 2024, in Tabacundo (Pedro Moncayo, Pichincha), residents of the Angumba community beat up a man involved in robberies. The man was stripped naked, lashed 40 times and then given a purification bath as punishment, which was decided during a communal assembly. The suspect, who had a criminal record for a robbery from 2015, was arrested by the police. There were no fatalities.

On 18 September 2024, in Latacunga (Cotopaxi), municipal agents beat up a female street merchant during an operation to seized products sold on the streets 5 de Junio and Antonia Vela, La Matriz parish. The victim's son was beaten up by the agents while trying to protect his mother and tear-gassed. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Mercurio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 19 September 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen and driving a motorbike shot and injured a man and a woman riding a car in a drive-by shooting at the El Trebol interchange, between Velasco Ibarra Avenue and Pichincha Avenue, heading towards La Marin sector and the Centro Historico. The female victim was an administrative official at the National Service of Integral Attention to Adults Deprived of their Liberty and Adolescent Offenders (SNAI). The perpetrators fired at least seven times and the female victim died at the hospital on 27 September. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuador en Vivo; Expreso
notes: On 19 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces carried out an operation and arrested 30 members of Los Tiguerones gang in an illegal drug rehabilitation clinic in the Socio Vivienda locality, Nueva Prosperina neighborhood. In other locations, 51 brick-shaped of cocaine, a long-range rifle, several pistols, a vest with the transit agency logo, ammunition, and other evidence were seized. Other 16 arrests were carried in Guayas province.

On 19 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man working as a tricycle driver in a drive-by shooting on Nicolas Lapentti Avenue. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), three unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured two adolescents in a drive-by shooting in the Playa Grande sector. It is suspected the shooting was related to territorial disputes between drug trafficking groups. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Ambato (Tungurahua), a man was killed and his beheaded body found in a ravine between Picaihua and Pishilata, San Jorge de Atarazana neighborhood. It is suspected the killing might be related to drug trafficking disputes. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), a person was killed and their head found on 25th Avenue West with Bolivar Madero Vargas Avenue, in the 12 de Noviembre (La Barraca) neighborhood. It is suspected the head was left by two suspects on a motorbike inside a black case next to a threatening message linked to a local organized crime group. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed two people and injured three in the 5 de Junio cooperative in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.
Defusal: On 19 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), police forces defused and removed an explosive device placed by an unknown number of unidentified individuals in a local business.

On 19 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unidentified armed individual described as a hitman shot and killed a man in the Los Jazmines cooperative. The victim, who was shot five times, was a drug user who was living in Chile after having received threats from a gang. Two other people were shot and injured. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.
On 19 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), a Peruvian man was shot dead by extortionists in the El Recreo neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2024, in Buenavista (Pasaje, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men inside a workshop in a drive-by shooting in the Ricarger citadel. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.
On 20 September 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), a group of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Casa Bonita citadel. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; Expreso; Policia DMG Zona 8
notes: On 20 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), three members of Los Tiguerones gang shot and killed a man on 30 and Maracaibo Streets, near Chembers Street. Three suspects with criminal records for carrying firearms and robberies were arrested. Police seized 312g of drugs, a precision scale, two military-grade hand grenades, extortion pamphlets, nine cell phones, and several motorbikes. It is suspected the attack motivation was extortion. 1 fatality.

Around 20 September 2024 (as reported), in Machala (El Oro), a person was killed and their body found wrapped in a sheet behind the Parque de la Paz cemetery, Los Andes neighborhood. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 20 September 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman driving a car in a drive-by shooting on 15 de Abril Avenue, Lea sector, Andres de Vera parish. The child in the car was unharmed. 1 fatality.

On 20 September 2024, in Anconcito (Salinas, Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a fisherman inside his house in the Balcon Encantado neighborhood. The perpetrators fired about 30 gunshots. It is likely the suspects were extortionists due to the victim's job in a fishing boat. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 September 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed three people outside a house in a drive-by shooting in the San Alejo neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 21 September 2024, in Buenavista (Pasaje, El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting inside their workshop between Mariana de Jesus and Patricio Rivera Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 21 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Chongon (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as extortionists shot and killed a man in the Progreso parish. The victim was shot dead inside his workshop for refusing to pay an extortion. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 21 September 2024 (as reported), in Samborondon (Guayas), an adolescent was shot dead and his body found tied up in the San Miguel precinct. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen in a car shot and killed a man on Julio Jaramilo and Salinas Streets in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Civilians (Ecuador); Former Los Chone Killers Gang
notes: On 21 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), members of the Los Chone Killers gang kidnapped and killed a former member of the same gang who had received threats from the group previously on Gabriel Roldos and Isidro Ayora Streets, between Sauces and Alborada. In the shooting, a Venezuelan man and a woman were killed. The former gang member's body was later found dead inside a vehicle on Guaranda and Ayacucho Streets. Two women were injured. 3 fatalities.
On 21 September 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), members of Los Chone Killers gang kidnapped a former member of the group who was trying to leave. There is no further information available.

On 21 September 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals beat up and kidnapped a taxi driver in the Colorado sector, Anibal San Andres parish. The victim was locked inside the boot of his car and later rescued by the police. There is no further information available. There were no casualties.

On 21 September 2024, in Playas (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in front of a pet shop on Alexander and Carlos Paredes Streets. The victim was shot several times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Policia Ecuador
notes: Weapons seizure: On 21 September 2024, in Zaruma (El Oro), police and armed forces through the security block carried out operation 'Impacto 188' and seized more than 80 dynamite sticks, other explosives, 47 ammonium nitrate sticks, 80 detonating capsules, detonation cords and other materials in the El Calvario sector inside a property used by explosive trafficking. There were no arrests.

On 22 September 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), a group of taxi drivers beat up two unidentified armed assailants involved in robberies for trying to rob another taxi driver. Both suspects were arrested. There were no fatalities.

Around 22 September 2024 (as reported), in Jambeli (Machala, El Oro), two people were killed and their beheaded and mutilated bodies were found in a state of decomposition in a shrimp farm in the El Chorrillo sector and the other in the El Coco beach. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 22 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a Venezuelan adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the Gallegos Lara cooperative, Florida neighborhood. The victim had no criminal records and was shot at least six times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 22 September 2024 (as reported), in Zapotillo (Loja), a man was killed and their body found showing signs of torture in the Querecotillo ravine. The victim was missing a thumb and it is suspected he was a Peruvian national. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 September 2024, in Playas (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified heavily-armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man and an adolescent in a drive-by shooting on the 15 de Agosto Avenue. Both victims were shot mainly in their heads. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 22 September 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman in a drive-by shooting on Carlos Ure Street. It is suspected the killing was related to extortions. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 22 September 2024 (as reported), in Barbones (El Guabo, El Oro), a man was shot twice in the head and his body found tied to a plastic chair. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 23 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified heavily-armed individuals carrying rifles and described as hitmen shot and killed a person driving a car on 309 Street, San Pedro 1 neighborhood. The perpetrators fired at least 15 gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 September 2024, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle kidnapped a man and held him for ransom (express kidnapping) in the Llano Chico sector. The suspects were arrested. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 23 September 2024, in Daule (Guayas), four unidentified heavily-armed individuals in two cars shot and killed three people inside a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on KM-4.5 of the Daule Road, in the parking lot of the art theatre, in the Mapasingue sector. The three victims were the owner of a real state agency, his private guard and his driver. The perpetrators fired more than 84 gunshots at the armored vehicle. It is suspected the killings were related to conflict over land invasions since the main target had received threats from people involved in illegal occupation of land. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 23 September 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a man was shot and killed and his charred body found inside a burnt-out vehicle in the Socio Vivienda sector. It is suspected the vehicle was used in the drive-by shooting which caused the deaths of three people on the Daule Road (coded separately). It is suspected that the victim was a taxi driver. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 23 September 2024 (as reported), in La Concordia (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), a person was killed and their body found wrapped in a jute sack in a state of decomposition on Parallel 0 Highway, between Monterrey and La Concordia. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 23 September 2024 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), a man driving his motorbike was shot dead and his body found in the Fabian Palacios neighborhood, San Alejo citadel. It is suspected the killing might be related to drug trafficking disputes between Los Lobos gang and Los Choneros gang. The perpetrators were on motorbikes. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 September 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), four unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Maria Zuleika Illarreta and Gonzalo Cordova Rivera Streets. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 23 September 2024, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man sitting inside a car in a drive-by shooting between the Santa Anita and the La Gatazo sectors, La Roldos neighborhood. Five other people were shot and injured. The fatal victim had a criminal record for illicit association. 1 fatality.

On 24 September 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man on 15 de Abril Avenue, near the El Angel de Portoviejo statue. It is suspected the killing might be related to drug trafficking disputes between Los Lobos gang and Los Choneros gang. The victim was shot at least nine times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near an educational institution. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 24 September 2024 (as reported), in Pampanal de Bolivar (Esmeraldas), five fishermen were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture in a mangrove area. None of the victims had criminal records. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Two suspects were arrested on 8 October 2024. Authorship and motivations unknown. 5 fatalities.

Around 25 September 2024 (as reported), in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), an adolescent was shot 13 times and his body found on the side of the Perimetral Highway, near the roundabout of the El Tambo commune. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 25 September 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Leonidas Proano parish, 6 de Marzo sector, La Aurora neighborhood. The victim was shot at least 10 times, mostly in the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed three people in a drive-by shooting in the El Recreo citadel. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 26 September 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving a vehicle in a drive-by shooting in the La Ferroviaria de Machala line. The victim was the manager of a private security company and the perpetrators fired 13 times. A woman was injured. 1 fatality.

On 26 September 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man riding a motorcycle in the Wilson Franco de la Cruz sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 September 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the 3 de Noviembre neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 26 September 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped an adolescent and held her for ransom. The victim was rescued unharmed on 29 September. There is no further information available.

Around 27 September 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a woman was killed and her body found with signs of violence (unspecified) at the intersection of Venezuela and 5 de Junio Streets, between the Centenario and Astillero neighborhoods. The victim was an official who worked at the public prosecutor's office. It is suspect that the perpetrators dropped the body from a taxi. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 27 September 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), armed forces seized 400 explosive capsules, 1,200 dynamite sticks, 16 bags of ammonium nitrate, 1,300 meters of slow fuse and 800 meters of detonating cord during an operation to curb illegal mining.

On 27 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Guayas y Quil cooperative, Guasmo Sur. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 27 September 2024 (as reported), near Cusua (Tungurahua), two men were shot dead and their bodies found on the Cusua-Bilbao Highway. It is suspected the killing was related to drug trafficking disputes. 2 fatalities.

On 27 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Abel Gilbert cooperative. Another person was shot and injured. Later, unidentified armed individuals on a tricycle shot and killed a man driving a motorbike with five gunshots in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 27 September 2024, in Samborondon (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed five members of the same family in the Villa Mercedes area. Authorship and motivations unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 27 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a local merchant and held him for ransom. It is suspected the kidnappers were extortionists and members of Los Chone Killers gang. Authorities suspect that the victim died of a heart attack while being held captive because his body was found without signs of violence.

On 27 September 2024, near Cotalo (Tungurahua), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Achupallal ravine, in the Cusua-Cotalo region, on the road that connects Banons with Riobamba. It is suspected the killing was related to drug trafficking. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 27 September 2024 (as reported), in Babahoyo (Los Rios), a man was killed and his dismembered body found wrapped in a plastic bag near the Catarama river, in the Nueva Esperanza sector, El Salto parish. The victim's head was found on Calderon and Nueve de Octubre Streets. The victim was kidnapped on 26 September alongside another man who was beaten up. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 28 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Olmedo (Guayas), a large group of local residents and merchants lynched an unidentified armed individual involved in the robbery of a tech store in La Bahia sector, between Colon and Pedro Carbo. Two other suspects escaped. There were no arrests. 1 fatality.
On 28 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants shot and killed an adolescent between W Street and 23 Alley. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting on Atanasio Santos Street, San Cristobal citadel. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving another motorbike in a drive-by shooting near the Juan Montalvo cooperative. The perpetrators fired six gunshots. Later, two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in the Isla Trinitaria sector in another drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Policia DMG Zona 8
notes: Weapons seizure: On 28 September 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces carried out operation 'Renacer 27' and seized 30.000 ammunition cartridges, 620 ammo feeders, two rifles, seven C4 explosive capsules, eight detonating fuses, 15 hand grenades, eight dynamite sticks, one high-end vehicle and two motorbikes, and drugs. One female suspect involved in contract killings, extortions and drug trafficking was arrested.

Weapons seizure: On 29 September 2024, in Carmen de Pijili (Azuay), military forces seized 2,800 explosive capsules, 700 dynamite sticks, 2,000 meters of slow fuse, 2,000 of detonating cord, 100 bags of ammonium nitrate and 2,800 ammonium nitrate plugs from the Los Lobos gang in the Carmen de Pijili sector. An illegal gold mine was also dismantled.

On 29 September 2024, in Valencia (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals who arrived in a vehicle shot and killed an adolescent and injured a man inside a house in the La Vieja Union parish. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting on Avenida del Ejercito and Vicente Mendoza Street, San Alejo neighborhood. The perpetrators fired at least 11 gunshots. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 29 September 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the Primavera 2 sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 29 September 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Eloy Alfaro and Colon Streets. Two other people were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the 12 de Noviembre neighborhood. Two other people were injured. It is suspected the perpetrators were extortionists. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 29 September 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Rosa Zarate (Quininde, Esmeraldas), a person was killed and the bones of their dismembered left limb found in an advanced state of decomposition. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 29 September 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Duran canton (Guayas), two men were shot and killed and their bodies found with signs of torture (beatings, tied up limbs, gunshots to the head) in the Puente Lucia sector, El Chorrillo road. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Cronica (Ecuador); Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 29 September 2024, in the rural area of the Tarifa parish (Samborondon, Guayas), between six and eight unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes and described as hitmen and carrying rifles shot and killed seven people during an attack on a cockfighting ring in the Guachapeli arena, El Carmen sector. More than 10 other people were injured and some of the fatal victims had more than 40 gunshot wounds. The perpetrators robbed most victims. It is suspected the killings might be related to drug trafficking and territorial disputes. Authorship and motivations unknown. 7 fatalities.

On 30 September 2024, in the rural area of the Ambato canton (Tungurahua), a group of local residents acting as a vigilante group set fire to a pickup truck in which five suspects were committing robberies in the La Union-Tisaleo neighborhood. The suspects tried to steal car accessories from a vehicle earlier. Three suspects were detained and later arrested and two escaped. There were no casualties.

On 30 September 2024, in Milagro (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a man on his way to work and held him for ransom. The victim was rescued unharmed by the police during operation 'Gran Libertad 612' in the La Pina Sur sector on 3 October. There is no further information available.

On 30 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), four unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a man outside of a restaurant in the La Fragata sector. The victim was shot several times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), four unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Mina de Piedra neighborhood. The perpetrators fired 23 times and a woman was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 30 September 2024 (as reported), near La Concordia (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), a man was killed and his dismembered body found in a state of decomposition inside a jute sack on the side of the Parallel Zero Road, La Concordia-La Villegas Route. The victim was kidnapped on 27 July (coded separately). The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 30 September 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man on 12 Street and 26 Avenue, Naval Citadel, Santa Martha neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 30 September 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Patricia Pilar parish (Buena Fe, Los Rios), a person was killed and their mutilated head found on the side of the road near Las Gemelas ranch, Los Angeles sector. It is suspected the killing was related to a settling of scores. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 30 September 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a Venezuelan man in a drive-by shooting at a petrol station on Quito and Primero de Mayo Streets. The victim was shot eight times. His girlfriend, also Venezuelan, and a woman worker at the station were injured by stray bullets. The fatal victim was involved in thefts around the Centenario Park. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 30 September 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), police forces with the support of the bomb squad carried out a controlled detonation of an explosive device (lemon-type hand grenade) in the Autoridad Portuaria neighborhood.

On 1 October 2024, in Quero (Tungurahua), a group of local residents and Indigenous people applied a purification ceremony to three individuals involved in robberies during an indigenous justice trial in the Plaza del Mercadeo, Huachi La Libertad-Ambato region. All three suspects were beaten up but eventually released in the Pishilata neighborhood. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 1 October 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), armed forces carried out a raid in a property in the La Judith sector, between San Camilo and San Cristobal parishes. Eight members of Los Lobos gang, including one of its leaders, a man of Colombian nationality was arrested. The suspects were involved in contract killings, extortions and highway robberies were arrested. Ammunition rounds of different calibres, a ballistic vest, a signal inhibitor and communication radios and a Santa Muerte image were seized.

On 1 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a tricycle shot and killed an off-duty security guard in a drive-by shooting at the entrance to Trinipuerto, Los Esteros neighborhood. The victim was shot several times while on his way home and he had no criminal record. It is suspected the killing was perpetrated by members of Los Lagartos gang and motivated by the guard not collaborating with the organization. 1 fatality.

On 1 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a professional tricycle taxi driver in a drive-by shooting on Modesto Luque Avenue, Paraiso de la Flor sector. The victim had no criminal records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in two vehicles shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Mirador del Cerro del Carmen sector, near the CNT tower. The victim had a criminal record for robbery from 2012. He was shot nine times. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_1: Military Forces of the United States (2021-2025)
notes: Property destruction: Around 2 October 2024 (from 2 - 4 October), off the Coast of Manta (Manabi), navy forces with the support of the United States coast guard seized 4.5 tons of drugs valued at $135 million between the Galapagos islands and the coast of Manta, in the high seas. Six suspects were arrested during the operation that took place between 2 and 4 October.

On 2 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals who arrived in two cars shot and killed a man in the Cerro del Carmen sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2024, in Daule (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man sitting inside a car and injured a pregnant woman in the Santa Rosa compound. The fatal victim was an informal taxi driver and he was the main target of the shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Jessi zone, in the Salado Estuary, Isla Trinitaria. The victim had been targeted in a shooting on 27 September (coded separately). It is suspected the killing was related to drug trafficking and territorial disputes between two rival gangs. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: Weapons seizure: On 2 October 2024, in Macara (Loja), police and armed forces seized 20,000 meters of slow-fuse cable, 6,200 blocks of explosive material weighing about 500kg and eight rifles and four shotguns used in illegal mining. Vests and helmets were also seized.

source: Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Security measures: On 3 October 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), president Daniel Noboa (ADN) declared a new state of emergency for 60 days in the provinces of Guayas, Manabi, Los Rios, Santa Elena, Orellana and the district of Quito and the canton of Camilo Ponce Enriquez. Through Executive Decree 410, the government intends to deploy armed and police forces in the eight provinces and two metropolitan regions to curb the increasing hostilities between organized criminal groups, the state of unrest and the internal armed conflict. Additionally, 19 cantons were put under curfew every day.

On 3 October 2024, in Quito - Tumbaco (Pichincha), residents of Ruta Viva and Carchi Street set a motorbike on fire and captured two men involved in robberies around the Tumbaco parish. Both suspects were delivered to the police and arrested. There were no casualties.

On 3 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unidentified armed inmate shot and killed another inmate with at least eight gunshots inside the El Oro deprivation of liberty center. The perpetrator was arrested with robbery, murder and extortions charges before the killing. Police seized a firearm. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and injured a taxi driver on Junin and Boyaca Streets. The victim was shot at least six times and hospitalized but his health status is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 3 October 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Los Helechos sector. The victim was a street vendor who was working on his food cart and he was shot five times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving his work truck in a drive-by shooting at the intersection between Gran Colombia and Avenida del Ejercito, Miraflores neighborhood. The victim was shot multiple times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 3 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals wearing masks and, on a motorbike, shot and killed a man in front of a mechanic's workshop between 22 and Gomez Rendon Streets, Isla Trinitaria sector. It is suspected the killing was related to drug trafficking, extortions or motorbike theft and the victim was shot approximately 15 times. The victim worked at the locality and he had criminal records for theft and robbery. The victim's brother and dog were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2024, near Pueblo Nuevo (Babahoyo, Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting on the Pueblo Nuevo-Mata de Cacao Road, towards the Palmar compound. The victim's partner managed to escape. The fatal victim was shot mainly in the head and it is suspected the homicide was a selective killing. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting inside a motorbike repair shop in the 7 de Septiembre neighborhood. The victim was working when he was shot five times in the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Mazato neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), near Portoviejo (Manabi), a man was killed and his body found wrapped in sheets between Cuatro Esquinas-El Zapallo Road. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and injured another in a drive-by shooting on Susana Letor Street, El Conde neighborhood, near Solidaridad park. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 3 October 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), police forces with the support of the bomb squad carried out a controlled detonation of an explosive device (lemon-type hand grenade) in the Autoridad Portuaria neighborhood. A threatening pamphlet was left beside the explosive.

Property destruction: On 3 October 2024, in Duran (Guayas), police and armed forces through the security block carried out several operations and dismantled criminal hideouts in the Los Esteros and Hector Cobos (El Arbolito) cooperatives. The houses were used for kidnappings and as hideouts, and sharp weapons were seized.

Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Bajo Alto (El Guabo, El Oro), a fisherman was shot dead and his body found. The number of perpetrators is unknown. It is likely the attack motivation was related to the victim's job. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2023-); Police Forces of Ecuador (2023-)
notes: On 3 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), a group of citizens engaged in a physical altercation with municipal traffic officers on Sucre and Paez Streets. The officers used pepper spray and at least two people were arrested by the police. The cause of the conflict is unknown. There were no casualties.

On 4 October 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and injured another in a drive-by shooting in the Venecia neighborhood. Later, an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed another man driving a motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the 24 de Mayo neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 4 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), members of the Los Tiguerones gang kidnapped a man and held him for ransom while he was near his lubrication plant in the Pascuales parish. A video was released on social networks by the kidnappers in which the victim begged for a large sum of money to prevent his murder. There is no further information available.
On 4 October 2024, in Rocafuerte (Manabi), armed forces arrested the leader of Los Lobos gang during a raid in the San Antonio sector. There is no further information available.

On 4 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man with more than 10 gunshots, several to the head, in the Miraflores neighborhood. The victim had criminal records for robbery and possession of firearms. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 October 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man driving his motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the La Cereza sector. The suspects crashed the vehicle but managed to escape. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 October 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a man in the Los Amigos de Lino volleyball court in the Jose Luis Tamayo parish, also known as Muey, Centenario neighborhood. The victim was shot five times mostly in the head and another man was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Policia Ecuador
notes: On 4 October 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen in a vehicle fired shots against five people in another vehicle in a drive-by shooting in the El Salto parish. All five victims were shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 4 October 2024, in Santa Lucia (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man inside his house in the La Voz housing cooperative. The victim had no criminal records. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 5 October 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man in the Venecia del Mar neighborhood. A threatening pamphlet was left beside the body attributing the killing to the Los Fantasmas gang. Motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man on Juan Montalvo and San Martin Streets. The victim was shot in the head and chest. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man outside of his tire shop in a drive-by shooting on Rosendo Aviles and 36 Streets. The suspects fired at least five gunshots using a 9mm pistol. It is suspected the victim's son was a member of a gang who was threatened by a rival gang. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as hitmen shot and killed a taxi driver in a drive-by shooting in the Peninsula sector, General Enriquez Gallo neighborhood. The victim was shot three times on the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 5 October 2024, in General Farfan (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed four men in a drive-by shooting in the Patria Nueva neighborhood. One of the victims was a community leader involved in resistance against oil extraction who was killed during a meeting. A woman was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 5 October 2024, in Flavio Alfaro (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a man on Amazonas and Sucre streets. It is suspected the killing was related to a settling of scores over drug trafficking issues. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the San Estuardo neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 5 October 2024 (as reported), in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), a man was shot and killed and his body found near a guardrail in the Palenque sector. The victim had been kidnapped on the same day and the perpetrators made him kneel before shooting him dead ('tiro de gracia'). The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a van shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 5 October 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez canton (Azuay), armed forces blew up nine clandestine gold mines and five backhoes used as heavy machinery in the Pacifico Sur sector in a series of controlled explosions. Five of these illegal sites belonged to the Los Lobos gang.

Around 5 October 2024 (as reported), in Babahoyo (Los Rios), two brothers were killed and their bodies found with signs of torture. One of the victims had a criminal record and legal proceedings against him. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 6 October 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and injured an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the 22 de Mayo neighborhood. At least 15 gunshots were fired. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 October 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the El Arenal sector, near Cangrejo. The victim was shot at least eight times on the head. Later, an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in a football field on Galo Garcia Avenue, Los Mirtos neighborhood. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Weapons seizure: On 6 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), police forces arrested three members of Los Tiguerones gang and seized one assault rifle, two pistols, ammunition, hundreds of dynamite sticks, drugs and other explosive devices during a raid in a criminal operations center in the Pascuales neighborhood.

On 7 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men inside a taxi in a drive-by shooting at the intersection between Vela and 8 Norte Streets. One of the victims was a taxi driver and the other was the passenger. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 7 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as gunmen shot and injured a man and a woman attending a funerary wake in a drive-by shooting at the Playita Mia market. The victims were uncle and niece. Authorship and motivations unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 7 October 2024, in Rosa Zarate (Quininde, Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on the Malecon Rio Quininde, also known as El Bajo. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 7 October 2024 (as reported), in Santa Rosa (El Oro), a person was killed and their decapitated body found tied up to a mangrove and in an advanced state of decomposition in the Guajaval estuary. The body was missing the head and arms. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 October 2024, in Tulcan (Carchi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting. The killing was described as a contract killing. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 7 October 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces arrested three members of Las Chikes gang, which belong to the Los Tiguerones gang, and seized two pistols, a rifle and more than 30 explosive devices (dynamite sticks, slow fuse and explosive pins).

On 7 October 2024, in Santa Lucia (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with five gunshots to the head in a drive-by shooting. The victim had left the Penitenciaria del Litoral five days earlier and the attack motivation was related to a settling of scores between drug trafficking groups. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 7 October 2024, in La Aurora (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and a woman inside a car in a drive-by shooting in the Casa Laguna, at the entrance of the Sambo City area, La Aurora sector. The victims were shot at least 40 times and they were both foreigners. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in La Libertad (Santa Elena), a fisherman was killed and his body found with signs of violence (blows on his face) inside his house in the Mero Tomala locality, Sixto Chang neighborhood. The victim had a loud argument with unidentified people on 7 October. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), near Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), a man was killed and their naked body found tied up and covered by a blanket on the road to Nono. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two people were killed and their dismembered bodies, heads and body parts found in different bags near a school in the La Consolata cooperative, El Fortin sector. A threatening pamphlet against a person was left beside the bags. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 8 October 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified individuals blew up the entrance of a house (likely with people inside due to the time of the attack) with an explosive device in the Wilson Franco sector. There were no casualties.

On 9 October 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a lawyer in the Maria Piedad citadel. It is likely the attack motivation was related to the victim's job since he worked at the attorney general's office handling cases of robberies and drug trafficking, in which members of gangs were involved. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), near Jambeli (El Oro), a person was killed and their body found in an advanced state of decomposition with their hands and feet tied and gunshot wounds. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 9 October 2024, off the Coast of Puerto Velasco Ibarra (San Cristobal, Galapagos), police forces carried out operation 'Armageddon' and seized 4.5 tons of drugs and arrested eight suspects. The operation intercepted three vessels 62 and 213 nautical miles off from San Cristobal Island and the total seizure was that of 3,930 packages of cocaine bound for Mexico and United States.

On 9 October 2024, in Rosa Zarate (Quininde, Esmeraldas), armed forces arrested the leader of Los Tiguerones gang in the La Juanita sector. A modified Turkish 9mm pistol, two homemade 16-gauge shotguns, various ammunition rounds of different calibres and night vision scopes were seized.

On 9 October 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a man inside his house in the Calderon neighborhood. The victim's brother, also a target, managed to escape. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man and a woman in a drive-by shooting at a car workshop in the Nuevo Pilo neighborhood. Both victims were working at the time of the shooting. Later, two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as members of a criminal group shot and killed a merchant in a drive-by shooting on Ayacucho Avenue. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 9 October 2024, in Arenillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man inside a car in a drive-by shooting in the San Isidro citadel. The victim was shot at least eight times. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 9 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the La Pradera neighborhood. An infant child was shot and injured. The shooting happened in the territory of Los Choneros gang. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 October 2024, in Shushufindi (Sucumbios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) shot and killed four people in the La Olla sector. It is suspected the perpetrators used rifles during the shooting and one of the victims was beheaded. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 4 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Chongon (Guayas), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in the Tres Bocas sector, on the Perimetral Highway. The victim was a business owner who was kidnapped on the 4 October (coded separately). A video was released on social networks by the kidnappers in which the victim begged for a large sum of money to prevent his murder. The perpetrators fired at least 11 times and the perpetrators issued a warning to police officers investigating kidnappings and extortions. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 October 2024, in Moraspungo (Pangua, Cotopaxi), approximately 150 local residents carrying sticks, stones, and pieces of wire beat up three people suspected of kidnapping. Police arrested the three suspects and seized a revolver and a stolen vehicle. There were no fatalities.

On 10 October 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a taxi driver and held him for ransom (express kidnapping) in the Bendicion de Dios neighborhood. The victim was found by the police tied up and rescued. There is no further information available.

On 10 October 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a taxi driver inside his vehicle in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Zaruma and Corina Parrales Streets, 12 de Octubre neighborhood. The victim was shot several times in the head. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 October 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), four members of Los Tiguerones gang shot and killed an off-duty police officer inside his house in the El Coral sector. The perpetrators shot the victim 16 times. Four suspects were arrested, one of them was in the national most-wanted list. 1 fatality.

On 10 October 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed two people outside a liquor store in a drive-by shooting in the Abdon Calderon neighborhood. One of the victims was a police officer on paternity leave. Authorship and motivations unknown. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Ecuador (2023-) Prison Guards
notes: On 10 October 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed an off-duty prison guard in the Primero de Mayo sector. Authorship and motivations unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), three unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three people in the Las Orquideas neighborhood. All three suspects were arrested. Authorship and motivations unknown. 3 fatalities.

Weapons seizure: On 10 October 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), armed forces seized an arsenal of weapons and ammunition during a raid in a house in the El Progreso sector. The place was used as a weapons workshop for clandestine manufacture and repair of weapons. In total, hundreds of ammunition rounds, machine guns, rifles, a submachine gun, several pistols and revolvers, a telescopic sight and rifle silencers were seized.

Property destruction: On 10 October 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), armed and police forces through the security block dismantled several heavy machines used for illegal mining around the San Agustin River, in the Calichana site. In total, three excavators, four classifiers, two water suction motors and a dredger were disabled.

assoc_actor_1: Police Forces of Ecuador (2023-); Government of Ecuador (2023-)
notes: Property destruction: On 10 October 2024, in Sigsig (Azuay), armed forces in coordination with the ministry of environment and the national police dismantled 45 illegal mining camps, thirteen dredges and neutralized five excavators in the Rio Santa Barbara area. In addition, five internet antennas, two oxygen tanks, 72 meters of slow fuse, four dynamite sticks and seven gas masks were also neutralized.

Around 10 October 2024 (as reported), in Cuenca (Azuay), a man was killed and his body was found covered in a blanket with his hands and feet tied and signs of violence near his house in the Cerro de Nero sector. The victim had been reported missing since 5 October. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 10 October 2024 (as reported), in San Carlos (Quevedo, Los Rios), three men were shot and killed and their bodies were found tied up and with signs of torture in the Pambilar compound, near the entrance to the Esfuerzo compound. Two burned out vehicles were found nearby. Two of the victims were half-naked. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 11 October 2024, in Tarqui (Cuenca, Azuay), local residents set a motorbike on fire and neutralised two suspects involved in extortions in the Acchayacu neighbourhood. Both suspects were arrested and the police seized a firearm and two knives. It is unclear if any violence was perpetrated. There were no casualties.

Weapons seizure: On 11 October 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), armed forces seized 1,429 explosive plugs, 474 ordinary explosive capsules, 2,020 meters of slow fuse and arrested three suspects involved in illegal mining in the Torata parish. None of the suspects had criminal records.

Property destruction: On 11 October 2024, in El Progreso (Simon Bolivar, Guayas), police forces seized 2,385 brick-shaped packages of cocaine weighing 2.3 tons hidden inside a truck and bound for Europe. It is estimated that the drugs would produce 23,580,000 doses and were valued at $93 million. One suspect was arrested.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 11 October 2024, in the rural area of the Abdon Calderon parish (Portoviejo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed four members of the same family, including women and a girl, in the Potrerillo sector. Another person was shot and injured and none of the victims had criminal records. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 11 October 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the 13 de Mayo sector. The victim was shot multiple times while sitting outside a lubrication plant. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 October 2024, in Quinsaloma canton (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed three men in the Pambilar compound, Calope locality. The victims had been whipped with cables before being shot dead. Two of the victims had criminal records. It is suspected the victims were killed by the canton's anti-cattle theft group. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 3 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 11 October 2024, around Guayas province (coded Guayaquil), police forces seized 2,385 brick-shaped packages weighing around two tons of cocaine intended to be sent to Europe. The shipment of narcotics was valued at $4.6 million in Ecuador but more than $93.4 million in Europe. One suspect was arrested.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 11 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a couple threw a Molotov cocktail at a group of police officers while they were carrying out an operation to verify vehicle documentation on Penipe Avenue, Juan Montalvo cooperative. One police officer was injured. There were no fatalities.

On 12 October 2024, in Playas (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a municipal public road worker inside a restaurant on Pedro Menendez Gilbert Avenue. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man inside a restaurant in the Florida 4 neighbourhood, in front of the Heroes de Jambeli school. The victim was shot seven times. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 12 October 2024, in Shushufindi (Sucumbios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a woman, and injured another, inside a house in the Miraflores neighbourhood. Both victims were participating in a wake and the perpetrators left a threatening pamphlet calling the fatal victim an informant. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Union de Bananeros cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 October 2024, in La Aurora (Daule, Guayas), a group of people acting as a vigilante group, with the support of a security guard, beat up a man in the Star Stage of Villa Club. The suspect had tried to rob a vehicle earlier and was apprehended by the guards and eventually arrested by the police. There were no fatalities.

actor1: Farc Dissident - 30Th Front Rafael Aguilera: Revolutionary Armed Forces Of Colombia Dissident Faction (30Th Front - Rafael Aguilera Front)
notes: On 13 October 2024, in Loja (Loja), at least twelve members of the 30th front FARC dissident group kidnapped the provincial director of the National Ecuador Social Security Institute and held him for ransom. The victim was held until 4 November when he was released unharmed. Twelve suspects were arrested by the police in Quito, Tulcan and Arenillas on 27 February 2025 and 12 cell phones were seized.

On 13 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), four unidentified armed and hooded assailants shot and killed three Venezuelan nationals inside a house in the El Fortin sector. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 13 October 2024, in Guayaquil - rocafuerte (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle killed a woman and injured two men in a drive-by shooting near Plaza del Centenario, between Velez and 6 de Marzo streets. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 13 October 2024, in Zaruma (El Oro), armed forces seized abandoned explosive material, including three bags of ammonium nitrate, 13 fractions of slow fuses, ordinary capsules, 470 ammonium nitrate plugs, and 120 metres of slow fuse. It is likely the material was being used by a criminal group for the purpose of illegal mining.

Property destruction: On 13 October 2024, in Zapotillo (Loja), armed forces carried out an operation to curb illegal petrol smuggling and seized 15,000 litres of petrol, two trucks, tanks, cisterns and cans containing gasoline. Operations against illegal mining were carried out in the Samanamaca and El Arton sectors, Calvas and Macara cantons, where two suspects were arrested, 39 packages of gold-bearing material and heavy machinery were seized.

On 13 October 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Barreiro parish. A woman was shot and injured. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 13 October 2024 (as reported), in Babahoyo (Los Rios), a man was killed and his body found tied up, with a bag over his head, and with signs of torture in the San Pablo compound, Babahoyo-Montalvo Road. The victim's left ear was severed, his face had five cuts, he had a rope tied around his neck and the cause of death was asphyxiation. The victim had been missing since 12 October and he had been threatened by members of a criminal group.
