He had criminal records for possession of firearms from 2019, concealment of stolen goods from 2020 and robbery from 2021-2022. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a construction businessman and held him for ransom (express kidnapping). The victim was a former candidate for mayor of Pasaje de las Nieves affiliated with the Avanza party. He was released on the same day in the Sauces sector. There is no further information available.

Property destruction: On 14 October 2024, off the Coast of Puerto Velasco Ibarra (San Cristobal, Galapagos), navy forces seized 48 packages weighing approximately 1.5 tons of drugs being loaded into a fishing boat about 190 nautical miles from the Galapagos islands. Three suspects were arrested.

On 14 October 2024, in Duran (Guayas), four members of the Los Chone Killers gang dressed as police officers and wearing balaclavas fired shots and set fire to three houses in the Una Sola Fuerza cooperative. A pregnant girl was shot and set on fire inside one of the houses. The attack was conducted in the Latin Kings' territory and it is suspected it was related to drug trafficking and territorial disputes. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 14 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) on a motorbike and a car killed a man in a drive-by shooting on the steps of Santa Ana hill. The victim had a criminal record for intimidation. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 October 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man inside a house. It is suspected the shooting was related to drug trafficking and territorial disputes. 1 fatality.

On 14 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) injured a man driving a car in a drive-by shooting on the Manta-Jaramijo Road. The victim ran over one of the assailants, killing him. The victim later died too. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 14 October 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Alfonso Grunauer neighbourhood. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 15 October 2024, in Naranjal (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) shot and injured a local criminal court judge at a restaurant in the Tarqui sector. Other people were injured by stray bullets. The authorship and motivation are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 15 October 2024, in Liguiqui (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle killed a man driving a car in a drive-by shooting in the Liguiqui site. The perpetrators fired at least nine times and the vehicle used in the shooting was abandoned nearby. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 15 October 2024 (month of), in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals blew up three houses in an attack in the Blanca Garcia neighborhood, known as La Barraca. Two people were killed and houses were destroyed. 2 fatalities.

Around 15 October 2024 (month of), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman in the Portete neighbourhood. The killing was related to drug trafficking disputes. 1 fatality.

Around 15 October 2024 (month of), in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals who arrived in a car shot and killed at the entrance of his house in the Eloy Alfaro parish. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 15 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes killed five people in a drive-by shooting in the Paraiso de la Flor sector, Nueva Prosperina neighbourhood. Among the victims, were tricycle drivers. A father and his son were injured by stray bullets alongside six other people. One fatal victim was identified as a religious foreigner and three others were adolescent students. It is suspected the attack motivation was because the tricycle drivers did not pay an extortion tax. One suspect with at least four criminal records (unspecified) was arrested on 17 October. 5 fatalities.

On 15 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals in a car (described as hitmen) killed an off-duty security guard in a drive-by shooting in the Cesar Sandino 2 cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. The victim was shot several times in the head. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 October 2024, in Nueva Loja (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), an unidentified armed individual on a motorbike (described as a hitman) killed a man driving a van in a drive-by shooting on Quito Avenue. One suspect with a criminal record was arrested and the victim was shot approximately seven times. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2024, in Zamora (Zamora Chinchipe), police forces arrested 37 unidentified armed individuals involved in illegal mining. In total, three dump trucks, one van, cash, 39 cell phones, laptops, 11 radios, one firearm, 63 ammunition cartridges, seven excavators and other materials.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 16 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), at least 15 unidentified heavily-armed and hooded individuals dressed as police officers shot and killed two men and a woman, and set houses on fire between the El Chorrillo and El Mirador sectors, San Francisco 2 cooperative, on the road to Daule. Three other people were shot and injured in the Villa Bonita sector. It is suspected the attack was related to land disputes between members of the Los Lobos gang and local residents. 3 fatalities.

On 16 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), members of the Los Pepes gang in a car killed three people and injured three others in a drive-by shooting in the Si Vivienda sector. The perpetrators fired more than 30 gunshots and left a threatening pamphlet warning members of the Los Choneros gang that more violence was to be expected. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 16 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the La Pradera neighbourhood. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) carrying rifles and pistols killed a man and injured another in a drive-by shooting in the El Chofer 1 neighbourhood. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 16 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Rocafuerte (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes (described as hitmen) killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of 9 de Octubre and Quito Avenues, near Parque Centenario. The victim was a foreigner with no criminal records. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 16 October 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez canton (Azuay), armed forces carried out controlled demolitions in illegal mines to curb criminal gangs engaged in illegal mining in the Santa Isabela, Mollopongo and El Tierrero sectors. Explosive material was also destroyed.

On 17 October 2024, in Cajabamba (Colta, Chimborazo), local residents and members of an Indigenous group acting as a vigilante group carried out an Indigenous tribunal and beat up a man accused of robbery in the San Rafael community, Columbe parish. The suspect was lashed 10 times and then delivered to the police. There were no fatalities.

On 17 October 2024, in San Pablo (Portoviejo, Manabi), three unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. The victim was in a wheelchair due to a disability and he was broadcasting a video on social media during the shooting. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed two men and a woman in a drive-by shooting in the 1 de Septiembre cooperative, Las Malvinas neighbourhood. Two other women were injured by stray bullets. One victim had four criminal records for robbery and one for illegal possession of firearms, and he had been sentenced to death by members of a criminal organisation. 3 fatalities.

On 17 October 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), at least six unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man riding a motorbike on the El Guabo-Machala Road. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2024, in Arenillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Franklin Jimenez neighbourhood. The victim was shot dead in front of his wife. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of Los Lagartos gang members in a vehicle (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting the Proletarios con Tierra cooperative, Guasmo Sur sector. The victim was a retired member of the armed forces and he was shot nine times. The sector is controlled by the Los Lagartos gang and the victim had received death threats. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the Nuevos Horizontes sector. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 17 October 2024, in Jaramijo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed a man in a drive-by shooting outside his house on John F. Kennedy Street. Another man was injured, and the shooting took place during a funerary wake. The authorship and motivation are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Abdon Calderon neighborhood. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2024, in Playas (Guayas), an armed individual shot and killed a man on Carlos Paredes Street and 15 de Agosto Avenue. The perpetrator was an adolescent who shot the victim seven times and then escaped on a motorbike with another individual. Earlier, two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man on Sixto Chang Avenue and Aurelio Yepez. According to the police, the killings were related to drug trafficking disputes. The authorship is unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 18 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), four unidentified armed individuals carrying rifles and pistols and described as hitmen in a van shot and killed an off-duty municipal traffic agent driving his car in a drive-by shooting on the Vela sector, between Rocafuerte and 25 de Junio Streets. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 October 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man outside his house in the Las Palmeras neighbourhood. The perpetrators fired approximately seven shots and left a threatening pamphlet linked to an organised criminal group. Police seized firearms from the victim's home. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 18 October 2024, in Pedernales (Manabi), armed forces seized a Peruvian-made revolver, 10 dynamite sticks and ammunition rounds hidden inside a warehouse in the El Achiote sector. There were no arrests.

Around 18 October 2024 (as reported), in Ambato (Tungurahua), a man was killed and his body found tied up and in an advanced state of decomposition on the road to Chiquicha, San Juan de Pachanlica neighborhood. On the same day, a human hand was found in the gutter of the Rio Verde tunnel, Banos sector. It is unknown if both cases are related. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. At least 1 fatality.

On 18 October 2024, in Colon Eloy Alfaro (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals described as delinquents on a motorbike shot and killed a person in a drive-by shooting. Both suspects were arrested the next day during a gunfire exchange with the police (coded separately). Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador)
notes: On 18 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals in a pickup truck and carrying high-calibre firearms fired shots into the air and kidnapped a woman and held her for ransom on Gallegos Lara and B Streets, Cristo del Consuelo sector. The victim was a local merchant's daughter and she was rescued by the police unharmed on 22 October. There is no further information available.
tags: women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

notes: On 18 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen who arrived on a motorbike and a tricycle shot and killed a female adolescent and a man inside a barbershop in the La Floresta 2 sector. The killed man was the owner of the barbershop and he had received death threats from a criminal organization likely due to his job. 2 fatalities.

On 18 October 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on 4 de Noviembre and 7 Streets. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 18 October 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Nueva Loja parish (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), a man and a woman were shot and killed and their bodies found with hands and feet tied up and partially covered by palm leaves in the El Condor sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 18 October 2024 (as reported), in Playas (Guayas), an adolescent was killed and his beheaded body was found incinerated and with his head and limbs mutilated near the roundabout to the Posorja parish. The victim had been missing since 16 October. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 October 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman social activist riding a motorbike with her daughter in a drive-by shooting in the Paraiso neighborhood. The victim was dedicated to defending street animals and carried out rescue campaigns. The victim was shot in the head but her daughter was not harmed. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.
tags: women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders

notes: On 18 October 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), three unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike injured a man in a drive-by shooting in the La Ventura sector. Police forces arrested all three suspects who belonged to a criminal group and two of them had criminal records for robbery and drug trafficking. The victim also had a criminal record for robbery. Police seized two firearms and a stolen motorbike. Authorship unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 18 October 2024 (as reported), in Santa Lucia (Guayas), a man was shot and killed with several gunshots to the head and his body found with his hands tied up and signs of torture (unspecified) outside a local stadium. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 19 October 2024, in San Gerardo (Camilo Ponce Enriquez, Azuay), armed forces dismantled an illegal mine using explosives in the San Gerardo sector in a controlled explosion. The region is controlled by two gangs who are fighting over illegal mining: Los Lobos gang and Los Lobos Box gang.

On 19 October 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a man on 4 de Agosto and Colon Streets, near La Madre Park. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 October 2024, in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman in a drive-by shooting in the San Jacinto sector. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 19 October 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as delinquents shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Chilintomo junction. The victim was shot five times. Both suspects were arrested by the police in the La Chorrera sector. A motorbike and a firearm were seized. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

notes: On 20 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals fired over 10 gunshots at a vehicle on Pedro Menendez Avenue, near Rio Guayas citadel. The son of the former mayor of Guayas, journalist and presidential candidate for the Democratic Center Movement was inside the vehicle with some friends. The vehicle was the property of the candidate. The driver and bodyguard of the son was injured while trying to repel the attack. Investigators stated that the attack was a robbery, however, the presidential candidate denied it claiming that they did not try to steal anything. There were no fatalities.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 20 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), several unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man inside a taxi on 25 de Junio Avenue, near the Bananero monument. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 20 October 2024, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), an unidentified armed individual wearing a motorbike helmet shot and killed a football player inside a stadium in the La Roldos sector, between the San Francisco de Rumihurco and San Jose de Cangahua neighborhoods. The suspect escaped with another individual on a motorbike. The victim was shot at least six times. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 October 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the 12 de Octubre citadel. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 October 2024, in the rural area of the Patricia Pilar parish (Buena Fe, Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed a man and a woman inside their house in the Los Reubicados area. The male was shot nine times and the woman was shot 19 times. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 21 October 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Santa Isabel sector. Another person was shot and injured and a burning vehicle was found abandoned in the Santa Clara neighborhood, Eloy Alfaro parish. It is suspected the shooting was related to drug trafficking and territorial disputes between Los Lobos gang and Los Choneros gang. 2 fatalities.

Around 21 October 2024 (as reported), in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), a man was killed and his beheaded body found with several gunshot wounds and signs of torture. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Zaruma Alley and Teresa Arcaya Street. The suspect was arrested and the police seized a firearm, an ammo feeder and ammunition rounds. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 21 October 2024, in Loja (Loja), police forces seized 15 black jute sacks containing 9,900 explosives in the Lote Bonito neighbourhood, Chontacruz circuit. One suspect was arrested.

On 22 October 2024, in Quinsaloma (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman and injured her husband inside a car in a drive-by shooting. The female victim was the general secretary of the municipality. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.
tags: local administrators; women targeted: government officials

notes: Property destruction: On 22 October 2024, in El Chical (Tulcan, Carchi), armed forces destroyed two large illegal mining camps in the El Pablo Sector and apprehended approximately 30 people. It is suspected that the illegal mining camps belonged to criminal groups trying to establish themselves in the region.

Property destruction: On 22 October 2024, in Camilo Ponce Enriquez (Azuay), police forces demolished three illegal mining shafts through controlled detonations using explosives and arrested six people involved in illegal mining activities.

On 22 October 2024, in Palmales (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the Palmales Viejo sector. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 October 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. The victim was shot in the head and chest. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 22 October 2024, in Jaramijo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man riding a bicycle in a drive-by shooting in the Villamarina neighborhood. The victim was a bricklayer biking to work and the perpetrators fired at least five gunshots. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on the corner of Loja and Babahoyo Streets. The victim had left prison on the same day. Later, an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Vela and 11 Streets. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 23 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), local residents acting as a vigilante group beat up and apprehended two unidentified armed assailants described as delinquents in the Samanes sector. Both were involved in robberies. There were no fatalities.

Defusal: On 23 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), police forces with the support of the bomb squad found explosive devices (assumed defused) left inside a backpack in front of a bank on 25 de Junio Avenue, near Paseo Shopping. There is no further information available.

On 23 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Carlos Magno cooperative. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 23 October 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a person was killed and their dismembered body, including the head, was found inside several abandoned packages on a bridge between 25 de Julio and Las Esclusas. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 23 October 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an informal taxi driver and former police officer was shot several times and killed and his body was found inside his vehicle in the El Mirador sector, San Eduardo cooperative. notes: On 24 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of Los Pepes gang members carrying rifles on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed three people in a drive-by shooting at a volleyball court in the Los Jardines neighborhood. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 24 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Jardines del Salado citadel. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 October 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a taxi driver inside his vehicle in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Pasaje and Portoviejo Streets, Martha Bucaram neighborhood. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 24 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed two people and injured two others in the 20 de Mayo neighborhood. The hitmen left threatening pamphlets near the victims. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 24 October 2024, in Puerto Jeli (Santa Rosa, El Oro), an unidentified armed individual on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at a construction site. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 24 October 2024 (as reported), in Azogues (Canar), a taxi driver was killed and his body was found inside his taxi in the Toray sector. It is unknown if the victim had any signs of violence. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 October 2024, off the Coast of Jama (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants engaged in piracy and aboard three boats attacked fourteen fishermen 100 nautical miles into the high seas. The suspects beat them, threatened to kill them, stole six engines and left them adrift. The fishermen were rescued on the 28 October. There were no fatalities.

On 25 October 2024, in San Miguel de Ibarra (Imbabura), police forces arrested two members of Los Lobos gang, including a medium-value target who would be one of the leaders of the organization. Police seized one firearm, two cell phones, drugs, one vehicle and other evidence.

On 25 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Octava Norte and Juan Montalvo Streets. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 25 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), five unidentified armed individuals in two vehicles and described as hitmen exchanged gunfire with a private security guard and police officers in a drive-by shooting outside the attorney general's office on 4 de Noviembre Avenue, Jocay neighborhood. The guard, who was also a police officer, and his client, a public prosecutor, were shot dead. The perpetrators fired 35 gunshots and a car was set on fire after the attack in the El Porvenir neighborhood. It is suspected the killing was motivated by revenge since the prosecutor participated in hearings where gang members were accused. Two suspects were arrested. 2 fatalities.

On 26 October 2024, in San Andres de Taday (Azogues, Canar), local residents set two cars and an unidentified armed individual described as a member of a criminal group on fire during a robbery attempt at an ATM, killing him. Five other suspects were detained by the residents and handed over to the police, who saved the suspects from being lynched. Four of the suspects had criminal records for robberies, possession of firearms, drug trafficking and others. One of the suspects was the leader of a local criminal group. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two Ecuadorian civilians and one Colombian in a drive-by shooting in the Nueva Esperanza neighbourhood. The two Ecuadorians were charged with fraud, stolen goods and other crimes. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 26 October 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Cristobal Colon Street, San Alejo sector. The victim was shot several times. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a van shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Pasaje Libre neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 26 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed two men sitting inside a car in a drive-by shooting at a petrol station on 25 de Julio Avenue, Las Brisas sector. The perpetrators fired about 20 gunshots and injured another person. Later, two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and a woman travelling in their car in a drive-by shooting in the Rosita Nelly neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 4 fatalities.

Defusal: On 26 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), police forces with the support of an anti-bomb squad defused an explosive device thrown into a business on Marcel Laniado Street, between Paez and Juan Montalvo. It is suspected the attack was related to extortions. There is no further information available.

Around 26 October 2024 (as reported), in Babahoyo (Los Rios), a man was shot multiple times in the head with an assault rifle and killed and his body was found with signs of torture and his head destroyed in the T de Baba sector, Pan-Americana Babahoyo-San Juan Highway. The victim, who was kidnapped by unidentified armed individuals wearing military clothing from his home on 25 October, was beaten before being shot. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Esmeraldas News; Expreso
notes: On 27 October 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), armed and police forces arrested a high-profile member of Los Tiguerones gang involved in contract killings, kidnappings and extortions on Carlos Concha Road, El Basurero sector. A Remington 721 rifle, 26 5.56mm ammunition, four .38 ammunition rounds and explosives were seized. The suspect was the uncle of another member of the same gang arrested in Spain.
On 27 October 2024, in Rosa Zarate (Quininde, Esmeraldas), armed forces arrested the leader of Los Tiguerones gang in the Patria Nueva neighbourhood. Ammunition and drugs were seized.

On 27 October 2024, in Arenillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man and injured four others during a meeting in the Los Ceibos citadel. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2024, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Oe19A and N75 Streets, La Planada neighborhood. The victim was a drug user. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed two people and injured another in a drive-by shooting on block 10 of the Bastion Popular sector. The injured victim had a criminal record for robbery from 2023. 2 fatalities.

On 27 October 2024, in Puebloviejo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen shot and killed two men during a funerary wake between Astolfo Guerra and 8 de Agosto Streets. It is suspected that a local criminal group was the author of the attack. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 28 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a man on 10 Street and 34 Avenue, Santa Martha neighbourhood. The victim was shot five times by a 9mm firearm, he had no criminal records and was a public servant from Montecristi. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 October 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a person during the early detonation of explosives intended for an attack (coded separately) in the Tiwinza neighbourhood. There is no further information available.

On 28 October 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen who arrived on a motorbike shot and killed a man inside his meat processing business on Libertad Avenue, El Floron neighborhood. The El Floron area is currently facing drug trafficking and territorial disputes between Los Lobos gang and Los Choneros gang. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 28 October 2024 (as reported), in Daule (Guayas), a man was shot and killed and his body found in a state of decomposition and showing signs of violence near the La Rioja urbanisation, between the La Aurora and Los Lojas parishes. The victim was shot in the head and he had been reported missing. Police found drugs in the victim's pockets. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 October 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a van shot and killed a man with several gunshots in a drive-by shooting in the Subidita al Cielo sector, Cevallos citadel. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 October 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Jose Apolinario Galvez and Paez Streets, near El Cangrejo park. The perpetrators fired at least six times. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 October 2024, in Jipijapa (Manabi), police forces carried out a raid and arrested a high-profile suspect and member of Los Choneros gang involved in the homicide of five tourists in Puerto Lopez (coded separately).

On 29 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals on a tricycle shot and killed a child in a drive-by shooting on Francisco Segura and 29 Street. Three other people were shot and injured. Two suspects were arrested and identified as members of the Los Freddy Kruegers gang. It is suspected the perpetrators were in search of a target involved in drug trafficking who had an argument with gang members earlier. 1 fatality.

On 29 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a girl and injured another girl in a drive-by shooting in the Janeth Toral cooperative, Nueva Prosperina neighbourhood. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 October 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in front of the civil registry, Urbirrios neighbourhood. Two other people were shot and injured. The victim had no criminal records and he was the son of a high-profile football player. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 October 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), local residents attacked police officers who responded with tear gas during the arrest of two unidentified armed individuals involved in the killing of a taxi driver (coded separately). There were no fatalities.

On 29 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), local residents acting as a vigilante group set fire to a motorbike during a robbery attempt on 36 and Augusto Gonzalez Streets. The suspects described as delinquents managed to escape. There were no fatalities.

On 29 October 2024, around Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting outside of a store in the La Margarita complex, on the Babahoyo-Baba Road. The victim had criminal records for receiving stolen goods from 2022 and possession and carrying firearms from 2024. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), two members of Los Lobos gang shot and killed two men in the Los Angeles cooperative. Both suspects were adolescents and they were arrested in a house in the Los Pinos cooperative, Puente Lucia sector. It is suspected the victims were either being extorted or that they belong to a rival gang. Police seized a bag with .38 calibre ammunition and several firearms. 2 fatalities.

On 30 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a fisherman after returning from work in the Eloy Alfaro neighborhood. The victim was shot multiple times next to his boat. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving his car along Puente Patria in a drive-by shooting. The victim was a former municipal worker and he had several legal proceedings for fraud. He had been receiving death threats for three months related to an outstanding debt he had related to a money loan and on one occasion armed individuals fired shots at his house (unspecified). Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 30 October 2024, in El Salitre (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen who arrived on motorbikes shot and killed four people inside a restaurant on 27 de Noviembre Avenue. The business owner, who had an unspecified criminal record, was shot more than 15 times. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 4 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 30 October 2024, in Patricia Pilar (Buena Fe, Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in a nightclub. The victim was shot five times, mostly in the head. One suspect was arrested in a petrol station near the Taguasenta 2 sector. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 30 October 2024 (as reported), in El Viento (Tosagua, Manabi), a couple were killed and their charred bodies were found. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 30 October 2024, in Playas (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed two women and a man inside a food establishment located on Alfonso Jurado Street and Paquisha Avenue, Lindo neighbourhood. None of the victims had criminal records. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

Defusal: On 30 October 2024, in Machala (El Oro), police forces with the support of a bomb squad defused/removed a dynamite stick left in front of a locksmith's shop on Juan Montalvo and 12 Norte Streets.

On 30 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed four people near a hospital. One of the victims was a girl. It is suspected the shooting was related to drug trafficking disputes. 4 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 31 October 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), hundreds of left-leaning activists and students carrying signs, pro-Palestine flags, and banners and led by the Guevarista Movement held a march with a starting point at Plaza Indoamerica through the Centro Historico sector against the government of president Daniel Noboa (ADN) and demanded solutions for the growing energy and drought crisis. The demonstrators blocked major roads, impacting traffic and transportation. On Chile Street, demonstrators set fire to cardboard cutouts of Daniel Noboa and clashed with the police and on Carondelet Palace, walls were vandalised with messages against the president.

On 31 October 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), several unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a man at the intersection between Velasco Ibarra and Pinas Streets. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 31 October 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants set fire to a drug user behind the Mercado del Rio, killing him. The victim lived on the streets. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 31 October 2024, in Lomas de Sargentillo (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men travelling in a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on El Telegrafo Avenue. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 31 October 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed two men during a funerary wake in a house on Alberto Lara Street and 16 de Noviembre, in the El Guabito sector. The shooting was described as a contract killing and the attack motivation might be related to a settling of scores. Authorship unknown. 2 fatalities.
Weapons seizure: On 31 October 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces seized 13 dynamite sticks during a raid carried out at a house used by the Los Fatales gang. There were no arrests.

On 31 October 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two people in the Las Malvinas sector. It is suspected the shooting was related to drug trafficking disputes. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 1 November 2024, in Colimes (Guayas), six unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle kidnapped the former mayor from inside her house. The victim's vehicle was found abandoned on the Cabuyal-Laurel Road, Santa Lucia canton. The victim was rescued by the police in the Balzar Sector, Guayas province, on 4 November. There is no further information available.

On 1 November 2024, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), two unidentified armed assailants stabbed and killed a man in the Colinas del Norte sector. It is suspected the suspects were extortionists and that the victim was attacked because he refused to pay his extortion fees. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 November 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the San Marcos citadel. The victim was shot multiple times in the head. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 November 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed two people and injured another in a drive-by shooting on 123 and 104 Streets, Jaime Chavez Gutierrez neighborhood, Los Esteros parish. It is suspected the killings were related to a drug trafficking dispute between Los Lobos gang and Los Choneros gang. 2 fatalities.

On 1 November 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), two unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a woman on Jose Peralta and Humberto Fierro Streets. The victim had criminal records for fraud and weapon and ammunition trafficking. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 November 2024, in Pueblo Nuevo (Babahoyo, Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and injured another riding a vehicle in a drive-by shooting in the Pueblo Nuevo compound. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the block 8 of the Bastion Popular sector. Another person was shot and injured. The victim had recently left a detention center after a raid in which drugs, firearms, and explosives were found. 1 fatality.

On 2 November 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man inside his barbershop in the Maria Auxiliadora neighbourhood. The perpetrator posed as a client and entered the barbershop before shooting the victim. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.
