source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 2 November 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured two men driving a vehicle in a drive-by shooting in the San Lorenzo sector. The main victim was a lawyer, former prosecutor and candidate for assemblyman for Guayas (affiliated with the Ecuadorian Union party) and the other was the lawyer's father after a political meeting in which both participated. It is suspected the attack was either a robbery attempt because the perpetrators stole several of the victim's belongings but also an assassination attempt because the suspects shot at the victims multiple times after the robbery. Authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.
On 2 November 2024, in Duran (Guayas), five members of the Latin Kings gang kidnapped a man and held him for ransom in the Los Ceibos sector. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 2 November 2024, in El Eno (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a van described as hitmen and carrying 5.56 large-calibre assault rifles shot and killed six people and injured two others in a drive-by shooting at the El Placer pool bar, Llurimagua locality, Yumiragua compound. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 6 fatalities.

On 2 November 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving a van in a drive-by shooting at the intersection between Panamericana Sur and Carchi Street, Los Artesanos neighborhood. The victim was working at the time of his killing. The van hit a passerby who was injured. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 2 November 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a taxi driver was killed and his beheaded and charred body was found showing signs of torture in the block 7 of the Balerio Estacio cooperative, Puerto Principal sector. The head was found in a garbage dump in the Cordillera del Condor cooperative. It is suspected the victim was a member of a local criminal group and he had two legal proceedings for alimony and assault. The area where the human remains were found is controlled by Los Tiguerones gang. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 November 2024, in Montalvo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a street merchant outside a pool hall in the San Jose neighborhood. The victim was killed with six gunshots while working on his juice stand and he had no criminal records. It is suspected the merchant was a victim of extortions. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 November 2024, in Vinces (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a tricycle shot and killed a woman in a drive-by shooting in the El Arenal sector, Nicaragua citadel. The woman was a collateral victim since the perpetrators targeted a man. It is unclear if the man was killed or injured. Authorship and motivations are unknown. At least 1 fatality.
Around 2 November 2024 (weekend of), in Cuenca (Azuay), police forces arrested 72 suspects and seized 20 firearms during multiple operations during the holiday weekend.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Policia DMZ Zona 9; Policia Ecuador
notes: Property destruction: On 3 November 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), police forces carried out operation 'Cero Impunidad 2676' and seized 1,295 brick-shaped packages of cocaine hydrochloride valued at around $3 million in Ecuador and $75 million in the United States. Four suspects were arrested in the Pueblo Nuevo sector, two of them Mexican and one Colombian.

Around 3 November 2024 (as reported), in Quevedo (Los Rios), a man was shot and killed and his body was found tied up on a guardrail in the La China sector, 24 de Mayo parish. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 November 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), six members of Los Lobos gang kidnapped a man and a woman, both Venezuelan, and held them for ransom in the La Ajavi sector. All suspects were arrested near the Parque Chino and two of them had criminal records. The victims were rescued and their valuables recovered. There is no further information available.

On 3 November 2024, in Rosa Zarate (Quininde, Esmeraldas), a group of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on the Malecon Rio Quininde, aka El Bajo. The victim was about to graduate from a military academy and he was shot five times. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 3 November 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Santa Cecilia parish (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), a man and a woman were shot and killed and their charred bodies were found on a country road in the Mariscal Sucre area. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 4 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle fired shots at a house in a drive-by shooting in the Mapasingue sector. Police forces chased the suspects and arrested them and the suspects had no criminal records. It is unknown if the residents were at the house at the time of the shooting. Police seized a 9mm pistol. Authorship and motivations are unknown.

On 4 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unidentified armed individual on a motorbike and described as a member of a criminal group shot and killed a person in a drive-by shooting in the Los Esteros sector, Trinitaria Island area. One suspect was arrested and he had criminal records for theft. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 November 2024, in Machala (El Oro), several unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man inside a building at the intersection of 12ava Norte and Vela streets. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 4 November 2024 (as reported), in Machala (El Oro), a man was killed and their head and limbs found inside bags in the Dos Bocas sector. It is suspected the killing was an intimidation maneuver. Three unidentified individuals on a motorbike were seen dropping the human remains. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 November 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a pickup truck in a drive-by shooting on Pichincha Street. The perpetrators fired at least 16 times and a woman was injured. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 November 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed three people inside a motel in the Chone neighborhood. One off-duty police officer was the only survivor. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 5 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Las Malvinas sector. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 November 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured an adolescent outside of a store on Republica Avenue and Pasaje Street (drive-by). Both perpetrators were Peruvian nationals. Authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 5 November 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on 9 de Octubre and 1 de Enero streets, Miraflores neighborhood, Tarqui parish. The perpetrators fired at least seven gunshots. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 5 November 2024, in La Aurora (Daule, Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes carrying long-range firearms shot and killed a man inside his car in a drive-by shooting on Leon Febres Cordero Avenue, near the Mix Centre shopping. The victim was an advisor to a councilor of the national Council of Citizen Participation and Social Control (CPCCS) who had received death threats. The perpetrators fired at least 30 gunshots. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 6 November 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), several unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike described as hitmen shot and killed a man riding a motorbike with his infant daughter in a drive-by shooting on Garcia Moreno and Oscar Ugarte Streets, Union Lojana citadel. The child was injured and hospitalized in critical condition. The victim was a municipal official. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Policia DMG Zona 8; Primicias
notes: On 6 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Bolivar (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and injured a uniformed officer from the municipality transit and mobility agency on Quito Avenue and Manabi Street. The victim's car was shot at least 17 times. Authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 6 November 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed seven people during a party at a house on 5 de Noviembre Avenue, El Porvenir neighborhood. Several other people were shot and injured. The perpetrators fired at least 30 gunshots and they set a car on fire two blocks away from the shooting. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 7 fatalities.

On 6 November 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a tricycle taxi driver in the Barreiro Nuevo sector. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Jaramijo (Manabi), a man was killed and their skeleton found tied-up inside a bag near a cemetery. The number of perpetrators is unknown. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 November 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle fired shots and set fire to a vehicle with two people inside in the Urseza 2 neighborhood. A woman escaped but the man driving the vehicle died in the fire. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 November 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and injured four men inside an armored vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Alejandro Castro Avenue and Via Pajonal, Las Crucitas sector, near the general hospital. The perpetrators fired more than 80 gunshots and three of the victims had criminal records. There were no fatalities.

Property destruction: On 7 November 2024, in San Jose de Wisyua (Sucumbios), armed forces dismantled and set fire to an artisanal drug processing laboratory in the San Jose de Wisuya sector, around the border with Colombia. There were no arrests.

On 7 November 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting on 26 de Septiembre and San Eduardo Streets, near El Mamey park. The victim was shot seven times. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 7 November 2024, in Cabuyal (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes fired shots (drive-by) and blew up a house in the Cabuyal area. One person was shot dead. 1 fatality.

On 7 November 2024, in Mocache (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in two vehicles kidnapped a person. Police pursued the kidnappers, rescued the victim and arrested one suspect. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 7 November 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) shot and killed a child inside his house with eight gunshots in the Barreiro Viejo sector. The boy was shot dead after the suspect's main target, the victim's relative, escaped. It is suspected the killing was related to a settling of scores. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 7 November 2024, in La Aurora (Daule, Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man inside a shopping mall on Leon Febres Cordero Avenue. The victim had no criminal records and he was shot twice in the head. The perpetrators escaped on a motorbike. Another person without criminal records was shot and injured. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 November 2024, in Anconcito (Salinas, Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Las Penas neighborhood. Authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in El Porton (Machala, El Oro), five people, including a woman of Venezuelan origin, were killed and their bodies found on the El Limon Road. Four bodies were beheaded, burned out, and the heads were found inside jute sacks along the La Primavera Road. One victim was killed and his body found inside a burned-out car in the Urseza 2 neighbourhood. A torso from another victim and in a state of decomposition was also found nearby. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 6 fatalities.

On 8 November 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), an unknown number of unidentified hooded and armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and injured two others in a drive-by shooting on Darque and Manuela Canizares Streets. The perpetrators fired more than 20 gunshots. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Palestina (Guayas), a man was shot and killed with gunshots to the head and his body found tied-up and showing signs of beating in the San Pablo compound. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 November 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man during a funerary wake in a drive-by shooting in the El Limon sector, on the road to Santa Ana. A woman was shot and injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), a couple were killed and their bodies found inside two packages between Las Almendras and Anansayas Streets, La Bota circuit. The causes of death were no specified. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Ambato (Tungurahua), a man was shot and killed and his body found with several gunshot wounds, mostly to the head, in the Picaihua parish. Police intervened in the area in several occasions due to drug trafficking. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 9 November 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a female drug user in an abandoned lot on Yaguachi Street, Las Manuelas market. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 November 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 November 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), several unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men riding a motorbike in a drive-by shooting on Velazco Ibarra and Eugenio Espejo Streets, Jose Mayen neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 9 November 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the La Troncal parish (Canar), three unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle kidnapped a man and held him captive in a forested area. The victim was found by the police tied-up and rescued unharmed. There is no further information available.

Around 9 November 2024 (as reported), in El Porton (El Oro), three people were shot in the head and killed and their bodies found on the old El Limon Highway, on the road to Pajonal, El Porton sector. Two burned out vehicles were found nearby. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 9 November 2024 (week of), in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), a woman was killed and her body found showing signs of violence, stab wounds, and tied up with ropes on the road to Lloa. The victim was last seen in the La Magdalena sector when she was approached by a vehicle without license plates and tinted windows. The victim had received death threats. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 November 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Barreiro parish. It is suspected the suspects were looking for the victim's son. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 10 November 2024 (as reported), in Daule (Guayas), a person was killed and their dismembered body was found in several packages at one of the intersections of the Narcisa de Jesus Highway. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 November 2024, in El Limon (Portoviejo, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) in a vehicle shot and killed a man riding a motorbike in a drive-by shooting on Portoviejo-Santa Ana Highway. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 10 November 2024 (as reported), in Manta (Manabi), a man was killed and his beheaded torso and head found charred in a garbage dump in the Si Vivienda sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.
Property destruction: On 11 November 2024, in Carmen de Pijili (Azuay), armed forces dismantled two illegal mines in the Carmen de Pijili sector. There were no arrests.

source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 11 November 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man riding another motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the Los Helechos sector. The perpetrators fired more than 20 gunshots at the victim who had four criminal records for robberies. A woman was shot and injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 11 November 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil (Guayas), eight unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a person and held them for ransom. Police forces arrested all eight kidnappers, seized two firearms, two ammo feeders, ammunition cartridges, and 10 cell phones. The victim was rescued unharmed. The kidnappers were involved in drug trafficking, kidnappings, illegal possession of firearms, and other crimes. There is no further information available.

On 11 November 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Florida neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 11 November 2024, in Lodana (Santa Ana, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle fired shots at a vehicle with five other men in a drive-by shooting. Three men were shot dead and two others were injured. One victim had a criminal record for robbery, other for cattle rustling and illegal possession of firearms. It is suspected the attack was related to drug trafficking disputes between the Los Choneros and Los Lobos gangs. 3 fatalities.

Around 11 November 2024 (as reported), in Babahoyo (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals (described as members of a criminal group) kidnapped a man and held him for ransom in the El Guayacan parish. Police arrested both suspects, and armed forces and the victim rescued unharmed. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 12 November 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), several unidentified heavily-armed individuals in a van kidnapped a psychologist from the prosecutor's office on Quevedo-El Empalme Road, El Guayacan parish. The victim was rescued in El Empalme on 14 November. The victim was later released.
tags: local administrators; women targeted: government officials

notes: Around 12 November 2024 (as reported), in Ambato (Tungurahua), a man was shot multiple times in the head and killed and his body found on Socrates and Emanuel Kant Streets, Picaihua parish, in the San Luis Hamlet. It is suspected the perpetrators were of Venezuelan origin and that they shot the victim inside his house before stealing several of his belongings. The victim had a criminal record and his death could be linked to a settling of scores. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2024, in Mata de Cacao (Babahoyo, Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 12 November 2024 (as reported), in Colonche (Santa Elena), a man was killed and his dismembered body found among the bushes on the side road that connects San Vicente to Las Balsas. The victim's tongue was cut off in the 'Colombian Necktie' style, which is a criminal practice of settling of scores between gangs. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2024, in Anconcito (Salinas, Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Las Penas neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 12 November 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Loja canton (Loja), a man was killed and his body found showing signs of torture, and he was gagged and tied up on the road that connects Loja with Catamayo. The victim had been missing since 11 November. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2024, in El Empalme (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle kidnapped a judicial official and held her for ransom. The victim was rescued on 14 November in the La Esperanza sector, Vergel Road and one suspect was arrested. Police seized one vehicle and one cell phone. There is no further information available.

On 12 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals blew up an office in the Florida sector. One person was injured by the blast. The business owner had received death threats from extortionists. Six suspects were arrested, including one of the victim's employees, a Venezuelan national. There were no fatalities.
On 13 November 2024, in Bajo Alto (El Guabo, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on boats and blew up a house and set fire to two fishing boats. There were no fatalities.

Around 13 November 2024 (as reported), in Atacames (Esmeraldas), a man was killed and his dismembered body found showing signs of torture (unspecified). The victim had been missing since 11 November. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car and a motorbike (described) as hitmen shot and killed four people inside a house in a drive-by shooting on 30 Street. The perpetrators fired around 15 gunshots and the killings might be linked to other shootings perpetrated during territorial disputes between criminal groups. 4 fatalities.

On 14 November 2024, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), police officers shot and killed a man and injured another on Simon Bolivar Avenue, near the Ciclista roundabout. Both officers were arrested and it is suspected the officers acted disproportionately or exceeded their authority. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 14 November 2024, off the Coast of Puerto Velasco Ibarra (San Cristobal, Galapagos), naval forces seized a vessel carrying 59 brick-shaped packages of cocaine totalling 1.2 tons of drugs valued at 36 million dollars 130 nautical miles of the islands. The crew was arrested.

Defusal: On 14 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), police forces with the support of a bomb squad deployed anti-explosive equipment due to an explosive device left on Augusto Gonzalez and 28 Street.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 14 November 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a woman riding a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Maria Auxiliadora Avenue, in the Jocay neighbourhood. Two children were shot and injured and the perpetrators fired at least 18 gunshots. The main victim was the cousin of a former leader of Los Choneros gang killed in December 2020. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.
tags: women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

notes: Property destruction: On 14 November 2024, in the rural area of the Tarapoa parish (Cuyabeno, Sucumbios), armed forces dismantled a clandestine complex of four artisanal crude oil refineries with the refining capacity of more than 18,000 gallons of petrol. The gang operating in the area is unknown. There were no arrests.

Around 14 November 2024 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a taxi driver was killed and his body was found showing signs of violence (unspecified) and with his feet and hands tied in the Progreso cooperative, Divino Nino sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 November 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting inside his cell phone repair shot inside a shopping centre. Both suspects, a Venezuelan and a Colombian, were arrested. Police seized a revolver and a motorbike. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 November 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a person. The victim was found gagged and tied up inside an abandoned building in the 5 de Junio cooperative. It is suspected the victim was tortured. There is no further information available.

On 15 November 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a person. Both suspects were arrested and the police seized a firearm and a motorbike. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 November 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), a group of hooded individuals clashed with police forces near Caja del Seguro, at the intersection between Guayaquil and Bolivar, during a demonstration against the government of president Daniel Noboa (ADN). One person was injured. There were no fatalities.

On 15 November 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), four unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes (described as hitmen) shot and killed at least three people in a drive-by shooting in the San Carlos neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. At least 3 fatalities.

Around 15 November 2024 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), a man was killed and his body was found showing signs of violence next to a hole which was presumably made to burn and bury it on Portoviejo-El Zapallo Road, Cuatro Esquinas sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 15 November 2024, in Chongon (Guayaquil, Guayas), armed forces intercepted trucks carrying stolen petrol after illegally drilling holes in the La Libertad and Esmeraldas pipelines. In total, three seizures were made, one of 8,030 gallons from the La Libertad-Esmeraldas pipeline, another of 5,000 from the La Libertad-Pascuales pipeline and lastly one from the Santo Domingo-Esmeraldas pipeline of 3,030 gallons intended to be taken to the border with Colombia. There were no arrests.

source: Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: Property destruction: On 15 November 2024, around Guayas province (coded Guayaquil), police forces with the support of canine units carried out operation 'Poseidon LII' and seized 5,940 brick-shaped packages of drugs weighing five tons hidden inside a container bound for Valencia, Spain. Five suspects were arrested, two of them linked to an organised criminal group.

Around 15 November 2024 (month of), in San Jacinto de Buena Fe (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals dressed as police officers shot and killed at least two brothers in the Las Cumbres neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. At least 2 fatalities.

Around 15 November 2024 (month of), in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a man and held him for ransom. It is suspected the Los Tiguerones gang may be behind the kidnapping and the victim was never found. There is no further information available.

On 16 November 2024, in Cuenca (Azuay), five unidentified armed individuals in a van kidnapped six people from the Ictocruz sector. Four men were released in the Matacaballo sector, Soldados-Chaucha Road. Police rescued two women in the El Cabo sector, Paute canton, on 19 November. There is no further information available.

Around 16 November 2024 (as reported), in Ambato (Tungurahua), a man was shot and killed and his body found with nine gunshot wounds, mostly to the head, in the Letamendi neighbourhood. The police intervened in the area in several occasions due to drug trafficking. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 16 November 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unidentified armed individual on a motorbike shot and killed a man inside his motorbike workshop in a drive-by shooting on Troncal del Pacifico Avenue. The victim was shot several times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Primicias
notes: On 16 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Sucre (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a truck driver in a drive-by shooting on Alcedo Street, between Jose Mascote and Avenida del Ejercito. The victim was working on a delivery at a supermarket when he was shot dead. It suspected the driver was a victim of extortionists killed because he refused to pay the extortion fee. Authorship unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Primicias
notes: On 16 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Nueve de Octubre (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals (described as delinquents) dressed as armed forces shot and killed four men on Gomez Rendon, between Jose Mascote and Avenida del Ejercito, Nueve de Octubre neighborhood. The victims were lined on a wall before being shot. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 16 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and injured an adolescent in a drive-by shooting on 26 and LL Streets. Later, two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man with nine gunshots in a drive-by shooting on Alcedo Street, between Jose Mascote and Avenida del Ejercito. The victim had been threatened by extortionists. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Property destruction: On 16 November 2024, in Nueva Loja (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), armed forces with the support of the Napo Jungle Brigade dismantled an illegal petrol refinery in the Chone 1 sector. The refinery had the capacity to produce 18,000 gallons of crude oil and 10,000 gallons of white gasoline. The fuel was destined for the processing of drugs refined in laboratories in Colombian territory. The army seized three tankers with a capacity of 2,000 gallons of crude oil each, a tanker with the capacity of 1,000 gallons and another with a capacity of 500 gallons, a pool containing approximately 5,000 gallons, and 100 55-gallon tanks.

On 17 November 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed three men in a drive-by shooting in the El Privilegio sector. Two victims were uncle and nephew and other people were shot and injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 17 November 2024, in Tres Postes (Alfredo Baquerizo Moreno, Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a woman and her daughter and son inside their house in the El Terron sector, Jujan canton. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 18 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), dozens of residents shouted and pushed police officers during the arrest of three people involved in illegal activities on Calicuchima and 17 Streets. Police used tear gas against people who tried to stop the arrests. The area is occupied by Los Duendes gang and Los Freddys gang and the arrests were related to prison riots that killed 17 people in the Littoral Penitentiary. There were no casualties.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Primicias
notes: On 18 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), more than seven unidentified armed individuals (described as delinquents) and in two vehicles shot and killed a man and injured another during an ambush on Carlos Julio Arosemana Monroy Avenue, Bloco 1 of the Bastion Popular neighbourhood. A business owner of a restaurant was kidnapped and the fatal victim was his driver. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 November 2024, in Naranjal (Guayas), several unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) shot and killed a traffic officer and another man in the La Roldos neighbourhood. The traffic officer was shot 10 times and another man was shot and injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 18 November 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man near a mechanic's workshop in a drive-by shooting in the Cinco Esquinas sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 18 November 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a person in a drive-by shooting in the Horacio Hidrovo neighbourhood. Later, the same hitmen shot and killed a woman in the La Gulf sector, near Carlos Polit Ortiz school. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 19 November 2024 (as reported), in Ancon (Santa Elena), a man was shot and killed and his charred body was found naked and tied up on the Ancon-Santa Elena Highway. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 19 November 2024 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), a man was killed and his body was found tied-up floating in the Portoviejo River, near Avenida del Ejercito. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 November 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Jaime Roldos neighbourhood. One of the victims had a criminal record and two other people were shot and injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 19 November 2024, in the rural area of the Puebloviejo canton (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) in a vehicle killed three men riding a motorbike in a drive-by shooting on the San Juan-Puebloviejo sector. One victim worked as a security guard at a ranch in the area. Two other men were kidnapped and later released. It is suspected the shooting might have been related to territorial disputes between Los Purros gang and Los AK47 gangs. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 20 November 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle (described as hitmen) killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the La Union neighbourhood. A woman was also injured as a collateral victim. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 November 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and injured another in a drive-by shooting in the Teodoro Vite neighbourhood. The perpetrators fired at least six gunshots. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_1: FUT: United Workers' Front; Labor Group (Ecuador); Teachers (Ecuador); UNE: National Union of Educators; FP: Popular Front
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); International Federation for Human Rights; La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil; ProtectDefenders.eu; Wambra Medio Comunitario
notes: On 21 November 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), movements led by FUT, UNE, FP, teachers and workers clashed against the police who used tear gas near the San Blas sector during an anti-government demonstration. Some demonstrators threw rocks at the riot police and destroyed fences while trying to reach Plaza de la Independencia, in the Centro Historic neighborhood. Three police officers were injured and the demonstrators also set objects and images of president Daniel Noboa (ADN) on fire. One public official, and two members of the INREDH human rights organization were arrested, alongside other 9 people, including an adolescent. There were no fatalities.

Around 21 November 2024 (as reported), in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), five unidentified armed individuals kidnapped two people. Both victims were rescued and the suspects arrested. A stolen motorbike was recovered. There is no further information available.

On 21 November 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a bus driver inside the transport cooperative office. The victim, who was the owner of the cooperative, was shot in the head and chest and he had been threatened by extortionists. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 21 November 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man on 25 de Junio Avenue, in front of a gym. The vehicle used in the shooting was set on fire near a banana plantation in the El Porton area. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured five people in a drive-by shooting near the Valdivia judicial unit. The shooting was aimed at a person who was carrying out a procedure. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador)
notes: On 21 November 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) in two vehicles and dressed as police officers carrying large-calibre firearms killed two men inside a car in a drive-by shooting in the Las Cumbres neighbourhood, Tarqui parish. Another person was injured. The perpetrators fired approximately 130 gunshots. The victims were brothers and worked as local merchants. It is suspected the shooting might be related to drug trafficking disputes. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 21 November 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), two men were shot and killed and their bodies were found showing signs of torture in the El Chorrillo compound, in Pascuales parish. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 22 November 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Guatita Guerrero Coliseum. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality

On 22 November 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed three men in the El Floron 4 sector. None of the victims had criminal records. It is suspected the killings might be related to drug trafficking disputes. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 22 November 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed a man riding a motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the Jose Mayon neighbourhood. It is suspected the killing would be a reprisal for the homicide of a Peruvian citizen. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 November 2024, in La Victoria (Santa Rosa, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an adolescent. It is suspected the killing was related to a settling of scores between Los Lobos gang and Lobos Guantes-Box gang. 1 fatality.

On 23 November 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man boarding a taxi on Santa Rosa and 11B Streets. The victim was a former official of the agriculture department of El Oro. The taxi driver and the victim's companion were shot and injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 23 November 2024, in the rural area of the El Laurel parish (Daule, Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle (described as hitmen) killed a journalist in a drive-by shooting on KM-9 of the road to Daule, near Huancavilca military fort. The victim had criminal records due to irregular agricultural activities in 2010. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 23 November 2024, in Tulcan (Carchi), police forces seized 150 explosive devices hidden inside a taxi and arrested five suspects, two of them Colombians, trying to transport the cargo through the Ecuador-Colombia border.

On 23 November 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Costa Azul sector. The victim was shot three times while riding a motorbike. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 November 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Valle Hermoso neighbourhood, San Rafael sector. The perpetrators (described as hitmen) fired at least eight times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 November 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car and a motorbike killed a man riding a motorbike in a drive-by shooting in the San Jorge neighbourhood. The victim had a criminal record for drug involvement. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped an informal app taxi driver and held him for ransom in the Nueva Granada neighbourhood, La Floresta citadel. The victim was rescued by the police, four suspects were arrested and 57 brick-shaped packages of cocaine hydrochloride were seized. Police seized a firearm and five ammunition rounds. There is no further information available.

Around 23 November 2024 (as reported), in Pelileo (San Pedro de Pelileo, Tungurahua), two men were shot and killed and their bodies were found in the Chambag hamlet, Patate-Pelileo neighbourhood. One of the victims was the brother of the mayor of Palora. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 23 November 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man outside of his father's house in the La Malaria sector. The victim had been released from prison 22 days ago and he had criminal records for drug possession and drug trafficking. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: On 24 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Bolivar (Guayas), local residents beat up a man involved in a shooting earlier and set him on fire on Seis de Marzo and Capitan Najera Streets. The victim died from his burns. 1 fatality.

On 24 November 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car killed one man and injured two others in a drive-by shooting at the intersection of Municipalidad Avenue and Galo Garcia. The shooting happened in front of the municipal court. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Letamendi (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Guerrero Martinez and Robles Chambers Streets. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle fired shots in a drive-by shooting at a group of people sitting in front of a house in Batallon del Suburbio. The perpetrators were armed with assault rifles, three people were injured, and all victims had criminal records for drug possession and attempted homicide. There were no fatalities.

On 24 November 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike injured a man in a drive-by shooting. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 24 November 2024, in Valencia (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a couple in a drive-by shooting in the San Francisco sector, La Union parish. Around 24 November 2024 (as reported), in Montecristi (Manabi), a man was shot and killed and his body was found with his hands tied and a blindfold on in the Los Artesanos neighbourhood. On 24 November 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Prado 1 neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 November 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting. The victim was shot more than 10 times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 November 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals dressed as military officers kidnapped three men from the La Malaria sector, on the Babahoyo-Montalvo Road. There is no further information available.

Property destruction: On 25 November 2024, in Azogues (Canar), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals fired shots and set an interprovincial bus on fire. It is suspected the attack was related to extortions.

On 25 November 2024, in El Cambio (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Garzon Zhapan sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 November 2024, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the 16 de Octubre cooperative. Later, two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man and an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the Carlos Carrera cooperative, El Arbolito 2 sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 25 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a security guard in a drive-by shooting in the Mapasingue Oeste sector. 1 fatality.

On 25 November 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle killed a man in a drive-by shooting between G and H Streets. Another victim was shot and injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 November 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed three men and injured a woman in the Portete neighbourhood. In this region, there is a drug trafficking dispute between Los Duendes gang and Los Freddys gang. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 25 November 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting on Garcia Moreno Street, between Pedro Carbo and Juan Montalvo Streets. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

There is no further information available.

Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Barbones parish (El Guabo, El Oro), a man was killed and his dismembered body was found packed inside a jute sack. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in El Salitre (Guayas), an off-duty police officer was shot and killed and his body was found with two gunshots to the chest in the Los Sauces sector. The victim was not working at the time of his killing. Police seized a memory card and two cell phones at the scene. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a tricycle (described as hitmen) shot and killed a disabled woman in the Las Malvinas sector, Los Esteros neighbourhood. The perpetrators fired more than 37 gunshots and some house around the area were used as drug hideouts. It is suspected the attack was related to drug trafficking disputes between Mafia-18 gang and Los Carniceros gang. 1 fatality.
tags: women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

notes: On 1 December 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals killed a man in a drive-by shooting near a restaurant. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 December 2024, in Machala (El Oro), several unidentified armed assailants shot and injured a man on 10 Norte and Santa Rosa Streets. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 1 December 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), several unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three men and injured two other people at a touristic complex on 9 de Mayo Avenue. It is suspected the attack was related to drug trafficking disputes. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in Union del Toachi (Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas), two people were killed and their severed legs were found floating in the waters of the Toachi river, at KM-2 of the La Concordia Highway. The following day, two dismembered bodies were found in a mass grave in the Pisotanti sector. A human head was found floating in the river and bags with human organs were found in another area. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. At least 2 fatalities.

On 1 December 2024, in Vinces (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the Loma del Tanque sector, San Lorenzo de Nicaragua parish. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in Zaruma (El Oro), an adolescent was shot and killed and his body was found in the Limoncitos area. A pamphlet was found near the body which indicated that the attack was related to drug trafficking disputes. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 2 December 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a high-profile football player and his friend at the intersection of Malecon and Manuela Canizares Streets. The kidnappers have not requested money in exchange for his release. The victim was rescued unharmed alongside a friend in the Taseche sector, in the Atacames canton. Three suspects were arrested on 5 December.

On 2 December 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed an adolescent in the Santa Cruz Bajo neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed two people and injured three others in a drive-by shooting in the 5 de Diciembre neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 2 December 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike injured a street merchant in a drive-by shooting in the 18 de Noviembre market. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 2 December 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Machalilla neighbourhood. The perpetrators fired at least 20 gunshots. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 2 December 2024, in General Farfan (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), armed forces carried out an operation and seized a truck carrying 5,000 gallons of diesel in the El Proyecto sector. A rifle was also seized. There were no arrests.

source: Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 3 December 2024, in Archidona (Napo), nearly 200 local residents led by members of social and indigenous groups burned logs and tires blocked four sections of the Amazonian Road that connects Napo with Orellana and Sucumbios in strong opposition to the construction of a Bukele-style maximum security prison in the Yawari sector. The demonstrators gave the government 24 hours to stop the project which already started on Napo Avenue under the threat of the local mayor of radicalisation of the demonstrations.

On 3 December 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), local residents beat up three people, including a woman, involved in robberies around Gregorio Escobedo and Bosmediano Streets. The three suspects were arrested. There were no fatalities.

Around 3 December 2024 (as reported), in Barbones (El Guabo, El Oro), a man was shot three times in the head and killed and his body was found in the La Victoria site. A pamphlet left near the scene stated that robberies are prohibited around the La Ponce sector, which may refer to the victim being involved with illegal activities. The number of perpetrators is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 December 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man in the San Pablo parish. The victim was shot at least three times in the head. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Weapons seizure: On 3 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui , Guayas, police forces with the support of a bomb squad removed a dynamite stick which was left outside a factory in the Las Iguanas sector.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 3 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), inmates at the Litoral Penitentiary, also known as 'La Peni', used three grenades during an attack in which several people were injured. Among the victims were a soldier, nine inmates, and a prison guard. Seven prisoners and two prison guards were arrested. There were no fatalities.
Property destruction: On 4 December 2024, in Liguiqui (Manta, Manabi), armed forces seized two tons of cocaine hidden inside a private property. There were no arrests.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 4 December 2024, in Bahia de Caraquez (Sucre, Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) shot and killed a father and his two children in the Acuarela 2 citadel, Leonidas Plaza parish. A couple were also injured. It is suspected the attack was related to drug trafficking disputes between Los Lobos gang and Los Choneros gang, which are the two gangs active in the region. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 4 December 2024, in El Cambio (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed three men inside of a heavy truck mechanic's workshop in the 10 de Agosto neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 4 December 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man inside a house in the Los Marginados neighbourhood, San Jorge Bajo sector. The victim was not the hitmen's main target. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 December 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed (drive-by) a man on 8 Norte A Street, between Ayacucho and Guayas Streets. The victim was shot at least five times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 December 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man in the Amazonas 1 neighbourhood. The victim was shot several times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 December 2024, in Archidona (Napo), a group of local residents led by members of social and indigenous groups burned logs and tires and blocked four sections of the Amazonian Road that connects Napo with Orellana and Sucumbios for the second consecutive day. The demonstrators are in strong opposition to the construction of a Bukele-style maximum security prison in the Yawari sector. The demonstrators gave the government 24 hours to stop the project which already started on Napo Avenue under the threat of the local mayor of radicalisation of the demonstrations.

On 4 December 2024, in Colta (Chimborazo), an indigenous group organised as a vigilante group beat up three suspects involved in robberies during an indigenous justice trial and killed them in the Cebollar Alto community. One truck was set on fire and the suspects were involved in cattle theft. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Diario Regional Los Andes; El Diario (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 5 December 2024, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified heavily-armed assailants shot and injured two men inside an armored vehicle on 25 de Junio Avenue, in the Las Brisas citadel. One victim was the director of the El Oro deprivation of liberty center prison, and had been in the position for a month, and the other was his driver. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Property destruction: On 5 December 2024, in Liguiqui (Manta, Manabi), police forces seized nearly two tons of cocaine hidden in the bushes inside 63 bundles of jute sacks. There were no arrests.

Around 5 December 2024 (as reported), in Boyaca (Chone, Manabi), six men were shot and killed and their bodies were found tied-up on a road between Cucuy and the Platanales sector. Most of the gunshots were in their heads and the bodies had signs of torture. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 6 fatalities.

On 5 December 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men (drive-by) in the La Octubrina neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 5 December 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a street merchant (drive-by) on Y de Vuelta Larga locality, San Rafael sector. The victim was shot at least five time while working. The shots hit mainly the head and chest. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: Around 5 December 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Chongon (Guayas), a man was shot and killed and his body was found on the side of the Perimetral Highway, Tres Bocas sector. The victim was in his underwear and his hands were tied-up. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man outside of his house (drive-by) in the Jaime Roldos Aguilera cooperative. It is suspected the perpetrators were members of the Los Carniceros gang. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man inside his house in the Calderon citadel. The perpetrators fired at least five gunshots. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2024, in Machala (El Oro), several unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man inside a house between Pasaje and Fulton Franco Streets. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the El Murcielago neighbourhood. A motorbike was found burned out on the road to San Juan. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2024, in Nueva Loja (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man inside a house in the El Pondo neighbourhood. The victim was shot several times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2024, in Patricia Pilar (Buena Fe, Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man riding a motorbike (drive-by) in the San Pablo parish. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 December 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the San Alejo citadel. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 6 December 2024 (as reported), in Huaquillas (El Oro), a man was shot and killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied up in the Las Brisas del Mar neighbourhood. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 6 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as members of a criminal) group kidnapped an informal taxi driver and held him for ransom in the El Fortin sector, Nueva Prosperina neighbourhood. The victim was rescued on the same day with his hands tied. There were no arrests. There is no further information available.

On 6 December 2024, in Quinsaloma (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the Santa Rosa neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Property destruction: On 6 December 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), armed forces seized 13 large packages of drugs buried in black bags in the Rio Cana sector. There were no arrests.

notes: On 6 December 2024, in Tena (Napo), nearly 1,000 people, accompanied by the mayor and led by members of social organisations and Kichwa indigenous groups (including members of the CONFENIAE) burned logs and tires and marched to the governor's office to demand that the government stop the construction of a maximum-security prison in Archidona, which will deeply affect the canton.

On 6 December 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men (drive-by) in the Zone H. Both victims were shot in the head and one of the victims had criminal records for illegal possession of firearms and homicide. Both had survived previous attempts at armed attacks. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 6 December 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), police and armed forces through the security block arrested 45 people, 23 of whom had criminal records and were involved in extortions and kidnappings. The operation was carried out in the El Tablazo, El Cerro and Anconcito areas. In total, six firearms, 85 dynamite sticks, eight cars, six motorbikes, four boats and 108 gallons of petrol were seized.

On 6 December 2024, in Nueva Loja (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed four men and injured another (drive-by) on Progreso Avenue and Libertador Bolivar, near the bus terminal. The perpetrators were carrying high-calibre firearms and one of the victims was a sign language interpreter in the provincial government. Two victims had criminal records. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 6 December 2024, in San Pablo (Portoviejo, Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. The perpetrator shot the victim 18 times and he was arrested and sentenced to 40 years in prison. The motorbike used in the shooting was abandoned in the Cevallos citadel. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 7 December 2024, in Tonsupa (Atacames, Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a communal leader in a drive-by shooting in the Tierra Prometida sector. The victim had received several death threats, had his car set on fire before and suffered an assassination attempt. The mastermind of the crime was a female foreign citizen who was arrested on 9 December. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 7 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed three people (drive-by) in the Union de Bananeros sector, Guasmo Central. Three other people were injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 7 December 2024, in El Salitre (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man (drive-by) near the Juan Carlos Macias stadium. The victim had two criminal records for carrying firearms and robbery from 2010 and 2013. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a vehicle (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Santa Clara neighbourhood. A burned-out vehicle was found in the Los Espinos sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle and dressed in police uniforms shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the La Paz neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 7 December 2024, around Pichincha province (coded Quito), police forces with the support of the ministry of the interior, destroyed one ton of cocaine paste and 6.2 tons of cocaine hydrochloride using the encapsulation method. In total, 7.2 tons of drugs were destroyed, which amounts to a value of $760 millions in the international markets. The drugs were seized between 1 January and 1 December.

On 7 December 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an off-duty police officer outside a commercial establishment. The victim was shot six times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Telegrafo; El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 8 December 2024, in Taura (Guayas), four minors were killed by military officers who forcibly took them while playing football in the Las Malvinas neighborhood of Guayaquil. After being taken, the minors contacted their families, reporting they were transported to Taura, where they were beaten and abandoned. In a first instance, police arrived to the location but did not find the minors. On 24 December 2024, authorities discovered four burned bodies in Taura. Subsequent forensic investigations confirmed the remains belonged to the missing minors. Sixteen military personnel are under investigation and in preventive detention for suspected forced disappearance. 4 fatalities.

On 8 December 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unidentified armed individual (described as a hitman) shot and injured a Venezuelan citizen. The suspect escaped with his companion. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 8 December 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the Loma de Franco sector. The victim had received death threats. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 8 December 2024, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals fired shots at a house after sending extortion messages to the local residents. Both suspects were arrested.

On 8 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Garcia Moreno (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a vehicle shot and injured five people in a drive-by shooting in the Cristo del Consuelo neighbourhood. One victim had a criminal record. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 8 December 2024, in Playas (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle (described as hitmen) shot and killed two brothers (drive-by) in the Hospitalaria neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 8 December 2024, in Puerto Lopez (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed an off-duty public transit agent (drive-by) in the Puerto Lopez boardwalk. Another agent was shot and injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 December 2024, in Salinas (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the La Concepcion neighbourhood, Santa Rosa parish. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador)
notes: On 8 December 2024, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a man inside a barbershop on Sucre and Juan X. Marcos Streets. The victim had received several threatening pamphlets earlier and it is likely the killing was related to extortions or drug trafficking disputes. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 December 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Juan Montalvo citadel. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.
