source: Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; Wambra Medio Comunitario
notes: On 9 December 2024, in Archidona (Napo), local residents led by members of social organizations and Kichwa indigenous groups (including members of the CONFENIAE) burned logs and tires and marched and blocked the Amazonian Road that connects Napo with Orellana and Sucumbios in strong opposition to the construction of a maximum-security prison in the Yawari sector. The demonstrators gave the government 24 hours to stop the project which already started on Napo Avenue under the threat of the local mayor of radicalization of the demonstrations. As a consequence of the demonstrations, president Daniel Noboa (ADN) issued Executive Decree 476 (coded separately), appointing a new governor for the province of Napo, replacing the previous one who resigned.

Other: On 9 December 2024, in Quito - Manuela Saenz (Pichincha), president Daniel Noboa (ADN) issued Executive Decree 476, appointing a new governor for the province of Napo due to the ongoing demonstrations against the construction of a maximum-security prison in the Archidona canton. The new governor will replace the former governor who resigned from her role due to the crisis.

assoc_actor_1: Kichwa Indigenous Group (Ecuador); CONFENAIE: Confederation of Indigenous Nationalities of the Ecuadorian Amazon; Indigenous Group (Ecuador)
source: El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 10 December 2024, in Archidona (Napo), local residents from Jumandi, Beto and Wami led by members of social organizations and Kichwa indigenous groups (including members of the CONFENIAE) burned logs and tires and marched along Misahualli bridge. They blocked the Amazonian Road that connects Napo with Orellana and Sucumbios in strong opposition to the construction of a maximum-security prison in the Yawari sector. The demonstrators gave the government 24 hours to stop the project which already started on Napo Avenue under the threat of the local mayor of radicalization of the demonstrations. As a consequence of the demonstrations, president Daniel Noboa (ADN) issued Executive Decree 476 (coded separately), appointing a new governor for the province of Napo, replacing the previous one who resigned.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Defusal: On 10 December 2024, in Machala (El Oro), police forces with the support of the bomb squad defused 10 dynamite sticks rigged inside a car near the La Primavera Highway, Urseza 2 neighbourhood. President Daniel Noboa (ADN) will participate in an event near the location. No material damages or casualties were reported.

On 10 December 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces arrested 14 members of Los Aguilas gang, including a high-profile leader. Around 20kg of cocaine, 160g of marijuana, a firearm, 13 ammunition cartridges, an ammo feeder, three vehicles, 11 cell phones, cash and clothing were seized during operation 'Onix'.

Defusal: On 10 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces with the support of the bomb squad defused a vehicle rigged with explosives near the Judicial Complex Alban Borja. The judge's vehicle had been set up with bombs by unknown individuals. There were no material damages or casualties but the building was evacuated for safety reasons.

On 10 December 2024, in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), three unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a man during a kidnapping in the La Roldos sector. The victim managed to escape. There were no fatalities.

Around 10 December 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped an off-duty security guard between the Sauces 5 and the Las Orquideas sector. The victim's family received extortion threats. There is no further information available.

On 11 December 2024, in Tarqui (Cuenca, Azuay), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man (drive-by) between 106 Street and 109 Avenue, El Rosario neighbourhood. The victim had no criminal records. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 11 December 2024 (as reported), in Alto Tambo (San Lorenzo, Esmeraldas), a man was killed and his body was found along the San Lorenzo-Ibarra Highway, near the Durango precinct. The victim had been taken during what was suspected to be a military operation. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants kidnapped an elderly man in a wheelchair and held him for ransom in the La Casuarina sector. The victim ended up dying upon his release due to illnesses and the fact that he wasn't fed nor given water for four days. Six suspects were arrested. There is no further information available. 1 fatality.
On 11 December 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), a group of local residents beat up a man who was trying to kidnap a woman. There were no fatalities.

Around 11 December 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two men were shot and killed and their bodies found inside a vehicle with their hands and feet tied up, their mouths gagged, and their faces covered in packing tape in the Stella Maris cooperative. The vehicle had been stolen in the Los Esteros sector and it was found on 25 de Julio Avenue, Guasmo Sur region. It is suspected that two men abandoned the car where it was found. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 11 December 2024, in Junquillal (Salitre, Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the Junquillal parish. The victim was shot at least five times and some gunshots hit him in the head. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 December 2024, in Montalvo (Los Rios), four unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the 24 de Mayo compound. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 12 December 2024 (as reported), in Arenillas (El Oro), a man was killed and his beheaded body was found tied up and showing signs of torture in the Colinas de Santa Fe citadel. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 12 December 2024, in Machala (El Oro), police forces deployed an operation to curb drug trafficking and demolished several houses used for drug sales on Junin Street, Urdesa Este, Machala Libre and Ciudadela El Seguro. There were no arrests.

On 12 December 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed two men inside an abandoned house in the Autoridad Portuaria neighbourhood, known as El Pampon. One of the victims had drugs in his hands and the perpetrators fired more than 20 gunshots. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 12 December 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a security guard was killed and his body was found near the traffic interchange on the Narcisa de Jesus-Pascuales Highway. The victim had been kidnapped on the 10 December while riding his motorbike from Sauces 5 to the Las Orquideas sector. The victim's family received extortion threats. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), three unidentified armed individuals in two vehicles shot and killed a man driving another vehicle in a drive-by shooting in the Samanes 2 sector. The victim's daughter was not harmed but an elderly man was taken and later left in the Las Orquideas sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) in a vehicle shot and killed a man inside his house, where he operated a locksmith business, in a drive-by shooting in the Costa Azul 1 neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 December 2024, in Rosa Zarate (Quininde, Esmeraldas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving a vehicle (drive-by) on E-20 State Highway, La Independencia sector. The victim was shot once in the head. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 13 December 2024 (as reported), in Daule (Guayas), a man was killed and his body was found with multiple blows to the head and his hands tied behind his back in a sewer in the Las Minas sector, Los Lojas parish. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 13 December 2024 (as reported), in Quito - La Delicia (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped two people and kept them in the Santo Antonio neighbourhood, near the Catechin hill. Police forces rescued the victim. There is no further information available.

On 13 December 2024, in Puerto Providencia (Shushufindi, Sucumbios), three unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an adolescent inside a tire repair shop (drive-by) in the Nueva Vida complex. Later, three suspects were arrested in Nueva Loja, Lago Agrio canton. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 December 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals (described as hitmen) on motorbikes shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. One suspect was arrested and sent to El Rodeo prison and then to the Penitenciaria del Litoral in Guayaquil. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 14 December 2024, in Quito - Eloy Alfaro (Pichincha), a member of Los Lobos gang shot and killed a man on Jose Maria Aleman and Juan Barreto Streets, Solanda neighborhood. The victim had criminal records for theft and the attack motivation was related to a dispute over money obtained through extortion. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 14 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), police forces with the support of canine units seized 3,864 brick-shaped packages of cocaine hydrochloride weighing 3.7 tons hidden inside a shipment bound for Belgium. The operation 'Poseidon LX' was carried out in the Los Esteros sector and the shipment was worth $147 million.

On 14 December 2024, in Pascuales (Guayaquil - Pascuales , Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an adolescent and then fled on a motorbike. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 December 2024, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman in a drive-by shooting on 16 Este and Hector Chica Streets, Martha Bucaram neighborhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 14 December 2024 (as reported), in Duran (Guayas), a man was killed and his beheaded body was found wrapped in sheets in the Las Terrazas neighborhood. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), police forces shot and injured a man during a police patrol in the Samanes Park. The victim had tried to flee from a police approach and was later taken to the hospital and then a hearing without being offered assistance. The victim died during the hearing. 1 fatality.
Property destruction: On 15 December 2024, in Colonche (Santa Elena), armed forces destroyed a clandestine runway linked to drug trafficking activities. There were no arrests.

Around 15 December 2024 (as reported), in Quevedo (Los Rios), a woman was killed and her body was found naked and with signs of torture in the La Carmita subdivision, El Guayacan parish. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 15 December 2024 (as reported), in Daule (Guayas), a man was shot three times in the head and killed and his body was found in the Los Alamos citadel. The victim had no criminal records. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Urdaneta (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man (drive-by) on Ayacucho and 19 Streets. The victim's brother and his wife were injured and neither of the three victims had criminal records. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the 15 de Abril citadel, known as La Cuca. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 December 2024, in Quevedo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals beat up, fired shots and injured a priest in the San Camilo parish. The victim was kidnapped and then later released. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 15 December 2024 (as reported), in San Pablo (Santa Elena), a man was stabbed and killed and his body was found with signs of torture in a vacant lot near a cemetery. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 16 December 2024 (as reported), in Ambato (Tungurahua), a man was stabbed 10 times in the neck and his body was found on the Paltacalo and Yahuarcocha Streets, El Buen Pastor neighborhood. It is suspected the killing was perpetrated by two women and a man who were arrested in the Simon Bolivar citadel. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 16 December 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces with the support of canine units seized 3,309 brick-shaped packages of cocaine weighing 3.2 tons hidden inside a container bound for Germany. Three people were arrested.

Property destruction: On 16 December 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as delinquents fired shots at several commercial premises located between Reales Tamarindos Avenue and Atanasio Santos. It is suspected the attack was related to extortions. The gunshots caused material damage only.

On 16 December 2024, in Arenillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a taxi driver (drive-by) while he was driving on Panamericana Street. The victim was shot several times in the head. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 December 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), two unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed (drive-by) a man on Eleodoro Solorzano Avenue, Abdon Calderon neighborhood. A crowd of local residents tried to lynch the hitmen and set them on fire but the police arrested them after they crashed the motorbike during the escape. Police seized the firearm and a motorbike. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 16 December 2024, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man (drive-by) near the entrance to the San Vicente de Paul hospital. The victim was a relative of a man who had been released from prison six months ago. The man who had been released from prison was also killed on 16 December along with another person. It is suspected the attack could be linked to possible settling of scores or conflicts between criminal groups. 3 fatalities.

On 17 December 2024, in Tarqui (Cuenca, Azuay), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and injured a female employee of a local public institution on J13 Street, Jocay neighborhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.
tags: local administrators; women targeted: government officials

notes: On 17 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of local residents and merchants beat up two unidentified armed individuals described as delinquents in the Florida neighborhood. The suspects were involved in thefts and at least one of them was arrested after. There were no fatalities.

On 17 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), four unidentified armed men (described as delinquents) on two motorcycles beat, shot and killed an adolescent in front of his family in Flor de Bastion. The body of the victim was taken to another location by the perpetrators and was found alongside three others on 22 December 2024 near the Chongon reservoir (coded separately). No arrests were made. 1 fatality.

Around 17 December 2024 (as reported), in Ambato (Tungurahua), three people were shot and killed and their bodies were found on the road to Las Vinas, Manantial neighborhood, Pishilata parish. It is suspected the perpetrators were driving two vehicles. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 18 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Letamendi (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a couple inside a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Pedro Robles Chambers Street, between Babahoyo and Lizardo Garcia. The perpetrators were dressed as water company workers and they got off the vehicle during the shooting. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 18 December 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a man (drive-by) in the Voluntad de Dios sector. The victim was dedicated to reading electric meters and he was working on a lamppost at the time he was shot in the eye and hospitalized in a critical state. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 18 December 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man riding a motorbike (drive-by) in the Union Lojana sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 18 December 2024 (as reported), in Portoviejo (Manabi), two men were killed and their dismembered bodies were found inside a briefcase and two plastic bags on Cordova and Atahualpa Streets, near Pio Noveno Church. Later, in the Bahia Rio sector, other human parts were found in two more sacks which are suspected to belong to the same victims. On 26 December, more human remains suspected to belong to one of the victims were found in El Mamey park. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 18 December 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man (drive-by) on Madero Vargas Street, Autoridad Portuaria neighborhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), several unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man driving a vehicle on Abdon Calderon Avenue, Union de Bananeros cooperative, Guasmo Sur. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a man in the Bellavista 1 neighborhood. The perpetrators fled towards 4 de Noviembre neighborhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 December 2024, in Daule (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the Juan Bautista Aguirre citadel. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals in a car and described as hitmen shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the Juan Montalvo sector. Another person was also injured by the perpetrators who used pistols and rifles. It is suspected the target was a third person who managed to escape. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 December 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man inside a car (drive-by) on 25 de Junio Avenue, in front of the Gran Piazza, Las Brisas citadel. The perpetrators fired at least 30 rifle gunshots and also injured a woman. The motorbike was later found on Ferroviaria Avenue. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 December 2024, in Montalvo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and injured a man and a woman (drive-by) riding a motorbike in the Y sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 19 December 2024, in the rural area of the Montecristi canton (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed two men and injured three others (drive-by) in the Pile community. The vehicle used by the perpetrators was found burned out in the Rio Cana community. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 19 December 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man (drive-by) on the road to Crucita. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 December 2024, in Machala (El Oro), a woman was killed and her body was found in a dump showing signs of torture on Pajonal Road. The victim had been kidnapped on the same day by unidentified armed individuals dressed as police forces. The victim was arrested in 2023 for being a part of a criminal group dedicated to robbing people after bank money withdrawals. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 December 2024, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and injured a man (drive-by) between Pedro Gual and Morales Streets. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 20 December 2024 (as reported), in the rural area of the Ventanas canton (Los Rios), a man was killed and his beheaded body was found in the La Polvareda sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 20 December 2024 (as reported), in El Guabo (El Oro), unidentified assailants tortured, shot, and killed three men, leaving their bodies on the road to San Vicente. The victims were found with gunshot wounds to the head, and had ropes binding their hands. One of the victims had a prior criminal record for robbery in 2021. A threatening leaflet and photos of suspected gang leaders were left at the scene, suggesting the killings were part of a territorial dispute between rival criminal groups. 3 fatalities.

On 20 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) exited a vehicle, shot and killed man in the passenger seat of a pickup truck near the Puerto-Aeropuerto road. The assailants used a rifle and a pistol and fled the scene. Police confirmed that the same assailants were involved in a separate attack that day in La Florita where they killed a man with a theft record and injured four people including two women, a man and a minor. No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear. 2 fatalities.

On 20 December 2024, in Santa Lucia (Guayas), four unidentified armed assailants abducted a man at the malecon (promenade), forcing him into a car. No arrests were made, and the motives remain unclear.

On 21 December 2024, in Valencia (Los Rios), two unidentified armed men arrived in a vehicle, entered a hair salon, and shot and killed two men. One victim was suspected of involvement in illicit activities, and the incident is believed to have been a settling of scores. No arrests were made. 2 fatalities.

On 21 December 2024, in Pasaje canton (coded as Pasaje de las Nieves, El Oro), the police arrested the leader of a criminal organization linked to the attack on the director of the Machala prison (coded separately), near Las Gaviotas sector. With the coordination of the El Oro Governor's Office, they carried out a strategic operation that resulted in his arrest and the seizure of high-caliber firearms.

On 21 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants (described as delinquents) on a motorcycle shot and injured a man driving another motorcycle in Florestal 2 neighborhood (drive-by). The injured man was transported to a hospital and his condition remains unknown. No arrests were made. There were no fatalities.

On 21 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), six unidentified armed men on three motorcycles shot and killed a man standing on a sidewalk in Flor de Bastion (drive-by). The assailants fired multiple shots before fleeing the scene. The victim, who had no prior criminal record, was pronounced dead at the scene. The incident is suspected to be linked to ongoing violence between rival factions, Tiguerones Fenix and Tiguerones Igualitos. 1 fatality.

On 22 December 2024, in Santa Marta (Vinces, Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants shot at a couple traveling by car. The woman was killed by a shot in the head, and her husband was injured by a shot in the thorax. No arrests were made. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: Around 22 December 2024 (as reported), near Chongon (Guayas), at least three male bodies were found in a body of water near the Via a la Costa road, near km 24. The bodies were found alongside the body of a minor who had been killed by unknown assailants on the 17 December 2024 in Pascuales (coded separately). The three bodies have not been identified and no arrests were made. At least 3 fatalities.

On 22 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a group unidentified armed assailants intercepted a vehicle near an educational facility on 6 de Marzo and Vacas Galindo streets and opened fire, killing two occupants and seriously injuring a third. The perpetrators used high-caliber weapons. No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear. 2 fatalities.

Around 22 December 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), residents discovered a dismembered body in an abandoned pickup truck with multiple bullet holes in Flor de Bastion (Block 7). No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 23 December 2024, at a port in Guayaquil (Guayas), police seized 1,257.68 kilograms of cocaine hidden in plastic bundles within a container of canned tuna. The shipment was destined for Vigo, Spain. Investigations are ongoing to identify those involved.

Property destruction: On 24 December 2024, off the Coast of La Libertad (Santa Elena), navy forces seized 2,334 brick-shaped packages of cocaine hydrochloride hidden in 68 jute sacks weighing 2.57 tons. Eight fiberglass speedboats and one fishing vessel were seized 400km off coast and 21 suspects were arrested, being 14 of them foreigners. 56 fuel canisters, 15 cell phones, two satellite devices and three GPS devices were also seized.

On 24 December 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), a group of unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen), dressed in military uniforms, shot and killed one man and injured two others after forcibly entering a home. No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 24 December 2024, off the coast of Santa Elena (coded as Coast of Salinas), navy officers intercepted a fishing vessel towing eight small boats carrying 68 packages of suspected drugs. Approximately 7,571 liters of gasoline were seized from the fishing vessel and 6,813 liters from the small boats. 21 individuals (20 Ecuadorians and one Colombian) were arrested.

On 24 December 2024, in Machala (El Oro), a man was shot and killed by two armed assailants on a motorcycle in a drive-by on Avenue Colon Tinoco. No arrests were made, and the motives remain unclear. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 24 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) in a red car shot and killed a father and daughter, and injured two minors and one adult in the vehicle, on the road to San Mateo (drive-by). The man, a ship captain, had no criminal record, while the daughter is under investigation for weapons possession. No arrests were made, and the motive remains unclear. 2 fatalities.

On 24 December 2024, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on at least one motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed an off-duty police officer in the Abdon Calderon neighborhood (drive-by). Other people were also injured. One suspect was arrested. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2024, in Pasaje canton (coded to Buenavista, El Oro), two unidentified armed assailants who arrived on a motorcycle shot and killed a man inside a local restaurant. The assailants fled the scene and no arrests were made. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Labor Group (Ecuador); Military Forces of Ecuador (2023-); Private Security Forces (Ecuador)
notes: On 25 December 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), thirty unknown heavily-armed individuals dressed as soldiers and driving vehicles with armed forces logos shot and killed a worker and injured a soldier at the construction site of a mega-prison. A construction engineer, a plumbing technician and two security guards were kidnapped and later released. Explosive devices were also detonated at the site. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), a security guard from Puerto Maritimo was shot and killed by unidentified armed assailants while riding a motorcycle on Avenida 25 de Julio. The attack is suspected to be linked to a 3-ton drug seizure at the port on 15 December (coded separately). No arrests were made. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Febres Cordero (Guayas), close to 15 unidentified armed assailants (described as delinquents) in a grey double-cabin truck and motorcycles forcibly entered a home in Sedalana neighborhood, robbing valuables and abducting a taxi driver. No contact or ransom demands have been made by the perpetrators, and no arrests have been reported.

On 25 December 2024, in El Guabo (El Oro), two men were shot and killed by unidentified armed assailants in the El Chofer neighborhood. The assailants left pamphlets with threats directed at other potential targets, reinforcing police suspicions that the incident was a turf-related dispute linked to drug trafficking. No arrests were made. 2 fatalities.

On 25 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), a man driving a motorcycle was shot and killed by unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle (described as hitmen) in a drive-by shooting in La Pradera 1 neighborhood. No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants in a vehicle shot at three men in the 15 de Abril neighborhood (drive-by). One man was killed, and two others were injured and taken to a medical facility. No arrests were made. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2024, in Picoaza (Portoviejo, Manabi), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed assailants (described as delinquents). On 26 December 2024, his body was exhumed, dismembered, and parts were discarded across the parish. A threatening note was found with the remains. Police confirmed the remains belonged to the victim. No arrests were made. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2024, in Puebloviejo (Los Rios), an unidentified number of armed assailants in a vehicle shot and killed a teenage athlete riding a motorcycle in San Juan parish (drive-by). No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador en Vivo; Ecuavisa; Primicias
notes: On 25 December 2024, in Simon Bolivar (Santa Elena), thirty unidentified armed assailants (described as criminals) dressed in military uniforms entered the construction site of the jail in Juntas del Pacifico and detonated several explosives, killing one construction worker and injuring at least one other. Subsequently, five people including the camp chief, a systems engineer, a hydro-sanitary technician, and two security guards were temporarily kidnapped and released by the armed forces. No arrests were reported. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot and killed a man on a bicycle (drive-by), then fled the scene. No arrests were made and the motives remain unclear. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2024, in San Juan (Los Rios), unidentified armed assailants on a motorcycle shot at two agricultural workers in the Colombia Chiquito neighborhood (drive-by). One man, who had a criminal record for theft and traffic violations, died shortly after the attack, while the other, with no criminal record, survived with gunshot injuries. No arrests were made. 1 fatality.
On 25 December 2024, in Bahia de Caraquez (Sucre, Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals killed a local resident. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 25 December 2024, in Bahia de Caraquez (Sucre, Manabi), people organized as a vigilante group executed two men involved in the killing of a local resident. 2 fatalities.

Around 25 December 2024 (as reported), in Turupamba (Biblian, Canar), a couple were shot and killed and their bodies were found on the road with a threatening pamphlet warning providing information to the authorities. It is suspected the killing was related to drug trafficking. The number of perpetrators and authorship are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 26 December 2024, in Playas (Guayas), a security guard was shot and killed by two unidentified armed assailants who arrived on a motorcycle. One of the assailants dismounted, shot the victim multiple times, and fled the scene. No arrests were made, and the motive remains unclear. 1 fatality.

On 26 December 2024, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), police forces arrested six members of Los Lobos gang, including a high-profile leader, and seized a revolver, drugs and cash during a raid in Comite del Pueblo.

On 26 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), unidentified armed assailants in a vehicle shot and killed a man outside a family member's home in the 15 de Septiembre neighborhood (drive-by). A two-year-old child and an elderly man were injured during the incident. The victim died at a hospital shortly after. A car was later found burned, suspected to have been used by the assailants. No arrests were made. 1 fatality.

On 27 December 2024, in Guayaquil (Guayas), two unidentified armed men stepped out of their car and shot at a taxi driver who was then taken to the hospital. No arrests were made and the motive is unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 27 December 2024 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an adolescent was shot and killed and his body was found tied-up in the Nueva Granada cooperative. The victim was being threatened to join a gang. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an adolescent in a drive-by shooting in the Melida Toral cooperative, Isla Trinitaria Island. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 27 December 2024, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police deactivated two explosive devices left at mobile phone shops in the commercial district. A minor suspected of planting the devices with extortion messages was arrested. Authorities suspect that he acted with accomplices using a black vehicle and motorcycle.

On 27 December 2024, in Flor de Bastion, Guayaquil - Tarqui, unidentified armed assailants in car shot at a man driving, who survived with injuries after crashing his car (drive-by). No arrests were made and the motive is unclear. There were no fatalities.

On 27 December 2024, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), a man was shot and killed by two unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) on a motorcycle while riding his bicycle near the entrance to Amazonas 1 neighborhood (drive-by). No arrests have been made, and the motive remains unclear. 1 fatality.

On 27 December 2024, in Valencia (Los Rios), two unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed one man, and severely injured the other in a drive-by shooting on the intersection between Vicente Rocafuerte and 12 of July Cooperative. The motives remain unclear and no arrests were made. 1 fatality.

On 28 December 2024, in Ambato (Tungurahua), local residents using ropes and wires beat up a man involved in robberies on Leon Febres Cordero and Batalla de Tarqui streets. The victim was arrested. There were no fatalities.

On 28 December 2024, in Arenillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a taxi driver on Jose Joaquin de Olmedo Street, Central neighborhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 December 2024, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals dressed as soldiers in a vehicle shot and killed four people (drive-by) on 24 and T Streets. Two of the victims were adolescents and one was a woman who survived. Also, an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man (drive-by) on Victor Emilio Estrada and Callejon 36, Urdesa Central sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 28 December 2024, in Playas (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in motorbikes described as hitmen shot and killed a man (drive-by) on 24 de Septiembre and Eduardo Cruz Streets, near Bahia de Ropa. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 December 2024, in Santa Rosa (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man in the 29 de Noviembre neighborhood in a drive-by shooting. The perpetrators also fired high-calibre rifle shots at local residences. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 December 2024, in Valencia (Los Rios), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and injured his brother (drive-by) in the 12 de Julio cooperative. Neither of the victims had criminal records nor received death threats. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 December 2024, in Quito - Tumbaco (Pichincha), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a child from the Puembo sector and held him for ransom. The child was rescued by the police on 7 January, in the El Carmen canton, Manabi province. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 29 December 2024, in Duran (Guayas), several unidentified armed and hooded assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a man in the Abel Gilbert citadel. The victim was shot several times and he was the husband of a former assemblywoman and former mayor of Duran from 2014 to 2019. She was affiliated with the Citizen Revolution Movement party and was facing criminal proceedings for alleged embezzlement. The sector where the attack took place is under the control of the Chone Killers gang, but it is suspected the perpetrators were members of the Latin Kings gang. Two suspects were arrested on 31 December during raids on Cerro Santa Ana and Avenida del Ejercito. One vehicle and two cell phones were seized. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 29 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed and hooded individuals in a truck shot and killed three people in the La Pradera citadel. Another person was also injured and one of the victims was a known local teacher. The attack was related to drug trafficking disputes between Los Lobos and Los Choneros gangs. 3 fatalities.

Around 29 December 2024 (as reported), near Balzar (Guayas), three men and a woman were shot dead and their bodies were found outside and inside a car at KM-110 of the Balzar-El Empalme Highway, Feria de los Mangos sector. Three of the victims had criminal records. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 29 December 2024, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an off-duty second sergeant in the armed forces (drive-by) on Macara Alley and Benalcazar Street, 9 de Octubre neighborhood. The victim was driving a vehicle with his family, who managed to escape uninjured. 1 fatality.

On 29 December 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a mother and her daughter (drive-by). The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 29 December 2024, in Milagro (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped five musicians (mariachi) and held them for ransom. The victims were rescued by the police in the rural area of the Buena Fe canton, Los Rios province. The kidnapping was related to extortions. There is no further information available.

On 30 December 2024, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man driving a vehicle (drive-by) in the Los Andes sector, Limon Highway. The victim was shot at least 10 times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man and injured another (drive-by) in the Nuevo Tarqui commercial area. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 December 2024, in Montecristi (Manabi), several unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed three men in the Los Bajos sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 30 December 2024, in Pascuales (Guayaquil - Pascuales , Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and an adolescent (drive-by) on Francisco de Orellana Avenue. The man had a criminal record for theft. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 30 December 2024, in Santa Elena (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men (drive-by) in the Brisas del Mar neighborhood. One of the victims was the singer of a high-profile orchestra. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 30 December 2024 (week of), in Guayaquil (Guayas), unidentified armed individuals kidnapped four people around the Progreso neighborhood. Four victims were rescued by the police near an urban farm in the same area and one suspect was arrested and the rest of the perpetrators managed to escape. There is no further information available.

source: Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso
notes: Property destruction: On 31 December 2024, off the Coast of Manta (Manabi), navy forces seized 1.5 tons of cocaine hidden inside a boat, 213 nautical miles off the coast. Two suspects were arrested and 171 gallons of fuel were also seized.

On 31 December 2024, in the rural area of the Daule canton (Guayas), a group of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen in several vehicles invaded a house and shot and killed a man and a woman in the La Elvira compound, El Limonal parish. The perpetrators fired at least 20 gunshots. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 31 December 2024, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the Urbirrios sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 1 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a woman inside a vehicle on La Casuarina sector. The victim was the girlfriend of an active-duty police officer. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.
tags: women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons

notes: On 1 January 2025, in Manta (Manabi), several unidentified armed assailants shot and injured three people in the 8 de Abril neighborhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 1 January 2025, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men (drive-by) in the Miramar neighborhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador)
notes: On 1 January 2025, in Guayaquil (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed four people between the Mapasingue Este, Flor de Bastion and Guasmo Sur sector. At least six people were injured. Also, an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man inside his house in the Flor de Bastion sector. The victim was shot and hit by 30 bullets.The authorship and motivations are unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 1 January 2025, in Pasaje de las Nieves (El Oro), an unidentified armed individual on a motorbike shot and killed two men (drive-by) between the Primero de Noviembre and 19 de Julio neighborhoods. The perpetrator was arrested after the attack. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 1 January 2025, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the 3 de Diciembre Street. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 January 2025, in Machala (El Oro), three unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the 19 de Noviembre neighborhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Property destruction: On 2 January 2025, off the Coast of Manta (Manabi), navy forces seized 45 packages weighing approximately 1.8 tons of cocaine floating in two satellite buoys 240 nautical miles off the coast. There were no arrests.

Other: On 2 January 2025, in Guayaquil (Guayas), president Daniel Noboa (ADN) declared a new state of emergency with executive decree 493 in seven provinces and three cantons due to the internal armed conflict. The curfew-focused decree will be in effect for 60 days and will cover the provinces of Guayas, Los Rios, Manabi, Santa Elena, El Oro, Orellana, Sucumbios and the cantons of Quito, La Troncal in Canar and Camilo Ponce Enriquez in Azuay.

On 2 January 2025, in San Miguel de Salcedo (Cotopaxi), local residents from the Cumbijin community organized as a vigilante group beat up a Venezuelan man involved in the killing of a firefighter and applied indigenous justice. The perpetrator was paraded and beaten by a large group of people throughout the city. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 2 January 2025, in Jaramijo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man (drive-by). The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 2 January 2025, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and injured six people (drive-by) in the La Ensenadita neighborhood. A burned-out vehicle was found in the Bellavista neighborhood. Later, a man was shot and killed in the La Pradera citadel by hitmen in a motorbike. A woman was injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unidentified armed individual fired shots at a house and killed two people (drive-by) in the Martha de Roldos citadel. It is suspected the attack was related to drug trafficking disputes. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 3 January 2025, in Manta (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man (drive-by) in a tire repair shop on the Interbarrial Highway. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayaquil, Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a van shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the San Francisco cooperative. The victim was shot over 40 times and one suspect was arrested. Police seized two assault rifles, two revolvers, one pistol, nine ammo feeders, ammunition, explosive devices and ballistic vests. 1 fatality.

On 3 January 2025, in the rural area of the Colimes canton (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals armed with rifles and on a pickup-truck shot and killed a man inside his farm in the San Andres area, Colimes-Olmedo Road. The hitmen also beheaded the victim and took his head. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 3 January 2025, in Manta (Manabi), four unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes and described as hitmen shot and killed two foreign citizens (drive-by). The perpetrators were dressed as police officers. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 3 January 2025, in Quito - Calderon (Pichincha), three members of Los Lobos gang beat up a homeless man and forced him to sell drugs, extort and rob on their behalf. All three perpetrators were arrested and they had several criminal records for robbery and drug trafficking. There were no fatalities.

Around 3 January 2025 (as reported), in Tisaleo canton (Tungurahua), a man was shot and killed and his body was found with 16 gunshot wounds. Authorities stated that the attack might be related to drug trafficking disputes. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 4 January 2025 (between 31 Dec - 4 Jan), off the Coast of Manta (Manabi), a man was shot and killed and his body was found floating in the sea. According to the Navy, another person was found injured and the shooting happened after a chase in international waters. The victims were kidnapped around 31 December. The area where the body was found is normally used by drug traffickers. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 4 January 2025, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the San Jacinto neighborhood. The shooting began after an argument at the foot of an effigy that was supposed to be burned for a local annual contest. The attack could be related to a settling of scores and the police seized a firearm and over 100 ammunition rounds in the victim's house. 1 fatality.

On 4 January 2025, in Duran (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a man and assaulted him inside his vehicle in the Primavera 1 sector. The victim was a taxi driver and he was rescued with multiple injuries by military personnel. Two suspects were arrested in the Casiguana sector. There were no fatalities.

On 4 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes and a car shot and killed a person (drive-by) in the San Eduardo sector. Police arrested five suspects in Guayaquil and Chongon who were members of Los Tiguerones gang and seized the vehicles. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: On 4 January 2025, in Quinsaloma (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified heavily-armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed three people and injured other seven (drive-by) in a fruit store on Pangua Avenue. Two of the victims, owners of the fruit store, were father and son and the other was a worker. One of the hitmen was shot and injured by his companions and left behind. It is suspected the shooting was related to extortion fees. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 4 January 2025, in Ambato (Tungurahua), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man inside his house. It is suspected the attack was related to drug trafficking disputes. The authorship is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 January 2025, in El Guabo (El Oro), police forces arrested two leaders of the Sao Box gang involved in kidnappings, extortions, robberies and drug trafficking. The raid was carried out in the Tendales parish and several firearms, ammunition, drugs (cocaine and marijuana), digital scales, cell phones, communication equipment and two motorbikes were seized.

On 4 January 2025, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the La Ventura sector. The victim was shot eight times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 January 2025, in Machala (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the San Ramon neighborhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 January 2025, in Puerto Bolivar (Machala, El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a van and dressed as army soldiers shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the Tiwintza neighborhood. The victim was shot six times in the head. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 January 2025, in Daule (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man (drive-by) on Rocafuerte Street, Abeja Maya sector. The hitmen shot the victim four times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), prisoners members of Los Lobos gang carried out a riot with the goal of killing the former vice president (MRC) locked in the Guayaquil liberty deprivation center, known as 'La Roca'. The order was given by the leader of the gang and the victim was evacuated without injuries. There were no fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Primicias
notes: On 5 January 2025, in Pascuales (Guayaquil - Pascuales , Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed three people on Misericordia Avenue, Las Monjas sector, Assad Bucaram cooperative. One victim was on the street and the two others, including a woman, were inside a building. The victims were members of an Christian group participating in a religious event and they had received death threats days before. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 5 January 2025, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man at the intersection of 16 Avenue and 18 Street, Abdon Calderon neighborhood. The victim, who had no criminal records, was shot multiple times in the head which suggests a settling of scores. Authorship is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 January 2025, in Quito - Quitumbe (Pichincha), local residents carrying signs, banners and burning tires marched on Mariscal Sucre and Emilio Uzcategui Avenues, near the Quitumbe and La Ecuatoriana bus terminals. The demonstrators complained to the municipality and the public works company about the delay in completing local street works.

On 6 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes and described as hitmen shot and killed a man (drive-by) on Garcia Moreno and Padre Solano Streets. It is suspected the attack was related to drug trafficking disputes. Also, an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed three drug users in the Bastion Popular sector. 4 fatalities.

On 6 January 2025, in Huaquillas (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the Los Ceibos neighborhood. The victim was a motorbike taxi driver. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals armed with high-calibre firearms shot and killed three people and injured three others in the Mucho Lote 1 sector. The perpetrators were described as members of a criminal group and they were dressed as police officers. More than 50 gunshots were fired and two of the victims were Venezuelan nationals. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 6 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed a man outside the civil registry, located on 25 de Julio Avenue, Los Esteros neighborhood. It is suspected the attack was related to drug trafficking disputes between the Los Carchineros gang and Los Tiguerones gang. 1 fatality.

On 6 January 2025, in the rural area of the La Esperanza canton (Quevedo, Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals kidnapped two supermarket workers and held them for ransom in the San Carlos area. The suspects managed to escape. Both victims were rescued blindfolded and tied by the police. There is no further information available.

On 6 January 2025, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified heavily-armed individuals carrying high-calibre rifles shot and killed a man in the Nueva Esperanza neighborhood, Eloy Alfaro parish. The hitmen shot the victim multiple times in the head. 1 fatality.

On 6 January 2025, in Ambato (Tungurahua), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a van shot and killed a man (drive-by) in the La Victoria neighborhood. The victim was shot several times in the head. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 6 January 2025 (as reported), in Mataje (San Lorenzo, Esmeraldas), a woman was killed and her body was found showing signs of violence. The victim was on a work trip to Esmeraldas to meet a client, an active-duty soldier, and she disappeared around Ibarra, Imbabura province. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2023-); Police Forces of Ecuador (2023-)
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 6 January 2025, in Santa Lucia (Guayas), three unidentified armed individuals described as hitmen on a motorbike shot and killed an off-duty sergeant of the Ecuador Transit Commission (CTE) and his friend (drive-by). The perpetrators used a pistol and a rifle. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 7 January 2025, in Pelileo (San Pedro de Pelileo, Tungurahua), local residents organized as a vigilante group carried out an Indigenous punishment on three thieves in the Quitocucho hamlet, Bolivar parish. The three suspects were beaten up and forced to walk half-naked as a part of the Indigenous justice. Police forces arrested the three suspects. There were no fatalities.

On 7 January 2025, in Rosa Zarate (Quininde, Esmeraldas), three members of Los Tiguerones gang shot and killed a man. All three perpetrators were arrested by the police and they had criminal records for several crimes such as homicide, robbery and drug trafficking. The motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Pascuales (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals described as members of a criminal group shot and killed a man in the Pie de Lucha cooperative, Pascuales sector. The victim was the owner of a clandestine rehabilitation center which served as a criminal hideout. The attack happened after a police operation in which eight suspects were arrested, one of them with criminal records, and several firearms and explosive devices were seized. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 January 2025, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on motorbikes or a car and described as hitmen shot and killed a man (drive-by) between the San Valentin and Los Jardines neighborhood, between the Eloy Alfaro and Tarqui parishes. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 January 2025, in Portoviejo (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man (drive-by) at a petrol station on Pedro Gual Street, between Coronel Sabando and 20 de Julio Streets, San Pablo de Portoviejo parish. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 January 2025, in Ambato (Tungurahua), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a man (drive-by) with a gunshot to the head. The victim had a criminal record for robbery and drug possession. The authorship and motivations are unknown. There were no fatalities.

On 8 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), local residents beat up a man attempting to steal a vehicle in the Puerto Santa Ana area. One person used a hammer against the thief who was arrested right after. There were no fatalities.

On 8 January 2025, in El Guabo (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man on VP1 Avenue and Santa Rosa Street. The victim was a well-known local seller. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 8 January 2025, in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), police forces with the support of a bomb squad carried out a controlled detonation on two explosive devices left in the Parada 12 sector. Later, another explosive device was deactivated at the intersection between Eloy Alfaro Avenue and 10 de Agosto Street. It is suspected the attack was related to extortion fees, a strategy used by criminal groups to intimidate local merchants.

On 8 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), four unidentified armed individuals in a van kidnapped an off-duty police officer and held him for ransom in the Pajaro Azul cooperative. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 8 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), three unidentified armed assailants described as hitmen shot and killed four men in the 26 de Febrero cooperative, Florida neighborhood, between the Martha de Roldos and Mapasingue Este sectors. The perpetrators fired at least 20 times and the victims had received death threats. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 4 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Ecuador (2023-); PSC: Social Christian Party (Ecuador)
notes: On 8 January 2025, in Guayaquil (Guayas), police forces arrested the former mayor of Duran (PSC). There were no reports on the motivation, but it is suspected that there is a price on the detainee's head, likely imposed by a criminal group. There is no further information available.

source: El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); Machala Movil; Primicias
notes: On 8 January 2025, in Puerto Lopez (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man (drive-by) during a funeral wake in the Jonas Gonzalez sector. A child was injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 January 2025, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man outside his house (drive-by) in the Las Minas sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 January 2025, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman (drive-by) riding a freight motorbike on the viaduct between El Salto and Barreiro parishes, Barreiro parish. The driver was shot and injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 January 2025, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals who arrived on a motorbike described as hitmen shot and killed a grill worker in a restaurant on Las Palmeras Avenue, between Sucre and 25 de Junio. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 January 2025, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed five people (drive-by) and injured three in the El Recreo sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 5 fatalities.

On 9 January 2025, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on two motorbikes shot and killed a man and injured four other people (drive-by) in the El Recreo neighborhood. The Latin Kings gang is the gang which controls the sector and it is suspected the attackers were members of the rivals Los Chone Killers gang. 1 fatality.

On 9 January 2025, in Guayaquil (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a truck shot and killed two Venezuelan men. Later, individuals on a motorbike shot and killed another man (drive-by) in the Portete neighborhood. It is suspected the perpetrators were members of the Los Tiguerones gang who are seeking to take control of the area. 3 fatalities.

On 9 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man and his stepdaughter (drive-by) in the Flor de Bastion sector. The perpetrators fired around 18 gunshots and the area is control of the Los Tiguerones gang. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 9 January 2025, in Portoviejo (Manabi), three unidentified armed individuals who arrived on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed two men and a child in a recycling plant on Vicente Mendoza Street, Fabian Palacios neighborhood. The perpetrators invaded the place, shot the workers and left right after the shooting. A woman was also injured. he authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 9 January 2025, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), four unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man at a food stand near the central market. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Property destruction: On 9 January 2025, in the rural area of the Puerto El Carmen parish (Putumayo, Sucumbios), armed forces incinerated 10,000 coca plants in a plantation in the Puerto Rodriguez sector. In the same canton, in another military operation, firearms, ammunition and petrol were seized. There were no arrests.

Around 9 January 2025 (as reported), in Esmeraldas (Esmeraldas), a female adolescent and her boyfriend were killed and their dismembered bodies were found in a mass grave in the Vencedores del Llano sector. The girl had disappeared from the Atacames canton on 5 January. Several suspects, some of them adolescents and others members of the Los Tiguerones gang, were arrested after posting a video of the execution online. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 10 January 2025, in El Porton (Machala, El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman (drive-by) riding her vehicle on the Pan-Americana Highway. The car flipped on a banana plantation and the victim was shot more than 15 times. It is suspected the motivation was a settling of scores. The authorship is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man at the entrance to the California business park. One of the perpetrators got off the vehicle and shot the victim eight times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man (drive-by) on Ernesto Alban Avenue, in the Los Almendros neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 January 2025, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike and described as hitmen shot and killed a man inside his vehicle (drive-by) near a school on 15 de Abril Avenue, between San Eduardo and Medardo Cevallos Streets, El Floron neighborhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 January 2025, in Rocafuerte (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man and injured two other passengers inside a pickup truck on Don Bosco Avenue and Elias Cedeno Street. The victim was the driver of an irregular van and the perpetrators fired more than 30 gunshots. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Defusal: On 10 January 2025, in Quito - Eugenio Espejo (Pichincha), police forces with the support of the bomb squad carried out a controlled detonation of a suspicious device left by unknown individuals on 6 de Diciembre Avenue.

On 10 January 2025, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals driving motorbikes shot and killed (drive-by) a man and injured two others in the Eugenio Espejo neighborhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.
Property destruction: On 10 January 2025, in Chanduy (Santa Elena), armed forces disabled a clandestine landing strip used by criminal organizations in the Tugaduaja commune.
On 10 January 2025, in Playas (Guayas), two unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) shot and killed a beach worker. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 January 2025, in Daule (Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man near the California business park. One suspect got out of the motorbike and shot the victim eight times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 January 2025, in Nueva Loja (Lago Agrio, Sucumbios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants (described as members of a criminal group) shot and killed an off-duty municipal guard in the Gilson Toledo neighbourhood. Three other people were injured. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 January 2025, in El Salitre (Salitre, Guayas), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting. It is suspected the victim was also armed. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 January 2025, in Playas (Guayas), several unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men in the La Finquita sector. The perpetrators placed two explosive devices in a house and set fire to two tricycles, a pickup truck and a car. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 10 January 2025 (as reported), in Loja (Loja), a man was shot multiple times in the head and his body was found on the Loja-Cuenca Highway, between the entrances to Zalapa Alto and Cera. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Ecuador (2023-); Private Security Forces (Ecuador); SUR Movement (Ecuador)
source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Diario Regional Los Andes; Ecuavisa; El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Prensa Chimborazo; Machala Movil
notes: On 11 January 2025, in Arenillas (El Oro), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike killed the mayor (SUR) in a drive-by shooting on Vicente Rocafuerte Avenue, Miraflores citadel. The motorbike belonged to a Peruvian police officer detained in the Puerto Pizarro prison since 2023 and it had been stolen on 10 January. The vehicle was abandoned right after the shooting and the perpetrators were carrying assault rifles. The victim's bodyguard and a child, suspected to be the victim's son, were injured. The fatal victim assumed the mayor's officer in May 2023. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Ecuavisa; El Comercio (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador); Machala Movil
notes: Around 11 January 2025 (week of), in Duran (Guayas), police forces arrested 57 suspects from the Los Chone Killers and Latin Kings gangs between 11-13 January. The suspects arrested, including two leaders, had criminal records for drug trafficking, robberies, homicides and others. It is suspected that those arrested were planning an attack between the two organisations due to territorial disputes. Police seized motorbikes, cell phones and other evidence. Most of the suspects were released so the police had to arrested at least 43 of them again.

On 11 January 2025, in Duran (Guayas), members of the Los Chone Killers gang shot and killed a truck driver in the Eloy Alfaro cooperative, Los Tubos sector. The victim had been threatened before by extortionists who were trying to force him to smuggle firearms and drugs in his truck. The victim's brother-in-law was shot dead after giving into the gang's pressure in 2023. 1 fatality.

On 11 January 2025, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants (described as delinquents) shot and killed a man in the Cinco de Junio cooperative. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 January 2025, in Duran (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants shot and killed a man outside of an entertainment centre. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 January 2025, in Portoviejo (Manabi), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man on San Ignacio de Andres de Vera Street. One of the perpetrators got off the bike and shot the victim. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuavisa; Expreso; Machala Movil
notes: On 11 January 2025, in La Libertad (Santa Elena), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) shot and killed four people, being three of them brothers, inside a house in the Lomas de Ballenita Sur neighbourhood. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 4 fatalities.

On 11 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man (drive-by) on Quisquis and Garcia Moreno Streets. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 January 2025, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a car shot and killed a man and injured three others (drive-by) in the La Ensenadita neighbourhood. It is suspected the attack was a settling of scores. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 January 2025, in Machala (El Oro), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed two men (drive-by) in the La Cuatro Mil neighbourhood. The perpetrators fired more than 40 times. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 11 January 2025, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants in a vehicle got out of a car and shot and killed a child and injured his father in the La Ventura sector. It is suspected that either both victims were collateral victims or that the father was the main target. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 January 2025, in Babahoyo (Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) shot and killed a man in the El Tropezon sector. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 12 January 2025, in Salasaca (San Pedro de Pelileo, Tungurahua), a crowd of local residents organised as a vigilante group carried out Indigenous justice and hung a man from his hands from a pedestrian bridge. The victim was trying to steal a vehicle and was later arrested by the police. There were no fatalities.

On 12 January 2025, in Catarama (Urdaneta, Los Rios), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a van kidnapped three men. Two victims were released. There is no further information available.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); El Diario (Ecuador); El Universo (Ecuador)
notes: On 12 January 2025, in Manta (Manabi), an unknown number of unidentified armed assailants (described as hitmen) in a vehicle got out and shot and killed two people and injured two others in the La Florida neighbourhood, Los Esteros parish. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 12 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a car guard (drive-by) in the Virgen de Monserrat cooperative. The victim was shot multiple times and he was also beaten. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 12 January 2025 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), three people were killed and their dismembered bodies were found inside jute sacks in the Socio Vivienda 2 sector. One victim was an army soldier, the other a woman, both of them were related, and the third victim was not identified. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; Ecuavisa; El Universo (Ecuador); La Republica (Ecuador)
notes: On 12 January 2025, in Manta (Manabi), four unidentified armed individuals in a pickup truck beat up and kidnapped six adolescents from San Mateo beach. The suspects tied them up, covered their faces, and took them to a hideout in the Sabana Grande sector. Five victims managed to escape but the perpetrators shot at them and injured at least three of them, who were rescued badly injured. One victim, a girl, was kept by the kidnappers. There were no fatalities.

Around 12 January 2025 (as reported), in Guayaquil - Tarqui (Guayas), a person was killed and their body was found in an advanced state of decomposition wrapped in plastic bags in the Puerto Santa Ana sector. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 12 January 2025 (as reported), in Tres Marias (Salitre, Guayas), a man was shot multiple times in the head and his body was found with a plastic bag around his head and showing signs of torture in a farm in the Vernaza parish. The number of perpetrators is unknown. The authorship and motivations are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Extra (Ecuador); Ecuador Comunicacion; El Universo (Ecuador); La Prensa Chimborazo
notes: On 12 January 2025, in Guayaquil - Ximena (Guayas), an unknown number of unidentified armed individuals in cars shot and killed five people and injured another (drive-by) in the 13 de Febrero cooperative, Floresta sector. The perpetrators fired at least 28 times. The area is controlled by the Los Lagartos gang and therefore the attack might be related to revenge between gangs. 5 fatalities.
